S01divyav_u:4: 001.001 buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:5: asmāt parāntake vāsavagrāme balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:7: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:8: 001.004 so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīnāyācate ārāmedavatāṃ vanadevatāṃ śṛṅgāṭakadevatāṃ balipratigrāhikāṃ devatām/
S01divyav_u:10: 001.006 asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante/
S01divyav_u:15: 001.008 api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrāa jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:20: 001.010 eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:36: 001.018 sā āttamanāttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati--diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva/
S01divyav_u:38: 001.019 yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:40: so 'pi āttamanāttamanā udānam udānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:46: 001.022 asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāmādeśayiṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:47_0: 001.024 āpannasattvāṃ ca tāṃ viditvā upariprasādatalagatāmayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte
S01divyav_u:51: 002.001 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:53: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇaviśālalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūruttuṅganāso ratnapratyuptikayā karṇikayā āmuktayālaṃkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:57: dharmatā yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartuṃ tasya koṭimūlyaṃ kriyate/
S01divyav_u:60: 002.007 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:61: 002.009 ayaṃ dārakaḥ koṭimūlyayā ratnapratyuptikayā āmuktayā jātaḥ,
S01divyav_u:63: bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa iti nāma/
S01divyav_u:65: tasminneva divase balasenasya gṛhapaterdvau preṣyadārakau jātau/
S01divyav_u:68: 002.012 śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:69: 002.013 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:71: 002.016 sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyām upanyastaḥ,
S01divyav_u:72: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:73: 002.017 so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍataḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:74: 002.018 tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:75: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:76: 002.019 trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi pratyupasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhakaṃ madhyamaṃ kanīyasam/
S01divyav_u:77: 002.020 sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:79: sa koṭikarṇastaṃ pitaraṃ paśyati nityaṃ kṛṣikarmānte--udyuktam/
S01divyav_u:83: yathā tvamupariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍasi ramasi paricārayasi,
S01divyav_u:92: tathāpi me ratnānāṃ parikṣayo na syāt/
S01divyav_u:96: balasenena gṛhapatinā vāsavagrāmake ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śroṇena koṭikarṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartum,
S01divyav_u:99: 002.032 balaseno nāma gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--[3]kīdṛśena yānena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yāsyati?
S01divyav_u:105: sa pitrā āhūyoktah--putra na tvayā sārthasya purastād gantavyam,
S01divyav_u:112: na ca te sārthavāhe hate sārtho vaktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:114: yuvābhyāṃ na kenacit prakāreṇa śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo moktavya iti//
S01divyav_u:115: 003.008 athāpareṇa samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayano mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--amba gacchāmi,
S01divyav_u:131: 003.015 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:133: atha śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ kṛtakautūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmoṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ samudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:135: 003.018 nipuṇataḥ sāmudram yānapātraṃ pratipādya mahāsamudramavatīrṇo dhanahārakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:137: tena tatropaparīkṣyopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tad vahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā tilataṇḍulakolakulatthānām/
S01divyav_u:140: sau śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'pi sārthavāho dāsakapālakāvādāya sārthamadhyādekānte 'pakramya āyaṃ vyayaṃ ca tulayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:148: 003.026 sa sārthaḥ sarātrimeva sthorāṃ lardayitvā saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:162: 003.031 bhavantaḥ, na śobhanaṃ kṛtam yadasmābhiḥ sārthavāhaśchoritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:167: āgacchata, kriyākāraṃ tāvat karmah--tāvanna kenacicchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāmārocayitavyam yāvad bhāṇḍaṃ pratiśāmitaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:169: 004.003 śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya mātāpitṛbhyāṃ śrutam--śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:174: paścāt te kathayanti--amba vismṛto 'smābhiḥ sārthavāha iti/
S01divyav_u:175: 004.007 tābhyāmeka āgatya kathayati--ayaṃ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo 'bhyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:176: 004.008 tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:180: 004.009 tasya tāvabhisāraṃ dattvā pratyudgatau na paśyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:182: tābhyāmudyāneṣu svakasabhādevakuleṣu cchatrāṇi vyajanāni kalaśāni upānahāni cākṣarāṇi abhilikhitāni dattāni sthāpitāni--yadi tāvacchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo jīvati,
S01divyav_u:188: 004.014 śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ sārthavāho 'pi sūryāṃśubhiḥ spṛṣṭa ātāpitaḥ prativibuddho yāvat sārthaṃ na paśyati nānyatra gardabhayānameva/
S01divyav_u:190: 004.016 rātrau ca vātena pravāyatā vālukayā mārgo vyapoḍhaḥ pithitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:191: te ca gardabhāḥ smṛtimanto gandhamāghrāyāghrāya śanairmandamandaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:192: 004.017 sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kasmādete śanairmandamandaṃ gacchantīti kṛtvā pratodayaṣṭyā tāḍitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:193: 004.018 te saṃbhrāntā ākulībhūtāḥ smṛtibhraṣṭā unmārgeṇa saṃprasthitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:195: 004.019 te tṛṣārtā vihvalavadanā jihvāṃ nirnāmayya gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:199: 004.021 ko 'sau nirghṛṇahṛdayastyaktaparalokaśca ya eṣāṃ pratodayaṣṭiṃ kāye nipātayiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:200: tena ta utsṛṣṭāh--adyāgreṇa acchinnāgrāṇi tṛṇāni bhakṣayata anavamarditāni,
S01divyav_u:204: yāvat paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:205: 004.025 tatra dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālo raudrāścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:207: upasaṃkramya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchati--asti atra bhoḥ puruṣa pānīyamiti/
S01divyav_u:211: tena sārthavāhena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdo niścāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:229: 005.005 ākrośakā roṣakā vayaṃ matsariṇaḥ kuṭukuñcakā vayam/
S01divyav_u:230: 005.006 dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//1//
S01divyav_u:233: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ pretanagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgacchan?
S01divyav_u:234: sa saṃprasthito yāvat tenāsau puruṣo dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:236: aho bata tvayā mamārocitaṃ syāt yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
S01divyav_u:240: yena tvaṃ pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:242: yāvadaparaṃ paśyati āyasaṃ nagaramuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:243: tatrāpi dvāre puruṣastiṣṭhati kālaścaṇḍo lohitākṣa udviddhapiṇḍo lohalaguḍavyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:251: 005.015 tena tatra praviśya pānīyaṃ pānīyam iti śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:270: 005.024 dānaṃ ca na dattamaṇvapi yena vayaṃ pitṛlokamāgatāḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:273: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śrutaḥ sa pretanagaraṃ praviśya kvastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvannirgacchan?
S01divyav_u:277: aho bata yadi tvayā mamārocitaṃ syād yathedaṃ pretanagaramiti,
S01divyav_u:281: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā pretanagaraṃ praviśya svastikṣemābhyāṃ jīvan nirgacchan?
S01divyav_u:285: 005.030 ekaḥ puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:290: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devo 'yaṃ vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:294: sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:301: 006.006 taistaṃ puruṣamavamūrdhakaṃ pātayitvā tāvat pṛṣṭavaṃśānutpāṭyotpāṭya bhikṣito yāvat sūryasyāstagamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:304: 006.008 sa ca puruṣastābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:312: 006.011 urabhrān praghātya praghātya māṃsaṃ vikrīya jīvikāṃ kalpayāmi/
S01divyav_u:322: kiṃ tvametānurabhrān divā praghātayasi āhosvidū rātrau?
S01divyav_u:329: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ divyaṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:331: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:337: sa urabhrān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
S01divyav_u:345: vaktavyastava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:347: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:349: 006.029 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:352: 006.031 tatra ekā apsarā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā,
S01divyav_u:353: ekaśca puruṣa abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikah aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate [7]paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:354: 007.001 sa taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:358: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:361: sa tasmin vimāne tāvat sthito yāvat sūryasyāstaṃgamanakālasamayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:368: tayā tasya puruṣasya kāyena kāyaṃ saptakṛtvo veṣṭayitvā tāvaduparimastiṣkaṃ bhakṣayantī sthitā,
S01divyav_u:372: sa ca puruṣo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikastayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:395: 007.018 yattanmayā āryasya kātyāyanasyāntikād divā śīlasamādānaṃ gṛhītam,
S01divyav_u:396: tasya karmaṇo vipākena divā evaṃvidhaṃ divyasukhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:398: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātrāvevaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi/
S01divyav_u:412: vaktavyah--tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇakalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:414: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya/
S01divyav_u:416: apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:419: tatraikā strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepanā/
S01divyav_u:421: 007.032 sā taṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā pratyavabhāṣitumārabdhā--[8]śroṇa, svāgatam/
S01divyav_u:423: sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ devīyaṃ vā nāgī vā yakṣī vā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:429: mā dāsyasīti uktvā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmasvakaṭāṃ pratyakṣīkartukāmā vimānaṃ praviśyāvasthitā/
S01divyav_u:452: cittamabhiprasannaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa mayā prasādajātayā piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:459: 008.017 sa ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
S01divyav_u:462: so 'marṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako busaplāvīṃ na bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:469: so 'pi ruṣito yāvad brāhmaṇānāṃ na dīyate,
S01divyav_u:472: so 'pi amarṣajātaḥ kathayati--kasmāt sa muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako 'yoguḍaṃ na bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:474: 008.024 nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ mama jñātayaḥ praheṇakāni preṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:476: sā praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā mama lūhāni upanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:477: 008.026 ahaṃ teṣāṃ jñātīnāṃ saṃdiśāmi--kiṃ nu yūyaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni praheṇakāni preṣayata?
S01divyav_u:478: te mama saṃdiśanti--na vayaṃ lūhāni preṣayāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:481: mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvāsmakaṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi?
S01divyav_u:482: sā kathayati--kiṃ svamāṃsaṃ na bhakṣayati yā tvadīyāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayatīti?
S01divyav_u:483: iyaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena svamāṃsāni bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:484: 008.032 nakṣatrarātryāṃ pratupasthitāyāṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni dattvā jñātīnāṃ preṣayāmi/
S01divyav_u:485: 008.033 sā dārikā tāni praṇītāni praheṇakāni mārge 'ntarbhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:486: 009.001 [9]te mama saṃdiśanti--kiṃ nu tvaṃ durbhikṣe yathā lūhāni asmākaṃ praheṇakāni preṣayasi?
S01divyav_u:490: mā tvaṃ praṇītāni praheṇakāni bhakṣayitvā teṣāṃ lūhāni upanāmayasi/
S01divyav_u:491: 009.004 sā kathayati--kiṃ nu pūyaśoṇitaṃ na bhakṣayati,
S01divyav_u:494: 009.005 mama buddhirutpannā--tatra pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇīyām yatraitān sarvān svakaṃ svakaṃ karmaphalaṃ paribhuñjānān paśyeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:495: 009.006 yayā mayāryamahākātyāyanaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇīte trāyastriṃśe devanikāye upapattavyam,
S01divyav_u:499: 009.009 sā tvayā vaktavyā--dṛṣṭāste mayā pitā mātā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
S01divyav_u:505: vaktavyā--tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catvāro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇasya pūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:508: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:510: 009.015 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:512: 009.016 evaṃ tasya paribhramato dvādaśa varṣā atikrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:518: śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇaṃ suptameva vāsavagrāmake paitṛke udyāne sthāpayitvā āgacchata/
S01divyav_u:520: 009.020 sa prativibuddho yāvat paśyati ghaṇṭāchatrāṇi vyajanāni,
S01divyav_u:525: 009.022 sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi ahaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mṛta eva gṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:530: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--ehi śroṇa,
S01divyav_u:532: 009.026 dṛṣṭaste śroṇa ayaṃ lokaḥ paraśca lokah?
S01divyav_u:534: 009.027 labheyāhaṃ bhadanta mahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:549: sa tava pitā kathayati--asti sūnādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:552: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:554: 010.002 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādāya gacchet/
S01divyav_u:567: adya mama piturdvādaśa varṣāṇi kālaṃ gatasya/
S01divyav_u:568: asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan?
S01divyav_u:574: tava pitrā agniṣṭomasyādhastāt suvarṇasya kalaśaḥ pūrayitvā sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:576: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:578: 010.011 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:587: dṛṣṭāste mayā mātā pitā bhrātā bhrāturjāyā dāsī/
S01divyav_u:592: 010.017 asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭaḥ paralokaṃ gatvā punarāgacchan?
S01divyav_u:597: tava paurāṇe paitṛke vāsagṛhe catasro lohasaṃghāṭāḥ suvarṇapūrṇāstiṣṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:600: āryaṃ ca mahākātyāyanaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya,
S01divyav_u:602: 010.022 apyevaitat karma tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchet/
S01divyav_u:609: śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvo 'yaṃ lokaḥ suvarṇasya śraddadhāti,
S01divyav_u:614: syādāryaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa eva te bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānate(?)/
S01divyav_u:630: 011.001 tau kathayatah--putra āvāṃ tvadīyena śokena rudantāvandhībhūtau/
S01divyav_u:642: sa taṃ dhanajātaṃ dīnānāthakṛpaṇebhyo dattvā daridrānadaridrān kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:643: 011.007 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:644: 011.008 ekānte sthitaḥ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocat--labheyāhamāryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām,
S01divyav_u:652: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ/
S01divyav_u:655: te tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikārānudgṛhya paryavāpya tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:658: uttare ca paripṛcchanti sūtrasya vinayasya mātṛkāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:660: atha ye āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavas tāṃstānuddeśayogamanasikāraviśeṣān gṛhya paryavāpya tāsu tāsu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣāmupagatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:661: te trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayāt kṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:662: 011.021 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:669: arhan saṃvṛttas traidhātukavītarāgo yāvad abhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:674: draṣṭavyā eva paryupāsitavyā eva hi tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:675: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:676_0: 011.029 athāyuṣmāñ śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa utthāyāsanād ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:676_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenāñjaliṃ kṛtvā praṇamyāyuṣmantaṃ
S01divyav_u:681: 012.001 durlabhadarśanā hi vatsa tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhās tadyathā audumbarapuṣpam/
S01divyav_u:682: 012.002 asmākaṃ ca vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
S01divyav_u:684: 012.003 pañca praśnāṃśca pṛccha--asmāt parāntakeṣu bhadanta janapadeṣu alpabhikṣukam/
S01divyav_u:688: 012.005 asmākamaparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma gocarma cchāgacarma/
S01divyav_u:689: 012.006 tadanyeṣu janapadeṣu idamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā erako merako jandurako mandurakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:690: 012.007 evamevāsmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣvidamevamrūpamāstaraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇaṃ tadyathā avicarma pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:692: bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni kasyaitāni naiḥsargikāni/
S01divyav_u:693: 012.009 adhivāsayati āyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:694: 012.010 athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇas tasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vāsavagrāmakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:696: athāyuṣmāñchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisāmayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:698: 012.014 tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha ānanda tathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasyaikavihāre mañcaṃ prajñāpaya/
S01divyav_u:699: 012.015 evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānandastathāgatasya śroṇasya ca koṭikarṇasya yāvat prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:700: 012.016 upasaṃkramya bhagavantamidamavocat--prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya śroṇasya koṭikarṇasya vihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:703: athāyuṣmānapi śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya yāvat pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:704: 012.021 tāṃ khalu rātriṃ bhagavān āyuṣmāṃśca śroṇaḥ koṭikarṇa āryeṇa tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsitavān/
S01divyav_u:705: 012.022 atha bhagavān rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamāmantrayate sma--pratibhātu te śroṇa dharmo yo mayā svayamabhijñāyābhisambudhyākhyātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:706_0: 012.023 athāyuṣmāñ śroṇo bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśah asmāt parāntikayā guptikayā udānāt
S01divyav_u:706_1: pārāyaṇāt satyadṛṣṭaḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ karoti /
S01divyav_u:707: 012.025 atha bhagavāñchroṇasya koṭikarṇasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat--sādhu sādhu śroṇa,
S01divyav_u:710_0: 012.028 athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭikarṇasyaitadabhavat--ayaṃ me kālo bhagavata upādhyāyasya
S01divyav_u:712: 012.031 sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:714: atha bhagavāñcchroṇaṃ koṭikarṇamidamavocat[13]--akālaṃ te śroṇa praśnavyākaraṇāya/
S01divyav_u:715: 013.001 saṃghamelakas tatra kālo bhaviṣyati praśnasya vyākaraṇāya/
S01divyav_u:716: 013.002 atha bhagavān kālyamevotthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:717: 013.003 athāyuṣmāñcchroṇaḥ koṭikarṇo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte 'sthāt/
S01divyav_u:718: 013.004 ekāntasthito bhagavantamidamavocat--asmāt parāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsavagrāmake bhadantamahākāyāyanaḥ prativasati,
S01divyav_u:720: 013.005 sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati yāvat sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:721: 013.006 pañca ca praśnāti vistareṇoccārayitavyāni yathāpūrvamuktāni yāvat kasya naiḥsargikāni/
S01divyav_u:725: ekapalāśike upānahe dhārayitavye na dvipuṭāṃ na tripuṭām/
S01divyav_u:728: 013.010 bhikṣurbhikṣoścīvarakāni preṣayati itaścyutāni tatrāsamprāptāni na kasyacinnaiḥsargikāṇi/
S01divyav_u:729: 013.011 āyuṣmān upālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--yaduktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu vinayadharapañcamenopasampadam,
S01divyav_u:743: 013.017 kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtamiti vistaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:744: bhagavānāha--bhūtapūrvam yāvat kāśyapo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho bhagavāñ śāstā loka utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:745: 013.019 tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ dvau jāyāpatikau/
S01divyav_u:747: 013.020 yadā kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣu nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:748: tasya rājñā kṛkinā catūratnamayaṃ caityaṃ kāritaṃ samantādyojanamuccatvena/
S01divyav_u:749: 013.022 tena tatra khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyā uttiṣṭhante,
S01divyav_u:752: tasya putraḥ sujāto nāṃnā sa rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:764: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā svayameva te karapratyāyā notthāsyanti/
S01divyav_u:768: 013.032 tau jāyāpatī vṛddhībhūtau tatraiva stūpe parikarma kurvāṇau tiṣṭhataḥ/
S01divyav_u:772: sa dṛṣṭvā pṛcchati--amba tāta kasyaiṣa stūpa iti/
S01divyav_u:776: na tena rājñāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskārakaraṇāya kiṃcit prajñāptam?
S01divyav_u:778: 014.004 ye pūrvanagaradvāre karapratyāyāste 'smin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskaraṇāya niryātitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:786: 014.008 amba tāta anayā karṇikayāsmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭapratisaṃskāraṃ kurutamiti/
S01divyav_u:789: taistāṃ vikrīya tasmin stūpe khaṇḍasphuṭitapratisaṃskāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:791: athāpareṇa samayena sārthavāhaḥ paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:794: 014.012 sa prasādajātaḥ pṛcchati--amba tāta yuṣmābhiḥ kiṃciduddhārikṛtam/
S01divyav_u:797: 014.014 tena prasādajātena yattatrāvaśiṣṭam aparaṃ ca dattvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam/
S01divyav_u:802: 014.017 yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya stūpe kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:803: tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:805: 014.019 ahamanena kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:809: 014.022 tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:812: 014.024 bhikṣava ūcuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena koṭikarṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭāh?
S01divyav_u:814: tasya karmaṇo vipākena dṛṣṭa eva dharme apāyā dṛṣṭā iti//
S01divyav_u:821: tena khalu samayena sūrpārake nagare nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:823: 015.004 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:824: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:825: 015.005 sā aṣṭānāṃ navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:827: 015.006 tasya trīṇi saptakāni ekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:828: 015.007 jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārako bhavasya gṛhapateḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:830: 015.008 bhūyo 'pyasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:834: yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavo gṛhapatir glānaṃ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:841: 015.013 na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yadahaṃ svāminamadhyupekṣeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:842: 015.014 sā vaidyasakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--ārya jānīṣe tvaṃ bhavaṃ gṛhapatim?
S01divyav_u:848: 015.016 sa kathayati--dārike tvameva kathayasi--sa patnyā putraiścāpyupekṣita iti/
S01divyav_u:865: bhavatu me tvayā sārdhaṃ samāgama iti/
S01divyav_u:868: yadi tu āryaputreṇa sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhavati,
S01divyav_u:870: 015.026 tenāvaśyaṃ nirbandhaṃ jñātvā abhihitā--yadā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī tadā mamārocayiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:871: sā apareṇa samayena kalyā saṃvṛttā ṛtumatī/
S01divyav_u:873: tato bhavena gṛhapatinā tayā sārdhaṃ paricāritam/
S01divyav_u:875: yameva divasamāpannasattvā saṃvṛttā tameva divasamupādāya bhavasya gṛhapateḥ sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāśca paripūrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:876: 015.029 sā tvaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:877: 015.030 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśīrṣaḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:879: tasminneva divase bhavasya gṛhapaterbhūyasyā mātrayā sarvārthāḥ sarvakarmāntāḥ paripūrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:880: 016.002 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātamahaṃ kṛtvā pūrvavat yāvatpūrṇeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:881: 016.003 pūrṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dvābhyāmaṃsadhātībhyāṃ datto vistareṇa yāvadāśu vardhate hradasthamiva paṅkajam/
S01divyav_u:883: tadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:884: 016.006 aṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūddhaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:885: 016.007 tato bhavena gṛhapatinā bhavilādīnāṃ putrāṇām yathānupūrvyā niveśāḥ kṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:886: 016.008 te patnībhiḥ sārdhamatīva saṃraktā nivṛttā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:887: 016.009 tato bhavo gṛhapatiḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:889: kasmāttvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:891: na tāvanmayā niveśaḥ kṛto yāvatsuvarṇalakṣaḥ samudānīta iti/
S01divyav_u:892: 016.011 te yūyaṃ nirastavyāpārāḥ patnīṣvatyarthaṃ saṃraktā maṇḍanaparamā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:896: 016.013 sa tāmavatāryadārukarṇikāṃ pinahya pratijñāmārūḍhah--na tāvat ratnakarṇikāṃ pinahyāmi yāvat suvarṇalakṣaḥ samupārjita iti/
S01divyav_u:899: teṣām yāstāḥ saṃjñā bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandīti tā antarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:911: 016.020 pūrṇenāpi tatraiva dharmeṇa nyāyena vyavahāritāḥ sātirekāḥ suvarṇalakṣāḥ samudānītāaḥ/
S01divyav_u:918: 016.023 kalitam yāvannyāyopārjitasya suvarṇasya mūlyaṃ varjayitvā sātiriktā lakṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:919: 016.024 bhavo gṛhapatiḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--puṇyamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yenehaiva sthiteneyatsuvarṇaṃ samupārjitamiti/
S01divyav_u:938: 017.003 durnyasto bhidyate mantraḥ prītirbhidyate lobhataḥ//2// iti//
S01divyav_u:948: tair nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā saṃskāreṇa śmaśānaṃ nītvā dhmāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:949: 017.009 tataste śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--yadā asmākaṃ pitā jīvati,
S01divyav_u:954: yannu vayaṃ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gacchāma iti/
S01divyav_u:970: 017.019 bhavilapatnyā dārikā abhihitā--tvayā kālaṃ jñātvā gantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:982: tāḥ saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati yeṣāṃ dāsīputrāḥ kulesvaiścaryaṃ vaśe vartayantīti/
S01divyav_u:983: 017.024 yāvadapareṇa samayena bhavilo bhavatrāto bhavanandī ca sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:987: 017.027 te anye 'pi svāmibhyāṃ pṛṣṭe kathayatah--evaṃ hi teṣāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:993: anyābhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā svaputrāḥ preṣitā yāvat kāśikavastrāvārī ghaṭṭitā,
S01divyav_u:997: 017.032 te dṛṣṭvā svāminoḥ kathayatah--dṛṣṭam yuvābhyāmapareṣāṃ kāśikavastrāṇi[18] dīyante,
S01divyav_u:1009: tābhistaṃ dṛṣṭvā svāminau tathā tathā bhagnau yathā gṛhavibhāgaṃ kartumārabdhau/
S01divyav_u:1010: 018.005 tau parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutah--sarvathā vinaṣṭā vayam,
S01divyav_u:1018: 018.008 yadi jyeṣṭhataro gṛhagataṃ kṣetragataṃ ca grahīṣyati,
S01divyav_u:1021: tathāpi vayaṃ śknumo gṛhagatena kṣetragatena cātmānaṃ saṃdhārayitum,
S01divyav_u:1023: 018.011 tāvevaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā bhavilasya sakāśaṃ gatau/
S01divyav_u:1040: sa saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ pitrā abhihitah--sarvasvamapi te parityajya pūrṇo grahītavya iti/
S01divyav_u:1041: 018.018 gṛhṇāmi pūrṇamiti viditvā kathayati--evaṃ bhavatu mama pūrṇaketi/
S01divyav_u:1043: sa tvaramāṇo gṛhaṃ gatvā kathayati--jyeṣṭhabhavike nirgaccha/
S01divyav_u:1049: so 'pi tvaramāṇa āvārīṃ gatvā kathayati--pūrṇaka avatareti/
S01divyav_u:1054: 018.023 yāvat bhavilapatnī pūrṇakena sārdhaṃ jñātigṛhaṃ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:1061: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--kimahaṃ jāne yuṣmākaṃ gṛhe īdṛśīyamavasthā bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:1067: anyatamaśca puruṣaḥ samudravelāpreritānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ bhāramādāya śītenābhidruto vepamāna āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:1079: 019.002 tena taṃ kāṣṭhabhāraṃ gṛhītvā tadgośīrṣacandanamapanīya vīthīṃ gatvā karapatrikayā catasraḥ khaṇḍikāḥ kṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1082: 019.004 uktaṃ ca--enaṃ kāṣṭhabhārakamamuṣmin gṛhe bhavilapatnī tiṣṭhati tatra naya,
S01divyav_u:1095: te pūrṇasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--tavāsti gośīrṣacandanam? sa āha--asti/
S01divyav_u:1098: 019.012 taiḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa gṛhītvā rājñaḥ pralepo dattaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1100: 019.013 rājā saṃlakṣayati--kīdṛśo 'sau yasya gṛhe gośīrṣacandanaṃ nāsti/
S01divyav_u:1110: 019.017 sa gośīrṣacandanasya tisro gaṇḍikā vastreṇa pidhāyaikaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1126: pūrṇaḥ kathayati--yadi me devaḥ parituṣṭo devasya vijate 'paribhūto vaseyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1128: adyāgreṇa kumārāṇāmājñā deyā na tvevaṃ pūrṇasyeti/
S01divyav_u:1129: 019.024 yāvanmahāsamudrāt pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:1130: 019.025 vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidasmākaṃ samastānāṃ nirgatyaikākinā vaṇijāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:1133: anye kathayanti--kiṃ tasya kṛpaṇasyāsti yaḥ śabdāyata iti/
S01divyav_u:1135: tena śrutaṃ mahāsamudrāt pañca vaṇikchatāni saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptānīti/
S01divyav_u:1149: tato vaṇiggrāmeṇāvacarakāḥ puruṣāḥ preṣitāh--paśyata kiṃ dravyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1157: te kathayanti--yattenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tad yūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
S01divyav_u:1165: yātenāvadraṅge dattaṃ tadyūyaṃ mūlye 'pi na dāsyatha/
S01divyav_u:1169: sa tairāhūyoktah--pūrṇa vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacidekākinā grahītavyam/
S01divyav_u:1173: yadā yuṣmābhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahaṃ na śabdito mama bhrātā vā?
S01divyav_u:1175: 020.013 tato vaṇiggrāmeṇa saṃjātāmarṣeṇa ṣaṣṭeḥ kārṣāpaṇānāmarthāyātape dhāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1183: te kathayanti--deva vaṇiggrāmeṇa kriyākāraḥ kṛto na kenacidekākinā paṇyaṃ grahītavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1186: samanuyujyantām yadaibhiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtastadā kimahamebhiḥ śabdito mama bhrātā vā?
S01divyav_u:1200: te vaṇiggrāmāḥ sarva eva saṃbhūya tasya niveśanaṃ gatvā dvāri sthitvā tairdūtaḥ preṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1207: 020.027 pañcadaśa lakṣāṇi teṣāṃ vaṇijyaṃ dattamavaśiṣṭaṃ svagṛhaṃ praveśitam/
S01divyav_u:1210: 020.029 tena sūrpārake nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ saurpārakīyā vaṇijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1212: yo yuṣmākamutsahate pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartuṃ sa mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānayatviti/
S01divyav_u:1214: tataḥ pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanah[21] pañcavaṇikśataparivāro mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1219: pūrṇaḥ ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgata iti/
S01divyav_u:1220: 021.003 śrāvasteyā vaṇijaḥ paṇyamādāya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1221: 021.004 te mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya yena pūrṇaḥ sārthavāhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1224: asti kaścidyuṣmābhirdṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā ṣaṭkṛtvo mahāsamudrātsaṃsiddhayānapātrāgataḥ saptamaṃ vāramavataran?
S01divyav_u:1231: 021.009 te rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye udānāt pārāyaṇāt satyadṛśaḥ sthaviragāthāḥ śailagāthā munigāthā arthavargīyāṇi ca sūtrāṇi vistareṇa svareṇa svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:1237: 021.012 sa buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāni āhṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:1240: 021.013 te kathayanti--asti śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulātkeśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1246: 021.017 sa taṃ hṛdi kṛtvā taiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ saṃsiddhayānapātraśca pratyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1250: kathaya katarasya dhaninaḥ sārthavāhasya vā tavārthāya duhitaraṃ prārthayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1274: pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha udyāne tiṣṭhati gṛhapatiṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:1275: 021.028 anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ jalayānena khinna idānīṃ sthalayānenāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1281: anāthapiṇḍadaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ pradhānapuruṣamasatkāreṇa praveśayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1282: 021.031 sa tena mahatā satkāreṇa praveśita udvartitaḥ snāpito bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1285: apūrveṇa gṛhapate icchāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
S01divyav_u:1286: 022.002 tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1289: yatredānīmīdṛśāḥ pradhānapuruṣā vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargamapahāya sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvamiti/
S01divyav_u:1290: 022.005 tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛḥpatiḥ pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1291: 022.006 tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣupariṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:1293: 022.008 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:1294: 022.009 nāsti tathāgatasyaivaṃvidhaḥ prābhṛto yathā vaineyaprābhṛta iti/
S01divyav_u:1295: 022.010 tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā pūrṇena sārthavāhena sārdhamekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1296: 022.011 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta pūrṇaḥ sārthavāha ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:1299: 022.014 tato bhagavān pūrṇaṃ sārthavāhamāmantrayate--ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:1300: sa bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrurvarṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvāsthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1301: 022.017 ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1302: 022.019 sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena//4//
S01divyav_u:1305_0: 022.022 ekānte sthita āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā
S01divyav_u:1305_1: saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvaiko
S01divyav_u:1306: 022.024 yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇi avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi ācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
S01divyav_u:1307_1: pravrajayeyam--kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
S01divyav_u:1309: sādhu khalu tvaṃ pūrṇa yastvamevaṃ vadasi--sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu pūrvavadyāvannāparamasmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1311: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye//
S01divyav_u:1312: 022.031 santi pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇīṣṭakāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni/
S01divyav_u:1323: manovijñeyā dharmā iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1325: santi tu pūrṇa cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni pūrvavad yavat śuklapakṣeṇāntike nirvāṇasyeti ucyate/
S01divyav_u:1326: 023.008 anena tvaṃ pūrṇa mayā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena coditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1328: anenāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā saṃkṣiptenāvavādena codita icchāmi śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
S01divyav_u:1329: 023.010 caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntikā manuṣyā rabhasāḥ karkaśā ākrośakā roṣakāḥ paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1330: 023.011 sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
S01divyav_u:1332: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asātyayā paruṣayā vācā ākrokṣyanti roṣayiṣyanti paribhāṣiṣyante,
S01divyav_u:1333: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1335: ye māṃ saṃmukhaṃ pāpikayā asatyayā paruṣayā
S01divyav_u:1337: 023.017 no tu pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharantīti/
S01divyav_u:1338: caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavat yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1339: 023.018 sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1341: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1342: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1344: ye māṃ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā praharanti,
S01divyav_u:1345: no tu daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharantīti/
S01divyav_u:1346: 023.022 caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ pūrvavad yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1347: 023.023 sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1349: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā prahariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1350: tasya mamaivaṃ bhaviṣyati--bhadrakā bata śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1352: ye māṃ daṇḍena vā śastreṇa vā praharanti,
S01divyav_u:1353: no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayanti/
S01divyav_u:1354: 023.027 caṇḍāḥ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyā yāvat paribhāṣakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1355: sacet tvāṃ pūrṇa śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1357: sacenmāṃ bhadanta śroṇāparāntakā manuṣyāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparoyiṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:1358: tasya me evaṃ bhaviṣyati--santi bhagavataḥ śrāvakā ye anena pūtikāyenārdīyamānā jehrīyante,
S01divyav_u:1367: śakyastvaṃ pūrṇa anena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ śroṇāparāntakeṣu janapadeṣu vastuṃ śroṇāparāntakeṣu vāsaṃ kalpayitum/
S01divyav_u:1373: 024.005 athāyuṣmān pūrṇo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1374: 024.006 athāyuṣmān pūrṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:1375: 024.007 śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1376: 024.008 yathāparibhuktaśayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaram yena śroṇāparāntakā janapadāstena cārikāṃ carañ śroṇāparāntakāñ janapadānanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1377: 024.010 athāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śroṇāparāntakaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:1380: sa saṃlakṣayati--amaṅgalo 'yaṃ muṇḍakaḥ śramaṇako mayā dṛṣṭa iti viditvā ā karṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā yenāyuṣmān pūrṇastena pradhāvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1386: 024.015 yasyārthe gahane caranti vihagā gacchanti bandhaṃ mṛgāḥ saṃgrāme śaraśaktatomaradharā naśyantyajasraṃ narāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1387: 024.017 dīnā durdinacāriṇaśca kṛpaṇā matsyā grasantyāyasam asyārthe udarasya pāpakalile dūrādihābhyāgataḥ//5// iti//
S01divyav_u:1388: 024.019 sa saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ pravrajita īdṛśena kṣāntisaurabhyena samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1395: 024.023 tasyaiva ca trimāsasyātyayāt tisro vidyāḥ kāyena sākṣātkṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1397: 024.024 traidhātukavītarāgo yāvat sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaśca saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:1398: 024.025 yāvadapareṇa samayena dārukarṇibhrātrorbhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1410: 024.030 tau kathayatah--tena dāsīputreṇa mahāsamudramavatīryāvatīrya bhogāḥ samudānītā yena tvaṃ bhuñjāno vikatthase/
S01divyav_u:1419: tena khalu samayena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ maheśvarasya yakṣasya parigraho 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:1422: 025.004 adrākṣīdapriyākhyo yo yakṣo gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1425: 025.006 upasaṃkramya maheśvaram yakṣamidamavocat--yat khalu grāmaṇīrjānīyā gośīrṣacandanavane pañcamātrāṇi kuṭhāraśatāni vahanti/
S01divyav_u:1426: 025.007 yatte kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tatkuruṣveti/
S01divyav_u:1427: atha maheśvaro yakṣo yakṣāṇāṃ samitimasamitiṃ kṛtvā saṃjātāmarṣo mahāntaṃ kālikāvātabhayaṃ saṃjanya yena gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ tena saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1428: 025.009 karṇadhāreṇārocitam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jāmbudvīpakā vaṇijah--yattat śrūyate mahākālikāvātabhayamiti, idaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:1430: tataste vaṇijo bhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1432: 025.014 vyasanamatibhayaṃ vayaṃ prapannā vigatabhayā hi bhavantu no 'dya nāthāḥ//6//
S01divyav_u:1450: tairekasvareṇa sarvairevaṃ nādo muktah--namastasmai āryāya pūrṇāya,
S01divyav_u:1458: 025.029 tata āyuṣmān pūrṇastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte śroṇāparāntake 'ntarhito mahāsamudre vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1460: 025.031 atha maheśvaro yakṣaḥ saṃlakṣayati--pūrvam yat kiṃcidvahanaṃ kālikāvātena spṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:1462: 025.032 idānīṃ ko yogo yena kālikāvātah [26]sumerupratyāhata iva pratinivṛttah?
S01divyav_u:1463: sa itaścāmutaśca pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyati āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ vahanasīmāyāṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:1468: yadi mayedṛśā guṇagaṇā nādhigatāḥ syurbhrātā me tvayā nāmāvaśeṣaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:1469: 026.004 maheśvaro yakṣaḥ kathayati--ārya idaṃ gośīrṣacandanavanaṃ rājñaścakaravartino 'rthāya dhāryate/
S01divyav_u:1470: 026.005 kiṃ manyase grāmaṇīḥ kiṃ varaṃ rājā cakravartī uta tathagato 'rhan samyaksambuddha?
S01divyav_u:1471: kim ārya bhagavāṃl loka utpannah? utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1473: tataste vaṇijo gatapratyāgataprāṇā āyuṣmati pūrṇe cittamabhiprasādya tadvahanaṃ gośīrṣacandanasya pūrayitvā saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1475: 026.010 tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo bhrātuḥ kathayati--yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
S01divyav_u:1478: ahamanena gośīrṣacandanena bhagavato 'rthāya candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ kārayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1479: 026.012 tena teṣāṃ vaṇijāṃ ratnaiḥ saṃvibhāgaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1480: 026.013 tata āyuṣmān pūrṇo gośīrṣacandanena prāsādaṃ māpayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1482: kiṃ divase divase pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhṇīdhvamāhosvit gośīrṣacandanacūrṇasya biḍālapadam?
S01divyav_u:1484: 026.015 yāvat alpīyasā kālena candanamālaḥ prāsādaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1490: 026.018 te ca bhrātara parasparaṃ sarve kṣamitā uktāśca--buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrya bhojayata/
S01divyav_u:1504_0: tata āyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ śaraṇapṛṣṭhamabhiruhya jetavanābhimukhaṃ sthitvā ubhe jānumaṇḍale
S01divyav_u:1504_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣiptvā dhūpaṃ saṃcārya ārāmikena ca sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ
S01divyav_u:1506: 026.027 anāthabhūtān prasamīkṣya sādho kṛtvā kṛpāmāgamanaṃ kuruṣva//8// iti/
S01divyav_u:1507: 026.029 tatastāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṛtvā jetavane gatvā sthitāni dūupo 'bhrakūṭavadudakaṃ vaidūryaśalākāvat/
S01divyav_u:1509: 026.031 sa kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ papraccha--kuto bhagavan nimantraṇamāgatam?
S01divyav_u:1514: bhikṣūnārocaya--yo yuṣmākamutsahate śvaḥ sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktum,
S01divyav_u:1516: 027.002 evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śalākāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1519: 027.004 tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāvimuktas tasyāmeva pariṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:1526: 027.010 ṛddhibhiryatra gantavyaṃ tūṣṇī tvaṃ bhava pūrṇaka//10// iti//
S01divyav_u:1529: tasyaitadabhavat--yena mayā sakalaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ charditaṃ tyaktaṃ pratiniḥsṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:1531: 027.012 tena vīryamāsthāya ṛddhimutpādya yāvadāyuṣmānānandas tṛtīyasthavirasya śalākāṃ na dadāti,
S01divyav_u:1532: tāvat tena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya śalākā gṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:1534: 027.015 vapuṣmattayā śrutena vā na balātkāraguṇaiśca gautama/
S01divyav_u:1537: 027.018 jarayā hi nipīḍitayauvanāḥ ṣaḍabhijñā hi bhavanti madvidhāḥ//12// iti//
S01divyav_u:1538: 027.019 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ caityaśalākāgrahaṇe/
S01divyav_u:1539: 027.020 tatprathamataḥ śalākāṃ gṛhṇatām yaduta pūrṇaḥ kuṇḍopadhānīyakaḥ sthaviraḥ/
S01divyav_u:1541: 027.021 kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā--praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ vivṛtapāpairiti,
S01divyav_u:1544: tena tayā tatra sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1545: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--āyuṣmantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1546: bhagavānevamāha--kiṃ cāpi uktaṃ mayā praticchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyamiti pūrvavat yāvat gatvā bhoktavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:1550: 027.029 pratyekamekaikasmin dvāre paramayā vibhūtyā rājaputrā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1551: mūladvāre ca mahatā rājānubhāvena sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1561: api tu khalu sthavirasthavirā eva te bhikṣava iti/
S01divyav_u:1564: 028.007 anye toyadharā ivāmbaratale vidyullatālaṃkṛtā ṛddhyā devapurīmiva pramuditā gantuṃ samabhyudyatāḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:1566: 028.010 āsane nirmitāścaike paśya ṛddhimatāṃ balam//14// iti//
S01divyav_u:1567: 028.011 tato bhagavān bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1568: 028.012 yāvad bhagavatā gandhakuṭyāṃ sābhisaṃskāraṃ pādo nyastaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1569: ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātah--iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī calati saṃcalati saṃpracalati/
S01divyav_u:1583: rājā āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ pṛcchati--ārya pūrṇa, kimetat?
S01divyav_u:1587: 028.018 tato bhagavatā kanakamarīcivarṇaprabhā utsṛṣṭā yayā jambudvīpo vilīnakanakāvabhāsaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1588: 028.019 punarapi rājā vismayotphullalocanaḥ pṛcchati--ārya pūrṇa, idaṃ kim?
S01divyav_u:1590: 028.021 tato bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchāntaiḥ sārdhaṃ sūrpārakābhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1592: sā bakulaśākhāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataśchāyāṃ kurvantī pṛṣṭataḥ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:1593: 028.023 tasyā bhagavatā āśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1594: yāṃ śrutvā tayā devatayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1596_1: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam /
S01divyav_u:1598_0: 028.029 dharmataiṣā--na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścittasya kalyatāṃ janayati
S01divyav_u:1598_1: aputrasya ca putralābho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko
S01divyav_u:1599: 028.031 tato bhagavāṃstāsāṃ vinayakālamavekṣya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya [29]prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1600: 029.001 tā api bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1601: tato bhagavatā tāsāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā yāvat srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1602_0: 029.003 tā dṛṣṭasatyās trirudānamudānayanti--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:1602_1: na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā neṣṭasvajanabandhuvargeṇa na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na
S01divyav_u:1607: 029.006 etā vayaṃ bhagavataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmo dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:1609: tata utthāyāsanāt yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--aho bata bhagavānasmākaṃ kiṃcidatra prayacchet yatra vayaṃ kārāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1612: 029.010 tatastayā jetavananivāsinyā tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ sā bakulaśākhāropitā/
S01divyav_u:1622: 029.015 te tena madena mattā na kiṃcinmanyante/
S01divyav_u:1627: 029.017 tataste ṛṣayaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparā vyavasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1630: te kathayanti--bhagavaṃstvaṃ dvipādakaṃ puṇyakṣetramiha praviṣṭo 'smākaṃ cedṛśī samavasthā/
S01divyav_u:1638: 029.022 tato bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1641: 029.024 tato yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocan--labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:1643: tataste bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryamiti/
S01divyav_u:1644: 029.027 bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭiprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathena avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1645: 029.029 ehīti coktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
S01divyav_u:1646: 029.031 sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//15//
S01divyav_u:1651: 030.003 tato bhagavān pañcabhirṛṣiśataiḥ pūrvakaiśca pañcabhirbhikṣuḥśatairardhacandrākāropagūḍhastat eva ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā prakrānto 'nupūrveṇa musalakaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1652: 030.005 tena khalu samayena musalake parvate vakkalī nāma ṛṣiḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:1653: 030.006 adrākṣīt sa ṛṣirbhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavat yāvat samantato bhadrakam/
S01divyav_u:1661: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1664_0: 030.012 tato bhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ
S01divyav_u:1664_1: bhikṣubhāvaṃ pūrvavat yāvat bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājito yāvadevaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena //
S01divyav_u:1665: 030.014 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śraddhādhimuktānām yaduta vakkalī bhikṣuriti/
S01divyav_u:1666: 030.015 tato bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛto vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi kurvan sūrpārakaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1670: tata ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā madhye sūrpārakasya nagarasyāvatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1671: 030.018 tataḥ sūrpārakādhipatī rājā āyuṣmān pūrṇo dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī te ca saptadaśa putrāḥ svakasvakena parivāreṇa yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S01divyav_u:1673: 030.020 tato bhagavānanekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairanugamyamāno yena candanamālaḥ prāsādas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1675: 030.022 sa janakāyo bhagavantamapaśyaṃś candanamālaṃ prāsādaṃ bhettumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1680: tato bhagavatā tasyāḥ pariṣad āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1691: 030.030 yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
S01divyav_u:1692: 030.031 atha dārukarṇī stavakarṇī trapukarṇī ca praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya āsanāni prajñāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayanti--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:1693: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālam [31]manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:1694: 031.001 tena khalu samayena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau mahāsamudre prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1695: tau saṃlakṣayatah--bhagavān sūrpārake nagare dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:1697: tatastau pañcanāgaśataparivārau pañcanadīśatāni saṃjanya sūrpārakaṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:1699: 031.004 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--imau kṛṣṇagautamau nāgarājau yadi sūrpārakaṃ nagaramāgamiṣyataḥ,
S01divyav_u:1707: 031.008 atha bhagavān maudgalyāyanasahāyo yena kṛṣṇagautamakau nāgarājau tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1709: 031.010 tau kathayatah--tādṛśena bhadanta prasādena vayamāgatā yanna śakyamasmābhiḥ kuntapipīlikasyāpi prāṇinaḥ pīḍāmutpādayituṃ prāgeva sūrpārakanagaranivāsino janakāyasyeti/
S01divyav_u:1710: 031.012 tato bhagavatā kṛṣṇagautamakayor nāgarājayostādṛśo dharmo yaṃ śrutvā buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatau,
S01divyav_u:1714: 031.014 ekaiko nāgaḥ saṃlakṣayati--aho bata bhagavān mama pānīyaṃ pibatu iti/
S01divyav_u:1721: 031.017 evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yatra pañcānāṃ nadīśatānāṃ saṃbhedastatrodakasya pātrapūramādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1724_1: bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau citrasya
S01divyav_u:1725: 031.022 ekenāṃśena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇavarṣaśataṃ paricaret,
S01divyav_u:1726: yadvā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvarta iti,
S01divyav_u:1728: neyatā putreṇa mātāpitaroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syādupakṛtaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:1729: 031.025 yastu asāvaśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S01divyav_u:1732: duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsampadi samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S01divyav_u:1733: iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syādupakṛtaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:1734: 031.028 mayā ca mātur na kaścidupakāraḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1735: yadahaṃ samanvāhareyaṃ kutra me mātā upapanneti/
S01divyav_u:1736: 031.029 samanvāhartuṃ saṃvṛttaḥ paśyati marīcike lokadhātau upapannā/
S01divyav_u:1740: 031.031 yannvahametamarthaṃ bhagavato nivedayeyamiti bhagavantamidamavocat--uktaṃ bhadanta bhagavatā pūrvam--duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau iti/
S01divyav_u:1747: 032.002 tato bhagavānāyuṣmāṃśca mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ sumerumūrdhni pādān sthāpayantau saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:1749: 032.004 adrākṣīt sā bhadrakanyā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:1750: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ sasambhramāt tatsakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--cirādbata putrakaṃ paśyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1757: 032.008 tato bhagavatā tasyā bhadrakanyāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:1758: yāṃ śrutvā tayā bhadrakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśaulaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1759: 032.010 sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati pūrvavat yāvat pratiṣṭhāpitā devamanuṣyeṣu/
S01divyav_u:1762: 032.013 apāvṛtā svargagatiḥ supuṇyā nirvāṇamārgaṃ ca mayopalabdham//16//
S01divyav_u:1764: 032.015 prāptaṃ ca kāntaṃ padamāryakāntaṃ tīrṇā ca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi//17//
S01divyav_u:1768: eṣāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:1769: 032.019 upāsikāṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāmabhiprasannām/
S01divyav_u:1772_0: 032.021 atha sā bhadrakanyā bhagavantamāyuṣmantaṃ ca mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ
S01divyav_u:1772_1: viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
S01divyav_u:1772_2: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhātahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā
S01divyav_u:1774: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pātragrāhakaḥ pātraṃ niryātayati/
S01divyav_u:1781: maudgalyāyanastato vismayāvarjitamatiḥ kathayati--kiṃ nāmeyaṃ bhagavann ṛddhih?
S01divyav_u:1783: 032.028 na mayā bhadanta vijñātamevaṃ gambhīramevaṃ gambhīrā buddhadharmā iti/
S01divyav_u:1787: 032.031 tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā pūrṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1788: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena [33]dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1790: bhagavānāha--pūrṇena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitāani avaśyambhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:1793: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:1797: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:1799: 033.008 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//19//
S01divyav_u:1800_1: kāśyapo nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:1809: 033.015 tena tīvreṇa paryavasthānena kharavākkarma niścāritam--kasya dāsīputrasyopadhivāra iti/
S01divyav_u:1814: 033.017 yadā asya paryavasthānaṃ vigataṃ tadā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--jānīṣe tvaṃ ko 'hamiti?
S01divyav_u:1815: sa kathayati--jāne tvaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajito 'hamapīti/
S01divyav_u:1816: 033.018 sa kathayati--yadyapyevaṃ tathāpi tu yanmayā pravrajya caraṇīyaṃ tatkṛtamahaṃ sakalabandhanābaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1823: 033.022 pañca tu janmaśatāni dāsyāḥ kukṣau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1824: yāvadetarhyapi carame bhave dāsyā eva kukṣau upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1827: 033.024 yattatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:1828: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:1829: 033.025 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1832: 033.027 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:1840: 034.002 yadā rājñā bhāgadhena ajātaśatruṇā vaidehīputreṇa naukramo mātāpitrormāpitastadā vaiśālakairlicchavibhirbhagavato 'rthe naukramo māpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1841: 034.003 nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--vayaṃ vinipatitaśarīrā yannu vayaṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇa bhagavantaṃ nadī{dīm} gaṅgāmuttārayema iti/
S01divyav_u:1843: 034.005 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ gantum yo yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava utsahate rājño māgadhasyājātaśatrorvaidehīputrasya nausaṃkrameṇa nadīgaṅgāmuttartum,
S01divyav_u:1845: yo vā bhikṣavo vaiśālakānāṃ licchavīnāṃ nausaṃkrameṇa,
S01divyav_u:1847: 034.007 ahamapi āyuṣmatā ānandena bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇa nadīṃ gaṅgāmuttariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:1850: 034.010 bhagavānapi āyuṣmatā ānandena sārdhaṃ nāgānāṃ phaṇasaṃkrameṇottīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1852: 034.012 ye tarantyarṇavaṃ saraḥ setuṃ kṛtvā visṛjya palvalāni/
S01divyav_u:1853: 034.013 kolaṃ hi janāḥ prabandhitā uttīrṇā medhāvino janāḥ//1//
S01divyav_u:1857: 034.017 chittveha mūlaṃ tṛṣṇāyāḥ kasya paryeṣaṇāṃ caret//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:1859: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāyuṣmantamāmantrayate--icchasi tvamānanda yo 'sau yūya ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasraṃ tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedho nānāratnavicitro vitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1865: 034.022 tato bhagavatā cakrasvatikanandyāvartena jālāvanaddhenānekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānāmāśvāsanakareṇa pṛthivī parāmṛṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:1871: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ārohapariṇāhaṃ nimittaṃ bhikṣavo yūpasya gṛhṇīta,
S01divyav_u:1874: 034.027 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta bhikṣavo yūpaṃ paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:1883: 035.001 [35]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājābhūta praṇādo nāma śakrasya devendrasya vayasyakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1884: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamudito 'hamaputraśca/
S01divyav_u:1887: kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
S01divyav_u:1895: 035.007 dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputrasya pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi saṃkliśyanti,
S01divyav_u:1905: 035.012 mā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kṛtvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:1914: 035.015 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:1915: 035.016 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1916: 035.017 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:1917: 035.018 jñātaya ūcuh--yasminneva divase 'yaṃ dārako mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1919: 035.019 yasminneva divase jātastasminneva divase mahājanakāyena nādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1920: 035.020 tasmāt bhavatu dārakasya mahāpraṇāda iti nāma/
S01divyav_u:1922: mahāpraṇādo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyāṃsaṃdhātrībhyāṃ dvāghyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyām/
S01divyav_u:1923: 035.023 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarṇpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:1926: 035.025 saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārīparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:1927: 035.026 so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paṇḍitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1928_0: 035.027 sa yāni tāni rāajñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ
S01divyav_u:1929_0: tadyathā--hastiśikṣāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śare dhanuṣi prayāṇe niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:1929_1: pāśagrahe tomaragrahe yaṣṭibandhe padabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe
S01divyav_u:1930: 035.032 dharmatā khalu na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat tāto jīvati/
S01divyav_u:1933: sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa kārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1938: 036.004 sa yāvattāvad dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1940: mayā tvaṃ praṇādasya rājñaḥ putratve samādāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1944: vayaṃ rājānaḥ pramattā iti ratibahulāḥ kṣaṇād vismarāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1948: 036.008 na ca śakyate vinā nimittena puṇyaṃ kartum/
S01divyav_u:1949: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa viśvakarmaṇo devaputrasyājñā dattā--gaccha tvaṃ viśvakarman rājño mahāpraṇādasya niveśane/
S01divyav_u:1952: 036.010 ūrdhvaṃ vyāmasahasreṇa tiryak ṣoḍaśapravedhaṃ nānāratnavicitraṃ sarvasauvarṇamiti/
S01divyav_u:1953: 036.011 tato viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa mahāpraṇādasya rājño niveśane divyo maṇḍalavāṭo nirmito yūpaścocchritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1956: 036.013 tasya mātulo 'śoko nāma yūpasya paricārako vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1957: 036.014 tato yūpadarśanodyuktaḥ sarva eva jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati,
S01divyav_u:1964: deva, jambudvīpanivāsī janakāya āgatya bhuktvā yūpaṃ paśyati,
S01divyav_u:1970: tato 'pyasau janakāyaḥ svapathyadanamādāya bhuktvā yūpaṃ nirīkṣamāṇastiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:1982: 036.024 tato rājñā mahāpraṇādena dānāni dattvā puṇyāni kṛtvā sa yūpo nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāmāplāvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:1983: 036.025 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau māpraṇādasyāśoko nāma mātulaḥ,
S01divyav_u:1986: 036.027 kutra bhadanta asau yūpo vilayaṃ gamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:1988: 036.028 aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ śaṅkho nāma rājā bhaviṣyati samyamanī cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājā saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:1990: 036.030 tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:1991: 036.031 pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:1993: 037.001 śaṅkhasya rājño brahmāyur nāma brāhmaṇaḥ purohito bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:1995: sā maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā putraṃ janayiṣyati maitreyaṃ nāma/
S01divyav_u:2002: 037.008 enaṃ ca yūpamādāya śaṅkhasya rājña upanāmayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:2006: 037.010 tataste māṇavakāstam yūpaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ chittvā bhājayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:2007: 037.011 tato maitreyo māṇavakastasya yūpasyānityatāṃ dṛṣṭvā tenaiva saṃvegena vanaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2009: tasminneva divase maitreyāṃśena sphuritvā anuttaraṃ jñānamadhigamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2010: 037.013 tasya maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddha iti saṃjñā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2013: 037.014 śaṅkho 'pi rājā aśītikoṭṭarājasahasraparivāro maitreyaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2016: 037.017 tato maitreyaḥ samyaksambuddho 'śītibhikṣukoṭiparivāro yena gurupādakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:2019_1: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvā vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati--yo
S01divyav_u:2019_2: 'sau bhikṣavo varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka utpannastasyāyaṃ
S01divyav_u:2019_3: śrāvakaḥ kāśyapo nāṃnā alpecchānāṃ saṃtuṣṭānāṃ dhūtaguṇavādināmagro, nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S01divyav_u:2026: 037.027 ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo dvayo ratnayoryugapalloke prādurbhāvāya?
S01divyav_u:2029: 037.029 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani madhyadeśe vāsavo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:2033: uttarāpathe dhanasaṃmato nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:2037: 038.001 yāvadapareṇa samayena vāsavasya rājñaḥ putro jāto ratnapratyuptayā śikhayā/
S01divyav_u:2038: 038.002 tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā ratnaśikhīti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:2040: 038.003 yasminneva divase vanaṃ saṃśritastasminneva divase 'nuttaraṃ jñānamadhigatam/
S01divyav_u:2044: kasyacidanyasyāpi rājño rājyamevamṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:2049: 038.009 te kathayanti--asti deva madhyadeśe vāsavo nāma rājā iti/
S01divyav_u:2053: tato dhanasaṃmato rājā caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ madhyadeśamāgatya gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe kūle 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2054: 038.013 aśrauṣīdvāsavo rājā--dhanasaṃmato rājā catruaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ madhyadeśamāgatya gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe kūle 'vasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:2055: 038.014 śrutvā ca punaḥ so 'pi caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyamaśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ patikāyaṃ gaṅgāyā uttare kūle 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2056: 038.016 atha ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastayorvinayakālaṃ jñātvā nadyā gaṅgāyāstīre rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:2058: dharmatā khalu yadā buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:2059: tasmin samaye śakrabrahmādayo devā bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:2060: 038.019 atha śakrabrahmādayo devā yena ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddhastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2061: 038.020 upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2064: dṛṣṭvā ca punaramātyān pṛcchati--kimayaṃ bhavanto vāsavasya rājño vijite mahānudārāvabhāsah?
S01divyav_u:2068: vāsavasya rājño vijite ratnaśikhī nāma samyaksambuddhah utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2081: yasya vijite dvipādakaṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ ratnaśikhī samyaksambuddho 'yam/
S01divyav_u:2083: 038.029 kiṃ tu kaṇṭhāśleṣaṃ te datvā gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:2087: 038.031 upasaṃkramya ratnaśikhinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2088: 038.032 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo vāsavo rājā ratnaśikhinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidamavocat--[39]mama bhadanta dhanasaṃmatena rājñā saṃdiṣṭam--priyavayasaya āgaccha,
S01divyav_u:2095: 039.004 bhagavan, kiṃ mayā tasya pādayor nipatitavyam?
