S01divyav_u:2377: 047.028 anyairapi brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ kuśalamadhiṣṭhānāya bhavatviti viditvā kulā baddhā(?)/
S01divyav_u:2378: 047.029 indreṇa brāhmaṇena yaṣṭyā mahaḥ prajñapita iti indramaha indramaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:2383_0: 047.032 athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaih [48]samalaṃkṛtamaśītyā
S01divyav_u:2388: tat ko 'sau upāyaḥ syāt yena me karmaparihāṇir na syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti/
S01divyav_u:2391: 048.006 tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenaivābhivādanaṃ kṛtam--abhivādaye buddhaṃ bhagavantamiti/
S01divyav_u:2395: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:2398: 048.011 athāyuṣmānānando laghuladhveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
S01divyav_u:2399: 048.012 evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:2405: yaṃ bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopitaṃ śarīrasaṃghātamupadarśayet/
S01divyav_u:2408: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:2409: tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikā api prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:2413: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--udgṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
S01divyav_u:2416: 048.023 rājñā prasenajitā śrutaṃ bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāyāvikopitaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātaṃ samucchritamiti/
S01divyav_u:2417: 048.024 śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sahāntaḥpureṇa kumārairamātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajānapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2422: anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:2424: taiḥ śrutam--anatarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāturavikopita iti/
S01divyav_u:2425: 048.029 śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti/
S01divyav_u:2427: 048.030 evaṃ ca cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:2428: 048.031 atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:2430: 049.003 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//1//
S01divyav_u:2431: 049.005 anyatamena upāsakena tasmin pradeśe mṛttikāpiṇḍo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2432: evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya tāvadiyat puṇyamākhyātaṃ bhagavatā anyatra/
S01divyav_u:2435: 049.008 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:2439: evaṃ ca cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--padāvihārasya mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ceyat puṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:2440: asmākaṃ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṃ kiyat puṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti?
S01divyav_u:2441: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:2442: 049.016 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:2447: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:2448: 049.023 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:2449: 049.025 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//4//
S01divyav_u:2453: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:2455: 050.003 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//5//
S01divyav_u:2457: evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--pradīpasya bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam/
S01divyav_u:2459: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:2460: 050.008 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇarāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:2461: 050.010 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6//
S01divyav_u:2463: evaṃ ca ... cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:2470: 050.019 tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:2494: 051.002 atha bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2496: 051.003 aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih--bhagavān kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2499: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2500: 051.006 ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:2501: 051.007 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2502_0: 051.008 anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatih utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:2502_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhuktena sārdhaṃ
S01divyav_u:2504_1: bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto
S01divyav_u:2505: 051.013 upasaṃkramya dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--na tāvadbhoḥ puruṣa tīrthyānāṃ praveśo dātavyo yāvad buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhuktaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:2508_0: 051.016 anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:2508_1: kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:2509: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:2510: 051.018 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2512: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:2513_0: 051.022 anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:2513_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:2525: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā ājñā dattā--mā tāvat tīrthyānāṃ praveśaṃ dāsyasi,
S01divyav_u:2528: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--tasya me lābhāḥ sulabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2529: yanmāṃ śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śramaṇaśākyaputrīya[52] iti na jānante/
S01divyav_u:2530: 052.001 gacchāmi, kṛpaṇajanasyānugrahaṃ karomīti viditvā udyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:2531: sa saṃlakṣayati--adya mayā kasyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti/
S01divyav_u:2532: 052.002 yāvadanyatamā nagarāvalambikā kuṣṭhābhidrutā sarujārtā pakvagātrā bhikṣāmaṭati/
S01divyav_u:2535: 052.004 tayā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaścittaprāsādikaḥ śāntena īryāpathena/
S01divyav_u:2536: 052.005 sā saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe dakṣiṇīye kārā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:2538: yadi āryo mahākāśyapo mamāntikādanukampāmupādāya ācāmaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt,
S01divyav_u:2540: 052.007 tata āyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya pātramupanāmitam--yadi te bhagini parityaktam,
S01divyav_u:2546: saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyāryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā na cchoritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2548: 052.010 athāyuṣmatā mahākāśyapena tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya tasyā eva pratyakṣamanyatamaṃ kuḍyamūlaṃ niśritya paribhuktam/
S01divyav_u:2549: 052.012 sa saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpi āryeṇa mama cittānurakṣayā paribhuktam,
S01divyav_u:2553: 052.014 tasyā atīva audbilyamutpannam--mamāryeṇa mahākāśyapena piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīta iti/
S01divyav_u:2554: 052.015 tata āyuṣmatī mahākāśyape cittamabhiprasādya kālaṃ gatā tuṣite devanikāye upapannā/
S01divyav_u:2555: 052.016 sā śakreṇa devendreṇa dṛṣṭā ācāmaṃ pratipādayantī cittamabhiprasādayantī kālaṃ ca kurvāṇā/
S01divyav_u:2558: tiryak ca pretaṃ ca manuṣyāṃścāturmahārājikān devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yāvanna paśyati/
S01divyav_u:2559: 052.019 tathā hyadhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate no tūpariṣṭāt/
S01divyav_u:2567: 052.027 atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--ime ca tāvanmanuṣyāḥ puṇyāpuṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati,
S01divyav_u:2569: 052.028 ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśanena puṇyānāṃ svapuṇyaphale vyavasthitaḥ kasmāt dānāni na dadāmi,
S01divyav_u:2574: 052.031 avacīravicīrakaṃ kākābhilīnakaṃ nātiparamarūpaṃ kuvindaṃ cātmānamabhinimārya udūḍhaśiraskaḥ saṇaśāṭikānivāsitaḥ sphaṭitapāṇipādo vastraṃ vāyitumārabdhah[53]/
S01divyav_u:2575: 053.001 śacī api devakanyā kuvindanaryā veśadhāriṇī tasarikāṃ kartumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:2576: pārśve cāsyā divyā sudhā sajjīkṛtā tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:2578: 053.003 duḥkhitako 'yamiti kṛtvā dvāre sthitena pātraṃ prasāditam/
S01divyav_u:2582: 053.007 suviruddhamiti kṛtvā jāto me hṛdi saṃśayaḥ//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:2583: 053.008 dharmatā hyeṣā--asamanvāhṛtya arhatāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate/
S01divyav_u:2588: yasya te bhagavatā dīrgharātrānugato vicikitsākathaṃkathāśalyaḥ samūla ārūḍho yathāpi tattathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena/
S01divyav_u:2590: ime tāvat manuṣyāḥ puṇyānāmapratyakṣadarśino dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:2591: 053.012 ahaṃ pratyakṣadarśī eva puṇyānāṃ kathaṃ dānāni na dadāmi?
S01divyav_u:2595: 053.016 tataḥ prabhṛti āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ samanvāhṛtya kulāni piṇḍapātaṃ praveṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2596: 053.017 atha śakro devendra ākāśasthaścāyuṣmato mahākāśyapasya piṇḍapātaṃ carato divyayā sudhayā pātraṃ pūrayati/
S01divyav_u:2601: 053.021 sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2602: sā ca tuṣite devanikāye upapannā iti/
S01divyav_u:2603: 053.022 rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena śrutam--amukayā nagarāvalambikayā āryo mahākāśyapa ācāmena pratipāditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2606: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2607: 053.025 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati,
S01divyav_u:2608: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2609_0: 053.027 atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:2609_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavānāryamahākāśyapamuddiśya bhaktaṃ saptāhena iti /
S01divyav_u:2611: 053.030 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2612_0: 053.031 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastāmeva rātriṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:2612_1: samudānīyaṃ kālyamevotthāya āsanāni [54]prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato
S01divyav_u:2613: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:2614: 054.002 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2616: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:2617: 054.006 anyatamaśca kroḍamallako vṛddhānte cittamabhiprasādayaṃstiṣṭhati--ayaṃ rājā pratyakṣadarśīm eva puṇyānāṃ sve puṇyaphale pratiṣṭhāpito 'tṛpta eva puṇyairdānāni dadāti,
S01divyav_u:2619_0: 054.008 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaparyāyeṇa buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ
S01divyav_u:2619_1: śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:2619_2: bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:2622: kiṃ tava, āhosvidyena tavāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtamiti?
S01divyav_u:2624: 054.013 ko 'nyo mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyatīti viditvā kathayati--bhagavan yena mamāntikāt prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasūtaṃ tasya bhagavān nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatu iti/
S01divyav_u:2625: 054.014 tato bhagavatā kroḍamallakasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:2627: tato 'nyadivase rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mama bhagavān piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:2630: te kathayanti--kimarthaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthita iti?
S01divyav_u:2633: yatredānīṃ sa bhagavān mama piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:2636: 054.020 vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā śvo bhagavān devasyaiva nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti/
S01divyav_u:2637: 054.021 taiḥ pauruṣeyāṇāmājñā dattā yataḥ śvo bhavadbhiḥ praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkartavyaḥ prabhūtaścaiva samudānayitavyo yathopārdhaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātre patati upārdhaṃ bhūmau iti/
S01divyav_u:2638: 054.023 amātyairaparasmin divase prabhūta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ praṇītaśca/
S01divyav_u:2642: 054.025 tataḥ kroḍamallakāḥ pradhāvitāh--bhūmau nipatitaṃ gṛhṇīma iti/
S01divyav_u:2649: tasya kroḍamallakasya cittavikṣepo jātah--na śakyaṃ tena tathā cittaṃ prasādayitum yathā pūrvam/
S01divyav_u:2650: 054.028 tato rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣuasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā na mama nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśatīti viditvā dakṣiṇāmaśrutvaiva praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2651: 054.030 tato bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya nāṃnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā--
S01divyav_u:2653: 054.032 paśyasi(?) phalaṃ hi rūṣkikāyā alavaṇikāyāḥ kulmāṣapiṇḍikāyāḥ//5//
S01divyav_u:2654: 055.001 [55]athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--bahuśo bahuśo bhadanta bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya niveśane bhuktvā nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:2656: 055.003 bhagavānāha--icchasi tvamānanda rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ śrotum?
S01divyav_u:2659: 055.005 ayaṃ bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasyālavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotiṃ varṇayet,
S01divyav_u:2664: 055.008 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:2665: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2678: tena tasya dārakasya mātā abhihitā--ayaṃ tava putraḥ kṣetraṃ rakṣatu,
S01divyav_u:2682: sa tasya sukhaṃ bhaktakena yogodvahanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2684: 055.016 tasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--adya gṛhapatipatnī suhṛtsambandhibāndhavāḥ saha śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhojanena vyagrā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2685: 055.017 gacchāmi sānukālaṃ tasya dārakasya bhaktaṃ nayāmi iti/
S01divyav_u:2686: 055.018 sā sānukālaṃ gatvā gṛhapatipatnyā etamarthaṃ niveśayati/
S01divyav_u:2687: sā ruṣitā kathayati--na tāvacchramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dadāmi jñātīnāṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:2691: 055.020 tatastasya dārakasya mātā saṃlakṣayati--mā me putro bubhukṣitakaḥ sthāsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:2704: 055.026 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prantaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:2707: 055.028 sa saṃlakṣayati--nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūte dakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:2711: 055.030 tato 'sau pratyekabuddhastasya daridrapuruṣasya cetasā cittamājñāya pātraṃ prasāritavān--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:2714: 055.032 tatastena tīvreṇa prasādena sā alavaṇikā kulmāṣapiṇḍakā tasmai pratyekabuddhāya pratipāditā//
S01divyav_u:2716: eṣa evāsau rājā prasenajit kauśalastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:2718: tena karmaṇā ṣaṭkṛtvo deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritavān,
S01divyav_u:2720: tenaiva ca karmaṇā avaśeṣeṇa etarhi rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2723: 056.007 paśyasi phalaṃ hi rūkṣikāyā alavaṇikāyā kulmāṣapiṇḍakāyāḥ// iti/
S01divyav_u:2724: 056.008 sāmantakena śabdo visṛtah--bhagavatā rājñaḥ prasenajito 'lavaṇikāṃ kulmāṣapiṇḍakāmārabhya karmaplotirvyākṛtā iti/
S01divyav_u:2727: 056.010 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2728: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdaraśyati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:2729: 056.012 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2730_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutterāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
S01divyav_u:2731: 056.015 adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:2732: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhamukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya traimāsyaṃ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:2734: 056.017 tailasya ca kumbhakoṭiṃ samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātum/
S01divyav_u:2735: 056.018 tatra bhakte pūjāyāṃ ca mahān kolāhalo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2740: 056.020 aparaiḥ samākhyātam--rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena buddhapramukho bhikṣuasṃghastraimāsyaṃ bhojitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2742: tailasya kumbhakoṭiṃ ca samudānīya dīpamālā abhyudyato dātumiti/
S01divyav_u:2743: 056.022 tatastasyā nagarāvalambikāyā etadabhavat--ayaṃ tāvadrājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ puṇyairatṛpto 'dyāpi dānāni dadāti,
S01divyav_u:2745: 056.024 yannvahamapi kutaścit samudānīya bhagavataḥ pradīpaṃ dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:2746: tayā khaṇḍamallake tailasya stokam yācayitvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya bhagavataścaṅkrame dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2747: 056.025 pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathāyaṃ bhagavāñ śākyamunirvarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma śāstā loka utpannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2748: evamahamapi varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunireva śāstā bhaveyam/
S01divyav_u:2757: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām--na tāvadupasthāyakāḥ pratisamlīyante na yāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ pratisamlīnā iti/
S01divyav_u:2758: 056.032 athāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃlakṣayati--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
S01divyav_u:2766: mama buddhirutpanā--asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavanta āloke śayyāṃ kalpayanti/
S01divyav_u:2774: te 'pi na śaknuyur nirvāpayituṃ prāgeva hastagataścīvarakarṇiko vyajanaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:2775: 057.007 tathā hi--ayaṃ pradīpastayā dārikayā mahatā cittābhisaṃskāreṇa prajvalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2776: 057.008 api tu ānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2789_0: 058.002 buddho bhavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme satkṛto gurukṛto
S01divyav_u:2789_1: mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrairdhanibhiḥ paurairbrāhmaṇairgṛhapatibhiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ
S01divyav_u:2790: 058.005 tatra khalu varṣāvāsaṃ bhagavānupagto jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:2791: 058.006 atha tadaiva pravāraṇāyāṃ pratyupasthitāyāṃ saṃbahulāḥ śrtāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2792: 058.007 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānto niṣaṇṇāh
S01divyav_u:2793: 058.008 ekāntaniṣaṇṇān saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:2794: 058.010 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2796: śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakāntāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2798: 058.012 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2799: 058.013 saṃbahulāñ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇija āyuṣmānānando dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:2800: 058.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:2801_0: 058.016 atha te vaṇija utthāyāsanebhyah ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmānānandastenānñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:2801_1: praṇamya āyuṣmantamānandamidamavocan -- kiṃcitte āryānanda śrutaṃ varṣoṣito bhagavān
S01divyav_u:2803: dharmatā caiṣā ṣaṇmahānagaranivāsino vaṇijo yasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavanto gantukāmā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:2805: 058.020 sa kathayati -- buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kiṃ na pṛcchatha ?
S01divyav_u:2808: mamāpi bhavanto durāsadā hi buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2810: yadi bhadantānandasyāpi durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2811: kathaṃ bhadantānando jānīte 'mukāṃ diśaṃ bhagavān gamiṣyatīti ?
S01divyav_u:2825: nāgnibhyaṃ nodakabhyaṃ na siṃhabhyaṃ na vyāghrabhyaṃ na dvīpitarakṣuparacakrabhyaṃ na caurabhayaṃ na gulmatarapaṇyātiyātrābhyaṃ na manuṣyāmanuṣyabhayam/
S01divyav_u:2826: 058.030 kālena ca kālaṃ divyāni rūpāṇi dṛśyante,
S01divyav_u:2832: 059.001 [059]atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijah āyuṣmatah ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2833: 059.003 dhartā khalu buddhā bhagavanto jīvanto dhriyanto yāpayanto mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamānāḥ parānugrahapravṛttāḥ kālena kālamaraṇyacārikāṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:2834: nadīcārikāṃ parvatacārikāṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ janapada cārikāṃ caranti/
S01divyav_u:2835: 059.005 asmiṃstvarthe buddho bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ cartukāmastadeva pravāraṇāṃ pravārayitvā āyuṣmantamānadāmāmantrayate sma -- gaccha ānanda,
S01divyav_u:2836: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cāriṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2837: 059.007 yo yuṣmākam utsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ janapadacārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:2839: 059.008 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati -- bhagavānāyuṣyanta itaḥ saptame divase magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:2840: 059.009 yo yuṣmākamutsahate bhagavatā sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:2842: 059.011 atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ saṃbahulaiśca śrāvastīnivāsibhirvaṇigbrāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:2843: 059.013 atha saṃbahulāśca śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2844: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocan -- adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavān yāvacca śrāvastī yāvacca rājagṛham,
S01divyav_u:2846: 059.016 adhivāsayati bhagavān saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvastīnivāsināṃ vaṇijāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:2847: 059.017 atha saṃbahulāḥ śrāvastīnivāsino vaṇijo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:2848: 059.019 atha saṃprasthite buddhe bhagavati antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca rājagṛham,
S01divyav_u:2851: 059.021 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti -- gaccatu bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2853: 059.022 ityanuvicintya sarve javena prasṛtā yena sārthaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2855: caurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smo bhadanta caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2856: 059.023 nāsamākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:2861: api tu sakalasya sārthasya parigaṇayya suvarṇaṃ gṛhṇīdhvam/
S01divyav_u:2863: asmin sārthe ye upāsakā viṇijastaiḥ kṛtsnasya sārthasya mūlyaṃ gaṇayya caurāṇāṃ niveditam iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
S01divyav_u:2864: 059.028 tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ sārthaniṣkrayārthaṃ bhagavatā nidhānaṃ darśitam/
S01divyav_u:2869: punarapi bhagavān sārthaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃgha puraskṛto rājagṛhāt śrāvastīṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2871: 060.001 [60]evaṃ dvitricatuṣpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃśca cairasahasrasakāśādāgamanagamanena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
S01divyav_u:2872: 060.002 saptaṃ tu cāraṃ bhagavān sārtharahito bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ śāvastyā rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2874: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ saṃlapanti -- bhagavān gacchatu,
S01divyav_u:2881: 060.006 caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva bhagavān -- vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:2882: 060.007 nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vaṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:2889: 060.010 atha bhagavāṃstaccaurasahasram yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā tato 'nupūrveṇa rājagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2890: 060.011 tatasteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ buddhirutpannā -- yā kācidasmākaṃ śrīsaubhāgyasampat,
S01divyav_u:2892: 060.012 yannu vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghamasmin pradeśe bhojayema iti/
S01divyav_u:2894_2: daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣtānāṃ trīrātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasena buddhacakṣuṣā lokam
S01divyav_u:2905: kamahamapāyād vyutthāpya svarge mokṣaphale ca pratiṣṭhāpayāmi,
S01divyav_u:2912: 060.029 yathā hi mātā priyamekaputrakaṃ hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya jīvitam/
S01divyav_u:2913: 060.031 tathaiva vaineyajanaṃ tathagato hyavekṣate rakṣati cāsya saṃtatim//2//
S01divyav_u:2915: 061.003 vaineyavatsān bhavaduḥkhanaṣṭān vatsān praṇaṣṭaniva vatsalā gauḥ//3//
S01divyav_u:2916_0: 061.005 tato bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ vaineyakālamapekṣya rājagṛhādanupūrveṇa bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:2916_2: mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāraḥ pūrvavat yāvanmahākaruṇayā samanvāgatas
S01divyav_u:2919: 061.009 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantamidamavodcan -- adhivāsayatu asmākaṃ bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena/
S01divyav_u:2921: atha caurasahasraṃ bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato'ntikān prakrāntam//
S01divyav_u:2922: 061.013 atha taccaurasahasraṃ tāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñnapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya,
S01divyav_u:2924: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyase/
S01divyav_u:2925: 061.015 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya caurasahasrasya bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2926: 061.017 atha taccaurasahasraṃ buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya candanodakena pādau prakṣālayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:2927: 061.018 atha bhagavān prakṣālitapāṇipādaḥ purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñnapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2928_0: 061.019 niṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena
S01divyav_u:2928_1: svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ
S01divyav_u:2929: atha bhagavatā teṣāmāśayānuśayaṃ viditvā dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñnātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:2930: yāṃ śrutvā tena caurasahasreṇa tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñnānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:2931_0: 061.024 dṛṣṭasatyāśca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā
S01divyav_u:2931_1: kṛtaṃ na rājñnā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair neṣṭair na svajanabandhuvargeṇa
S01divyav_u:2938: 061.027 labhema vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:2940: tato bhagavatā brahmeṇa svareṇābhihitāh -- eta vatsāḥ,
S01divyav_u:2943: 061.031 sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:2944_1: -- paśya bhadanta bhagavatā idaṃ caurasahasraṃ saptavāraṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe
S01divyav_u:2946: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani mayā asyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśādanekabhāṇḍasahasraḥ sārtho niṣkrītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:2948_1: duradhigamāṃ badaradvīpayātrāṃ varṣaśatena sādhayitvā etadeva caurasahasramārabhya
S01divyav_u:2949_0: 062.007 tacchruṇuta -- bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminneva jambudvīpe vārāṇasyāṃ
S01divyav_u:2949_1: nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati sma ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:2951: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ priyaseno nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:2953: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:2954: 062.013 atha anyatama udārapuṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvo 'nyatamasmāt praṇītāddevanikāyāccayutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣimavakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2966: 062.018 sā āttamanāḥ svāmina ārocayati -- diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhasva,
S01divyav_u:2968: 062.019 yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:2970: 062.020 so 'pyāttamanāttamanā udānamudānayati -- apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:2976: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmuddiśya dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādiśet -- idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatviti/
S01divyav_u:2977_1: uṣṇa uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ śīte śītopakaraṇairvaidyaprajñnaptairāhārair nātiśītair nātyuṣṇair
S01divyav_u:2980: 062.028 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:2981: 062.029 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāso dṛḍhakaṭhinaśarīro mahānagnabalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:2982: 062.031 tasya jñnātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatirātriṃdivasāni tasya jātasya jāto mahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti -- kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma?
S01divyav_u:2985: supriyo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhya upanyasto dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:2986: 063.003 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhurunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiṣcottaptottapairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:2990: 063.006 nikṣepe hastiparīkṣāyāmaśvaparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ puruṣaparīkṣāyāṃ strīparīkṣāyām/
S01divyav_u:2991_1: sarvabhūtarutajñnaḥ sarvagatigatijñnah uddhaṭṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ paramatīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ
S01divyav_u:2992_0: 063.009 sa yāni tāni rājñnāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhnābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryamanuprāptānāṃ
S01divyav_u:2993_0: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarudhanuḥṣu upayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:2993_1: tomaragrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe'kṣuṇṇavedhe
S01divyav_u:2995: dharmatā caiṣā -- na tāvat putrasya nāma nirgacchati yāvat pitā dhriyate/
S01divyav_u:3001: kālagate priyasene sārthavāhe brahmadattena kāśirājñnā supriyo mahāsārthavāhatve 'bhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3002: 063.019 tena sārthavāhabhūtena iyamevamrūpā mahāpratijñnā kṛtā -- sarvattvā mayā dhanena saṃtarpayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3005: 063.021 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- alpaṃ ca deyaṃ bahavaśca yācakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3007: yannvahaṃ sāmudram yānapātraṃ samudānīya mahāsamudramavatareyaṃ dhanahārikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3008: 063.023 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sāmudrayānapātraṃ samudānīya pañcamātrairvaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3009: 063.024 tato 'nupūrveṇa ratnadvīpaṃ gatvā ratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā svastikṣemābhyāṃ mahāsamudrāduttīrya sthalajairvahitrairbhāṇḍamāropya vārāṇasyabhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3016: 063.028 sārthavāhaḥ kathayati mamaiṣa bhavantaḥ sārthaḥ saṃniśritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3018: evamuktāścaurāḥ kathayanti -- vayaṃ smaḥ sārthavāhacaurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3019: 063.030 nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyā na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:3021: 063.031 teṣāṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sārthasya mūlyaṃ bhavanto gaṇyatām/
S01divyav_u:3023: tataste vaṇijaḥ parasparaṃ mūlyaṃ gaṇayitvā caurāṇāṃ nivedayanti[64] -- iyanti śatāni sahasrāṇi ceti/
S01divyav_u:3024: 064.001 tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena bhāṇḍaniṣkrayārthe svaṃ dravyamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:3026: evaṃ dvistriścatuḥpanñcaṣaḍvārāṃs tasyaiva caurasahasrasya sakāśāt supriyeṇa sārthavāhena sārthaḥ paritrāto mūlyaṃ cānupradattam/
S01divyav_u:3027: 064.003 yāvat saptaṃ tu vāraṃ supriyaḥ sārthavāho mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3030: 064.006 supriyeṇa ca sārthavāhenāvalokyābhihitāh -- supriyo 'haṃ bhavantaḥ sārthavāhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3031: caurāḥ kathayanti -- jānāsyeva mahāsārthavāha vayaṃ caurā aṭavīcarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3032: 064.007 nāsmākaṃ kṛṣir na vāṇijyaṃ na gaurakṣyam/
S01divyav_u:3034: tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena pūrvikāṃ pratijñnāmanusmṛtya dṛḍhapratijñnena tasya caurasahasrasya bhāṇḍamanupradattam/
S01divyav_u:3035: 064.009 supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati -- ime caurā labdhaṃ labdhamarthajātasaṃnicayaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:3036: 064.010 mayā ca mahatī pratijñnā kṛtā sarvasattvā dhanena mayā saṃtarpayitavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:3037: 064.011 so 'hamimaṃ caurasahasraṃ na śaknomi dhanena saṃtarpayitum/
S01divyav_u:3038: kathaṃ punaḥ sarvasattvān dhanena saṃtarpayiṣyāmīti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3039_1: lokahitārthamabhyudgatasya anyatarā maheśākhyā devatā upasaṃkramya samāśvāsayati
S01divyav_u:3041: asti khalu mahāsārthavāha asminneva jambudvīpe badaradvīpo nāma mahāpattano 'manuṣyāvacarito maheśākhyamanuṣyādhiṣṭhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3042: 064.016 santi tasmin badaradvīpe pradhānāni ratnāni sarvasattvavicitramanorathaparipūrakāṇi/
S01divyav_u:3048: na ca śakitā supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena sā devatā praṣṭum -- katarasyāṃ diśi badaradvīipaḥ kathaṃ vā tatra gamyata iti/
S01divyav_u:3049: 064.021 atha supriyasya sātrthavāhasya suptapratibuddhasya etadabhavat -- aho bata me sā devatā punarapi darśayet,
S01divyav_u:3050: diśaṃ copāyaṃ ca vyapadiśed badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti cintāparo middhamavakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3051_0: 064.023 atha sā devatā tasya mahātmana udārapuṇyamaheśākhyasya dṛḍhodārapratijñnasyodāravīryaparākramanāmanikṣiptotsāhatāṃ
S01divyav_u:3051_1: viditvā upasaṃkramya evamāha -- mā tvaṃ sārthavāha khedamāpadyasva /
S01divyav_u:3052: 064.025 asti khalu mahāsārthavāha paścime digbhāge panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni samatikramya sapta mahāparvatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3054_1: śaṅkhanābhī ca nīlodastārakākṣaśca parvatau nīlagrīva eva ca vairambhā tāmrāṭavī
S01divyav_u:3054_2: vemṇugulmaḥ sapta parvatāḥ sakaṇṭakāḥ kṣāranadī triśaṅkuh ayaskilamaṣṭādaśavakro
S01divyav_u:3054_3: nadīślakṣṇa eva ca dhūmanetramudakaṃ saptaśīviṣaparvatā nadī bhavati paścimā /
S01divyav_u:3056: 064.030 anulomapratilome mahāsamudre manuṣyānavacarite anulomapratilomā vāyavo vānti/
S01divyav_u:3057: 064.031 tatra yo 'sau puruṣo bhavati maheśākhyo maheśākhyadevatāparigṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3058: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya anulomapratilomamahāsamudramavatarati[65]/
S01divyav_u:3066: 065.003 anulomapratilomaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya anulomapratilomo nāma parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:3069_0: 065.005 sa vīryabalenātmānaṃ saṃdhārya tasmādeva mahāparvatādamoghāṃ nāmauṣadhīṃ
S01divyav_u:3069_1: samanviṣya gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anulomapratilomaṃ nāma
S01divyav_u:3073: 065.008 sacedevaṃ vidhiṃ vā nānutiṣṭhati auṣadhīṃ vā na labhate,
S01divyav_u:3078: 065.010 anulomapratilomaṃ mahāparvataṃ samatikramya āvarto nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
S01divyav_u:3079: 065.011 tatra vairambhakā vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ bhrāmyate/
S01divyav_u:3081: sa mahatā puṇyabalena vīryabalena cittabalena kāyabalena mahāntaṃ plavamāsthāya āvartaṃ mahāsamudramavarati/
S01divyav_u:3085: evaṃ dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe panñcame ṣaṣṭhe āvarte saptakṛtvo bhrāmayitvā nirudhyate,
S01divyav_u:3089: 065.018 tatra śaṅkho nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharo mahābalo mahākāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3090: 065.019 tasyopariṣṭādyojanamātre śaṅkhanābhī nāmauṣadhī divā dhūmāyate rātrau prajvalati/
S01divyav_u:3092: sa khalu nāgo divā svapiti rātrau carati/
S01divyav_u:3093: tatra tena puruṣeṇa divā sukhasuptasya nāgasya ātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhibalena mantrabalena puṇyabalena śaṅkhanābhī auṣadhī grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:3094: 065.022 gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya āvartaḥ parvato 'dhiroḍhavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3103: nīlode mahāsamudre tārākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raktanetraḥ pradīptaśiroruho vikṛtacaraṇadaśananayanaḥ parvatāyatakukṣiḥ/
S01divyav_u:3107: 065.028 audārikāścāsya āśvāsapraśvāsā gurugurukāḥ pravartante yathā meghasya garjato 'śanyāṃ ca sphūrjatyāṃ śabdaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3110_0: tatra tena puruṣeṇa tasmādeva samudrakūlānmahāmakarināmauṣadhīṃ samanviṣya gṛhya
S01divyav_u:3110_1: netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya mahānataṃ plavamāsthāya suptaṃ tārākṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:3114: tamenaṃ tārākṣo dakarākṣasa ojaṃ vā ghaṭṭayati,
S01divyav_u:3117: 066.003 nīlodaṃ mahāsamudraṃ samatikramya nīlodo nāma mahāparvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:3118: tatra nīlagrīvo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati panñcaśataparivāra ugratejā raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3124: sa khalu nāgo dṛṣṭiviṣo 'pi śvāsaviṣo 'pi sparśaviṣo 'pi daṃṣṭrāviṣo 'pi/
S01divyav_u:3127: yaḥ khalu tena dhūmena mṛgo vā pakṣī vā spṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:3129: 066.009 tatra tena puruṣeṇa śiraḥsnātenopoṣitena maitrāyatā karuṇāyatā avyāpannena cittenātmānaṃ samanurakṣatā nāgaśarīramaviheṭhayatā auṣadhī grahītavyā/
S01divyav_u:3130: 066.010 netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya anena vidhinā jānatānuṣṭhitena nīlodaḥ parvato 'bhiroḍhavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3138: 066.014 nīlodaṃ parvataṃ samatikramya vairambho nāma mahāsamudraḥ/
S01divyav_u:3139: vairambhe mahāsamudre vairambhā nāma vāyavo vānti yaistadudakaṃ kṣobhyate,
S01divyav_u:3141: 066.016 tamutsṛjya uttareṇa vairambhasya mahāsamudrasya mahatī tāmrāṭavī anekayojanāyāmavistārā/
S01divyav_u:3143: 066.018 tatra tāmrākṣo nāma ajagaraḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ paramadurgandhaḥ panñcayojanāyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3146: tadā asya yojanaṃ sāmantakena lālāsya spharitvā/
S01divyav_u:3154: tāṃ gṛhītvā netre anñjayitvā śirasi baddhvā samālabhya suptaṃ tāmrākṣamajagaraṃ viditvā auṣadhībalena mantrabalena vā ajagarabhavanasamīpena gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:3156: svastikṣemābhyāmatikramya aviheṭhitastāmrākṣeṇājagareṇa tataḥ paścānmūlaphalāni bhakṣayatā gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:3158: 066.026 tatra tena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭaiḥ pādau baddhvā tān parvatān vīryabalena laṅghayitvā sapta kṣāranadyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3160: tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā abhiruhyātikramitavyā aspṛśatā pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:3163: sapta kṣāranadīḥ samatikramya triśaṅkur nāma parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:3164: 066.029 triśaṅkau parvate triśaṅkavo nāma kaṇṭakāstīkṣṇāḥ sutīkṣṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3165: 066.030 tatastena puruṣeṇa tāmrapaṭṭairvetrapāśaiḥ pādau baddhvā atikaramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:3168: tatra tena puruṣeṇa śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā atikramitavyamaspṛśatā pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:3176: asya na kiṃcit nistaraṇamanyatra vṛkṣāgrād vṛkṣamadhiruhya gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:3177: 067.004 aṣṭādaśavakraṃ parvatamatikramya aṣṭādaśavakrikā nāma nādī grāhamakarākulā saṃvṛtā ca/
S01divyav_u:3185: ślakṣṇaṃ parvatamatikramya ślakṣṇā nāma nadī grāhamakarākulā/
S01divyav_u:3190: ślakṣṇāṃ nadīmatikramya dhūmanetro nāma parvato dhūmāyate saṃdhūmāyate/
S01divyav_u:3191: 067.010 yena khalu tena dhūmena mṛgā vā pakṣiṇo vā spṛśyante,
S01divyav_u:3195: 067.012 guhāṃ samanviṣya tenātra guhādvāramauṣadhibalena mantrabalena ca moktavyam /
S01divyav_u:3196: sā ca khalu guhā āśīviṣaparipūrṇā tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:3202: 067.015 tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ saṃjīvanī nāmauṣadhī jyotīrasaśca maṇirdīpaprabhāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3203: 067.016 tāmauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā saśīrṣapādaṃ samālabhya tāṃ cauṣadhīṃ gṛhītvā guhā praveṣṭavyā/
S01divyav_u:3204: auṣadhībalena mantrabalena auṣadhīprabhāvāccāśīviṣāḥ kāye na kramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:3212: 067.021 tataḥ śālmalīphalakaiḥ plavaṃ baddhvā māṃsapeśyā ātmānamācchādya adhiroḍhavyam/
S01divyav_u:3213: 067.022 tatastā āśīviṣā māṃsagandhena pārāt pāraṃ gamiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:3216: 067.023 so 'dhiroḍhavyas tatra drakṣyasi mahāntaṃ sauvarṇabhūmiṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpaphalacchāyāvṛkṣopaśobhitam/
S01divyav_u:3217: 067.024 rohitakāñ janapadān ṛddhāṃśca kṣemāṃśca subhikṣāṃśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃśca/
S01divyav_u:3218_0: 067.025 rohitakaṃ ca mahānagaraṃ dvādaśayojanāyāmaṃ saptayojanavistṛtaṃ saptaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ
S01divyav_u:3219_0: 067.027 vīṇā vallikā mahatī sughoṣakaiḥ śrotrābhirāmaiśca gītadhvanibhiranuparataprayogaṃ
S01divyav_u:3220_0: 067.030 yatra maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ prativasati abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito
S01divyav_u:3220_1: vyakto medhāvī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
S01divyav_u:3226: evaṃ mahāsārthavāha paramaduṣkarakāraka imāṃ sumerumalayamandarasadṛśīṃ dṛḍhāṃ pratijñnāṃ nistariṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:3230_0: atha supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ suptapratibuddho devatāvacanaṃ śrutvā paramavismayamāpannaścintayati
S01divyav_u:3245: kasmādahaṃ na sādhayiṣyāmītyanuvicintya supriyo mahāsārthavāho dṛḍhapratijñno dṛḍhavīryaparākramo 'nikṣiptotsāha udārapuṇyavipākamaheśākhyo/
S01divyav_u:3246_1: samanusmṛtya mahatā vīryabalena ekākī advitīyavyavasāyo yathopadiṣṭāni panñcāntaradvīpaśatāni samatikrāmati /
S01divyav_u:3248: sapta mahānadyo vistareṇa sarvāṇi saṃkaṭāni yathoktena vidhinā mūlakandaphalāhāro guṇavati phalake baddhvā paripūrṇairdvādaśabhirvarṣai rohitakaṃ mahānagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3249: 068.018 udyāne sthitvā anyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate -- kaścidbhoḥ puruṣa asmin rohitake mahānagare magho nāma sārthavāhaḥ prarivasati?
S01divyav_u:3253: atha supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyaitadabhavat -- mā haiva magho mahāsārthavāho 'dṛṣṭa eva kālaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:3254: 068.021 ko me vyapadeśaṃ kariṣyati tasya badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyeti viditvā tvaritatvaritam yena maghasya sārthavāhasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3257: 068.024 dharmatā khalu kuśalā bodhisattvāsteṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu/
S01divyav_u:3259_1: sārthavāhaḥ ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā supriyo mahāsārtahvāho 'dhītya
S01divyav_u:3264: 068.029 dākṣyadākṣiṇyacāturyamādhuryopetamupasthānakarmaṇi satputra iva pitaraṃ bhaktyā gauraveṇa śuśrūṣate/
S01divyav_u:3265: 068.030 tato maghasya sārthavāhasya kṣemaṇīyataraṃ cābhūdyāpanīyataraṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:3267_0: atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ pratilabdhasaṃjñnaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat
S01divyav_u:3267_1: -- kuto bhavāñ jñnānavijñnānasampanno 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paṇḍito vyakto
S01divyav_u:3271: evamūktaḥ supriyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:3273: 069.004 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya sārthavāhāya jātikulagotrāgamanaprayojanaṃ vistareṇārocayati sma,
S01divyav_u:3274: paraṃ cainaṃ vijñnāpayati -- sārvāhānubhāvādahaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:3276_0: 069.007 atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasyāśrutapūrvāṃ parahitārthamabhyudyatāṃ
S01divyav_u:3276_1: dṛḍhapratijñnāṃ śrutvā paramavismayajāto 'nimiṣadṛṣṭiḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya supriyaṃ
S01divyav_u:3278: yo nāma bhavāñ jambudvīpādamanuṣyāvacaritaṃ parvatasamudranadyottaraṇaṃ kṛtvā ihāgataḥ,
S01divyav_u:3281: 069.011 devaṃ tadbhavantaṃ paśyāmi devānyatamaṃ vā manuṣyaveṣadhāriṇam/
S01divyav_u:3283: api tu ahaṃ mahāvyādhinā grasto mumūrṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:3285: 069.013 api tu ko bhavato 'rthe parahitārthe 'bhyudyatasyātmaparityāgamapi na kuryāt?
S01divyav_u:3286: tena hi vatsa kṣipraṃ maṅgalapotaṃ samudānaya,
S01divyav_u:3289: 069.014 evaṃ sārthavāheti supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghāya mahāsārthavāhāya pratiśrutya maṅgalapotaṃ samudānīya saṃvaraṃ cāropya yena magho mahāsārthavāhastenaopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3290: 069.016 upasaṃkramya maghaṃ sārthavāhamidamavocat -- deva samudānīto maṅgalapotaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3293_1: sabhṛtyavargeṇa ca rohitakarājñnā ca nivāryamāṇo 'pi guṇavati phalake baddhvā āśu
S01divyav_u:3294: 069.020 atha magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ supriyasya mahāsārthavāhasya kathayati -- ahaṃ bāḍhaglāno na śakyāmi sthiyo gantum/
S01divyav_u:3296: 069.022 api tu asmin mahāsamudre yāvadevaṃvidhāni nimittāni bhavanti udakasya varṇasaṃsthānāni ca mama nivedayitavyāni/
S01divyav_u:3297: 069.023 yathā anekāni yojanaśatāni gatvā adrākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:3298: 069.024 dṛṣṭvā punarmaghāya sārthavahāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3300: 069.025 evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha ekapāṇḍaraṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:3301: 069.026 api tu paśyasi tvaṃ dakṣiṇakena mahatsudhāparvatam yadidaṃ tasyaitadanubhāvena pānīyaṃ ranñjitam/
S01divyav_u:3306: punarapi gacchan paśyati supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ śastravarṇaṃ pānīyam/
S01divyav_u:3307: 069.030 dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yat khalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- śastravarṇaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:3315: 070.003 evaṃ lohaparvatāstāmraparvatā rūpyaparvatāḥ suvarṇaparvatāḥ sphaṭikaparvatā vaidūryaparvatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3318: 070.005 dṛṣṭvā ca punarmaghāya sārthavāhāyārocayati -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyaṃ dṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:3320: 070.007 evemukte magho mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- naitanmahāsārthavāha nīlapītalohitāvadātaṃ pānīyam,
S01divyav_u:3330: 070.012 api tu mahāsārthavāha iyantyevāhaṃ badaradvīpamahāpattanasya daśa nimittāni jāne gamanaṃ prati,
S01divyav_u:3332: 070.013 evamukte supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- kadā badaradvīpamahāpattanasya gamanāyānto bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:3333: evamukte maghaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- mayāpi supriya badaradvīpamahāpattanaṃ kārtsyena na dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:3334: 070.015 api tu mayā śrutaṃ paurāṇānāṃ mahāsārthavāhānāmantikājjīrṇānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ mahallakānām -- ito jalamapahāya paścimāṃ diśaṃ sthalena gamyate/
S01divyav_u:3337: tataḥ supriyāya mahāsārthavāhāya kathayati -- maraṇāntikā me vedanāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3338: 070.018 etattvaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ baddhvā maccharīre śarīrapūjāṃ kuruṣva/
S01divyav_u:3339: 070.019 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastaṃ maṅgalapotaṃ tīramupanīya vetrapāśaṃ badhnāti/
S01divyav_u:3341: 070.021 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho maghaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kālagataṃ viditvā sthale utthāpya śarīre śarīrapūjaṃ kṛtvā cintayati -- maṅgalapotamāruhya yāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:3342: 070.022 sa ca poto vāyunā vetrapāśaṃ chittvā apahṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3343: 070.023 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścatūratnamayasya parvatasya dakṣiṇena pārśvenāṭavyāṃ sthalena saṃprasthito mūlaphalāni bhakṣayamāṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3346: tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho madhunā pādau pralipyābhirūḍhaśca,
S01divyav_u:3349: 070.027 sa tatra paśyati mahāntaṃ parvatamuccaṃ ca pragṛhītaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:3353: tatra ca parvate nīlādo nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:3354: 070.029 sa saṃlakṣayati -- ayaṃ bodhisattvo lokahitārthamudyataḥ parikliśyate,
S01divyav_u:3356: 070.030 idamanucintya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- ito mahāsārthavāha pūrveṇa yojanaṃ gatvā trīṇi parvataśṛṅgāṇyanupūrvaniṃnānyanupūrvapravaṇānyanupūrvaprāgbhārāṇi/
S01divyav_u:3359: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ suptaprabuddho vetraśiṭām [71]baddhvā tāni parvataśṛṅgāṇyatikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3360: 071.001 bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsāthavāhaḥ sphaṭikaparvataṃ ślakṣṇaṃ nirālambamagamyaṃ manuṣyamātrasya/
S01divyav_u:3361: 071.002 na cāsyopāyaṃ paśyati taṃ parvatamabhirohaṇāyeti viditvā cintāparo 'horātramavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3362: 071.003 tasmiṃśca parvate candraprabho nāma yakṣaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:3363: 071.004 sa cintāparaṃ sārthavāhaṃ viditvā lokahitārthamabhyudyataṃ mahāyānasamprasthitaṃ prasannacittaṃ copetyāśvāsayati -- na khalu mahāsārthavahena viṣādaḥ karaṇīya iti/
S01divyav_u:3368: tayā gṛhītayā nāsya kāye śastraṃ kramiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:3375: tatra te na śocitavyaṃ na kranditavyaṃ na paridevitavyam/
S01divyav_u:3376: 071.011 atha candraprabho yakṣaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ samanuśāsya tatraivāntarhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3377: 071.012 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaścandraprabheṇa mahāyakṣeṇa samāśvāsya ādeśitamārgo yathoktena vidhinā sphaṭikaparvatamatikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3379: 071.014 bhūyaḥ saṃprasthito 'drākṣīt supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sauvarṇaṃ mahānagaramārāmasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
S01divyav_u:3382: 071.016 dṛṣṭvā ca punarudyānaṃ gatvā cintayati -- yadyapyahaṃ nagaramadrākṣam,
S01divyav_u:3384: 071.017 kadā badaradvīpasya mahāpattanasyāgamanāyādhvā bhaviṣyatīti viditvā śayitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3385: atha sā pūrvadevatā supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ durmanasaṃ viditvā rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaya uṣasaṃkramya samāśvāsya utkarṣayati -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
S01divyav_u:3392_0: tataścatasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prasādikāścāturyamādhuryasampannāḥ
S01divyav_u:3397: apatikānāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇamaparāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3398: 071.027 imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni,
S01divyav_u:3402: 071.030 tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
S01divyav_u:3411: tatastvayā nipuṇaṃ praṣṭavyāh -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:3415: yāvaccaturthakinnaranagaraprāptasya te dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgamiṣyanti tāsāṃ pūrvikānāmantikādabhirūpatarāśca darśanīyatarāśca prāsādikatarāścāpsarasah -- pratispardhinyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3419: 072.009 atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pramuditamanāḥ sukhapratibuddhaḥ kālyamevo 'tthāya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3421_0: tataḥ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre catasraḥ kinnarakanyā nirgatā abhirūpā
S01divyav_u:3425: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ trāṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3426: 072.015 imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni ca/
S01divyav_u:3428: tadyathāmaṇayo muktā vaidūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāh etāni ca/
S01divyav_u:3429: 072.018 tvaṃ cāsmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasva/
S01divyav_u:3430: atha supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sūpasthitasmṛtiṃ tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya sauvarṇaṃ kinnaranagaraṃ praveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
S01divyav_u:3431: 072.020 niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
S01divyav_u:3434: 072.022 tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
S01divyav_u:3435: 072.023 na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
S01divyav_u:3438: 072.024 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko 'nubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:3439_0: 072.025 tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu sārthavāha jānīyāh -- tadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ
S01divyav_u:3439_1: śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣita idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya yojanasahasraṃ sāmantakena
S01divyav_u:3439_2: yo yenārthī bhavati hiraṇyena vā suvarṇena vā annena vā vastreṇa vā pānena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa
S01divyav_u:3439_3: vā dvipādena vā catuṣpādena vā yānena vā vāhanena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā,
S01divyav_u:3444_0: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01divyav_u:3444_1: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya sauvarṇāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:3445: 072.032 adrākṣīt supriyo [73]mahāsārthavāho rūpyamayaṃ kinnaranagaramārāmasampannaṃ vanasampannaṃ puṣkariṇīsampannam/
S01divyav_u:3446: 073.001 tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre'ṣṭau kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3451_0: 073.004 tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kthayā saṃdarśya
S01divyav_u:3451_1: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya rūpyamayāt kinnaranagarāt
S01divyav_u:3452: 073.007 tatrāpi supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trikoṭite dvāre ṣoḍaśa kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3454: 073.008 tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāstata eva viśiṣṭataraṃ saubhāsinikaṃ trisāhasrayojanikaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:3455: 073.009 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhastasya ratnasya prabhāvānveṣī kathayati -- asya ratnasya bhaginyaḥ ko'nubhāva iti?
S01divyav_u:3457_0: 073.011 supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya
S01divyav_u:3457_1: samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛbhaginīduhitṛvat pratisaṃmodya tṛtīyāt kinnaranagarāt pratiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:3460: tataḥ supriyeṇa sārthavāhena trirākoṭite dvāre dvātriṃśat kinnarakanyā nirgatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3465: apatīnāṃ patiralayanānāṃ layano 'dvīpānāṃ dvīpo 'śaraṇānāṃ śaraṇo 'trāṇānāṃ traṇo 'parāyaṇānāṃ parāyaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3466: 073.020 imāni ca te 'nnagṛhāṇi pānagṛhāṇi vastragṛhāṇi śayanagṛhāṇyārāmaramaṇīyāni vanaramaṇīyāni puṣkariṇīramaṇīyāni/
S01divyav_u:3468: tadyathā -- maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3471: tatrāpi supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ sūpasthitasmṛtistāḥ kinnarakanyā vividhairdharmapadavyanñjanaiḥ paritoṣayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:3472: 073.025 tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ sarvāṅgairanuparigṛhya catūratnamayaṃ kinnaranagaramanupraveśya prāsādamabhiropya prajñnapta evāsane niṣādayanti/
S01divyav_u:3473: 073.026 niṣaṇṇaḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho daśākuśalān karmapathān vigarhati,
S01divyav_u:3476: 073.028 tuṣṭāśca tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ kathayanti -- āścaryam yatredānīṃ daharaśca bhavān dharmakāmaśca/
S01divyav_u:3477: 073.029 na ca kāmeṣu sajjase vā badhyase vā/
S01divyav_u:3479: 073.030 tā api dharmadeśanāvarjitāḥ saubhāsinikaṃ jāmbudvīpapradhānamanarghyeyamūlyamanantaguṇaprabhāvaṃ badaradvīpamāpattane sarvasvabhūtaṃ ratnamanuprayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:3480: 073.031 evaṃ ca kathayanti -- idamasmākaṃ mahāsārthavāha maṇiratnaṃ badareṇa bhrātrā kinnararājñnā anupradattam,
S01divyav_u:3482: 074.001 tataḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ kathayati -- asya ratnasya ko 'nubhāva iti?
S01divyav_u:3483_0: tāḥ kathayanti -- yatkhalu mahāsārthavāha jānīyāh -- idaṃ maṇiratnaṃ tadeva poṣadhoṣito
S01divyav_u:3483_1: dhvajāgre baddhvā āropya kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ karaṇīyam -- śṛṇvantu
S01divyav_u:3484_0: yuṣmākam yo yenarthī upakaraṇaviśeṣeṇa hiraṇyena vā subarṇena vā ratnena vā annena
S01divyav_u:3484_1: vā pānena vā vastreṇa vā bhojanena vā alaṃkāraviśeṣeṇa vā dvipadena vā catuṣpadena
S01divyav_u:3484_2: vā vāhanena vā yānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā sa cittamutpādayatu,
S01divyav_u:3487: 074.008 ayaṃ tu prativiśeṣah -- yāni cāsya lokasya bhavanti mahābhayāni,
S01divyav_u:3488: tadyathā -- rājato vā cairato vā agnito vā udako vā manuṣyato vā amiṣyato vā siṃhato vā vyāghrato vā dvīpatarakṣuto vā yakṣyarākṣasapretapiśācakumbhāṇḍapūtanakaṭapūtanato vā,
S01divyav_u:3492: asminnucchrite ratnaviśeṣe ima īrayopadravā na bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:3493: 074.012 iryuktvā tāḥ kinnarakanyāḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsuh --- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha,
S01divyav_u:3503: 074.016 anyadeva vayaṃ sanmārgaṃ vyapadekṣyāmaḥ kṣipraṃ vārāṇasīgamanāya/
S01divyav_u:3505: bhāṣiṣyāmah -- itaḥ paścime digbhāge sapta pratānatikramya mahāparvata uccaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3506: 074.018 tasmin parvate lohitākṣo nāma rākṣasaḥ prativasati raudraḥ paraprāṇaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3507: 074.019 sa ca parvato 'manuṣyavacaritaḥ kṛṣṇamandhakāraṃ savisphuliṅgaṃ vāyuṃ mokṣayati/
S01divyav_u:3508: 074.020 tatra te etadeva ratnaṃ dhvajāgre 'varopayitvā gantavyam/
S01divyav_u:3512: 074.022 sa tava gandhamāghrāya sapta rātriṃdivasānyaśaniṃ pātayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3516: tatra drakṣyasi samaṃ bhūmipradeśamakṛṣṭoptaṃ ca taṇḍulaphalaśālimakaṇakamatuṣaṃ śuciṃ niṣphuṭigandhikaṃ caturaṅgulaparyavanaddham/
S01divyav_u:3517: 074.025 yastamaṣṭamyāṃ panñcadaśyāṃ vā bālāho'śvarājaḥ paribhujya sukhī arogo balavān prīṇitendriyaḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayyodānamudānayati -- kaḥ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:3521: sa tvayopasaṃkramya idaṃ syādvacanīyam -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:3524_0: 074.028 atha sa supriyo mahāsārthavāhastāḥ kinnarakanyā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya
S01divyav_u:3524_1: samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya mātṛduhitṛvat pratisamodya yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa
S01divyav_u:3530: 075.001 [74]upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bālāho 'śvarājastenānñjaliṃ praṇamya bālāhamaśvarājamidavocat -- ahaṃ pāragāmī,
S01divyav_u:3533: evamukte bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocat -- na te mahāsārthavāha mama pṛṣṭhādhirūḍhena diśo nāvalokayitavyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3536: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhasyāśvarājasya pṛṣṭhamadhiruhya yathānuśiṣṭo 'lpaiśca kṣaṇalavamuhūrtairvārāṇasīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3538: 075.007 avatīrya supriyo mahāsārthavāho bālāhāśvarājapṛṣṭhādbālāhāśvarājaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:3539: 075.008 tato bālāho 'śvarājaḥ supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhaṃ saṃrādhayāmāsa -- sādhu sādhu mahāsārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:3548: athāciraprakrānte bālāhe 'śvarājani supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3549: 075.013 aśrauṣurvārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā brahmadattaśca kāśirājah -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ pūrṇena varṣaśatena saṃsiddhayātraḥ pūrṇamanorathaḥ svagṛhamanuprāpta iti/
S01divyav_u:3552: 075.016 aśrauṣīt tat pūrvakaṃ caurasahasramanyaśca jano dhanārthī -- supriyo mahāsārthavāhaḥ saṃsiddhayātraḥ paripūrṇamanoratha āgata iti/
S01divyav_u:3553: 075.017 srutvā ca punarupasaṃkramya supriyaṃ mahāsārthavāhamidamavocan -- parikṣīṇadhanāḥ sma iti/
S01divyav_u:3554: 075.018 evamukte mahāsārthavāhastān sarvān maitreṇa cakṣuṣā vyavalokya vijñnāpayati -- gacchatu bhavantaḥ svakasvakeṣu vijiteṣu/
S01divyav_u:3559: atha supriyo mahāsārthavāhastadeva poṣadhe panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnāta upoṣadhoṣito yattatprathamalabdhaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya vācaṃ ca niścārayati,
S01divyav_u:3561: sahābhidhānacca yo yenārthī tasya tadvarṣaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:3563: 075.024 taccaurasahasraṃ supriyeṇa mahāsārthavāhena daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3564: 075.025 atrāntarāt kālagate brahmadatte kāśirājani paurāmātyaiḥ supriyo mahāsārthavāho rājābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3565_0: 075.026 mahābhiṣiktena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā dvitīyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropya
S01divyav_u:3566: 075.028 tṛtīyena maṇiratnena yathoktena vidhinā dhvajāgrocchritena yathepsitopakaraṇaviśeṣavarṣaṇāni saṃpannāni/
S01divyav_u:3568_0: 075.030 tato 'nupūrveṇa jambudvīpaiśvaryabhūtena supriyeṇa mahārājñnā tadeva poṣadhe
S01divyav_u:3568_1: panñcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātenopoṣadhoṣitena kṛtsne jambudvīpe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā upakaraṇotpannābhilāṣiṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:3569: 076.001 samanantaraṃ dhvajāgrāvaropite tasmiñ jambudvīpapradhānamaṇiratne kṛtsno jambudvīpanivāsī mahājanakāyo yathepsitairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3570: 076.003 upakaraṇasaṃtarpitaśca jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyaḥ supriyeṇa rājñnā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3571_0: 076.004 tato jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiśvaryādhipatye partiṣṭhāpya rājarṣibrahmacaryaṃ
S01divyav_u:3571_1: caritvā caturo brahmān vihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihārī
S01divyav_u:3572: 076.007 bhagavanāha -- kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau supriyo nāma mahāsārthavāhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3573: ahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartitavān/
S01divyav_u:3577: kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho bodhisattvabhūtaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3579: eṣa eva śāriputro bhukṣuḥ sa tena kā
S01divyav_u:3582: eṣa evānando bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3584: eṣa evāniruddho bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3586: sa eṣa eva devadattastena kalena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3588: eṣa eva māraḥ pāpīyān sa tena kalena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:3591: 076.015 tadā tāvanmayā bhikṣavo dṛḍhapratijñnena pratijñnāpūraṇārthaṃ saptavārāṃścaurasahasrāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3593_1: caurasahasrapramukhaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jambudvīpaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
S01divyav_u:3594: 076.019 idānīmapi mayā anekairduṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttaraṃ jñnānamadhigamya maitrāyatā karuṇayā saptakṛtvaścaurasahasrasakāśāt sārthaḥ paritrātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3595: 076.020 aparituṣṭaṃ ca caurasahasraṃ viditvā yāvadāptaṃ dhanena saṃtarpayitvā atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3603: tena khalu samayena bhadraṃkare nagare ṣaḍ janā mahāpuṇyāḥ prativasanti--meṇḍhako gṛhapatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī/
S01divyav_u:3614: 077.007 sa yadi śataṃ sahasraṃ vā parityajati,
S01divyav_u:3632_0: 077.013 dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ
S01divyav_u:3632_4: trī rātrestrirdivasasya ṣaṭkṛtvo rātriṃdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ
S01divyav_u:3655: 077.031 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ meṇḍhako gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro bhadraṃkare nagare prativasati/
S01divyav_u:3659: bhikṣūṇāmārocaya--tathāgato bhikṣavo bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3660: 078.002 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:3662: 078.003 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmanto bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3663: 078.005 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ bhadraṃkareṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:3665: 078.006 evamāyuṣmanniti te bhiṣava āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchanti//
S01divyav_u:3666_0: 078.008 atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
S01divyav_u:3666_1: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
S01divyav_u:3682: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3691: 078.019 evamanekaguṇagaṇasamanvāgato buddho bhagavāñ janapadacārikayā bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3698: śrutvā ca punarvyathitāste parasparaṃ kathayanti--pūrvaṃ tāvadvayaṃ śramaṇena gautamena madhyadeśānnirvāsitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3709: 078.028 bhavantaḥ, śramaṇo gautamaḥ kṣurāśaniṃ pātayannanekā aputrikā apatikāśca kurvannāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:3711: yasminneva kāle sthātavyaṃ tasminneva kāle 'smākaṃ parityāgas triyate/
S01divyav_u:3716: 078.031 te kathayanti--bhadraṃkarasāmantakena sarvajanakāyamudvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsayata/
S01divyav_u:3725: tatastairbhadraṃkaranagarasāmantakena sarvo janakāya udvāsya bhadraṃkaraṃ nagaraṃ pravāsitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3730: 079.003 tataḥ śakro devendraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpam yadahaṃ bhagavato 'satkāramadhyupekṣeyam/
S01divyav_u:3731: 079.004 yena nāma bhagavatā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanekair duṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūryānuttarajñānamadhigatam,
S01divyav_u:3732: sa nāma bhagavān sarvalokaprativiśiṣṭaḥ sarvavādavijayī śūnye janapade cārikaṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:3737: cāturmahārājikā devā uktāh--yūyaṃ bhadraṃkarāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ vāsayateti/
S01divyav_u:3742: 079.013 tīrthyair nagarajanakāyasametairavacarakāḥ preṣitāh--gatvā paśyata kīdṛśā janapadā iti/
S01divyav_u:3743: 079.014 te gatāḥ paśyantyatiśayena janapadān ṛddhān sphītān/
S01divyav_u:3745: na kadācidasmābhirevamrūpā janapadā ṛddhāḥ sphītā dṛṣṭapūrvā iti/
S01divyav_u:3759: tīrthyāḥ kathayanti--samayena tiṣṭhāmo yadi yūyaṃ kriyākāraṃ kuruta--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:3765: 079.023 ten khalu samayena kapilavastuno brāhmaṇadārikā bhadraṃkare nagare pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:3767: sā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ bhagavāñ śākyakulanandanaḥ śākyakulādrājyamapahāya pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3771: 079.026 tato bhagavatā tasyāścetasā cittamājñāya sopānaṃ nirmitam/
S01divyav_u:3772: 079.027 tato hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditā pradīpamādāya sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:3773: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt pradīpaṃ sthāpayitvā pādau śirasā vanditvā niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:3774: 079.028 tato bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī catruāryasatyasamprativedhikī pūrvavadyāvaccharaṇagatāmabhiprasannāmiti/
S01divyav_u:3775: 079.030 atha bhagavāṃstāṃ dārikāmidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ dārike yena meṇḍhako gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrama,
S01divyav_u:3782: vaktavyah--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:3783: 080.002 sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti,
S01divyav_u:3787: evaṃ bhadanteti sā dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:3788: 080.004 yathāparijñātaiva kenacideva meṇḍakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:3793: 080.007 yuktametadevamatitheḥ pratipattum yathā tvaṃ pratipanna iti?
S01divyav_u:3795: gaṇena kriyākāraḥ kṛtah--na kenacicchramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramitavyam/
S01divyav_u:3798: 080.009 gṛhapate, bhagavān kathayati--tava putrasya pañcaśatiko nakulakaḥ kaṭyāṃ baddhastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:3799: 080.010 sa yadi śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā vyayīkaroti,
S01divyav_u:3802: 080.011 na śaknoṣi tvaṃ ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇaṃ datvā āgantumiti?
S01divyav_u:3806: sa ṣaṣṭikārṣāpaṇān dvāre sthāpayitvā brāhmaṇadārikopadiṣṭena sopānenāvatīrya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3807: 080.013 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:3808: 080.014 tato bhagavatā meṇḍhakasya gṛhapaterāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:3809: yāṃ śrutvā meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā yāvacchrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:3811: kimeṣo 'pi bhadraṃkaranagaranivāsī janakāya evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhīte?
S01divyav_u:3813: tvāmāgamya bhūyasā sarva eva janakāyo lābhīte/
S01divyav_u:3814: 080.018 tato meṇḍhako gṛhapatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3815: 080.019 svagṛhaṃ gatvā nagaramadhye kārṣāpaṇānāṃ rāśiṃ vyavasthāpya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:3816: 080.021 yo draṣṭumicchati jinaṃ jitarāgadoṣaṃ nirbandhamapratisamaṃ karuṇāvadātam/
S01divyav_u:3817: 080.023 so 'niścareṇa hṛdayena suniścitena kṣipraṃ prayātu dhanamasya mayā pradeyam//3// iti//
S01divyav_u:3822: gaṇenaivaṃ kriyākāraḥ kṛto gaṇa eva udghāṭayatu/
S01divyav_u:3825: 080.027 tataḥ parasparaṃ saṃghaṭṭanena na śaknuvanti nirgantumiti vajrapāṇinā yakṣeṇa vineyajanānukampayā vajraḥ kṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3830: 080.030 te gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purato niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3832: atha baghavāṃstāṃ parṣadamabhyavagāhya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣadyānekasattvasaṃtānakuśalamūlasamāropikāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
S01divyav_u:3842: 081.004 tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā śilpina āhūya uktāh--bhagavato 'kālakhādyakāni śīghraṃ sajjīkuruteti/
S01divyav_u:3844: tato meṇḍhakena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'kālakhādyakairakālapānakaiśca saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3845: 081.007 tato bhagavān meṇḍhakaṃ gṛhapatiṃ saparivāraṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ karvaṭanivāsinaṃ janakāyam yathābhavyatayā vinīya prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3851_0: 082.002 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ
S01divyav_u:3851_1: bhadanta meṇḍhakena meṇḍhakapatnyā meṇḍhakaputreṇa meṇḍhakasnuṣayā meṇḍhakadāsena
S01divyav_u:3851_2: meṇḍhakadāsyā karma kṛtam yena ṣaḍabhijñātā mahāpuṇyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S01divyav_u:3854: bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyambhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:3857: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:3861: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:3863: 082.011 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//1//
S01divyav_u:3864_0: 082.012 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā
S01divyav_u:3864_1: rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
S01divyav_u:3866: 082.015 tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā/
S01divyav_u:3867: 082.016 trividhaṃ durbhikṣaṃ bhaviṣyati--cañcu śvetāsthi śalākāvṛtti ca/
S01divyav_u:3868: tatra cañcu ucyate--samudgake tasmin manuṣyā bījāni prakṣipya anāgate sattvāpekṣayā sathāpayanti/
S01divyav_u:3869: 082.017 mṛtā nāma anena te bījakāyaṃ kariṣyantīti/
S01divyav_u:3871: śvetāsthi nāma durbhikṣam--tasmin kāle manuṣyā asthīnyupasaṃhṛtya tāvat kvāthayanti,
S01divyav_u:3875: śalākāvṛttir nāma--tasmin kāle manuṣyāḥ khalu bilebhyo dhānyaguḍakāni śalākayā ākṛṣya bahudakasthālyāṃ kvāthayitvā pibanti/
S01divyav_u:3877: 082.022 tato rājñā brahmadattena vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurāḥ/
S01divyav_u:3878: 082.023 naimittikairdvādaśavarṣikā anāvṛṣṭirvyākṛtā śalākāvṛtti durbhikṣaṃ cañcu śvetāsthi ca/

S01divyav_u:3911: 083.009 kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā, na vācikī/

S01divyav_u:3914: 083.011 te mūlanikṛttā iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/

S01divyav_u:3916: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yadi riktakāni kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi sahadarśanānme pūrṇāni syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,

S01divyav_u:3926: 083.018 putraḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3928: yadi ca śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā tato vyayaṃ kuryāt,
S01divyav_u:3930: mā parikṣayaṃ gacchet--evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:3932: 083.022 snuṣā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3935: taṃ na ca parikṣayaṃ gaccheyuryāvanmayā apratipraśrabdham--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ labhinī syām,
S01divyav_u:3937: 083.025 dāsaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3939: sapta sīrāḥ kṛṣṭāḥ syuh--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca lābhī syām,
S01divyav_u:3941: 083.028 dāsī praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhā--evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:3943: sapta mātrāḥ saṃpadyeran--evaṃvidhānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca labhinī syām,
S01divyav_u:3946: 083.031 sa ca mahātmā pratyekabuddhasteṣāmanukampayā ṛddhyā upari vihāyasā rājakulasyopariṣṭāt saṃprasthitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:3948: tasya ṛddhyā gacchato rājño brahmadattasyopari cchāyā nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:3953: tato 'sau gṛhapatiḥ kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi pratyavekṣitumārabdho yāvatpūrṇāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:3960: 084.008 tathaiva putrasya snuṣāyā dāsasya praṇidhiḥ siddhā/

S01divyav_u:3968: 084.012 rājā tamāhūya kathayati--yadā eva lokaḥ kālagataḥ,

S01divyav_u:3980: 084.019 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatirgṛhapatipatnī gṛhapatiputro gṛhapatisnuṣā gṛhapatidāso gṛhapatidāsī,
S01divyav_u:3981: ayameva meṇḍhako gṛḥpatir meṇḍhakapatnī meṇḍhakaputro meṇḍhakasnuṣā meṇḍhakadāso meṇḍhakadāsī ca/
S01divyav_u:3982: 084.021 yadebhiḥ pratyekabuddhe kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,

S01divyav_u:3985: 084.022 ahaṃ caibhiḥ pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:3986: 084.023 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,

S01divyav_u:4000_1: bhavantaḥ pakṣasya aṣṭamyāaṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca prāṇino hantavyā yatkāraṇameyurmanuṣyā
S01divyav_u:4001: 085.008 tena khalu samayena anyatamo goghātako mahāntaṃ vṛṣabhamādāya nagarānniṣkramati praghātayitum/

S01divyav_u:4006: 085.011 tato vṛṣa īdṛśamanāryaṃ vaco duruktaṃ śrutvā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah āhṛṣṭaromakūpa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto nirīkṣate,
S01divyav_u:4009: 085.014 bhagavāṃśca pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat/
S01divyav_u:4010_0: 085.015 athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:4010_1: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakamam /
S01divyav_u:4015: atha sa vṛṣo bhagavatyavekṣāvān pratibaddhacittah eṣo me śaraṇamiti sahasaiva tāni dṛḍhāni varatrakāṇi bandhanāni cchittvā pradhāvan yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4016: 085.021 upasaṃkramyobhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pādau jihvayā nileḍhumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4017: 085.022 sa cāsya raudrakarmā goghātakaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha eva śastravyagrahastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4018: tato bhagavāṃstaṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ goghātakamidamavocat--kuruṣva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa anena govṛṣabheṇa sārdhaṃ sātmyam/
S01divyav_u:4027: atha bhagavāmllaukikacittamutpādayati--aho bata śakro devendrastrīṇi kārṣāpaṇasahasrāṇyādāyāgacchediti/
S01divyav_u:4028: 085.028 sahacittotpādādbhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasratrayamādāya bhagavataḥ purastādasthāt/
S01divyav_u:4029: 085.029 atha bhagavāñ śakraṃ devendramidamavocat--anuprayaccha kauśika asya goghātakasya triguṇaṃ mūlyam/
S01divyav_u:4031: atha goghātakaḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasrayaṃ vṛṣamūlyaṃ gṛhītvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭaḥ pramudito bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā taṃ govṛṣaṃ bandhanānmuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4032: 085.032 śakro devendro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4033_1: bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho bhagavato mukhaṃ
S01divyav_u:4035: 086.003 dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:4039_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ
S01divyav_u:4039_1: hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaparyantān narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
S01divyav_u:4042: 086.009 teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
S01divyav_u:4045: 086.010 teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
S01divyav_u:4049: 086.012 te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhir gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:4057: 086.022 atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4082: 086.031 atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyāmantarhitāḥ//

S01divyav_u:4110_2: aśokavarṇo nāma cakravartī caturarṇavāntavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /

S01divyav_u:4149: tasya karmaṇo vipākena iyantaṃ kālaṃ na kadācit sugatau upapannaḥ/

S01divyav_u:4155: 088.026 athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhikṣūṇāṃ purastādgāthā bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:4158: 088.029 āpanno hi paraṃ kṛcchraṃ govṛṣo yena mocitaḥ/

S01divyav_u:4179: 089.017 asmākaṃ ca lābhasatkāraḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ samucchinnaḥ/
