S01divyav_u:4213: 090.003 tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4214: 090.004 atha mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhavat--asakṛdasakṛnmayā śramaṇasya gautamasya parākrāntam,
S01divyav_u:4217_0: iti viditvā maskarivadātmānamabhinirmāya upari vihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavidyotanavarṣaṇaprātihāryāṇi
S01divyav_u:4217_1: kṛtvā saṃjayinaṃ vairaṭṭīputramāmantrayate--yatkhalu saṃjayiñ jānīyāh--ahaṃ riddhimāñ jñānavādī,
S01divyav_u:4219: 090.008 arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:4220: 090.009 yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, ahaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:4227: ahaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:4231: 090.014 tatra me bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4234: 090.016 pūraṇādyāḥ ṣaṭ śāstāraḥ sarvajñajñānino yena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastenopasaṃkrāman/
S01divyav_u:4235: 090.017 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāramidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--vayam ṛddhimanto jñānavādinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4237: arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:4238: 090.019 yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:4246: vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:4250: 090.024 tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:4251: 090.025 evamukte rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastīrthyānidamavocat--yūyamapi śavā bhūtvā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ riddhiṃ prārabhadhve?
S01divyav_u:4252: atha pūraṇādyāḥ ṣaṭ śāstāro 'sarvajñāḥ sarvajñānajñānino 'rdhamārge rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ vijñāpayanti--vayaṃ smo deva riddhimanto jñānavādinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4254: 090.029 arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:4255: 090.030 yāvat tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:4256: 090.031 evamukte rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastāṃstīrthikaparivrājakānidamavocat--yadyevaṃ trirapyetamarthaṃ vijñāpayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:4258: 090.032 atha tīrthyānāmetadabhavat--ayaṃ rājā [91]māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4262: tatra vayaṃ gatvā śramaṇaṃ gautamamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihārye āhvayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4264: 091.004 atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa kṣipram/
S01divyav_u:4267: 091.006 evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4268: 091.007 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāramidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:4269: 091.008 atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya rājagṛhānniryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/
S01divyav_u:4270: 091.010 tasya yāvatī yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:4271: 091.011 antarā rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavantamadrākṣīt/
S01divyav_u:4272: 091.012 tadantarā pañca kakudānyapanīya tadyathā--uṣṇīṣaṃ chatraṃ khaḍgamaṇiṃ vālavyajanaṃ citre copānahau,
S01divyav_u:4274: 091.013 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4275: 091.014 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ viditvā rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:4276: 091.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:4277: 091.016 atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavantamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4278: 091.019 atha bhagavata etadabhavat--kutra pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?
S01divyav_u:4279: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti--śrutapūrvaṃ bhadanta pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti/
S01divyav_u:4280: 091.021 bhagavato jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--śrāvastyāṃ pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti/
S01divyav_u:4284: 091.024 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cartum,
S01divyav_u:4286: 091.025 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--bhagavānāyuṣmantaḥ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ cariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:4287: 091.026 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritum,
S01divyav_u:4288: sa cīvarāṇi dhāvatu sīvyatu rañjayatu iti/
S01divyav_u:4290_0: 091.028 atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
S01divyav_u:4290_1: āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
S01divyav_u:4290_2: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:4290_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭṭagaṇaparivṛto rājahaṃsa iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:4290_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto[92]
S01divyav_u:4290_5: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva pauragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:4291_0: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:4291_1: virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:4291_2: vemacitra ivāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva
S01divyav_u:4292_0: brahmakāyikagaṇaparivṛtaḥ stimiva iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva
S01divyav_u:4292_2: bhikṣusaṃghena ca puraskṛto yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:4293: 092.007 anekaiśca devatāśatasahasrairanugamyamāno 'nupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme//
S01divyav_u:4294: 092.010 aśrauṣustīrthyāḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śrāvastīṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:4296: 092.011 te śrāvastīṃ gatvā rājānaṃ prasenajitkauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīthāh--vayam ṛddhimanto jñānavādinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4298: 092.013 arhati jñānavādī jñānavādinā sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum/
S01divyav_u:4299: yadyekaṃ śramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati, vayaṃ dve/
S01divyav_u:4307: vayaṃ dvātriṃśaditi yāvacchramaṇo gautama uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:4308: vayaṃ taddviguṇaṃ tattriguṇamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4311: 092.018 tatrāsmākaṃ bhavatu śramaṇena gautamena sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4312: 092.019 evamukte rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--āgamayantu tāvadbhavanto yāvadahaṃ bhagavantamavalokayāmi/
S01divyav_u:4313: 092.020 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nyatamaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa/
S01divyav_u:4316: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kṣipraṃ bhadraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā yena rājā prasenajit kauśalastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4317: 092.024 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--yuktaṃ devasya bhadraṃ yānaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:4318: 092.025 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadraṃ yānamabhiruhya śrāvastyā niryāti bhagavato 'ntikaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya/
S01divyav_u:4319: 092.027 tasya yāvatī yānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatārya pādābhyāmeva ārāmaṃ praviśya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4320: 092.028 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4321: 092.029 ekānte niṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--ime bhadanta tīrthyā bhagavantamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryeṇāhvayante/
S01divyav_u:4322: 092.030 vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:4326_0: 092.032 evamukte bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--nāhaṃ mahārāja
S01divyav_u:4326_1: [93]evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi evam yūyaṃ bhikṣava āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmuttare
S01divyav_u:4327: 093.002 api tu ahamevaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi--praticchannakalyāṇā bhikṣavo viharata vivṛtapāpā iti/
S01divyav_u:4328: 093.003 dvirapi trirapi rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--vidarśayatu bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:4332: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatām yaduta daśāvaśyakariṇīyāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:4333: 093.007 na tāvadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvānti yāvanna buddho buddhaṃ vyākaroti,
S01divyav_u:4334: yāvanna dvitīyena sattvenāparivartyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpāditaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:4340: anavatapte mahāsarasi śrāvakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pūrvikā karmaplotirvyākṛtā bhavati,
S01divyav_u:4343: 093.012 atha bhagavata etadabhavat--avaśyakaraṇīyametattathāgateneti viditvā rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja/
S01divyav_u:4344: 093.013 itaḥ saptame divase tathāgato mahājanapratyakṣamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:4345: 093.014 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavantamidamavocat--yadi bhagavānanujānīyāt,
S01divyav_u:4347: 093.016 atha bhagavata etadabhavat--katarasmin pradeśe pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇināmiti?
S01divyav_u:4348: devatā bhagavata ārocayanti--antarā bhadanta śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhermahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:4349: 093.019 bhagavato 'pi jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarāt pūrvakaiḥ samyaksambuddhairmahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:4350: 093.020 adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya tūṣṇībhāvena/
S01divyav_u:4351: 093.021 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--katamasmin bhadanta pradeśe prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ kārayāmi?
S01divyav_u:4352: antarā ca mahārāja śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanam/
S01divyav_u:4353: 093.023 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4354: 093.026 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--itaḥ saptame divase bhagavānuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:4362: iti viditvā raktākṣo nāma parivrājaka indrajālābhijñaḥ sa āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4364: evaṃ cāhuh--[94]yatkhalu raktākṣa jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4365: 094.001 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:4371: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhiriddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4372: 094.006 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśāyiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:4378: 094.010 atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājako yena te ṛṣayastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4380: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu bhavanto jānīran--śramaṇo gautama ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4381: 094.012 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:4386: 094.015 tena khalu samayena subhadro nāma parivrājakaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4388: 094.016 atha raktākṣaḥ parivrājako yena subhadraḥ parivrājakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4390: evaṃ cāha--yatkhalu subhadra jānīyāh--śramaṇo gautamo 'smābhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4391: 094.018 sa kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:4395: subhadreṇābhihitam--na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yadyuṣmābhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4397: mama tāvat kuśinagaryāmāvāso 'navatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:4398: 094.022 śramaṇasya gautamasya śāriputro nāma śiṣyastasya cundo nāma śrāmaṇerakastasyāpi tatraivānavatapte mahāsarasi divā vihāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:4399: 094.024 na tathānavataptakāyikā devatā api kārān kartavyān manyante yathā tasya/
S01divyav_u:4401: ihāhaṃ kuśinagarīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātamādāya anavataptaṃ mahāsarasaṃ gacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:4402: 094.026 tasya mamānavataptakāyikā devatā anavataptānmahāsarasaḥ pānīyamuddhṛtya ekānte na prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:4404: tasyānavataptakāyikā devatā pāṃśukūlāni dhāvayitvā tena pānīyenātmānaṃ siñcati/
S01divyav_u:4407: 094.029 na śobhanaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kṛtam yacchramaṇo gautamo riddhiprātihāryeṇāhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4408: 094.030 evamahaṃ jāne yathā maharddhikaḥ śramaṇo gautamo mahānubhāva iti/
S01divyav_u:4412: 095.001 [95]atha rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya kālo nāṃnā bhrātā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4414: 095.003 anyatamayā cāvaruddhikayā prāsādatalagatayā rājakumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:4417: tai rājñe niveditam--yatkhalu deva jānīthāḥ--kālena devasyāntaḥpuraṃ prārthitam/
S01divyav_u:4421: 095.007 evaṃ deveti pauruṣeyai rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya kālasya vīthīmadhye hastapādāśchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4423: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ devanāṃ vedayate/
S01divyav_u:4426: 095.010 kālasya jñātibhirabhihitam--etamāryāḥ kālaṃ rājakumāraṃ satyābhiyācanayā yathāpaurāṇaṃ kurudhvamiti/
S01divyav_u:4429: 095.012 atha kālasya rājakumārasyaitadabhavat--kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasambādhaprāptaṃ māṃ bhagavān na samanvāharatīti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:4430: 095.014 imāmavasthāṃ mama lokanātho na vetti saṃbādhagatasya kasmāt/
S01divyav_u:4433: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--gaccha tvamānanda saṃghāṭimādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena kālo rājabhrātā tenopasaṃkrāma/
S01divyav_u:4434_0: 095.020 upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evaṃ
S01divyav_u:4434_1: vada--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā arūpiṇo vā rūpiṇo vā saṃjñino
S01divyav_u:4434_2: vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino vā nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4436: 095.023 ye kecid dharmā asaṃskṛtā vā saṃskṛtā vā,
S01divyav_u:4438: 095.025 anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:4439: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāyānyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena yena rājabhrātā kālastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4440: 095.027 upasaṃkramya kālasya rājakumārasya hastapādān yathāsthāne sthāpayitvā evamāha--ye kecit sattvā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuṣpadā vā bahupadā vā yāvannaivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4442: 095.029 ye keciddharmāḥ saṃkṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā,
S01divyav_u:4444: 095.030 ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā parṣado vā,
S01divyav_u:4446: 095.031 anena satyena satyavākyena tava śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:4447: 095.032 sahābhidhānāt kālasya rājakumārasya śarīram yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttam,
S01divyav_u:4448: [96]yathāpi tatra buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:4449: 096.001 kālena kumāreṇa tenaiva saṃvegena anāgāmiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ṛddhiścāpi nirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:4452: 096.003 yatrāsya śarīraṃ gaṇḍagaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya gaṇḍaka ārāmika iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:4453: 096.004 atha rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sa pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4456: 096.006 rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena antarā ca śrāvastīmantarā ca jetavanamatrāntarādbhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ kāritaḥ śatasahasrahastah .... caturṇāṃ maṇḍapo vitataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4459: 096.009 rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena saptame divase yāvajjetavanaṃ yāvacca bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapo 'ntarāt sarvo 'sau pradeśo 'pagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4463: 096.013 atha bhagavān saptame divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:4464: 096.014 śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśrāmya bahirvihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisaṃlayanāya/
S01divyav_u:4465: 096.015 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo 'nekaśataparivāro 'nekasahasraparivāro 'nekaśatasahasraparivāro yena bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4469: 096.019 niṣadya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--ete vayamāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4473: 096.021 atha rājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavamāmantrayate--ehi tvamuttara,
S01divyav_u:4475: 096.023 upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha,
S01divyav_u:4476: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:4477: 096.024 evaṃ ca vada--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:4478: 096.025 evaṃ devetyuttaro māṇavo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4479: 096.026 upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4480: 096.027 ekāntaniṣaṇṇa uttaro māṇavo bhagavantamidamavocat--rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandate,
S01divyav_u:4481: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchati alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātraṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca anavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:4482: 096.030 sukhī bhavatu māṇava rājā prasenajit kauśalastvaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:4483: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśala evamāha--ime bhadanta tīrthyā āgatā yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:4487: 097.002 adrākṣīdrājā prasenajit kauśala uttaraṃ māṇavakamupari vihāyasā āgacchatam/
S01divyav_u:4488: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4491: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kenaitad vidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:4492: atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte 'rgaḍacchidreṇārciṣo nirgatya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍape nipatitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:4495: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocan--eṣa idānīṃ mahārāja śramaṇasya gautamasya prātihāryamaṇḍapaḥ prajvalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4497: atha so 'gniraspṛṣṭa eva vāriṇā sarvaprātihāryamaṇḍapamadagdhvā svayameva nirvṛto yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:4498: 097.010 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4501: 097.013 kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:4505: 097.015 dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4508: 097.017 kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:4509: bhagavatā kanakamarīcikāvabhāsā utsṛṣṭā yena sarvaloka udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:4511: dṛṣṭvā ca punastīrthyānāmantrayate--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4514: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena vā gautamena?
S01divyav_u:4515: gaṇḍakenārāmikenottarakauravād dvīpāt karṇikāravṛkṣamādāya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasyāgrataḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4516: 097.023 ratnakenāpyārāmikena gandhamādanādaśokavṛkṣamānīya bhagavataḥ prātihāryamaṇḍapasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4517: 097.024 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4520: kiṃ tvaṃ jñāsyasi kena etadvidarśitamasmābhirvā śramaṇena gautamena?
S01divyav_u:4523: ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampati prakampati saṃprakampati/
S01divyav_u:4534: gaganatalasthā devatā bhagavata upariṣṭāddivyānyutpalāni kṣipanti padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi,
S01divyav_u:4538: 098.005 atha teṣām ṛṣīṇāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ mahāpṛthivīcālaḥ saṃvṛtta iti/
S01divyav_u:4539: teṣāmetadabhavat--nūnamasmākaṃ sabrahmacāribhiḥ śramaṇo gautamo riddhyā āhūto bhaviṣyatīti viditvā pañca ṛṣiśatāni śrāvastīṃ saṃprasthitāni/
S01divyav_u:4541_0: 098.008 adrākṣuste ṛṣayo bhagavantaṃ dūrādeva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:4541_1: mūrtimantamiva dharmaṃ havyāvasiktamiva hutavahaṃ kāñcanabhājanasthamiva pradīpaṃ
S01divyav_u:4542: 098.010 dṛṣṭvā ca punar na tathā dvādaśavarṣe 'bhyastaśamatho yogācārasya cittasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01divyav_u:4543: aputrasya vā putraḥ pratilambho daridrasya vā nidhidarśanaṃ rājyābhinandino vā rājyābhiṣeko yathā tatprathamatapūrvabuddhāropitakuśalamūlānāṃ tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:4545: 098.014 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte sthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4546: ekāntasthitāste ṛṣayo bhagavantamidamavocan--labhemahi vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:4548: te bhagavatā brāhmeṇa svareṇāhūtāḥ--eta bhikṣavaścarata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:4549: 098.017 sahābhidhānānmuṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ pātrakaravyagrahastāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravo varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4551: 098.021 satya(dyaḥ) praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//2//
S01divyav_u:4552_0: 098.023 atha bhagavān divyamānuṣyeṇa pūjāsatkāreṇa satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito
S01divyav_u:4552_1: 'rhannarhatparivāro saptabhiśca nikāyaiḥ saṃpuraskṛto mahatā ca janaughena yena prātihāryamaṇḍapastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S01divyav_u:4554: bhagavataḥ kāyādraśmayo nirgatya sarvaṃ prātihāryamaṇḍapaṃ suvarṇavarṇāvabhāsaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4555_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu /
S01divyav_u:4556: 098.028 ahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:4560: na tvaṃ gṛhapate ebhih ṛddhyā āhūtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4563: 098.032 sthānametadvidyate yattīrthyā evaṃ vadeyuḥ--nāsti śramaṇasya gautamasyottare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam[99]/
S01divyav_u:4572: 099.004 athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu/
S01divyav_u:4573: 099.005 ahaṃ tīrthyaiḥ sārdhamuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:4578: 099.008 api tu na tvaṃ tīrthyair riddhyā āhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4579: ahameṣāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayiṣyāmi hitāya prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:4585: tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja tathāgatamadhyeṣate uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?
S01divyav_u:4586_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S01divyav_u:4586_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat--ahaṃ
S01divyav_u:4586_2: bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayitum /
S01divyav_u:4591_0: atha bhagavāṃstadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte svasminnāsane 'ntarhitaḥ
S01divyav_u:4591_1: pūrvasyāṃ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya caturvidhamīryāpathaṃ kalpayati tadyathā--caṃkramyate
S01divyav_u:4593: tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhānyarcīṃṣi kāyānniścaranti tadyathā nīlapītāni lohitānyavadātāni mañjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni/
S01divyav_u:4597: 099.023 yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśīti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4598: 099.024 niṣadya bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamidamavocat--iyaṃ mahārāja tathāgatasya sarvaśrāvakasādhāraṇā ṛddhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:4599_0: 099.026 tatra bhagavān dvirapi rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalamāmantrayate--ko mahārāja
S01divyav_u:4599_1: tathāgatamadhyeṣate 'sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām?
S01divyav_u:4600_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśala utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ
S01divyav_u:4600_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--ahaṃ
S01divyav_u:4600_2: bhadanta bhagavantamadhyeṣe 'sādhāraṇāyām ṛddhyāmuttare manuṣyadharme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ hitāya prāṇinām /
S01divyav_u:4605: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadi laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti,
S01divyav_u:4606: antaśaḥ kuntapipīliko 'pi prāṇī bhagavatah cetasi cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:4610: atha śakrabrahmādīnāṃ devānāmetadabhavat--kimarthaṃ bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittamutpāditam?
S01divyav_u:4612: 100.004 atha śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataścetasā cittamājñāya tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
S01divyav_u:4614: evameva śakrabrahmādayo devā anekāni ca devatāśatasahasrāṇi ca devaloke 'ntarhitāni,
S01divyav_u:4616: 100.006 atha brahmādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4617: 100.008 śakrādayo devā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīktya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā vāmaṃ pārśvaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4618: 100.009 nandopanandābhyāṃ nāgarājābhyāṃ bhagavata upanāmitaṃ nirmitaṃ sahasrapatraṃ śakaṭacakramātraṃ sarvasauvarṇaṃ ratnadaṇḍaṃ padmam/
S01divyav_u:4619: 100.010 bhagavāṃśca padmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:4623: evaṃ bhagavatā buddhapiṇḍī nirmitā yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya buddhā bhagavanto parṣannirmitam(?)/
S01divyav_u:4637: 100.021 bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā sarvaloko 'nāvṛtamadrākṣīdbuddhāvataṃsakaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanamupādāya antato bāladārakā api,
S01divyav_u:4638: yathāpi tadbuddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena//
S01divyav_u:4639: 100.024 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--tāvat pratigṛhṇīta bhikṣavo 'nupūrve sthitāyā buddhapiṇḍyā nimittam/
S01divyav_u:4642: atha bhagavāṃstam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4648: 100.031 saṃbuddhāvabhāsite tu loke na tārkiko bhāsate na cāsya śrāvakaḥ//6//
S01divyav_u:4649: 100.032 atha rājā prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4652: 101.001 dvirapi prasenajit kauśalastīrthyānidamavocat--vidarśitaṃ bhagavatā uttare manuṣyadharme riddhiprātihāryam/
S01divyav_u:4654: evamukte tīrthyā anyonyaṃ vighaṭṭayanta evāhuḥ--tvamuttiṣṭha tvamuttiṣṭheti/
S01divyav_u:4656: 101.004 tena khalu punaḥ samayena pāñciko mahāsenāpatistasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃnipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4657_0: 101.005 atha pāñcikasya yakṣasenāpateretadabhavat--ciramapi te ime mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:4657_1: viheṭhayiṣyanti bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti viditvā tumulaṃ vātavarṣaṃ saṃjanayya mahāntamutsṛṣṭavān /
S01divyav_u:4658: 101.006 tumulena vātavarṣeṇa tīrthyāṇāṃ maṇḍapā adarśanapathe kṣiptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4659: 101.007 tīrthyā hyaśanivarṣeṇa bādhyamānā diśo digbhyo vicalanti/
S01divyav_u:4661: 101.009 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāni/
S01divyav_u:4662: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā tasyāṃ parṣadyekavāribindur na patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4667: 101.012 pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā tīrthyā abhihitāh--ete yūyaṃ mohapuruṣā bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchadhvaṃ dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:4668: 101.013 te niṣpalāyamānāḥ kathayanti--ete vayaṃ parvataṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4671: 101.016 bahavaḥ śaraṇam yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca/
S01divyav_u:4675: 101.020 yastu buddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4682: iti viditvā niṣpalāyan kathayati--aham yuṣmākaṃ śāsanasarvasvaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:4689: 101.029 te kalahajātā viharanti bhaṇḍanajātā vigṛhītā vivādamāpannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4696: 102.006 gamanāya me samayaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ kāyasya me balavīryam {na?} kiṃcit/
S01divyav_u:4697: 102.008 spṛṣṭāśca bhāvāḥ sukhaduḥkhate me anāvṛtaṃ jñānamihārhatām//12//
S01divyav_u:4699: 102.012 ācakṣva me dūṣika etamarthaṃ śītodakā kutra sā puṣkiriṇī//13//
S01divyav_u:4701: 102.015 eṣā khalu śītā puṣkiriṇī nalinī ca virājati toyadhārā/
S01divyav_u:4702: 102.017 śramaṇādhama hīnāsatpuruṣa tvamimāṃ nanu paśyasi puṣkariṇīm//14//
S01divyav_u:4704: 102.020 na tvaṃ naro nāpi ca nārikā tvaṃ śmaśrūṇi ca te nāsti na ca stanau tava/
S01divyav_u:4705: 102.022 bhinnasvaro 'si na ca cakravākah evaṃ bhavān vātahato nirucyate//15//
S01divyav_u:4706: 102.024 atha pūraṇo nirgrantho vālukāghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe baddhvā śītikāyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4708: 102.026 atha te nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ mṛgayamāṇāḥ pratimārge gaṇikāṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛcchanti--bhadre,
S01divyav_u:4716: 102.033 kathaṃ sa buddhimān bhavati puruṣo vyañjanānvitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4717: 102.034 lokasya paśyato yo 'yaṃ grāme carati nagnakaḥ//18//
S01divyav_u:4720: 103.003 atha te nirgranthā yena śītikā puṣkiriṇī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4721: adrākṣuste nirgranthāḥ pūraṇaṃ kāśyapaṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ mṛtam/
S01divyav_u:4722: 103.004 kālagataṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ puṣkiriṇyā uddhṛtya ekānte chorayitvā prakrāntāḥ//
S01divyav_u:4723: 103.006 bhagavatā buddhanirmāṇo nirmito dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgato muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4724: 103.007 dharmatā khalu buddhā bhagavanto nirmitena sārdhaṃ niścayaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:4734: 103.014 bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathā abhiprasannasya āśayaṃ cānuśayaṃ ca dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhakī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:4741: 103.019 yadbhūyasā sā parṣad buddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:4742: 103.020 atha bhagavāṃstāṃ parṣadaṃ buddhaniṃnāṃ dharmapravaṇāṃ saṃghaprāgbhārāṃ vyavasthāpyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4743: 103.022 dhanyāste puruṣā loke ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4752: 104.002 buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:4753: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śiśumāragirau bodho nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhāno mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:4755: 104.005 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:4756: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:4759: vaidyaprajñaptaiścāhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyaistiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitairāhāraiḥ/
S01divyav_u:4760: 104.008 hārārdhahārabhūṣitagātrā apsareva nandanavanacāriṇī mañcānmañcaṃ pīṭhātpīṭhamanavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmim/
S01divyav_u:4761: 104.010 na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
S01divyav_u:4762: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:4763: 104.011 dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prādādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:4764: 104.012 tasyāstrīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā varṇasaṃsthānaviśeṣānurūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyapasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:4765: 104.013 sā dhātryaṅkagatā unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā saripimaṇḍenānyaiśca cottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:4768: tadā rūpiṇī yauvanānurūpayā ācāravihāraceṣṭayā devakanyeva tadgṛhamavabhāsamānā sugṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantarjanasya ca prītimutpādayati/
S01divyav_u:4769: 104.016 tasyāstādṛśīṃ vibhūtiṃ śrutvā nānādeśanivāsrājaputrā amātyaputrā gṛhapatiputrā dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhiputrāḥ sārthavāhaputrāśca bhāryārtham yācanakān preṣayanti/
S01divyav_u:4771: tathā tathā bodho gṛhapatiḥ sutarāṃ prītimutpādayati/
S01divyav_u:4775: kiṃ tu yo mama kulaśīlena vā dhanena vā sadṛśo bhavati,
S01divyav_u:4778: 104.021 anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutam yathā śiśumāragirau bodho gṛhapatistasya duhitā evaṃ rūpayauvanasamuditā,
S01divyav_u:4779: sā nānādeśanivāsināṃ rājāmātyagṛhapatidhanināṃ śreṣṭhisārthavāhaputrāṇāmarthāya prārthyata iti/
S01divyav_u:4780: 104.023 śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--ahamapi tāvat tāṃ putrasyārthāya prārthayāmi/
S01divyav_u:4781: 104.024 kadācid bodho gṛhapatirdadyāditi viditvā tasyā yācanakāḥ preṣitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4782: bodhena gṛhapatinā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ samudācāradhanasampadaṃ ca vicārya dattā/
S01divyav_u:4783: 104.025 anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā mahatā śrīsamudayena putrasya pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:4784: 104.026 yāvat punarapi bodhasya gṛhapateḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:4793: 104.031 iti śrutvā bodho gṛhapatiḥ paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4801: udyānaṃ gatvā tiṣṭhāmīti viditvā tena pauruṣeyā uktāh--yadi me kaścinmahānanartha utpadyate,
S01divyav_u:4802: sa śrāvayitavyo nānya ityuktvā udyānaṃ gatvā avasthito yāvadasyāsau patnī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:4804: anyatamaḥ puruṣastvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4816: 105.009 tadanantarameva dvitīyapuruṣastathaiva tvaritatvaritamaśruparyākulekṣaṇo bodhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:4826: 105.014 atha tasya jñātayo lokadharmānuvṛttyā avajñāpūrvakena nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayitumārabdhāh--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:4828: apare kathayanti--yena bodhasya gṛhapateḥ kukṣigatenaivānekadhanasamuditaṃ gṛhaṃ nidhanamupanītam,
S01divyav_u:4830: api tu ayaṃ pitrā jātamātraḥ svāgatavādena samudācaritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4831: tasmādasya svāgata iti nāma bhavatu iti/
S01divyav_u:4834: tathā tathā bodhasya gṛhapaterdhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4838: 105.022 ye 'pyasya pauruṣeyāḥ paṇyamādāya deśāntaragatā mahāsamudram yāvattīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:4845: 105.026 kecidbodhasya gṛhapateḥ prāṇaviyogaṃ śrutvā tatraiva avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4848: kecit tatraivāvasthitāḥ svāgatasya vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4851: kecidanyāśrayeṇa tatraivāvasthitāḥ santaḥ svāgatasya nāmāpi na gṛhṇanti/
S01divyav_u:4852: 105.030 kiṃ tu bodhasyaikā purāṇavṛddhā dāsī kṛtajñatayā svāgatasyopasthānaṃ kurvantī tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:4854: sā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyam[106] paryādānaṃ gatam/
S01divyav_u:4858: 106.002 tayā svāgatasya nāṃnā sthālyāṃ taṇḍulān prakṣipya bhaktārtham yojitā vinaṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4862: etamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhamanekadhanasamuditaṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ prabhūtadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatam/
S01divyav_u:4865: atra prāptakālaṃ sarvathā yāvat prāṇaviyogo na bhavati tāvanniṣpalāyeyem/
S01divyav_u:4868: 106.008 tasmiñ śūnye gṛhe śvānaḥ praviśya kalahaṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4870: 106.009 sa śvānakalahaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati--bodhasya gṛhapatergṛhe śvānaḥ kaliṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:4873: sa tatra praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:4876: 106.012 tataḥ svāgato bhojanavelāṃ jñātvā lekhaśālāyāḥ svagṛhamāgato bhoktumiti yāvat paśyati śūnyam/
S01divyav_u:4883: sa teṣāṃ sakāśaṃ gato yāvattatra kaliḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4884: 106.016 te kalahaṃ kṛtvā vyupaśāntāḥ parasparaṃ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4895: 106.021 tasmādapi niṣkāsito yāvat kroḍamallānāṃ madhye praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4900: vayaṃ pūrve yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā āgacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4901: 106.024 idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastakā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
S01divyav_u:4902: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
S01divyav_u:4906: 106.028 tatra yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallāśca yathānilayamāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4908: 106.030 ye te riktahastakā riktapātrā āgatāste bhūyo dvidhā bhūtvā praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4909: tatra teṣāmapi yeṣāṃ madhye svāgataste tathaiva riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4910: 106.031 te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgatakroḍamallakau praviṣṭau riktahastau riktamallakau āgatau/
S01divyav_u:4912: 107.001 tataste kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃkalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:4913: ayaṃ mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭho yena vayaṃ riktahastā rikmallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4915: 107.003 sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:4916: 107.004 atrāntare yāvacchrāvasteyo vaṇijo bodhasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ paṇyamādāya śiśumāragirimanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4917: 107.005 tena svāgato mallakena hastagatena pīṭhīṃ gato mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñāta uktaśca--putra tvaṃ bodhagṛhapateḥ putra iti?
S01divyav_u:4920: 107.006 sa muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā aśruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ kathayati--putra,
S01divyav_u:4923: sa āha--teṣāmapi kecit kālagatāḥ kecidihaiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:4929: 107.011 ye vaṇikpauruṣeyāḥ paṇyaṃ gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ,
S01divyav_u:4936: sa dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--putra śrāvastīṃ kiṃ na gacchasi?
S01divyav_u:4948: tena tau kārṣāpaṇau khustavastrānte baddhvā sthāpitau,
S01divyav_u:4952: yāvadasau vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya svāgataṃ vaismṛtya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4960: te taṃ khaṭucapeṭādibhistāḍayitvā ardhacandrakāreṇa grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:4969: yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:4979: sa mātāpitṛviyogapratispardhinā pūrvakarmāparādhaprabhāveṇa duḥkhadaurmanasyena saṃtāpitamanāḥ sāśrukaṇṭhastūṣṇīmavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:4982: sa sārthavāhastasyāhāraṃ patrapuṭake baddhvā kiṃcidbhūmau pāṃśunā praticchādya sthāpayati,
S01divyav_u:4989: asthānamanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'samprāpte viśeṣādhigame so 'ntarā kālaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:4992: 108.006 yāvat tasya bhaginyāḥ santikā preṣyadārikā udakārthinī kumbhamādāya gatā/
S01divyav_u:4995: tvaṃ bodhasya gṛhapateḥ śuśumāragirīyakasya putra iti?
S01divyav_u:4996: sa kathayati--evaṃ māṃ bhaginījanaḥ saṃjānīta iti/
S01divyav_u:4997: 108.009 sā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā bāṣpoparudhyamānakaṇṭhā urasi prahāraṃ dattvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ praṣṭumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:5002: kecit tatraiva tiṣṭhanto vācamapi na prayacchanti/
S01divyav_u:5008: kiṃcidanyapauruṣeyā gṛhītvā dhanārthino deśāntaraṃ mahāsamudraṃ cāvatīrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5016: 108.019 sā dīrghamuṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya kathayati--ihaiva tiṣṭha yāvatte bhaginyāḥ kathayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:5022: kārṣāpaṇāṃśca dattvā uktā ca--sa vaktavyo yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:5025: sā vastrāṇyādāya kārṣāpaṇāṃśca tasya sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati--imāni te vastrāṇi kārṣāpaṇāśca bhaginyā preṣitāni,
S01divyav_u:5026: kathayati ca--yadi te bhāgineyo vā bhāgineyikā vā upasaṃkrāmati,
S01divyav_u:5036: 108.029 sa ca mārgapariśramakhinnena kṣudhārtena na śakyate kartum/
S01divyav_u:5044: na tvayā śrutam yathā śrāvastyāmudyānamoṣakāḥ puruṣāḥ pratidinamanvāhiṇḍyante?
S01divyav_u:5051: sa vigatamadyamadaḥ pratibuddho yāvat paśyati tānyevānantakāni(?)
S01divyav_u:5058: 109.006 sā gatā yāvat paśyati muṣitakaṃ tenaiva veṣeṇāvasthitam/
S01divyav_u:5061: 109.008 sā saṃlakṣayati--yamāgamya bodhasya gṛhapateranekadhanasamuditaṃ sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavaṃ gṛhaṃ vinaṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:5069: tatra tatra nirbhatsyante ca niṣkāsyante ca/
S01divyav_u:5072: vayaṃ pūrvam yatra yatra gacchāmastataḥ pūrṇahastāḥ pūrṇamallakā gacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5073: 109.014 idānīṃ ko yogo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā nairāśyamāpannā ihāgatā iti?
S01divyav_u:5074: tatraike kathayanti--nūnaṃ ko 'pi mandabhāgyo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakā ihāgatā iti/
S01divyav_u:5078: te tathaiva nirbhartsitā niṣkāsitāśca nairāśyamāpannā riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5084: te bhūyo dvidhā bhūtā evam yāvat svāgato 'nyaśca kroḍamallakaḥ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5087: 109.022 te kroḍamallakāḥ sarve saṃbhūya saṃjalpaṃ kartumārabdhāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5088: ayaṃ mandabhāgyasattvo 'smākaṃ madhye praviṣṭo yena vayaṃ riktahastā riktamallakāścāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5090: sa taiḥ prabhūtān prahārān dattvā śirasi ca mallakaṃ bhaṅktvā niṣkāsitaḥ//

S01divyav_u:5405: tena śrutam yathā svāgatena bhikṣuṇā bodhasya gṛhapateḥ putreṇāśvatīrthiko nāgo vinīta iti/
S01divyav_u:5407: 116.024 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5408: 116.025 sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryasvāgata śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
S01divyav_u:5415: tadā mama gṛhe tatprathamataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
S01divyav_u:5418: 116.030 atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śuśumāragirau vihṛtya yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5421: 116.032 aśrauṣīdanāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikām[117] carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5423: 117.001 śrutvā ca punaḥ śrāvastyā niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5424: 117.002 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5425: 117.003 ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:5426: 117.004 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:5427_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
S01divyav_u:5429: 117.008 athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5430: 117.010 aśrauṣīt sa brāhmaṇo bhagavān bhargeṣu janapadacārikāṃ carannihānuprāpta ihaiva viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāma iti/
S01divyav_u:5432: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu me āryaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhakteneti/
S01divyav_u:5434: 117.013 atha sa brāhmaṇa āyuṣmantaḥ svāgatasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5435_0: 117.014 athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:5435_1: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
S01divyav_u:5436: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:5437: 117.017 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yenānāthapiṇḍadasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5438: 117.018 tenāpi brāhmaṇenāyuṣmataḥ svāgatasya praṇīta āhāraḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5439: 117.019 āyuṣmānapi svāgataḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya yena tasya brāhmaṇasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5441: 117.021 ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān svāgatastena brāhmaṇena praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5442: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--āryeṇa svāgatena praṇīta āhāraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5454: 117.026 tato dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ śrāvastīvīthīṃ kiliñjacchannām/
S01divyav_u:5455: 117.027 sa tāmatikrānta ātapena spṛṣṭo madyakṣiptaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5457: 117.028 bhagavatā suparṇikā kuṭir nirmitā--maitaṃ kaścid dṛṣṭvā śāsane 'prasādaṃ pravedayiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:5458: 117.029 anāthapiṇḍadaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena svahastena saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:5459_0: 117.030 anekaparyāyeṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:5459_1: dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S01divyav_u:5460: 117.032 atha bhagavānanāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā [118]saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5462: 118.002 atha bhagavāṃstān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--ayaṃ sa bhikṣavaḥ svāgato bhikṣuryenāśvatrīrthiko nāgastāvaccaṇḍo vinītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5466: tasmānna bhikṣuṇā madyaṃ pātavyaṃ dātavyaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:5467: 118.005 atha bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgataṃ madyavaśāt suptamutthāpyedamavocat--svāgata, kimidam?
S01divyav_u:5470: 118.006 tato bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ svāgatamādāya vihāraṃ gatvā purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5471: 118.007 niṣadya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--māṃ bho bhikṣavaḥ śāstāramuddiśya bhavadbhirmadyamapeyamadeyamantataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi//
S01divyav_u:5472: 118.009 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā svāgatena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye kule mahādhane mahābhoge jātah?
S01divyav_u:5473: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena kroḍamallako jātaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5475: kiṃ karma kṛtam yena bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam,
S01divyav_u:5477: bhagavānāha--svāgatenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:5480: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:5484: api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:5486: 118.019 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//10//
S01divyav_u:5487: 118.020 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:5489: 118.022 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:5496: 118.027 tena gṛhapatinā bhūyasā paryavasthitena sa mahātmāa svayameva grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5503: 118.031 sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--avatarāvatara mahādakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:5506: tena tasya [119]pūjāsatkāraṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5509: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:5512: 119.005 bhagavānāha--kiṃ kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau gṛhapatireva,
S01divyav_u:5513: asau svāgato bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:5520: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:5521: 119.009 ahamanena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5522: 119.010 bhūyo 'pi kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe pravrajito babhūva/
S01divyav_u:5524: sa bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5527: 119.013 sa maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare dakṣiṇīye yādavāyurbrahmacaryaṃ caritam,
S01divyav_u:5529_0: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro māṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi
S01divyav_u:5529_1: tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha iti,
S01divyav_u:5531: 119.017 yathā mām upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenābhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagro nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5532: evaṃ māmapi sa bhagavāñ śākyamuniḥ śākyādhirājo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tejodhātuṃ samāpadyamānānāmagraṃ nirdiśediti/
S01divyav_u:5534: 119.020 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:5537: 119.022 tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmaṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:5545: 120.002 dharmatā khalu cyavanadharmaṇo devaputraysa pañca pūrvanimittāni prādurbhavanti--akliṣṭāni vāsāṃsi kliśyanti,
S01divyav_u:5549: cyavanadharmā devaputraḥ sva āsane dhṛtiṃ na labhate/
S01divyav_u:5565: 120.009 upasaṃkramya taṃ devaputramidamavocat--hā kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartase,
S01divyav_u:5578: evamukte devaputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamanubhūya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkaryāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:5579: 120.014 tatra mayā bahūni varṣāṇyuccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavya iti/
S01divyav_u:5580: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kāruṇyatayā taṃ devaputramidamavocat--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa,
S01divyav_u:5584: 120.016 atha sa devaputrastiryagyonyupapattibhayabhīto maraṇabhayabhītaśca śakraṃ devānāmindramidamavocat--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:5587: 120.019 atha sa devaputrastriśaraṇaparigṛhīto bhūtvā cyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ//
S01divyav_u:5588: 120.021 dharmatā khalu adhastāddevānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate nordhvam/
S01divyav_u:5589: atha śakro devānāmindrastaṃ devaputramavalokayati--kimasau devaputraḥ sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapanno na veti/
S01divyav_u:5597: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ kutūhalajāto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5598: 120.026 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5599_0: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ śakro devānāmindro bhagavantamidamavocat--ihāhaṃ bhadanta adrākṣamanyatamaṃ
S01divyav_u:5599_1: devaputraṃ cyavanadharmāṇaṃ pṛthivyāmāvartamānaṃ karuṇakaruṇaṃ ca paridevamānam--hā mandākini,
S01divyav_u:5610: 120.029 tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--kasmāt tvaṃ mārṣa atyarthaṃ śocasi paridevase krandasi urasi tāḍayasi saṃmohāpadyasa iti?
S01divyav_u:5611: sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika divyaṃ sukhamapahāya itaḥ saptame divase rājagṛhe nagare sūkarikāyāḥ kukṣau upapatsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:5612: 120.031 tatra mayā [121]bahūni varṣāṇi uccāraprasrāvaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:5613: 121.001 tamenamevaṃ vadāmi--ehi tvaṃ mārṣa buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:5616: 121.003 sa evamāha--eṣo 'haṃ kauśika buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dvipadānāmagryam,
S01divyav_u:5623: atha śakro devānāmindra āttamānāstasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:5624: 121.008 ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:5626: 121.010 ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:5628: 121.012 ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:5630: 121.014 atha bhagavāñ śakrasya devānāmindrasya bhāṣitamanusaṃvarṇayannevamāha--evametat kauśika, evametat/
S01divyav_u:5631: 121.016 ye buddhaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:5633: 121.018 ye dharmaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:5635: 121.020 ye saṃghaṃ śaraṇam yānti na te gacchanti durgatim/
S01divyav_u:5637_0: 121.022 atha śakro devānāmindro bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau
S01divyav_u:5637_1: śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjalikṛtasampuṭo bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:5644: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ dhriyamāṇānām yāpayatāṃ keśanakhastūpā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:5646: tadā bhikṣavaḥ keśanakhastūpe pujāṃ kṛtvā kecit puṇḍāya praviśanti,
S01divyav_u:5648_0: 122.005 tena khalu samayena buddho bhagavāṃs tathāgatamākārataḥ samanusmaraṃścittamabhiprasādayati--ityapi
S01divyav_u:5648_1: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:5649: 122.009 atha bhagavān sāyāhṇe pratisamlayanādvyutthāya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5650: 122.010 adrākṣīdbhagavāṃstaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam/
S01divyav_u:5651: 122.011 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--paśyata yūyaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya cittamabhiprasādayantam?
S01divyav_u:5653: 122.012 anena bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmirākrāntā adho 'śītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakramityatrāntarā yāvatyo vālukāstāvantyanena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni/
S01divyav_u:5654: 122.014 atha teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāmetadabhavat--puruṣamātrāyām yāvadgartāyāṃ na śakyate vālukā gaṇayitum,
S01divyav_u:5657: atha te bhikṣavo na bhūyaḥ keśanakhastūpe kārāṃ kartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:5658_0: 122.017 atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--anavarāgro
S01divyav_u:5660: 122.020 āyuṣmānupālī buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papraccha--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā asya bhikṣoriyatpuṇyaskandha iti,
S01divyav_u:5661: kutra bhadanta iyatpuṇyaskandhastanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:5662: nāhamupālinn ito bahiḥ samanupaśyāmyeva kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca yathā sabrahmacārī sabrahmacāriṇo 'ntike/
S01divyav_u:5663: 122.023 tatropālinn imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:5673: tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhaptinā dvau śukaśāvakau pratilabdhau/
S01divyav_u:5674: 123.003 tena niveśanaṃ nītvā ālāpitau poṣitau saṃvardhitau mānuṣālāpaṃ ca śikṣāpitau/
S01divyav_u:5675: 123.004 tayoścāyuṣmānānando 'bhīkṣṇamāgatya caturāryasatyasamprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ karoti--yaduta idaṃ duḥkham,
S01divyav_u:5680: 123.007 teṣāṃ kālānukālamupasaṃkrāmatāṃ tābhyāṃ śukaśāvakābhyāṃ nāmāni parijñātāni/
S01divyav_u:5683: 123.009 dṛṣṭvā antarjanamāmantrayatah--eṣa bhadantaḥ sthaviraḥ śāriputra āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:5685: 123.010 evamāyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ kāśyapaṃ raivatamāyuṣmantamānandaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayatah--eṣo 'smākamācāryānanda āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:5688: adrāṣṭāṃ tau śukaśāvakau bhagavantaṃ dūrādevāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ prasādanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittamatyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpamiva śriyā jvalantam/
S01divyav_u:5691: 123.016 atha bhagavāṃstayoranugrahārthaṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5692: niṣadya bhagavatā śukaśāvakau caturāryasatyasamprativedhikayā dharmadeśanayā śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau/
S01divyav_u:5693: 123.018 atha bhagavāñ śukaśāvakau antarjanaṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:5694: 123.019 tau cāntarjanasya viharataḥ pramādavihāriṇau biḍālena prāṇinā gṛhītau/
S01divyav_u:5695: 123.020 vihvalavadanau cchidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu namo buddhāya,
S01divyav_u:5700: 123.023 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantamidamavocat--nāhetupratyayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:5701: 123.024 ko bhadanta hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāviṣkaraṇe?

S01divyav_u:6299: dvāre dvāre pañcaśatāni nīlavāsasām yakṣāṇāṃ sthāpitāni saṃnaddhāni santi citrakalāpāni yāvadeva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmārakṣaṇārthamatyarthaṃ śobhanārtham/
S01divyav_u:6300_0: 136.024 sudarśanasya nagarasya vīthyah ardhatṛtīyāni yojanasahasrāṇyāyāmena vistareṇa
S01divyav_u:6300_1: dvādaśa yojanānyabhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāḥ kanakavālukāstīrṇāścandanavāripariṣiktā hemajālāvanaddhāḥ /
S01divyav_u:6305: tāḥ puṣkiriṇyaḥ pūrṇāḥ śītalena vāriṇā kṣaudrakalpenāmbunā utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā vividhairjalajaiḥ śakunakairvalgusvarairmanojñasvaraiḥ kāmarūpibhir nikūjatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6306: 136.030 sāmantake vividhāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ sujātāḥ susaṃsthitā āpīḍakajātāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6307: tadyathā dakṣeṇa mālākāreṇa vā mālākārāntevāsinā vā mālā vā agrasthitāvataṃsakāni vā suracitāni/
S01divyav_u:6309: 137.001 sudarśane nagare caturvidhāḥ kalpadūṣyavṛkṣā nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6314: 137.004 caturvidhā ābharaṇavṛkṣā hastopagāḥ pādopagā guhyāḥ prakāśitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6325: 137.009 gṛhāḥ kūṭāgārā harmyāḥ prāsādā svāsanakā avalokanakā saṃkramaṇakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6329_0: 137.011 devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sudharmā devasabhā trīṇi yojanaśatānyāyāmena trīṇi
S01divyav_u:6329_1: yojanaśatāni vistareṇa samantaparikṣepeṇa navayojanaśatāni abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sphaṭikamayī,
S01divyav_u:6334: 137.015 teṣāmeva devānāṃ sarvānte mūrdhātasya rājña āsanaṃ prajñaptam/
S01divyav_u:6336: 137.017 tatra ye puṇyamaheśākhyāḥ sattvā anupūrveṇa praviṣṭāh avaśiṣṭā bahiḥ sthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6337: yataḥ sa rājā mūrdhātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yānyetānyāsanāni prajñaptakāni,
S01divyav_u:6340: 137.019 atha rājño mūrdhātasyaitadabhavat--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate/
S01divyav_u:6343: na khalu rājño mūrdhātasya śakrasya devānāmindrasyaikāsane niṣaṇṇayoḥ kaścidviśeṣo vā,
S01divyav_u:6347: 137.024 rājño mūrdhātasya deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu tiṣṭhataḥ ṣaṭtriṃśāścakrāścyutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6348: tatra ca teṣāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāmaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:6354: 137.027 yato rājñā mūrdhātena trāyastriṃśānāmuktam--kimetadbhavanto 'tīva saṃbhramajātā devāh?
S01divyav_u:6366: paścādrājā mūrdhāto nirgatastasmādevanagarāt [138]teṣāṃ devānāmasurairbhagnakānāṃ svaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃnahya/
S01divyav_u:6367: 138.001 dharmatā ca punareṣāṃ devāsurāṇām yudhyatāṃ rathā vaihāyasena tiṣṭhanti/
S01divyav_u:6368: 138.002 teṣāmanyonyaṃ na kasyacidadhiko vā hīno vā/
S01divyav_u:6372: 138.004 paścāt te saṃlakṣayanti--puṇyavipākamaheśākhyo 'yaṃ sattvo yasyāsmākamuparivaihāyasaṃ ratho gacchati/
S01divyav_u:6373: 138.005 jitā bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtā āsurīṃ purīṃ praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6376: 138.007 sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--ahameva devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sakāśādabhyadhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6387: 138.012 aho batāhaṃ śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:6388: 138.013 sahacittotpādādrājā mūrdhātastasmāt ṛddhitaḥ paribhraṣṭo jambudvīpeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt/
S01divyav_u:6391: atha rājño mūrdhātasyāmātyagaṇamahāmātyā rājyakartāro mantrasahajīvino yena rājā mūrdhātastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6392: 138.016 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ mūrdhātamidamavocan--bhaviṣyanti khalu devasyātyayāt paścimā janapadāh?
S01divyav_u:6394: saced vo grāmṇyo mamātyayāt kaścidupasaṃkramyaivaṃ pṛcchet--kiṃ bhavanto rājñā mūrdhātena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtam,
S01divyav_u:6395: teṣāmidaṃ syādvacanīyām--rājā bhavanto mūrdhāto ratnaiḥ samanvāgato 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:6396: 138.019 catasṛbhiśca mānuṣikābhī ṛddhibhiścaturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā devāṃstrāyastriṃśānadhirūḍhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6404: 138.028 yaḥ prekṣati duḥkhamitonidānaṃ kāmeṣu jātu sa kathaṃ ramate/
S01divyav_u:6405: 138.030 loke hi śalyamupādhiṃ viditvā tasyaiva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet//7//
S01divyav_u:6406: 139.001 [139]yadā ca punastena janakāyena śrutaṃ rājā mūrdhāto glāno maraṇāvasthita iti,
S01divyav_u:6407: tataste 'mātyā janapadāścānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājānaṃ mūrdhātamupasaṃkramya darśanāya/
S01divyav_u:6408: 139.002 yatastena rājñā tasya janasya tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā--kāmeṣvādīnavakathā gṛhāśramapadasyādīnavo bhāṣitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6409: tathā kāmo jugupsito yathā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāmantike pravrajya gṛhāśramapadānyapahāya vanaṃ saṃśritāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6410: ṛṣibhiḥ pravrajitvā catvāri brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ prahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokasabhāgatāyāmupapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6411: 139.006 yāvacca jambudvīpe yāvacca pūrvavidehe dvīpe yāvaccāparagodānīye dvīpe yāvaccottarakuruṣu yāvacca saptasu kāñcanamayeṣu parvateṣu yāvacca devāṃstrāyastriṃśānadhirūḍaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6413: 139.009 śakrasya bhikṣavo devānāmindrasyāyuṣaḥ prāmāṇam yanmanuṣyāṇāṃ varṣamekaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmekarātriṃdivasam/
S01divyav_u:6414: 139.011ṭena rātriṃdivasena triṃśadrātrakena māsena dvādaśamāsena saṃvatsareṇa divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇam/
S01divyav_u:6415: 139.012 tadbhavati mānuṣikayā gaṇanayā tisro varṣalakṣāḥ ṣaṣṭiśca varṣasahasrāṇi//
S01divyav_u:6417: evaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpāditam--aho bata me śakro devānāmindro 'rdhāsanenopanimantrayate,
S01divyav_u:6418: kāśyapo bhikṣustena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
S01divyav_u:6419_0: 139.016 yasmin khalvānanda samaye rājño mūrdhātasyaivaṃvidhaṃ cittamutpannam--yannvahaṃ
S01divyav_u:6419_1: śakraṃ devānāmindramasmāt sthānāccyāvayitvā svayameva devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayeyam,
S01divyav_u:6420: kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddhastena kālena tena samayena śakro devānāmindro babhūva/
S01divyav_u:6427_0: 139.021 tatra tāvanmayā ānanda sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohena aparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmeṇa
S01divyav_u:6427_1: maraṇakālasamaye tāvadevaṃvidhā parikathā kṛtā yadanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi gṛhāśramamapahāya
S01divyav_u:6427_2: ṛṣibhyaḥ pravrajitvā kāmeṣu kāmacchandaṃ vyapahāya tadbahulavihāriṇo brahmalokamupapāditāḥ /
S01divyav_u:6428: 139.024 idānīṃ sarvajñenānuttarajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena nirvāṇāya saṃprasthitena tāvadevaṃvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:6433: 139.028 anekāni vaiśālikāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi yeṣāṃ kecitsrotāpattiphale vyavasthāpitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6441_1: bhadanta karmāṇi kṛtāni rājñā mūrdhātena yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena sahacittotpādādeva
S01divyav_u:6443_0: 140.004 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani sarvābhibhūr nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃl loke
S01divyav_u:6443_1: utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:6445: tatra viṣaye dharmatā--yā aciroḍhā dārikā bhartari pravahaṇakena pratipradīyate,
S01divyav_u:6446: sā catūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakīrya baddhakā svāmine pradīyate/
S01divyav_u:6448: sa ca śreṣṭhidārakaścatūratnamayāni puṣpāṇi pratigṛhya yānamadhiruhya śvaśuragṛhamanuprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6449: 140.009 tasya gacchato 'bhimukhaṃ sarvābhibhūḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ carannanupūrveṇābhyāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6451: 140.011 yato 'sau prasādīkṛtacetā yānādavatīrya taṃ bhagavantaṃ taiścatūratnamayaiḥ puṣpairavakiriti/
S01divyav_u:6452: 140.012 tāni sarvābhibhuvā samyaksambuddhenādhiṣṭhitāni tathā yathā śakaṭacakramātrāṇyabhinirvṛttāni/
S01divyav_u:6456: 140.015 anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:6457: 140.017 tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān atāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//8//
S01divyav_u:6459: 140.021 praṇidhiśca me tatra kṛtā udārā ākāṅkṣatā vā idamagrabodhim//9//
S01divyav_u:6460: 140.023 tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me prāpta hi me bodhiḥ śivā anuttarā/
S01divyav_u:6461: 140.025 vṛṣṭaṃ ca saptāhahiraṇyavarṣaṃ mūrdhātasya rājño mahābalasya//10//
S01divyav_u:6462: 140.027 tasyaiva karmaṇo vipākato me nagaramapi sauvarṇakāñcanaṃ babhūva mahāsudarśanasya ramaṇīyā kuśāvatī nāma purī babhūva//
S01divyav_u:6463_0: 140.029 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśaṃ
S01divyav_u:6463_1: bhadanta rājñā mūrdhātena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam,
S01divyav_u:6466: 141.001 [141]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vipaśyī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6467: 141.002 atha sa vipaśyī samyaksabuddho janapadeṣu caryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6468: 141.003 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bandhumatīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśāt/
S01divyav_u:6470: bhagavantaṃ vipaśyinamasecanakadarśanarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā adhikaḥ prasāda utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6471: 141.005 prasādajātena tasya mudgānāṃ muṣṭiṃ gṛhītvā pātre prakṣiptā/
S01divyav_u:6477: 141.009 anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:6478: 141.011 tīrṇaśca tārayeyaṃ mahājanaughān na tāritā ye pūrvakairjinendraiḥ//11/
S01divyav_u:6481: yanmayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya prasādajātena mudgānāṃ muṣṭiḥ pātre pakṣiptā,
S01divyav_u:6482: tasmāccatvāro mudgāḥ pātre patitā avaśiṣṭā bhūmau patitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6483: tasya karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu dvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:6486: 141.017 sacedbhikṣavaḥ sa mudgaḥ pātre patito 'bhaviṣyanna bhūmau,
S01divyav_u:6487: sthāanametadvidyate yaddeveṣu ca manuṣyeṣu ca rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kāritamabhaviṣyat/
S01divyav_u:6488: 141.018 yo 'sau otkariko vaṇik tena kālena tena samayena,
S01divyav_u:6491: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:6492: 141.020 yasmādevaṃ buddhe bhagavati mahākāruṇike kārāḥ kṛtā atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhavanti mahānuśaṃśā mahādyutayo mahāvaistārikā iti,
S01divyav_u:6495: buddhe dharme saṃghe kārāḥ karaṇīyāḥ samyakpraṇidhānāni ca karaṇīyānīti//
S01divyav_u:6502: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:6503: 142.004 tena khalu samayena pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣu cañcūryamāṇāni mahāsamudrataṭamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:6505: 142.006 yato vaṇijastaṃ mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃbhinnamanaso na prasahante samavataritum/
S01divyav_u:6506: 142.007 paścāttervaṇigbhiḥ karṇadhāra uktah--uddhoṣaya naḥ puruṣo mahāsamudrasya bhūtaṃ varṇam/
S01divyav_u:6507: 142.008 yato varṇadhāra uddhoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6509: tadyathā--maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilā pravālo rajataṃ jātarūpamaśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6510: 142.010 ya icchati evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena prīṇayituṃ mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitam,
S01divyav_u:6511: kālena ca kālaṃ dakṣiṇīyebhyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitumūrdhvagāminīṃ saubhāgyakarīṃ sukhavipākāmāyatyāṃ svargasaṃvartanīm,
S01divyav_u:6513: 142.014 evamukte ca punaḥ sarva eva sattvāḥ saṃpattikāmā vipattipratikūlāstaṃ śrutvā tasmin mahāsamudre vyavasitāḥ samavataritum/
S01divyav_u:6516: yato vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--kasyedānīṃ vakṣyāmo vahanāt pratyavatarasveti/
S01divyav_u:6518: 142.018 tataḥ sa udghoṣayituṃ pravṛttah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6519: santyasmin mahāsamudre imāni evamrūpāṇi mahānti mahābhayāni,
S01divyav_u:6520: tadyathā timibhayaṃ timiṃgilabhayamūrmibhayaṃ kūrmabhayaṃ sthale utsīdanabhayaṃ jale saṃsīdanabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghaṭṭanabhayaṃ kālikāvātabhayam/
S01divyav_u:6522: yena cātmano jīvitaparityāgo vyavāsthito mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ citraṃ ca jambudvīpaṃ parityaktum,
S01divyav_u:6525: taṃ śrutvā tathodghuṣya tu tasmādyānapātrādavatīrṇā bahavaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6528: 142.025 paścād dvau trayo yāvadanupūrveṇa sarve varatrāśchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6529: tāsu cchinnāsu tadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasampreritaṃ gagane mahāvātasamprerito megha iva balavadvāyusampreritaṃ kṣiprameva saṃprasthitam/
S01divyav_u:6531: sa taṃ pradeśamanuprāptānāṃ karṇadhāraḥ kathayati--santyasmin ratnadvīpe kācamaṇayo ratnasadṛśāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6534: 142.029 tatraiva ca kroñcakumārikā nāma striyo bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:6540: asminneva ca ratnadvīpe saptāhāt pareṇa amanuṣyā na sahante,
S01divyav_u:6541: tāvadvidhān viparītān vāyūnutpādayanti yairvahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadakṛtakāryāṇām/
S01divyav_u:6544: prāpya ca taṃ ratnadvīpaṃ prayatnamāsthāya ratnānveṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā anupūrveṇopaparīkṣya ratnānāṃ tadvahanaṃ pūritaṃ tadyathā yavānāṃ vā yavasasyānāṃ vā mudgānāṃ vā bhāṣāṇāṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:6545: 143.003 vahanaṃ pūryitvā te 'nukūlaṃ jambudvīpābhimukhena vāyunā saṃprasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6546: 143.004 mahāsamudre ca tribhiḥ skandhaiḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃmiśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6552: 143.007 tatra ca mahāsamudre tā matsyajātayaḥ parasparānyonyabhakṣaṇaparāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6557: 143.009 tatra timiṃgilo nāma matsyāstṛtīyādudakaskandadhādabhyudgamya uparimandakaskandhamādāya carati/
S01divyav_u:6559: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāsamudrāt pānīyaṃ mahatā vegenākṣiptaṃ mukhadvāram yato dhāvati/
S01divyav_u:6561: 143.012 tasyaivaṃ carata ātmabhāvācchira evaṃ lakṣyate dūrata eva,
S01divyav_u:6563: 143.013 akṣīṇi cāsya durata eva saṃlakṣyante nabhasīvādityau/
S01divyav_u:6566: teṣāmevaṃ cintayatāṃ tadvahanaṃ tasya mukhadvāram yato vegenopahartumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:6567: 143.016 teṣāṃ vahanaṃ vegenāpahriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā ādotuadvayotpādanaṃ ca saṃlakṣya saṃvega utpannah--kiṃ bhavanto yat tacchrūyate saptādityāḥ kalpasaṃvartanyāṃ samudāgamiṣyantīti,
S01divyav_u:6569: 143.018 yataḥ karṇadhāreṇa teṣāṃ vimarśajātānāmuktam--yat tadbhavantaḥ śrūyate timitimiṃgila iti,
S01divyav_u:6574: 143.022 paśyatha etau dūrata eva sūryavadavalokyete etau akṣitārakau/
S01divyav_u:6579: yasya vo yasmin deve bhaktiḥ sa tamāyācatu/
S01divyav_u:6580: 143.025 yadi tenāpi tāvadāyācanena kāciddevatā asmākamasmānmahābhayādvimoṣkaṇaṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:6583: 143.028 naiva ca teṣāmāyācatāṃ tasmānmaraṇabhayāt jīvitaparitrāṇaviśeṣaḥ kaścit/
S01divyav_u:6584: 143.029 tathaiva tadvahanaṃ salilavegāt bhikṣiptaṃ timiṃgilamukhadvāram yato 'pahriyate/
S01divyav_u:6589: 143.031 kiṃ tu sarva evaikaraveṇa namo buddhāyeti vadāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6590: sati maraṇe buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā kālaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6593: 144.001 bhagavatā ca jetavanasthena sa vādaḥ śruto divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa/
S01divyav_u:6594: 144.002 śrutvā ca punarbhagavatā sa nādastathā adhiṣṭhito yathā tena timiṃgilena śrutam/
S01divyav_u:6595: 144.003 tasya taṃ namo buddhāyeti rāvaṃ śrutvā manaso 'marṣa utpanno viklavībhūtaśca--buddho bata loka utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6596: 144.004 na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt yadahaṃ buddhasya bhagavato nāmodghoṣaṃ śrutvā āhāramāhareyam/
S01divyav_u:6597: 144.005 sa cintayituṃ pravṛttah--yadyahamidanīṃ sahasaiva mukhadvāraṃ pidhāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:6600: 144.006 yannvahaṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ mukhadvāraṃ saṃpidadhyām/
S01divyav_u:6601: 144.007 tatastena timiṃgilenātmīyaṃ mukhadvāraṃ mṛdunopakrameṇa svairaṃ svairaṃ pihitam/
S01divyav_u:6603: 144.009 atha te vaṇijastīramāsādya tadbhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭoṣṭragogardabhādibhiḥ purayitvā anupūrveṇa grāmanigamapallīpattanādiṣu cañcūryamāṇāḥ śrāvastīmanuprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6604: 144.010 te tatra gatvā saṃlakṣayanti--dharmataiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātramāgacchati,
S01divyav_u:6606: 144.012 yannu vayametāni ratnāni buddhasya bhagavato dadyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6607: te tāni ratnāni saṃgṛhya bhagavataḥ sakāśamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6608: 144.013 anupūrveṇa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavataḥ kathayanti--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:6609_0: asmākaṃ samudre yānapātreṇāvatīrṇānāṃ timiṃgilagrāheṇa tasmin yānapāre 'pahriyamāṇe
S01divyav_u:6609_1: jīvitavināśe pratyupasthite bhagavataḥ smaraṇaparāyaṇānāṃ nāmagrahaṇaṃ tasmāt mahāgrāhamukhādvinirmuktam,
S01divyav_u:6610: tato vayaṃ bhagavan saṃsiddhayānapārāḥ kṣemasvastinā ihāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6611: 144.016 dharmatā caiṣā yasya nāṃnā vahanaṃ saṃsiddhayānapātrā āgacchanti,
S01divyav_u:6622: 144.021 yadvayametāni ratnāni tyaktvā bhagavato 'ntike pravrajema iti/
S01divyav_u:6623: 144.022 paścāt te tāni ratnāni mātāpitṛbhyaḥ putradāradāsīdāsakarmakaramitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyo yathānyāyataḥ saṃvibhajya pravrajitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6625: 144.024 yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kīdṛśāni karmāṇi bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:6627: yeṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākena bhagavānārāgito na virāgitah?
S01divyav_u:6629: 144.027 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapaḥ samyaksambuddho loka utpanno 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:6630: tasya ca śāsane eta eva ca pravrajitā abhūvan/
S01divyav_u:6631: 144.028 tatra pravrajya ca na kaścit tadrūpo guṇagaṇo 'dhigato nānyatra sabrahmacāriṇāmuddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:6632: 144.029 maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavantah--yadasmābhiḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksambuddhamāsādyoddiṣṭamadhītaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:6634: asya karmaṇo vipākena vayam yo 'sau anāgato 'dhvani kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena śākyamuninarmā samyaksambuddho vyākṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6636: 145.001 [145]bhagavānāha--kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañcabhikṣuśatānyatīte 'dhvanyāsan kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitāni,
S01divyav_u:6640: 145.003 yaścāsau mahāsamudre timistimiṃgilo nāma matsyo buddhaśabdaṃ śrutvā anāhāratāyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6645: 145.007 yatra ca vikṣiptaṃ tatrāpi samīpe nāgasyaiva bhavanam/
S01divyav_u:6647: evaṃ kṣiptena pāramparyeṇa tat kalevaraṃ mahāsamudrataṭaṃ samudānītam/
S01divyav_u:6649: taccānekaiḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālaśvāpadādyaiḥ pakṣibhistatsamucchritaiśca kṛmibhirbhakṣyamāṇamasthikaraṅkajīrṇamāsaṃ śvetaṃ śvetaṃ vyavasthitam/
S01divyav_u:6650: 145.011 asyāṃ ca śrāvastyāṃ tasya brāhmaṇasya yadā patnī antarvartinī saṃvṛttā,
S01divyav_u:6651: tadeva tasyā garbhotpādādatīva kṣudduḥkhena pīḍyamānayā gṛhasvāmyabhihitah--āryaputra,
S01divyav_u:6656: sā ca tadannapānaṃ sarvamabhyavahṛtya naiva tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:6664: 145.018 kimetadbhavantaḥ syāt--asyāḥ sattvamudare utpannam yasyotpādānnaiva tṛptimupayāti?
S01divyav_u:6665: yataḥ sa brāhmaṇo naimittakānāṃ darśayitvā saṃśayanirṇayanārthaṃ vaidyādīn bhūtatantravidaśca--paśyantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6666: iyaṃ brāhmaṇī kiṃ mahatā rogeṇābhibhūtā syādatha bhūtagrahāviṣṭā syādanyadvā syādrūpaṃ maraṇaliṅgamanenopasaṃkrameṇa pratyupasthitā syāt/
S01divyav_u:6670: tadā tairvaidyanaimittakabhūtatantravidbhiścikitsakaiḥ sā brāhmaṇīparyanuyuktā--kasmāt kālādārabhya tavaivaṃvidhā dīptāgnitā samutpannā?
S01divyav_u:6671: tayā abhihitam--garbhalambhasamakālameva sa evaṃvidha upakramaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6672: 145.025 yato naimittakavaidyacikitsakairabhihitam--nāsyāḥ kaścidanyastadrūpo rogo nāpi bhūtagrahāveśo bādhākara utpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6677: 145.029 tasya dārakasya jātamātrasya sā brāhmaṇī vinītakṣudduḥkhā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:6678: sa dārako jātamātra eva atyarthaṃ bubhukṣayopapīḍyate/
S01divyav_u:6679: 145.030 tasya bubhukṣayā pīḍyamānasya mātā stanaṃ dātuṃ pravṛttā/
S01divyav_u:6680: 145.031 sa ca dārakaḥ stanaṃ pītvāpi sarvaṃ naiva tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:6681: paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayā ca brāhmaṇyā tiraskṛtaprātiveśyasvajanayuvatyaścābhyarthya stanaṃ tasya dārakasya dāpayituṃ pravṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6682: 146.001 [146]sa ca dārakaḥ sarvāsāmapi stanaṃ pītvā naiva tṛptimabhyupagacchate/
S01divyav_u:6683: paścāt tena brāhmaṇena tayārthe chagalikā kṛtvā/
S01divyav_u:6684: 146.002 sa dārakastasyā api cchagalikāyāḥ kṣīraṃ pītvā janikāyāśca stanaṃ naiva tṛpyate/
S01divyav_u:6685: 146.003 tatra kālena kālaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaśca piṇḍapātaṃ praviṣya parikathāṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:6686: 146.004 sa dārakastāṃ parikathāṃ śrutvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ na roditi,
S01divyav_u:6688: 146.005 pratyavāsṛteṣu bhikṣubhikṣuṇīṣu ca punaḥ pipāsāduḥkhaṃ pratisaṃvedayamāno rohituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6691: 146.007 sa ca dārako 'nupūrveṇa māsārdharmāsādīnāmatyayādbhuñjāno naiva kadācidannapānasya tṛpyati/
S01divyav_u:6696: gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhikṣāṃ paryaṭitvā āhārakṛtyaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:6697: 146.010 yataḥ sa dārako bhaikṣabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvastyāṃ bhaikṣaṃ paryaṭati/
S01divyav_u:6698: paryaṭanneva ca bhuktvā bhuktvā atṛpyamāna eva gṛhamāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:6699: 146.011 yato 'sau saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ mayā karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena na kadācit vitṛpyamāna āhāramārāgayāmi?
S01divyav_u:6708: tatra ca tvaṃ pravrajitaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃcayaṃ kariṣyasi/
S01divyav_u:6709: 146.016 akuśalāśca te dharmā ye 'sminnapi janmani saṃcitā bhaviṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:6713: 146.018 atha sa mahātmā upāsakena codito jetavanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6714: jetavanaṃ gatvā tatra bhikṣūn pāṭhasvādhyāyamanasikārodyuktān dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6721: yataḥ sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sakāśādanujñāṃ mārgituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6726: 146.024 tatra ca bhikṣūṇāṃ kadācit piṇḍapāto bhavati,
S01divyav_u:6728: sa ca yasmin divase piṇḍapāto bhavati,
S01divyav_u:6732: 146.026 yata upādhyāyenāsya saṃlakṣitah--taruṇavayasā pravrajito dīptāgnitayā na tṛptimupayāti/
S01divyav_u:6733: 146.027 sa ātmīyādapi piṇḍapatāt tasya saṃvibhāgaṃ prārabdhaḥ kartum/
S01divyav_u:6737: 146.029 yata upādhyāyastaṃ śrutvā sapremān bhikṣūnanyāṃśca sārdhavihāriṇaḥ prārabdho vaktum/
S01divyav_u:6738: 146.030 yataḥ samānopādhyāyaiḥ samānācāryairanyaiśca sapremakairbhikṣubhirupasaṃhāra ārabdhaḥ kartum/
S01divyav_u:6742: 146.032 dānapatirapi viditvā yadyadadhikaṃ tattadasmai datvā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:6743: 147.001 [147]atha pānakaṃ bhavati tadapi tathaiva yadadhikaṃ bhavati tattasyānupradīyate/
S01divyav_u:6744: tasya ca yataḥ pravrajitasya na kadācidannapānena kukṣiḥ pūṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6745: 147.002 tena khalu samayena anyatamena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6746: 147.003 bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamantargṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya/
S01divyav_u:6749: tena caivamupalabdham yo 'saṃviditameva buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayati sa sahasaiva bhogairabhyudgacchati/
S01divyav_u:6751: 147.007 sa tasyāhārasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā praṇītapraṇītasya śucinaḥ sārdhaṃ sarvarūpairmitrasvajanasahāyo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti vihāraṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6752: 147.009 sa paśyati tasmiñ jetavane bhikṣava eva na santi/
S01divyav_u:6761: sa kathayati--yadi te mahātman parityaktaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:6762: 147.013 tatastena gṛhapatinā saṃlakṣayitvā yenāhāreṇaikasya bhikṣoḥ paryāptaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:6763: tāvadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ gṛhītvā taṃ dharmaruciṃ pariveṣayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6771: tatastena gṛhapatinā bhūyastasmāt śakaṭādyena bhikṣudvayasyāhāreṇa paryāptaṃ syāt,
S01divyav_u:6779: 147.020 yatastasmācchakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā trayāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6784: 147.022 yataḥ sa gṛhapatistasmādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā yena caturṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paryāptaṃ syāditi punarbhojayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6796: 147.027 yataḥ śrūyate pañcabhir nīlavāsaso yakṣaśatairjetavanamaśūnyamiti teṣāṃ bhaviṣyatyeva anyatamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6797: 147.028 iti saṃcintya garbharūpāṇi gṛhe 'nupraveśayituṃ pravṛttah--gacchatha yūyaṃ śīghraṃ gṛhameva,
S01divyav_u:6799: 147.029 sa gṛhajanaṃ visarjya maraṇabhayabhītastasmāt śakaṭādannapānaṃ gṛhītvā pariveṣayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6805: 148.002 tasmānnagarāt piṇḍapātanirhārako bhikṣu tasyaiva piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6807: tasya dharmarucer na kadācidyato jātasya kuṣkiṃ pūrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6809: 148.004 tasya ca gṛhapater nagaraṃ praviśato 'bhimukhaṃ bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaḥ saṃprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6811: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamuddiśya pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ tṛptitaḥ śakaṭamannapānasya pūrayitvā jetavanaṃ gato buddhapramyukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:6812: 148.007 na ca me tatra bhikṣavo labdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6814: tena samākhyātaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛham upanimantraṇaṃ praviṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:6816: 148.009 yatastasya mamānupūrveṇa sarvaṃ tadannapānaṃ śakaṭaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:6824: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--ko 'sau dānapatirbhaviṣyati yo 'sau dharmaruceretāvatā āhāreṇa pratidivasam yogodvahanaṃ kariṣyati?
S01divyav_u:6830: paścādbhagavān vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ sahacittotpādāt ṛddhyā dharmaruciṃ gṛhītvā samudrataṭamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6840: sa itaścāmutaśca tasyā anupārśvanaṃ tāṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ śramamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6845: 148.023 yato 'sau bhagavato 'ntikaṃ gatvā bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ tadbhagavan?
S01divyav_u:6854: dharmarucistaṃ śrutvā bhagavadvaco vyākulitacetāḥ kathayati--mamaiṣedṛśī asthiśakalā?
S01divyav_u:6859: 148.029 ityuktvā bhagavān vitatapakṣa iva rājahaṃsa ṛddhyā jetavanamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6860: 148.030 atha dharmarucinā cintayatā manasikāramanutiṣṭhatā uṣmagatānyutpāditāni murdhānaḥ kṣāntayo laukikā agradharmā darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6871: 149.006 sa evaṃ saṃlakṣya duṣkarakārako bata me bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:6872: 149.007 yadi ca bhagavatā mamaivaikasyārthe 'nuttarā samyaksambodhiradhigatā syāt,
S01divyav_u:6876: tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:6879: 149.011 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat/
S01divyav_u:6886_0: 149.015 yato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--bhagavan
S01divyav_u:6886_1: dharmarucirihaiva śrāvastyāṃ jāto 'sminneva jetavane pravrajito na kutaścidāgato na kutracidgataḥ /
S01divyav_u:6891: evamukte bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--na bhikṣavaḥ pratyutpannaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi/
S01divyav_u:6894: icchatha bhikṣavo 'sya dharmaruceḥ pūrvikāṃ karmaplotimārabhya dhārmikathāṃ śrotum?
S01divyav_u:6896: etasya sugata samayo yadbhagavān dharmarucimārabhya bhikṣūṇāṃ dhārmikathāṃ kuryāt/
S01divyav_u:6898_0: 149.023 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani prathame 'saṃkhyeye kṣemaṃkaro nāma tathāgato
S01divyav_u:6898_1: loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S01divyav_u:6900: tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ kṣemo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:6901: 149.026 tasyāṃ ca kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamo vaṇikśreṣṭhī prativasati/
S01divyav_u:6902: 149.027 tenāsau kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ traimāsān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6904: bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya tasmācca ratnānyānīya saṃghe pañcavārṣikaṃ kariṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:6905: 149.029 evaṃ saṃcintya bhāṇḍaṃ samudānīya grāmanigamapallīpattanarājadhānīṣvanupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ samudramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6907: 149.031 asya tasmin mahāsamudre 'vatīrṇasya kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalambuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6910: sa ca śreṣṭhī saṃsiddhayānapātreṇa devatāmānuṣyaparigṛhītena tasmānmahāsamudrāt tīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6911: 150.002 uttīrya ca taṃ bhāṇḍaṃ śakaṭairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiśca cotkṣipya anupūrveṇa saṃprasthitaḥ/
