S01divyav_u:6912: 150.003 sa ca panthānaṃ gacchan prātipathikān pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pravṛttih?
S01divyav_u:6914: 150.004 sa kathayati--asti kaścit kṣemāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ kṣemaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhah?
S01divyav_u:6915: te kathayanti--parinirvṛtaḥ sa bhagavān kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:6918: 150.007 tasmācca jalābhiṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇo jīvita utthāya bhūyaḥ pṛcchati--kiṃ bhavanto jānīdhvaṃ śrāvakā api tāvattasya bhagavatastiṣṭhanti?
S01divyav_u:6920: 150.009 saptāhaparinirvṛtasya ca buddhasya bhagavataḥ kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya kṣemeṇa rājñā caityamalpeśākhyaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
S01divyav_u:6921: 150.010 tena ca gatvā śreṣṭhinā janapadāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6922: asti bhavantastasya bhagavato buddhasya kiṃcit stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam/
S01divyav_u:6925: 150.012 tasya etadabhavat--etaṃ mayā suvarṇaṃ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksambuddham uddiśyānītam/
S01divyav_u:6927: yannvahametenaiva suvarṇena tasyaiva bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:6932: ahametenaiva suvarṇenaitat tasya bhagavataścaityaṃ maheśākhyataraṃ kārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:6934: 150.017 tato brāhmaṇā nagaraṃ prati nivāsinaḥ saṃbhūya sarve tasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayanti--bho mahāśreṣṭhin,
S01divyav_u:6939: idānīṃ tu tasya parinirvṛtasya vayameva dakṣiṇīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6941: sa teṣāṃ kathayati--nāham yuṣmākametat suvarṇaṃ dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:6946: teṣāṃ tathā vyutpadyatāṃ na lebhe taccaityam yathepsitaṃ tena suvarṇena kārayitum/
S01divyav_u:6947: 150.023 atha sa śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--mahārāja,
S01divyav_u:6948: taccaityaṃ na labhe brāhmaṇānāṃ sakāśādyathābhipretaṃ kārayitum/
S01divyav_u:6950: 150.025 evaṃ ca rājñā svapuruṣa ājñaptah--yadyasya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidapanayaṃ karoti,
S01divyav_u:6952: 150.026 evaṃ deveti sahasrayodhī puruṣo rājñaḥ pratiśrutya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:6953: 150.027 nirgamya ca tān brāhmaṇānevaṃ vadati--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:6954: ahaṃ rājñāsya mahāśreṣṭhinaḥ svapuruṣo dattah--yadyasya stūpamabhisaṃskurvataḥ kaścidvighātaṃ kuryāt,
S01divyav_u:6955: sa tvayā mahatā daṇḍena śāsayitavya iti/
S01divyav_u:6958: 150.030 te brāhmaṇāḥ sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivaṃ śrutvā bhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:6959_0: yatastena mahāśreṣṭhinā saṃcintya yathaitat suvarṇaṃ tatraiva garbhasaṃsthaṃ syāt
S01divyav_u:6959_1: tathā kartavyamiti tasya stūpasya sarvaireva caturbhiḥ pārśvaiḥ pratikaṇṭhukayā catvāri
S01divyav_u:6960: 150.032 yāvadanupūrveṇa[151] prathamā meḍhī tato 'nupūrveṇa dvitīyā tatastṛtīyā meḍhī yāvadanupūrveṇāṇḍam/
S01divyav_u:6961: 151.001 tathāvidhaṃ ca stūpasyāṇḍaṃ kṛtam yatra sā yūpayaṣṭirabhyantare pratipāditā/
S01divyav_u:6965: 151.004 tatra ca kriyamāṇe sahasrayodhinaḥ puruṣasyaivamutpannam--nātra kaścididānīṃ prahariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:6967: tena ca mahāśreṣṭhinā tasya stūpasya caturbhiḥ pārśvaiścatvāro dvārakoṣṭhakā māpitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:6973: tatra ca vividhāni jalajāni mālyāni ropitāni tadyathā utpalaṃ padmaṃ kumudaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ sugandhikaṃ mṛdugandhikam/
S01divyav_u:6974: 151.010 vividhāni ca puṣkariṇītīreṣu sthalajāni mālyāni ropitāni,
S01divyav_u:6980: ye tasmiṃścaitye gandhairdhūpairmālyaiśca cūrṇaiḥ kārāḥ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:6983: dakṣiṇena vāyunā sarvapuṣpajātīnāṃ gandhena taccaityamaṅgaṇaṃ cāsya sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:6986: vāyatā vāyatā taccaityāṅgaṇaṃ ca tena vividhena gandhamālyena sphuṭaṃ bhavatyanubhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:6988: 151.018 sa taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajātakṛtaniṣṭhitaṃ kathayati--asmiṃścaitye kārāṃ kṛtvā kimavāpyate?
S01divyav_u:6989: yato 'sau śreṣṭhī buddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ tribhirasaṃkhyeyairvīryeṇa vyāyamatā anuttarā bodhiravāpyate/
S01divyav_u:6990: 151.020 sa taṃ śrutvā viṣādamāpanno hīnotsāhatayā kathayati--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi anuttarāṃ samyaksambodhiṃ samudānayitum/
S01divyav_u:6991_0: 151.021 tato 'sau śreṣṭhī pratyekabuddhodāharaṇaṃ pravṛttaḥ kartum--evaṃ sahasrayodhī
S01divyav_u:6991_1: tasyāpi varṇodāharaṇaṃ śrutvā viṣaṇṇacetāḥ kathayati--etāmapyahaṃ pratyekabodhiṃ
S01divyav_u:6992: 151.023 tataḥ sa mahāśreṣṭhī śrāvakavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--asminnapi tāvat praṇidhatsva cittam/
S01divyav_u:6993: 151.024 yataḥ sahasrayodhyāha--tvayā punarmahāśreṣṭhin katamasyāṃ bodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam?
S01divyav_u:6999: 151.028 kiṃ tu loke yadā tvaṃ buddhotpādaśabdaṃ śrutvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhethāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7000: 151.029 sa ca śreṣṭhī taṃ caityaṃ kṛtvā nirīkṣya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ karoti--
S01divyav_u:7001: 151.030 anena dānena mahadgatena buddho bhaveyaṃ sugataḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:7004: ahameva sa tasmin samaye bodhisattvacaryāṃ vartāmi/
S01divyav_u:7006: eṣa eva dharmarucistena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:7010: 152.005 dvitīye dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno vidyācaraṇasamyaksambuddhaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān/
S01divyav_u:7011: 152.006 atha dīpamakaraḥ samyaksambuddho janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran dvīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7012: 152.007 dvīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvīpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:7013: 152.009 tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7014: 152.010 tasya ca dīpasya rājño vāsavo nāma sāmantarājo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:7016: iha mayā dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7018: 152.012 tadā ca vāsavena rājñā dvādaśavarṣāṇi yajñamiṣṭvā yajñāvasāne rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
S01divyav_u:7024: 152.014 tena khalu samayena anyeṣu janapadeṣu dvau māṇavakau prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7027: 152.017 tābhyāṃ ca śrutaṃ vāsavena rājñā pañca mahāpradānāni yajñāvasāne samudānītāni,
S01divyav_u:7028: yo brāhmaṇaḥ svādhyāyasampanno bhaviṣyati sa lapsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:7031: 152.019 ko 'smākaṃ tatra bahuśrutatamo vā svādhyāyatamo bhaviṣyatīti saṃcintya yena vāsavasya rājño mahānagaraṃ tena saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:7033: yau etau dvau māṇavakau āgacchataḥ sumatiśca matiśca,
S01divyav_u:7035: 152.021 yadevaṃ dvau māṇakakau āgacchataḥ sumitaśca matiśca,
S01divyav_u:7037: yadevaṃ mahārāja tvayā dvādaśa varṣāṇi yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7039: 152.023 sa rājā saṃlakṣayati--nūnametau mahātmānau yeṣāmāmarthāya devatā apyārocayanti/
S01divyav_u:7040: 152.024 yato 'sau rājā paśyati māṇavakau dūrata evāgacchantau agrasanamībhiruhyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:7041: 152.025 yato rājā vāsavastyau sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ pṛcchati--bhavān sumati?
S01divyav_u:7043: 152.028 yato rājā vāsavaḥ sumatiṃ māṇavamagrāsane bhojayitvā pañca pradānāni prayacchati/
S01divyav_u:7047: yataḥ sā kanyā sumatiṃ māṇavaṃ prāsādikamabhirūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lubdhā snehotpannā,
S01divyav_u:7050: yataḥ sā kanyā rājñā pradānabuddhyā parityaktā [153]na punargṛhītā,
S01divyav_u:7051: sumatināpi māṇavenāpratigṛhyamāṇā rājño dīpasya dīpāvatīṃ nagarīṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:7052: 153.002 sā tatra gatvā tadātmīyamalaṃkāraṃ śarīrādavatārya mālākārāyānuprayacchati--asyālaṃkārasya mūlyaṃ me pratidivasaṃ devasyārthe nīlotpalāni dadasva/
S01divyav_u:7053: 153.003 sā tenopakrameṇa tadalaṃkārikaṃ suvarṇaṃ datvā devaśuśraūṣikā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:7054: 153.004 sa ca māṇavakaḥ sumatistāni catvāri mahāpradānāni gṛhya upādhyāyasakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7057: kārṣāpaṇānāṃ tu pañca śatāni tasyaiva sumaterdadāti/
S01divyav_u:7058: sa ca sumatistasyāmeva rātrau daśa svapnānadrākṣīt--mahāsamudraṃ pibāmi,
S01divyav_u:7060: imau candrādityau evaṃmaharddhikau evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi,
S01divyav_u:7067: 153.010 pratibuddhasyaitadabhavat--ka eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ mama vyākaraṇaṃ kariṣyati?
S01divyav_u:7069: 153.011 atha sumatirmāṇavaḥ saṃśayanirṇayanārtham ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7070: 153.012 sumatistasya ṛṣeḥ pratisaṃmodanaṃ kṛtvā svapnānākhyāyāha--kuruṣva me eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ nirṇayam/
S01divyav_u:7073: tatra dīpena rājñā dīpaṃkaro nāma samyaksambuddhaḥ sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7075: 153.015 atha vāsavo rājā tasya dīpasya rājñaḥ pratiśrutya aśītyamātyasahasraparivṛto dīpāvatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7076_0: 153.016 tena ca dīpena rājñā saptamāddivasāddīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa
S01divyav_u:7076_1: nagarapraveśaṃ kariṣyāmīti sarvaviṣayādhiṣṭhānāñca sarvapuṣpāṇāṃ saṃgrahaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ /
S01divyav_u:7077: 153.018 tatra ca yasmin divase rājñā dīpena tasya dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya sābhisaṃskāreṇa nagarapraveśa ārabdhaḥ kartum,
S01divyav_u:7080: sā ca devopasthāyikā dārikā mālākārasakāśaṃ gatā--prayaccha me nīlotpalāni,
S01divyav_u:7082: 153.022 mālākāra āha--adya rājñā sarvapuṣpāṇi gṛhītāni dīpaṃkaranagarapraveśasyārthe/
S01divyav_u:7084: punarapi tatra puṣkiriṇyām yadi matpuṇyair nīlotpalapadmamanuddhṛtamāsādyeta/
S01divyav_u:7085: 153.023 tatra puṣkiriṇyāṃ sumateḥ puṇyānubhāvāt sapta nīlapadmāni prādurbhūtāni/
S01divyav_u:7094: yataḥ sā dārikā kathayati--madīyaiḥ puṇyairetāni prādurbhūtāni,
S01divyav_u:7099: tena mālākāreṇaivaṃ śrutvā tasyā dārikayāstānyuddhṛtya anupradattāni/
S01divyav_u:7100: 153.031 sā tāni gṛhītvā udakakumbhe prakṣipya tatkumbhamudakasya pūrayitvā adhiṣṭhānaṃ gatā prasthitā/
S01divyav_u:7108: sā ca dārikā tasmādudyānāt tasya sumatermāṇavasyābhimukhamāgatā/
S01divyav_u:7110: 154.005 yatastāni sumatirdṛṣṭvā tasyā dārikāyāḥ kathayati--prayaccha mamaitāni padmāni/
S01divyav_u:7112: sā dārikā tasya sumateḥ kathayati--tadā necchasi māṃ pratigṛhītum/
S01divyav_u:7119: yadi tvameṣāṃ padmānāṃ pradānaphalena mamāpi jātyāṃ jātyāṃ patnīmicchasi,
S01divyav_u:7120: asya dānasya pradānakāle yadyevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ karoṣi--jātyāṃ jātyāṃ mama bhāryā syāditi/
S01divyav_u:7121: 154.011 sumatirāha--vayaṃ dānābhiratāḥ svagarbharūpaparityāgaṃ svamāṃsaparityāgaṃ ca kurmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7122: 154.012 tataḥ sā dārikā sumateḥ kathayati--tvamevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kuru,
S01divyav_u:7125: 154.013 evamukte tayā dārikayā tasya sumateḥ pañca padmānyanupradattāni,
S01divyav_u:7129: 154.016 tatra te 'haṃ bhavet patnī nityaṃ sahadharmacāriṇī//2//
S01divyav_u:7132: 154.020 sa ca rājā śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ gṛhītvā dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7134: evameva vāsavo rājā amātyaiḥ saha pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7135: dīpo rājā bhagavato buddhasya pādayor nipatya vijñāpayati--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:7138: 154.023 sa ca rājā dīpaḥ śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:7141: bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā ekaikaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ahaṃ bhagavataśchatraṃ dhārayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:7143: 154.026 tatra bhagavatā sābhisaṃskāra indrakīle pādo vyavasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7145: tadaiva samanantarakālaṃ pṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā--calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā,
S01divyav_u:7147: 154.028 dharmatā ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatām yadendrakīle sābhisaṃskāreṇa pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
S01divyav_u:7169: padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagurucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni mandāravāṇi puṣpāṇi kṣipanti,
S01divyav_u:7176: 155.009 tatra ca dīpāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi puṣpairdhūpairgandhaiśca kārāṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:7177: 155.010 te 'pi ca sumatiśca dārikā ca yena dīpaṃkaraḥ samyaksambuddhastenānugacchanti padmāni gṛhya/
S01divyav_u:7178: 155.011 te ca tatra mahājanakāyena pūjārthaṃ saṃparivṛtasya bhagavata upaśleṣaṃ na labhante/
S01divyav_u:7179: 155.012 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--bahutaraṃ sumatirmāṇavo 'smānmahājanakāyāt puṇyaprasavaṃ kariṣyati iti/
S01divyav_u:7182: labdhāvakāśaśca sumatirmāṇavo bhagavantamasecanakadarśanaṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva prasādajātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7183: 155.015 prasādajātena ca tāni pañca padmāni bhagavataḥ kṣiptāni/
S01divyav_u:7184: 155.016 tāni ca bhagavatā dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena tathā adhiṣṭhitāni,
S01divyav_u:7188: 155.018 tathā dṛṣṭvā tayā dārikayā prasādajātayā dvau padmau bhagavataḥ kṣiptau/
S01divyav_u:7189: tau cāpi bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitau yathā śakaṭīcakramātrau karṇasamīpe vitānaṃ baddhvā vyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:7190: 155.019 tatra ca pradeśe tumulena vātavarṣeṇa kardamo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7191: 155.020 paścāt sumatirmāṇavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ sakardamaṃ pṛthivīpradeśamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7192: 155.021 tasmin sakardame pṛthivīpradeśe jātaṃ saṃtīrya bhagavato bhagavataḥ purato gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:7195: 155.024 tatastena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena samyaksambuddhena tasya sumatermāṇavasya jaṭāsu pādau vyavasthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:7196: 155.025 tasya ca sumateḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubuddha eva matirmāṇavastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:7198: anena dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhenāsya sumatermāṇavasya tiraścām yathā padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7199: 155.027 paścāt dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena sumatirmāṇavo vyākṛtah--bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ nṛbhavādvimukto mukto vimurlokahitāya śāstā/
S01divyav_u:7200: 155.030 śākyātmajaḥ śākyamunīti nāṃnā trilokasāro jagataḥ pradīpaḥ//4//
S01divyav_u:7201: 156.001 [156]yadā ca sa sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7206: dṛṣṭvā ca praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yadā anenānuttarajñānamadhigataṃ tadāsya vayaṃ śrāvakā bhavema/
S01divyav_u:7211: 156.008 śrāvikā te bhaviṣyāmi tasmin kāla upasthite//6//
S01divyav_u:7212: 156.009 khagasthaṃ māṇavaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrāṇi śatāni ca/
S01divyav_u:7216: 156.013 yadā ca sumatirmāṇavo dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena vyākṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7224: tena rājñā teṣāṃ bhṛtyānāmekaiko vālo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7225: 156.017 tairamātyaiḥ svake vijite gatvā caityāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni/
S01divyav_u:7227: tadā dīpena rājñā vāsavena ca rājñā tairanekaiśca naigamajānapadaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārito 'nāgataguṇāvekṣatayā/
S01divyav_u:7228: 156.019 tataḥ sa matirmāṇava ucyate--ahamanuttarasyāṃ samyaksambodhau vyākṛtah--tvayā kutra cittamutpāditam?
S01divyav_u:7231: tataḥ sa kathayati--yadā tava dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena padbhyāṃ jaṭā avaṣṭabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7232: tadā kupitena vāg niścāritā--dīpaṃkareṇa samyaksambuddhena śrotriyasya jaṭā tiraścām yathā padbhyāmavaṣṭabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7235: 156.024 tatastau sumatirmatiśca dīpaṃkarasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajitau/
S01divyav_u:7238: 156.026 sa ca sumatirmāṇavaścyutaḥ kālagatastuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7240: 156.028 bhagavānāha--yo 'sau vāsavo rājābhūt tena kālena tena samayena,
S01divyav_u:7242: 156.029 yāni tānyaśītiramātyasahasrāṇi tena kālena tena samayena,
S01divyav_u:7251: 157.001 [157]etaddvitīye 'saṃkhyeye asya ca dharmarucermama ca darśanam yadahaṃ saṃdhāya kathayāmi--cirasya dharmaruce,
S01divyav_u:7253_0: 157.003 tasmādapyārvāk tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka utpanno
S01divyav_u:7253_1: vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:7256: 157.006 sa ca kalatrasahāyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:7257: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7260: sa ca gṛhapatistāṃ patnīmevamāha--jāto 'smākam ṛṇadharo dhanaharaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7262: 157.009 sa ca vaṇiglokenāvṛto dūrataraṃ gato bhāṇḍamādāya/
S01divyav_u:7264: 157.010 sa ca dārakaḥ kālāntareṇa mahān saṃvṛtto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7270: sā ca mātā asya kleśairbādhyamānā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ kleśān vinodayeyam,
S01divyav_u:7273: yathā anenaiva me sārdhaṃ rogavinodakaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:7275: 157.016 tatastayā vṛddhayuvatī āhūya bhojayitvā dvis triḥ paścānnavena paṭenācchāditā/
S01divyav_u:7276: tasyāḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--kena kāryeṇaiva mamānuprasādādinā upakrameṇānupravṛttiṃ karoṣi?
S01divyav_u:7277: sā tasyā vṛddhāyā viśvastā bhūtvā evamāha--amba,
S01divyav_u:7281: yo 'bhyantara eva syānna ca śaṅkanīyo janasya/
S01divyav_u:7282: 157.019 vṛddhā kathayati--neha gṛhe tathāvidho manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
S01divyav_u:7285: 157.021 katamaḥ sa manuṣyo bhaviṣyati yasyāhaṃ vakṣyāmi?
S01divyav_u:7286: tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī tasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--yadyanyo manuṣya evaṃvidhopakramayukto nāsti,
S01divyav_u:7289: 157.023 tasyāstayā vṛddhayā abhihitam--kathaṃ nu putreṇa sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ gamiṣyasi?
S01divyav_u:7291: 157.024 tataḥ sā vaṇikpatnī kathayati--yadyanyo 'bhyantaro manuṣyo na saṃvidyate,
S01divyav_u:7294: 157.026 tataḥ sā vṛddhayuvatī tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasyaivāgamya pṛcchati--vatsa,
S01divyav_u:7298: tataḥ sā vṛddhā kathayati--bhavānevamabhirūpaśca yuvā ca asmin vayasi taruṇayuvatyā sārdhaṃ śobhethāḥ krīḍan raman paricārayan/
S01divyav_u:7301: 157.030 tataḥ sā vṛddhā evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tasya dārakasya kathayati--taruṇayuvatistavārthe kleśairbādhyate/
S01divyav_u:7302: 157.031 sa vaṇigdārako dvirapi trirapyucyamānastasyā vṛddhāyāḥ kathayati--amba,
S01divyav_u:7304: tatah [158]sā vṛddhā kathayati--uktaṃ tasyā mayā tannimittam/
S01divyav_u:7306: sā ca dārikā hīvyapatrāpyagṛhītā na kiṃcidvakṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7308: na tvayā tasyā vā anveṣaṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7309: 158.003 tatastena vaṇigdārakeṇa tasyā vṛddhāyā abhihitam--kutrāsmākaṃ saṃgataṃ bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:7313: 158.005 sā ca vṛddhā tasyā vaṇikpatnyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--icchāpitaḥ sa vo 'yaṃ dārakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7316: 158.007 sa ca dārakaḥ kāryāṇi kṛtvā gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7320: sa dārako labdhānujñastasyā vṛddhāyā gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7321: 158.009 tasya dārakasya tasmin gṛhe gatasya ratikrīḍākālamāgamayamānasya tiṣṭhato niśikālamapratyabhijñātam/
S01divyav_u:7322: 158.010 rūpe kāle sā mātā asya vaṇigdārakasya tasminneva gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavanārthaṃ tatraiva gatā/
S01divyav_u:7323: 158.011 gatvā ca tasmin gṛhe vikālamavyaktiṃ vibhāvyamāne rūpākṛtau nirgūḍhenopacārakrameṇa ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhavituṃ pravṛttā pāpakenāsaddharmeṇa/
S01divyav_u:7324: 158.013 sā ca parikṣīṇāyāṃ rātrau anubhūtaratikrīḍā satamondhakāre kālāyāmeva rajanyāmavibhāvyamānarūpākṛtau svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:7325: 158.014 sa cāpi vaṇigdārako ratikrīḍāmanubhūya prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhāṇḍāvāriṃ gatvā kuṭumbakāryāṇi karoti/
S01divyav_u:7327_0: tatra vṛddhāyā gṛhe ratikrīḍāmanubhavaṃśca cirakālamevaṃ vartamānena ratikrīḍākrameṇa
S01divyav_u:7330_0: 158.019 iti saṃcintya tatraiva vṛddhāgṛhe gatvā ratikrīḍāṃ putreṇa sārdhamanubhūya
S01divyav_u:7330_1: rajanyāḥ kṣaye satamondhakārakāle tasya dārakasyoparimaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ nivasyātmanīyāṃ
S01divyav_u:7331: 158.021 sa ca dārakaḥ prabhāakāle tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ śirasi mañcasyāvatiṣṭhantīṃ saṃpaśyati/
S01divyav_u:7332: 158.022 ātmīyāmevopariprāvaraṇapotrīmalabhamānastatraiva tāṃ paṭṭikāṃ saṃlakṣya tyaktvā bhāṇḍāvārīṃ gatvā yugalamanyaṃ prāvṛtya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7333: 158.023 tatra ca gataḥ saṃpaśyati tamevātmīyaṃ pravaraṇaṃ tasyā mātuḥ śirasi prāvṛtam/
S01divyav_u:7337: evaṃ cirakālaṃ tava mayā sārdhaṃ kāmān paribhuñjato 'dyāpyahaṃ tava saivāmbā?
S01divyav_u:7338: yataḥ sa vaṇigdārakastathāvidhaṃ mātṛvacanamupaśrutya saṃmūḍho vihvalacetā bhūmau nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7340: sa jalapariṣekāvasikto dārakaścireṇa kālena pratyāgataprāṇastayā mātrā samāśvāsyate--kimevaṃ khedamupāgatastvam?
S01divyav_u:7343: sa dārakastasyāḥ kathayati--kathamahaṃ khedaṃ na kariṣyāmi saṃmohaṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:7344: yena mayā evaṃvidhaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtam?
S01divyav_u:7345: tataḥ sa tayābhihitah--na te manaḥśūkaṃsdminnarthe utpādayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:7354: na ca tīryaṃ putrasya snāyato doṣakārakaṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:7356: api ca pratyanteṣu janapadeṣu dharmataivaiṣā yasyāmeva pitā asaddharmeṇābhigacchati,
S01divyav_u:7358: 159.004 evamasau vaṇigdārako mātrā bahuvidhairanunayavacanairvinītaśokastayā mātrā tasmin pātake 'saddharme punaḥ punaratīva saṃjātarāgaḥ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7362: sā vaṇikpatnī tathāvidhaṃ lekhārthaṃ śrutvā vaimanasyajātā cintayituṃ pravṛttā--mahāntaṃ kālaṃ mama tasyāgamanamudīkṣamāṇāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7364: 159.008 idānīṃ mayā evaṃvidhenopakrameṇa putraṃ ca paricaritvā sa cāgamiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7365: ka upāyaḥ syāt yadahaṃ tamihāsamprāptameva jīvitāt vyaparopayeyam?
S01divyav_u:7366: iti saṃcintya taṃ putramāhūya kathayati--pitrā te lekhyo 'nupreṣitah āgamiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:7370: yadā asau na prasahate pitṛvadhaṃ kartum,
S01divyav_u:7371: tadā tayā mātrā bhūyo 'nuvṛttivacanairabhihitah--tasyānuvṛttivacanairucyamānasya kāmeṣu saṃraktasyādhyavasāyo jātaḥ pitṛvadhaṃ prati/
S01divyav_u:7372: 159.013 kāmān khalu pratisevato na hi kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti vadāmi/
S01divyav_u:7375: 159.015 ityuktvā viṣamādāya samitāyāṃ miśrayitvā maṇḍilakān paktvā anye 'pi ca nirviṣāḥ paktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7378: gṛhya pitṛsakāśaṃ gatvā ca tasya viśvastasyaikatra bhuñjata etān saviṣān maṇḍilakān prayacchasva,
S01divyav_u:7380: 159.018 tataḥ sa dārakastena lekhavāhikamanuṣyeṇa sārdhaṃ tān maṇḍilakān gṛhya gataḥ pitṛsakāśam/
S01divyav_u:7381: 159.019 āgamya pitā asya atīva taṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā abhirūpaprāsādikaṃ maheśākhyaṃ prāmodyaṃ prāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7382: 159.020 sahyāsahyaṃ pṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ vaṇijāmākhyāti--ayaṃ bhavanto 'smākaṃ putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:7383: 159.021 yadā tena dārakeṇa saṃlakṣitaṃ sarvatra ahamanena pitrā pratisaṃvedita iti,
S01divyav_u:7387: paścāttena pitrā sārdhamekaphalāyāṃ bhuñjatā tasya pituḥ saviṣā maṇḍilakā dattāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7389: 159.024 yato 'sya pitā tān saviṣān maṇḍilakān bhakṣayitvā bhṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7390: 159.025 tasya ca pituḥ kāladharmaṇā yuktasya ca dārako na kenacit pāpakaṃ karma kurvāṇo 'bhiśaṅkito vā pratisaṃvedito vā/
S01divyav_u:7391: 159.026 paścāttairiṣṭasnigdhasuhṛdbhirvaṇigbhiḥ śocayitvā yattattu kiṃcittasya vaṇijo bhaṇḍamāsīddhiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:7393: 159.028 sa dārakastaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ gṛhya svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7394: 159.029 tasya ca gatasya svagṛhaṃ sā mātā pracchannāsaddharmeṇa taṃ putraṃ paricaramāṇā ratiṃ nādhigacchati,
S01divyav_u:7395: anabhiratarūpā ca taṃ putraṃ vadati--kiyatkālaṃ vayamevaṃ pracchannena krameṇa ratikrīḍāmanubhaviṣyāmah?
S01divyav_u:7396: yannu vayamasmāddeśādanyadeśāntaraṃ gatvā prakāśakrameṇa niḥśaṅkā bhūtvā jāyāpatīti vikhyātadharmāṇaḥ sukhaṃ prativasema/
S01divyav_u:7397: 159.032 tatastau gṛhaṃ tyaktvā [160]mitrasvajanasambandhivargānapahāya purāṇadāsīdāsakarmakarāṃstyaktvā yāvadarthajātaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ca gṛhya anyaviṣayāntaraṃ gatau/
S01divyav_u:7398: 160.002 tatra gatvā janapadeṣu vikhyāpayamānau jāyāpatikamiti ratikrīḍāmanubhavamānau vyavasthitau/
S01divyav_u:7399: 160.003 yāvadarhan bhikṣuḥ kenacit kālāntareṇa janapadacārikāṃ caraṃs tamadhiṣṭhānamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7400: 160.004 tena tatra piṇḍapātamanvāhiṇḍatā vīthyāṃ niṣadya ayaṃ vaṇigdharmaṇā saṃvyavahāramāṇaḥ sa dārako dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7402: sa ca dārakastamarhantaṃ tathā abhivadamānamupaśrutya saṃbhinnacetāḥ svena duścaritena karmaṇā śaṅkitamanāścintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7405: eṣa sa ihādhiṣṭhāne pratisaṃvedayiṣyati eṣā asya dārakasya māteti/
S01divyav_u:7408: tatastayoḥ saṃcintya taṃ gṛhamenamupanimantrayitvā bhuñjānaṃ ghātayāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7410: 160.011 sa dārako gūḍhaśastro bhūtvā arhantaṃ bhojayituṃ mātrā saha nirjanaṃ gṛhaṃ kṛtvā sa cārhadbhikṣubhuktvā tasmādgṛhādviśrabdhacārakrameṇa pratinirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7415: 160.015 tasya dārakasya sā mātā taṃ putramasaddharmeṇānuvartamānā tasminnevādhiṣṭhāne śreṣṭhiputreṇa sārdhaṃ pracchannakāmā asaddharmeṣu saktacittā jātā/
S01divyav_u:7419: 160.018 sā ca tasmiñ śreṣṭhiputre saṃraktacittā dvirapi trirapyucyamānā na nirvartate/
S01divyav_u:7420: tatastena niṣkoṣamāsiṃ kṛtvā sā mātā jīvitādvyaparopitā/
S01divyav_u:7425: 160.022 sa yadā nirvāsitastasmādadhiṣṭhānāt tadā cintayituṃ pravṛttah--asti cāsya buddhaśāsane kaścidevānunayah?
S01divyav_u:7428: 160.024 sa ca vihāraṃ gatvā bhikṣusakāśamupasaṃkramya evaṃ kathayati--ārya,
S01divyav_u:7437: 160.028 tatastena bhikṣuṇā abhihitah--ekaikena eṣāṃ karmāṇāmācaraṇānna pravrajyārho bhavasi,
S01divyav_u:7441: 160.030 tataḥ sa puruṣo 'nyasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--ārya pravrajeyam/
S01divyav_u:7446: sa yadā [161]dvirapi trirapi pravrajyāmāyācamāno 'pi bhikṣubhir na pravrājitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7447: tadā amarṣajātaścintayituṃ pravṛttah--yā api sarvasādhāraṇā pravrajyā,
S01divyav_u:7450: 161.003 tasmin vihāre 'gniṃ datvā anyatra vihāraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7454: 161.005 tatrāpi vihāre bahavo bhikṣavaḥ śaikṣāśaikṣāśca dagdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7455: 161.006 evaṃ tasyānekān vihārān dahataḥ sarvatra śabdo visṛtah--evaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī puruṣo bhikṣubhyaḥ pravrajyāmalabhan vihārān bhikṣūṃśca dahatīti/
S01divyav_u:7457: 161.008 tatra ca vihāre bodhisattvajātīyo bhikṣuḥ prativasati tṛpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7458: tena śrutaṃ sa evaṃ duṣkarakarmakārī puruṣa ihāgacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:7459: 161.009 yataḥ sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasyāsamprāptasyaiva tasmin vihāre pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7460: 161.010 sa taṃ puruṣaṃ sametya kathayati--bhadramukha, kimetat?
S01divyav_u:7465: 161.012 paścāt tena bhikṣuṇā tasya puruṣasya śiro muṇḍāpayitvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni/
S01divyav_u:7468: tatastena bhikṣuṇā uktah--kiṃ te śikṣāpadaiḥ prayojanam?
S01divyav_u:7472: 161.015 paścāt sa bhikṣustasya puruṣasya dharmadeśanāmārabdhaḥ kartum--tvamevaṃvidhaścaivaṃvidhaśca pāpakarmakārī sattvo yadi kadācidbuddhaśabdaṃ śṛṇoṣi,
S01divyav_u:7478: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:7485: 161.021 yāvacca mayā bhikṣavastribhirasaṃkhyeyaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiranyaiśca duṣkaraśatasahasrairanuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ samudānītā,
S01divyav_u:7492: 162.002 buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:7493: rājagṛhe nagare subhadro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7496: 162.004 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:7497: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:7498: 162.005 bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:7499: 162.006 rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caran yena subhadrasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7501: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmādāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7510: 162.011 tena bhagavataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūro dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7515: gacchāmi, paśyāmi kiṃ śramaṇena gautamena vyākṛtamiti/
S01divyav_u:7519: ārya, mayā tasya patnī darśitā--kiṃ janayiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:7524: 162.017 sa bhūriko gaṇitre kṛtāvī śvetavarṇāṃ gṛhītvā gaṇayitumārabdhah--paśyati yathā bhagavatā vyākṛtaṃ tatsarvaṃ tathaiva/
S01divyav_u:7527: 162.020 tadatra kiṃcid saṃvarṇayitavyaṃ kiṃcit vivarṇayitavyamiti viditvā hastau saṃparivartayati,
S01divyav_u:7533: 162.023 ārya, kiṃ satyaṃ kiṃ vā mṛṣā?
S01divyav_u:7538: mandabhāgyaḥ sa sattvo jātamātra evāgninā kulaṃ dhakṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7539: 162.025 yat kathayati--divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti, idaṃ mṛṣā/
S01divyav_u:7540: 162.026 gehapate, asti kaścit tvayā dṛṣṭo manuṣyabhūto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhavan?
S01divyav_u:7543: 162.027 yadā asya na bhaktaṃ na vastram,
S01divyav_u:7554: subhadraḥ saṃlakṣayati--sarvathā parityājyo 'sau iti viditvā sa bhaiṣajyaṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7561: asthānametadanavakāśo yaccaramabhavikaḥ sattvo 'ntarāducchidya kālaṃ kariṣyati aprāpte āśravakṣaye/
S01divyav_u:7571: sā tenāraṇyaṃ nītvā tathopakrāntā yathā kālagatā/
S01divyav_u:7572: sa tāṃ pracchannaṃ gṛhamānīya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāṃ prātiveśakānāṃ ca kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7575: sā tairvikrośadbhir nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:7576: 163.010 nirgranthaiḥ śrutam--te hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditāśchatrapatākā ucchrayitvā rājagṛhasya nagarasya rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭake upāhiṇḍamānā ārocayanti--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7577: 163.012 śramaṇena gautamena subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:7585_0: 163.016 dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānāmekārakṣāṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:7586: daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trirdivasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate--ko hīyate,
S01divyav_u:7603: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:7604: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
S01divyav_u:7607_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ
S01divyav_u:7607_1: nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhavamutpalaṃ padma [164]mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
S01divyav_u:7609: 164.002 teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7612: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7616: 164.005 te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya tannarakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:7624: 164.016 atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:7632: 164.028 tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:7635: 165.003 yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti nāthāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//7//iti/
S01divyav_u:7637: nāhetupratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:7640: 165.007 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantum,
S01divyav_u:7642: 165.008 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhikṣūṇāmārocayati--tathāgata āyuṣmantaḥ śmaśānacārikāṃ gantukāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7643: 165.009 yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ śmaśānacārikaṃ gantum,
S01divyav_u:7645: 165.010 evamāyuṣmanniti te bhikṣavaḥ sarve saṃśrutya bhagavatsakāśamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7646_0: 165.011 atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra
S01divyav_u:7646_1: āśvasta āśvāstaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhannarhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ
S01divyav_u:7646_2: prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gajarāja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:7646_3: siṃha iva daṃṣṭagaṇaparivṛto haṃsarāja iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suparṇīva parikṣagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:7646_4: vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ suvaidya ivāturagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:7646_5: deśika ivādhvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ
S01divyav_u:7647_0: nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto
S01divyav_u:7647_1: virūḍhaka iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto brahmeva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ
S01divyav_u:7647_2: sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntairindrayairasaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro dvātriṃśatā
S01divyav_u:7648_1: sūryasahasrātirekaprabho jaṅgama iva ratnaparvataḥ samantato bhadrako daśabhirbalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaistribhirāveṇikaiḥ
S01divyav_u:7648_3: parivṛto 'nyena ca mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena anekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ śītavanaṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S01divyav_u:7649: 165.026 aṣṭādaśānuśaṃsā buddhacārikāyāmityanekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni/
S01divyav_u:7651: 165.028 rājagṛhāt dvau bāladārakau brāhmaṇadārakaḥ kṣatriyadārakaśca bahir nirgatya krīḍataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7654: bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:7658: 165.032 sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nirhṛtā--mā haiva bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
S01divyav_u:7660: 166.001 [166]sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
S01divyav_u:7661: 166.003 mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//8//iti
S01divyav_u:7672: 166.012 yathā hyamī śītavanonmukhotsukāḥ pravānti vātā himapaṅkaśītalāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7673: 166.014 prayānti nūnaṃ bahavo divaukaso nirīkṣituṃ śākyamunervikurvitam//10//iti/
S01divyav_u:7674: 166.016 rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutam--bhagavatā subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnī vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:7678: 166.018 sā ca mṛtā kālagatā śītavanaṃ śmaśānamabhinirhṛtā/
S01divyav_u:7680: 166.019 śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--na bhagavān nirarthakaṃ śītavanaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:7681: 166.020 nūnaṃ bhagavān subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ patnīmāgamya mahadvineyakāryaṃ kartukāmo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7684: 166.022 adrākṣīt sa kṣatriyakumārako rājānaṃ māgadhaśreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:7686: 166.024 yathā hi śreṇyo magadhādhipo hyayaṃ viniryayau rājagṛhāt sabāndhavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7687: 166.026 pravartate me hṛdi niścitā matirmahājanasyābhyudayo bhaviṣyati//11//iti/
S01divyav_u:7690: 166.029 nirgrantha bhagavantaṃ smitonmukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayanti--yathā śramaṇo gautamaḥ smitonmukho mahājanamadhyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7693: nanvayaṃ sattvo mandabhāgyo na kālagata iti/
S01divyav_u:7700: tasyāḥ sarvaḥ kāyo dagdhaḥ sthāpayitvā kukṣisāmantakam/
S01divyav_u:7703: tasya coparipadmakarṇikāyāṃ kumāro niṣaṇṇo 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7704: 167.004 taṃ dṛṣṭvā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi paraṃ vismayamupagatāni/
S01divyav_u:7714: tatra bhagavāñ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate--gṛhāṇa jīvaka kumārakamiti/
S01divyav_u:7722: sa kathayati--rājakule 'haṃ bhadanta jāto rājakule vṛddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7724: 167.017 tatra bhagavān subhadraṃ gṛhapatimāmantrayate--gṛhāṇedānīṃ gṛhapate kumāramiti/
S01divyav_u:7729: ayaṃ sattvo 'tīva mandabhāgyo yo hi nāma sarvabhakṣeṇāpyagninā na dagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7730: 167.020 kiṃ bahunā? yadyevaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayasi, nīyatām/
S01divyav_u:7735: 167.022 tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ bimbisāramāmantayate--gṛhāṇa mahārāja kumāramiti/
S01divyav_u:7738: kiṃ bhavatu asya dārakasya jyotiṣka iti nāmeti/
S01divyav_u:7740: tato bhagavatā tasya janakāyasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:7754: 167.031 yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:7755_0: 167.032 jyotiṣko dārako rājñā bimbisāreṇa aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto [168]dvābhyāsaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ
S01divyav_u:7755_1: dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhāgtrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām /
S01divyav_u:7756: 168.002 so 'ṣṭhābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:7759: tena śrutam yathā mama bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:7765: 168.007 tena śrutam yathā sā asmākaṃ bhaginī kālagateti/
S01divyav_u:7766: 168.008 śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--bhagavatā asau vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:7770: 168.010 mā haiva tabhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāt/
S01divyav_u:7771: tena tiraḥprātiveśyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--śrutaṃ mayā asmākaṃ bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:7778: 168.014 mā haiva bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
S01divyav_u:7780: 168.015 sacandratāraṃ prapatedihāmbaraṃ mahī saśailā savanā nabho vrajet/
S01divyav_u:7781: 168.017 mahodadhīnāmudakaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajenmaharṣayaḥ syūr na mṛṣābhidhāyinaḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:7784: kiṃ tu tena svāmināpi asau tathā tathā upakrāntā,
S01divyav_u:7789: sa subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--na yuktaṃ gṛhapate tvayā kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:7790: 168.022 kiṃ kṛtam? asmākaṃ sattvavatī bhaginī tvayā nirgranthavigrāhitena tathā tathā upakrāntā,
S01divyav_u:7801: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
S01divyav_u:7807: nūnamevaṃ karomīti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:7808: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:7812: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
S01divyav_u:7818: na mayā tvatsakāśāt jyotiṣkaḥ kumāro gṛhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:7824: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam/
S01divyav_u:7834: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--yadi subhadro jyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:7835: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:7838: evaṃ ca vada--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:7839: 169.010 yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:7840: sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:7841: 169.012 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā bimbisārastenopasaṃskrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7843: kathayati ca--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
S01divyav_u:7844: 169.014 yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,
S01divyav_u:7845: sthānametadvidyate yat subhadro gṛhapatiruṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣye/
S01divyav_u:7853: yadi māṃ divase divase triṣkālaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatīti/
S01divyav_u:7856: sa rājñā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā hastiskandha āropya visarjitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:7857: 169.022 ācaritametallokasya--na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat pitā jīvati/
S01divyav_u:7861: 169.024 buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:7862: tena yasmin pradeśe tena subhadreṇa patnī āghātitā,
S01divyav_u:7864: 169.026 tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānta upanibaddham--bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati mṛditakukṣike dāva iti//
S01divyav_u:7865: 169.028 subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ pauruṣeyā ye paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:7868: sa buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasanno buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:7872: 169.032 ghaṇḍāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--nedaṃ kenacit viṣṭayā vā [170]śītayā vā karkaṭakena vā gṛhītavyam/
S01divyav_u:7873: 170.001 ya etacchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā maharddhiko vā mahānubhāvah ṛddhyā gṛhṇāti,
S01divyav_u:7883: yāvat sthavirasthavirā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7888: uktaṃ bhagavatā--pracchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ dhūtapāpairityuktvā prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:7893: 170.010 āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yena mayā anādikālopacitaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ tyaktaṃ charditaṃ pratinisṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:7909: api tu catvāri pātrāṇi suvarṇamayaṃ rūpyamayaṃ varḍūryamayaṃ sphaṭikamayam/
S01divyav_u:7910: 170.018 aparāṇyapi catvāri pātrāṇi rītimayaṃ tāmramayaṃ kaṃsamayamabhramayaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:7917: 170.022 api tvadhīṣṭāni te dve pātre āyasaṃ mṛṇmayam/
S01divyav_u:7918: yāvadapareṇa samayena jyotiṣkasya gṛhapaterdivyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā/
S01divyav_u:7919: 170.023 antarā ca rājagṛhamantarā ca campāmatrāntare śulkaśālā/
S01divyav_u:7922: tena putrāṇāṃ svapnadarśanaṃ dattam--yaḥ kaścit paṇyamaśulkayitvā gamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:7923: sā ghaṇṭā tāvadviraviṣyati yāvadasau nivartya śulkaṃ dāpayitavyamiti (yiṣyatīti?)/
S01divyav_u:7924: 170.027 taistaṃ svapnaṃ saṃbandhibāndhavānāṃ nivedya divasatithimuhūrtena tasmin pradeśe yakṣasthānaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:7928: sā brāhmaṇī saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ brāhmaṇo yaistairupāyairdhanopārjanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:7942: so 'pattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṃ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7955: 171.010 sārthikā avadhyātumārabdhāh--kim yūyamasamān bhūṣitukāmā yena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pratinivartayadhvamiti?
S01divyav_u:7959: 171.012 anyeṣāṃ gacchatāṃ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:7969: 171.016 kiṃ tu devasyaiva sānnidhyaṃ jñātaṃ bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:7976: brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--yūyaṃ kathayatha śulkaṃ na dāpayāma iti/
S01divyav_u:7980: 171.020 api devasyaitat sānnidhyamiti kṛtvā asmābhiḥ prāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7982: 171.021 sa taṃ punargṛhītvā punaśchatranāḍikāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:7985: tatrāpi tāṃ na kaścit kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa yācate/
S01divyav_u:7987: jyotiṣkaśca kumāro rājakulānniṣkramya hastiskandhābhirūḍho vīthīmadhyena svagṛhaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:8018: sa brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasannaḥ kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:8027: jyotiṣkeṇa tato yaḥ paribhuktakaḥ sa dārakāya dattaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8030: 172.007 jyotiṣkasya sa snānaśāṭaka upari gṛhasyābhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunā hriyamāṇo rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8035: śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitam/
S01divyav_u:8039: jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:8046: tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:8098: kiṃ tu devasya kāṣṭhadhūmena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni,
S01divyav_u:8100: 173.001 rājā tatra divyamānuṣyā śriyā upacaryamāṇaḥ pramatto na niṣkrāṃti/
S01divyav_u:8109: na śaknoṣi tvamekaṃ divasaṃ rājyaṃ kārayitum?
S01divyav_u:8112: 173.006 rājā jyotiṣkasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya kathayati--kumāra satyam?
S01divyav_u:8116: deva, puṣpāṇāṃ saṃkocavikāsānmaṇīnāṃ jvalanājvalanayogācchakunīnāṃ ca kūjanākūjanāt/
S01divyav_u:8117: 173.009 santi tāni puṣpāṇi yāni rātrau vikasanti,
S01divyav_u:8119: santi yāni divā vikasanti rātrau mlāyanti?
S01divyav_u:8120: santi te maṇayo ye rātrau jvālanti, na divā?
S01divyav_u:8121: santi ye divā jvalanti, na rātrau?
S01divyav_u:8122: santi te śakunayo ye rātrau kūjanti, na divā?
S01divyav_u:8123: santi ye divā kūjñati, na rātrau?
S01divyav_u:8126: 173.013 yathā tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtastathaiva nānyathetyuktvā jyotiṣkagṛhāt niṣkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8127: 173.014 ajātaśatrukumāreṇa jyotiṣkasantako maṇirapahṛtya dārakasya haste dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8142: api tu yata eva tvayā gṛhītastatraiva gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8148: 173.021 yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8153: 173.024 sa saṃlakṣayati--yena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ praghātitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8168: 173.029 ajātaśatruḥ saṃlakṣayate--evamapi mayā na śakitaṃ jyotiṣkasya maṇīnapahartum/
S01divyav_u:8177: 174.001 teṣām yo yatrābhirūḍhaḥ sa tatraivāsthito yāvat prabhātā rajanī saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:8180: anena kalirājena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:8184: 174.004 ajātaśatruṇā jyotiṣkasay dūto 'nupreṣitah--muñcata mamāyaṃ khalīkāra saṃlakṣayate--yena nāma pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8185: sa māṃ na praghātayitṣyatīti kuta etat?
S01divyav_u:8186: sarvathā ahaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarthattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:8190: 174.009 atha jyotiṣko gṛhapatiḥ suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānavalokya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8191: 174.010 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8192: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavantamidamavocat--labheyāhāṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:8198: 174.016 ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8201_0: tenodyacchamānena vyāyacchamānena idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:8204: 174.025 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā jyotiṣkeṇa karma kṛtam yena citāmāropitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8210: na bhikṣavaḥ kārmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:8214: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:8216: 175.002 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//15//
S01divyav_u:8217_0: 175.003 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava ekanavatikalpe vipaśyī nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato
S01divyav_u:8218: 175.005 dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati sma bandhumatīyake dāve/
S01divyav_u:8219_0: 175.006 tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bandhumān nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
S01divyav_u:8219_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
S01divyav_u:8221: 175.009 tasyānaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatirāḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:8222: 175.010 sa saṃlakṣayate--bahuśo mayā vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'ntargṛhe upanimantraya bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8223: 175.011 na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8224: 175.012 yannvahaṃ vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravārayeyam/
S01divyav_u:8226: 175.013 upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8227: 175.014 ekāntaniṣaṇṇamanaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vipaśyī samyakasmbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:8228: 175.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:8229_0: 175.016 athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:8229_1: praṇamya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhamidavocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃs traimāsīṃ
S01divyav_u:8231: athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8232: 175.021 aśrauṣīdbandhumān rājā--vipaśyī samyaksambuddho dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāro janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīmanuprāpto bandhumatyāṃ viharati bandhumatīye dāve iti/
S01divyav_u:8233: 175.023 śrutvā ca punarasyaitadabhavat--bahuśo mayā bhagavānantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8234: na tu kadācit traimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8237: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8238: 175.026 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ bandhumantaṃ rājānaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:8239: 175.027 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:8240_0: 175.028 atha bandhumān rājā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksambuddhastenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:8243: ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatirājñāsyati/
S01divyav_u:8246: 176.001 atha bandhumān rājā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena svaṃ nirveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8247: 176.003 bandhumān rājā anaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dūtena prakrośyedamavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāt--ahaṃ tvatprathamato vipaśyinaṃ samyakasmbuddhaṃ bhojayāmi,
S01divyav_u:8248: tataḥ paścāt tavāpi na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ bhojayitumiti/
S01divyav_u:8257: tathāpi yena pūrvanimantritaḥ sa eva bhojayati/
S01divyav_u:8263: tathā anaṅgaṇo gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:8264: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:8265: 176.012 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapaterbhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8267: 176.015 athānaṅgaṇo gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:8268_0: 176.016 anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:8268_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:8269: 176.018 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddho 'naṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:8270: 176.020 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8274: 176.022 tato bandhumān rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8276: kasmāt tvaṃ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
S01divyav_u:8278: kathamahaṃ na cintāparastiṣṭhāmi yo 'haṃ mama viṣayanivāsinaṃ kuṭumbinaṃ na śaknomi bhaktottarikayā parājayitum?
S01divyav_u:8284: bhavantaḥ, na kenacit madviṣayanivāsinā kāṣṭhaṃ vikretavyam/
S01divyav_u:8289: surabhiṇā gandhena sarvā bandhumatī nagarī sphuṭā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:8302: 177.002 tena cittaṃ pradūṣya kharā vāg niścārita--tāvanme bhaktakāṣṭhamasti,
S01divyav_u:8304: 177.003 rājā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8310: vayaṃ tathā kariṣyāmo yathā devaścānaṅgaṇaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parājayatīti/
S01divyav_u:8311_0: 177.006 tairaparasmin divase bandhumatī rājadhānī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyā vyavasthāpitā
S01divyav_u:8315: 177.011 tato bandhumān rājā dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8316: 177.012 tato vismayāvarjitacittasaṃtatirvipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:8317: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:8318: 177.014 atha vipaśyī samyaksambuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena bandhumato rājño bhaktābhisārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8320: 177.017 bandhumato rājño maṅgalyābhiṣeko hastināgo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:8322: 177.018 bandhumato rājño 'gramahiṣī vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
S01divyav_u:8324: 177.020 anaṅgaṇena gṛhapatinā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:8325: paśya kīdṛśenāhāreṇa bandhumān rājā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayatīti/
S01divyav_u:8331: so 'pi tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ viṣādamāpannaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śakyamanyat saṃpādayitum/
S01divyav_u:8332: 177.024 kiṃ tu hastināmantaḥpurasya ca kuto mama vibhavah?
S01divyav_u:8333: iti viditvā niveśanaṃ gato dauvārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:8343: iti viditvā kauśiko brāhmaṇaveṣamabhinirmāya yenānaṅgaṇasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8345: anaṅgaṇasya gṛhapateḥ kathaya--kauśikagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati bhavantaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:8347: gṛhapatinā ahaṃ sthāpitah--yaḥ kaścid yācanaka āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:8357: kauśikasagotro brāhmaṇo dvāre tiṣṭhati āryaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:8359: yena taysa prayojanaṃ tat prayaccha--kiṃ tenātra praviṣṭeneti?
S01divyav_u:8361: ukto mayā evaṃ kathayati--nāhaṃ kiṃcit prārthayāmi,
S01divyav_u:8365: 178.007 brāhmaṇaḥ kathayati--kasmāt tvaṃ gṛhapate kare kapolaṃ cintāparastiṣṭhasīti?
S01divyav_u:8367: 178.009 na tasya kathayecchokam yaḥ śokānna pramocayet/
S01divyav_u:8373: 178.012 atha śakro devendraḥ kauśikabrāhmaṇarūpamantardhāpy svarūpeṇa sthitvā kathayati--gṛhapate,
S01divyav_u:8374: viśvakarmā te devaputraḥ sāhāyyaṃ kalpayiṣyatītyuktvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8375: 178.013 atha śakro devendro devāṃstrāyastriṃśān gatvā viśvakarmāṇaṃ devaputramāmantrayate--gaccha,
S01divyav_u:8378: 178.015 paraṃ bhadraṃ tava kauśiketi viśvakarmaṇā devaputreṇa śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya āgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8381: 178.017 airāvaṇo nāgarājo vipaśyinaḥ samyaksambuddhasya śataśalākaṃ chatramupari mūrdhno dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:8383: 178.018 śacī devakanyā vipaśyinaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ sauvarṇena maṇivālavyajanena vījayati,
S01divyav_u:8385: 178.019 bandhumatā rājñā avacarakaḥ puruṣaḥ preṣitah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:8387: sa puruṣastatra gatastāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā tatraiva avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8392: tato bandhumān rājā svayameva taddvāraṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8403: tvamevaiko 'rhasi dine dine buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayituṃ na vayaṃtī/
S01divyav_u:8404_1: praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe
S01divyav_u:8405: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:8409: 179.001 [179]kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau anaṅgaṇo nāma gṛhapatiḥ,
S01divyav_u:8410: eṣa evāsau jyotiṣkaḥ kulaputrastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:8411: 179.002 yadanena bandhumato rājño dṛṣṭasatyasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā,
S01divyav_u:8412: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañcaśatāni samātṛkaścitāyāmāropya dhmāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8414: 179.004 yadvipaśyini tathāgate kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:8415: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8418: 179.006 ahamanena vipaśyinā samyaksambuddhena sārdhaṃ samajavaḥ samabalaḥ samadhuraḥ samasāmānyaprāptaḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8419: 179.007 iti hi bhikṣavah ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8422: 179.009 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:8431: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:8432_0: 180.002 satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhī
S01divyav_u:8433: 180.004 lābhī bhagavān prabhūtānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:8435_1: sa bhagavāṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:8436: 180.009 sa imaṃ sadevakaṃ lokaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamānuṣīṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya pravedayate/
S01divyav_u:8437: 180.011 sa dharmaṃ deśayati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
S01divyav_u:8438: 180.012 svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati/
S01divyav_u:8439_0: 180.013 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya
S01divyav_u:8439_1: phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:8443: 180.016 na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhet/
S01divyav_u:8444: 180.017 yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānante dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:8446: 180.019 utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:8448: 180.021 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani rājābhūt kanakavarṇo nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā suvarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8449: 180.022 rājā bhikṣavaḥ kanakavarṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8451: 180.024 rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya khalu bhikṣavaḥ kanakāvatī nāma rājadhānī babhūva pūrveṇa paścimena ca dvādaśa yojayānyāmena,
S01divyav_u:8452: dakṣiṇenottareṇa ca sapta yojanāni ca vistāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:8453: 180.026 ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca ramaṇīyā ca/
S01divyav_u:8455: 180.028 aṣṭādaśa kulakoṭī ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:8456: 180.029 saptapañcāśadgrāmakoṭya ṛddhāḥ sphītāḥ kṣemāḥ subhikṣā ramaṇīyā mahājanākīrṇamanuṣyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8457: 180.030 ṣaṣṭiḥ karvaṭasahasrāṇyabhūvann ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:8462: 181.001 [181]athāpareṇa samayena rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisamlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparivitarkamudapādi--yannvahaṃ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkānagulmān muñceyam/
S01divyav_u:8464: 181.003 atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapariṣadyānāmantrayate--adyāgreṇa vo grāmaṇyaḥ sarvavaṇijo 'śulkān muñcāmi,
S01divyav_u:8466: 181.005 tasyānenopāyena bahūni varṣāṇi rājyaṃ kārayato 'pareṇa samayena nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
S01divyav_u:8468: 181.006 atha brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇajñā naimittikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacariteṣu tat saṃlakṣayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8470: 181.008 apasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocan--yatkhalu devo jānīyāt--nakṣatraṃ viṣamībhūtam,
S01divyav_u:8472: 181.009 atha rājā kanakavarṇa idamevamrūpaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā aśrūṇi pravartayati--aho bata me jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8473: aho bata me jambudvīpah ṛddhaḥ sphītaḥ kṣemaḥ subhikṣo ramaṇīyo bahujanākīrṇamanuṣyo nacirādeva śūnyo bhaviṣyati rahitamanuṣyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8474: 181.012 atha rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya muhūrtaṃ śocitvā etadabhavat--ya ime āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8482: 181.016 ekaṃ koṣṭhāgāraṃ kārayitvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ pratyarpayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:8487: 181.019 paraṃ deveti gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ gaṇayanti,
S01divyav_u:8490: 181.021 ekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sthāpayitvā yena rājā kanakavarṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8492: 181.022 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamidamavocat--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvagrāmanagaranigamakarvaṭarājadhānīṣvannādyaṃ saṃhṛtam,
S01divyav_u:8495: māpayitvā sarvagrāmanagaranigamarājadhānīṣvekasmin koṣṭhāgāre sathāpitam yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:8496: 181.025 atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyānāmantrayitvā etadavocat--gacchata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8498: gaṇayitvā grāmaṇyaḥ sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prayacchata/
S01divyav_u:8499: 181.027 paraṃ deveti saṃkhyāgaṇakalipikapauruṣeyā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pratiśrutya sarvajāmbudvīpakān manuṣyān gaṇayanti,
S01divyav_u:8500: saṃgaṇya rājānaṃ kanakavarṇamādau kṛtvā sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ samaṃ bhaktaṃ prajñapayanti/
S01divyav_u:8503: nirgato dvādaśasya varṣasyaiko māso yāvadbahavaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jighatsitāḥ pipāsitāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:8504: 181.031 ten khalu punaḥ samayena sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇamanyatra rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaikā mānikā bhaktasyāvaśiṣṭā//
S01divyav_u:8505: 182.001 [182]tena khalu samayena anyatamaścatvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito bodhisattva imāṃ sahālokadhātumanuprāpto babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8506: 182.002 adrākṣīd bodhisattvo 'nyatarasmin banaṣaṇḍe putraṃ mātrā sārdhaṃ vipratipadyamanam/
S01divyav_u:8509: yatra hi nāma asyāmeva nava māsān kukṣau uṣitvā,
S01divyav_u:8513: 182.006 ka utsahata īdṛśānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritum?
S01divyav_u:8517: paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharati yadutedaṃ rūpam,
S01divyav_u:8526: 182.011 sa evaṃ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣūdayavyayānudarśī viharannacirādeva yatkiṃcit samudayadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakamiti viditvā tatraiva pratyekāṃ bodhimadhigatavān/
S01divyav_u:8527: 182.013 atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho yathāprāptānavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:8528: 182.014 saṃsevamānasya bhavanti snehāḥ snehānvayaṃ saṃbhavatīha duḥkham/
S01divyav_u:8530: 182.018 atha tasya bhagavataḥ pratyekabuddhasyaitadabhavat--bahūnāṃ me sattvānāmarthāya duṣkarāṇi cīrṇāni,
S01divyav_u:8531: na ca kasyacit sattvasya hitaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:8534_0: atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa sarvāvantamimaṃ
S01divyav_u:8534_1: jambudvīpaṃ samantādanuvilokayannadrākṣīt sa bhagavān pratyekabuddhaḥ sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam,
S01divyav_u:8537: 182.023 yannvahaṃ rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya niveśanāt piṇḍapātamahṛtya paribhuñjīya/
S01divyav_u:8538: 182.024 atha bhagavān pratyekabuddhastat eva ṛddhyā vihāyasamabhyudgamya dṛśyatā kāyena śakuniriva ṛddhyā yena kanakāvatī rājadhānī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8539: 182.025 tena khalu samayena rājā kanakavarṇa upariprāsādatalagato 'bhūt pañcamātrairamātyasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8540: 182.026 adrākṣīdanyatamo mahāmātrastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
S01divyav_u:8543: dvitīyo mahāmātra evamāha--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8546: 182.030 atha rājā kanakavarṇa ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ mukhaṃ saṃparimārjya mahāmātrānāmantrayate--naiṣa grāmaṇyo lohitapakṣaḥ śakuntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8549: 182.032 atha sa bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya prāsāde pratyaṣṭhāt//
S01divyav_u:8550: 183.001 [183]atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamutthāyāsanāt pratyudgamya pādau śirasā vanditvā prajñapta evāsane niṣīdayati/
S01divyav_u:8551: 183.002 atha rājā kanakavarṇastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyekabuddhamidamavocat--kimartham ṛṣe ihābhyāgamanam?
S01divyav_u:8556: yatra hi nāma jambudvīpaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayitvā ekasyāpi ṛṣerasamarthaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ pratipādayitum/
S01divyav_u:8559: 183.007 kiṃ duḥkhaṃ dāridryaṃ kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ tadeva dāridryam/
S01divyav_u:8561: 183.009 atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ puruṣamāmantrayate--asti bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:8564: sa evamāha--yat khalu deva jānīyāh--sarvajambudvīpādannādyaṃ parikṣīṇam,
S01divyav_u:8572: kathaṃ nāmehedṛśa ṛṣiḥ śīlavān kalyāṇadharmā mama niveśane 'dya yathādhautena pātreṇa nirgamiṣyati?
S01divyav_u:8573: atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyān saṃnipātyaivamavocat--anumodata yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8575: 183.016 anena kuśalamūlena sarvajāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:8576_0: 183.017 atha rājā kanakavarṇastasya maharṣestat pātraṃ gṛhītvā ekāṃ mānikāṃ bhaktasya
S01divyav_u:8576_1: pātre prakṣipya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pātraṃ gṛhītvā jānubhyāṃ nipatya tasya bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:8577: 183.019 dharmatā punarbhagavatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ kāyikī dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:8578: 183.020 atha bhagavān pratyekabuddho rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyāntikāt piṇḍapātramādāya tat eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8579: 183.022 atha rājā kanakavarṇaḥ prāñjalirbhūtvā tāvadanimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇo 'sthāt,
S01divyav_u:8581: 183.023 atha rājā kanakavarṇo gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyānāmantrayate--gacchata grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni niveśanāni/
S01divyav_u:8582: 183.024 mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:8584: tadā vayaṃ devena sārdhaṃ krīḍatā ramatā kathaṃ punarvayamidānīṃ devaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye parityakṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:8588: 183.028 mā ihaiva prāsāde jighatsāpipāsābhyāṃ sarva eva kālaṃ kariṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:8589: 183.029 evamuktā gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapāriṣadyāḥ prarudanto 'śrūṇi pravartayanto 'śrūṇi saṃparimārjya yena rājā kanakavarṇastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8590: 183.030 upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasya pādau śirasā vanditvā añjaliṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyaitadūcuh--kṣantavyaṃ te yadasmābhiḥ kiṃcidaparāddham/
S01divyav_u:8592: 184.001 [184]tadyathā tena bhagavatā pratyekabuddhena sa piṇḍapātraḥ paribhuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8593: atha tasminneva kṣaṇe samantāccatasṛṣu dikṣu catvāryabhrapaṭalāni vyutthitāni,
S01divyav_u:8597: 184.003 atha tasminneva divase dvitīye 'rdhabhāge vividhasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya varṣaṃ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:8599: idamevamrūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ mūlakhādanīyaṃ skandhakhādanīyaṃ patrakhādanīyaṃ puṣpakhādanīyaṃ phalakhādanīyaṃ tilakhādanīyaṃ khaṇḍaśarkaraguḍakhādanīyaṃ piṣṭakhādanīyam/
S01divyav_u:8600: 184.006 atha rājā kanakavarṇo hṛṣṭatuṣṭah udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto gaṇakamahāmātrāmātyadauvārikapārṣadyānāmantrayate--paśyatha yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8603: 184.010 atha dvitīye divase saptāhaṃ dhānyavarṣaṃ pravarṣanti,
S01divyav_u:8609: suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya/
S01divyav_u:8610: 184.013 sarvasya rājñaḥ kanakavarṇasyānubhāvena jāmbudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ dāridryasamucchedo babhūva//
S01divyav_u:8611: 184.015 syāt khalu bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8613: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājā kanakavarṇo babhūva/
S01divyav_u:8615: sacedbhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyurdānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--apīdānīm yo 'sau apaścimakaḥ kavalaścarama ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8618: 184.019 na caiṣāmutpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:8619: 184.020 yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānate dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam--yathā ahaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:8621: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādattaṃ tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:8622: 184.024 na naśyate pūrvakṛtaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ na naśyate sevanaṃ piṇḍatānām/
S01divyav_u:8623: 184.026 na naśyate āryajaneṣu bhāṣitaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛtajñeṣu na jātu naśyati//3//
S01divyav_u:8625: 184.029 asti caitasya vipāko avaśya dāsyate phalam//4//
S01divyav_u:8627: āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayaḥ sarvāvatī ca parṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
S01divyav_u:8631: 185.002 buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:8632: ācaritamāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcārikāṃ carituṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:8639: 185.007 yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
S01divyav_u:8644: 185.010 evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:8646: 185.011 tena khalu samayenāuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhiśca/
S01divyav_u:8649: 185.014 sa kathayati--ācaritaṃ bhadanta āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṃ narakacārikāṃ carituṃ tiryakcarikāṃ pretacārikāṃ devacārikāṃ manuṣyacārikāṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:8656: 185.018 yasya kasyacit sārdhaṃvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṃ carati,
S01divyav_u:8660: 185.021 evamaparamaparaṃ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyagavuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S01divyav_u:8662: 185.023 ayaṃ bhadanta heturayaṃ pratyayo yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:8663: 185.024 na sarvatra ānanda maudgalyāyano bhikṣurbhaviṣyati maudgalyāyanasadṛśo vā/
S01divyav_u:8665: 185.026 uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:8667: 185.027 bhagavānāha--pañca gatayaḥ kartavyā narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:8677: 185.031 anupapādukāḥ sattvā ghaṭīyantraprayogeṇa cyavamānā upapadyamānāśca kartavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8685: 186.005 uktaṃ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakraṃ kārayitavyamiti bhikṣubhiḥ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:8690: 186.007 bhagavānāha--dvārakoṣṭhake bhikṣuruddeṣṭavyo ya āgatāgatānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ darśayati/
S01divyav_u:8692: te aviśeṣeṇoddiśanti bālānapi mūḍhānapi avyaktānapi akuśalānapi/
S01divyav_u:8698: 186.012 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:8699: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8700: 186.013 tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:8707: sa suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantrayitvā antarjanaṃ ca samāśvāsya mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya divasatithimuhūrtena mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8709: tasya patnyā sa dārako jñātibalena hastabalena pālitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhito lipyāmupanyasto lipyakṣareṣu ca kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8710: 186.018 sa vayaskareṇa sārdhaṃ veṇuvanaṃ gato vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ paśyati dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitam/
S01divyav_u:8714: etāḥ pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:8715: 186.021 ārya, kimebhiḥ karma kṛtam yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni praryanubhavantīti?
S01divyav_u:8716: sa kathayati--ete prāṇātipātikā adattādāyikāḥ kāmamithyācārikā mṛṣāvādikāḥ paiśunikāḥ pāruṣikāḥ saṃbhinnapralāpikā abhidhyālavo vyāpannacittā mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8717: 186.024 tadebhirete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8720: 186.026 ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:8723: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:8726: 186.030 tattena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena evaṃvidhāni duḥkhāni kṣuttṛṣādīni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti/
S01divyav_u:8728: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena evaṃvidhāni sukhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:8730: ete prāṇātipātāt prativiratā adattādānāt [187]kāmamithyācārānmṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpādanabhidhyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8731: 187.002 tadebhirete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8734: 187.004 ebhiranyaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtam yena sukhāni pratyanubhavanti?
S01divyav_u:8736: ebhirapi daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāstanutarā mṛdutarāścāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ,
S01divyav_u:8738: 187.006 ārya, āsāṃ pañcānāṃ gatīnām yā etāstisro gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretāśca,
S01divyav_u:8740: 187.007 ye tu ete devā manuṣyāśca ete rocete/
S01divyav_u:8741: 187.008 tatkathamete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samādāya vartayitavyāh?
S01divyav_u:8743: svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya saced dṛṣṭa eva dharme ājñāmārāgayiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:8747: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsān samanupaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:8749: āveṇikā ime svārthā anuprāpto bhaviṣyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:8750: 187.012 yeṣāmahaṃ dāsaḥ preṣyo nirdeśyo bhujiṣyo nayena kāmaṃgamaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8751: teṣāṃ pūjyaśca bhaviṣyāmi praśaṃsyaśceti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:8752: 187.014 anuttaram yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:8753: 187.015 anuttaraṃ vā yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇamanuprāpnuvato 'nāpattikasya sato deeveṣūpapattirbhaviṣyatīti saṃpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:8780: tatra mayā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṃ cakramabhilikhitaṃ dṛṣṭam/
S01divyav_u:8781: 187.025 tatra pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca/
S01divyav_u:8794: putra, mayā tvaṃ jñātibalena hastabalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8802: sa tayā anujñāto bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8805: 188.004 sa tatra divasamatināmya vikāle gṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8816: so 'parasmin divase tādṛśaṃ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṃ gatvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8819: tena taṃ pratyākhyāya anye bhṛtakapuruṣā gṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:8825: 188.011 tāt, kiṃ tvaṃ pūrvaṃ bhṛtiṃ dadāsi,
S01divyav_u:8831: adya tāvat jijñāsyāmi yadi śakṣyati karma kartum, dāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:8857: 188.024 śrutvā gṛhapatistasya dārakasya dviguṇāṃ bhṛtiṃ dātumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8865: yāvat tava gṛhe karma kartavyaṃ tāvat tavaiva haste tiṣṭhatu/
S01divyav_u:8868: tadā asau dārako bhṛtiṃ gaṇayitumārabdho yāvat pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni na paripūryante/
S01divyav_u:8875: 188.031 mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhṛtikayā karma prārabdhaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:8878: 189.001 punarapi mayā anyatra bhṛtikayā karma kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:8889: 189.004 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8891: mayā pañcānāṃ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmītyamukasya gṛhapaterbhṛtikayā karma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:8899: 189.008 sa parituṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena sa gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8900: 189.009 upasaṃkramya gṛhapaterantikāt pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhītvā mātuḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:8910: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--tvayaiva etāni pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dattāani/
S01divyav_u:8911: 189.014 asmākaṃ gṛhe na bhāṇḍopaskaro nāpi śayanāsanam/
S01divyav_u:8914: 189.016 gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--mamedaṃ gṛhamacirotthitaṃ buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:8920: 189.019 sa saṃjātasaumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṃ kṛtvā prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8921: 189.020 upasaṃkramya vṛddhānte sthitvā kathayati--so 'haṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimantrayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:8923: atha sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:8924: 189.023 tenāpi gṛhapatinā tāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya gṛhaṃ saṃmārjitam/
S01divyav_u:8928: 189.025 tenāpi gṛhapatiputreṇa gatvā bhagavata ārocitam--samayo bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:8929: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti/
S01divyav_u:8930: 189.026 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8931: 189.027 ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchanti--kenāayaṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrita iti?
S01divyav_u:8936: gacchāma kulopakagṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakāṃ karma iti/
S01divyav_u:8942: bhagavāṃstasya gṛhapater niveśane purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:8944: 190.001 atha sa gṛhapatipurtaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhijanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:8945: 190.002 satatapariveṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paśyti ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya parimuñjānān/
S01divyav_u:8946: 190.003 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:8951: 190.006 atha bhagavāṃstaṃ gṛhapatiputraṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:8952: 190.008 atrāntare pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrāt saṃsiddhayānapātrāṇni rājagṛhamanuprāptāni/
S01divyav_u:8953: 190.009 rājagṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
S01divyav_u:8956: āgamayata kasyādya gṛhe buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhaktam,
S01divyav_u:8960: tavādya buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṃcit krayeṇāpi labhyate/
S01divyav_u:8971: te tenānnapānena saṃtarpitā gṛhapatergatvā kathayanti--tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te niveśane buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:8974: 190.019 anena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho 'nnapānena saṃtarpito na mayeti/
S01divyav_u:8982: 190.022 tadayaṃ paṭakaṃ prajñapto yena vo yat parityaktam,
S01divyav_u:8984: 190.023 te pūrvamevābhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhena ca protsāhitā iti tairyathāsambhāvyena maṇimuktādīni ratnāni dattāni/
S01divyav_u:8993: 190.027 kiṃ tu vayaṃ tavābhiprasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṃ kurmaḥ, gṛhāṇeti/
S01divyav_u:8995: mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojito deveṣūpapatsye iti/
S01divyav_u:9004: 190.031 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9006: mayā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā yadannapānamavaśiṣṭam [191]tadviṇijāṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:9008: kiṃ kalpate tanmama grahītumāhosvinna kalpata iti?
S01divyav_u:9014: 191.003 tena bhagavadvacanābhisampratyayāt parituṣṭena gatvā ratnāni gṛhītāni//
S01divyav_u:9016: tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saṃnipatya saṃjalpaṃ kurvanti--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9045: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadapyanena mama bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:9048: tena tasya sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā duhitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:9051: sahasaivaṃ bhogairabhyudgata iti tasya sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sahasodgato gṛhapatiriti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:9054: 191.021 yannvahaṃ punarapi buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojayeyam/
S01divyav_u:9056: 191.022 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9057: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:9058: 191.024 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:9059_0: 191.025 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:9059_1: praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu bhagavāñ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
S01divyav_u:9061: 191.027 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9062_0: 191.028 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:9062_1: samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
S01divyav_u:9063: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:9064: 191.031 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yena sahasodgatasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9066: 192.001 atha sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati/
S01divyav_u:9067_0: 192.002 anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya
S01divyav_u:9067_1: saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ
S01divyav_u:9068: 192.005 tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:9069: yāṃ śrutvā sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:9070_0: 192.007 sa dṛṣṭasatyastrirudānamudānayati--idamasmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na
S01divyav_u:9070_1: pitrā neṣṭena na svajanabandhuvargeṇa na rājñā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam /
S01divyav_u:9078: eṣo 'haṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:9079: 192.012 upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetamabhiprasannamiti/
S01divyav_u:9080: atha bhagavān sahasodgataṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:9081: 192.015 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtam yena bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:9084: bhagavānāha--sahasodgatenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni/
S01divyav_u:9087: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipaṣyante,
S01divyav_u:9091: api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:9093: 192.024 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//3//
S01divyav_u:9094: 192.025 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:9096: 192.027 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:9097: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:9098: 192.028 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:9100: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṃ nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:9102_0: 192.031 yāvadapareṇa samayena sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu
S01divyav_u:9103: 193.001 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasyā/
S01divyav_u:9107: adrākṣīt sa gṛhapatistaṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ kāyaprāsādikaṃ ca śānteneryāpathenodyānaṃ praviśantam/
S01divyav_u:9120: 193.010 so 'pi tasya piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9121: 193.011 yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateranyatarakarvaṭake kiṃcit karaṇīyamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:9127: aparasmin divase sā gṛhapatnī kālyamevotthāya tadarthamannapānaṃ sādhayitumārabdhā/
S01divyav_u:9134: kimarthaṃ bhṛtikayā karma kṛtvā na bhuṅkta iti?
S01divyav_u:9143: 193.019 kiṃ tu anena dārakeṇa tasyāntike kharāvāgniścāritā/
S01divyav_u:9148: 193.021 gacchāmi, taṃ mahātmānaṃ kṣamāpayāmi--mā atyantameva kṣato bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:9149: 193.022 iti viditvā taṃ dārakamādāya yena pratyekabuddhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9156: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī/
S01divyav_u:9157: 193.026 sa tasyānukampārthaṃ vitatapakṣa hava haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9159: 193.028 sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ saputraḥ pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9160: tataḥ sa dāraka āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati--avatara avatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:9163: sa gṛhapatiputrastīvreṇāśayena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharā vāgniścāritā,
S01divyav_u:9178: ahaṃ cānena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9179: 194.007 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9185: (iyaṃ tāvadutpattir na tāvat buddho bhagavāñ śrāvakāṇāṃ vinaye śikṣāpadam/?)
S01divyav_u:9192: ekasmin samaye bhagavān bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśābhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:9193: 195.003 tatra bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:9194: yāvadāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
S01divyav_u:9196_0: 195.005 atredānīṃ bhikṣavaḥ kimāścaryam yadetarhi śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū
S01divyav_u:9196_3: buddhapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe tatprathamataraṃ nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau,
S01divyav_u:9201: 195.013 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma nagarī rājadhānī abhūt,
S01divyav_u:9202: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca/
