S01divyav_u:9203_0: 195.014 dvādaśayojanānyāyāmena dvādaśayojanāni vistareṇa caturasrā caturdvārā suvibhaktā
S01divyav_u:9205: 195.018 tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmagurugandhāścandanagandhāścūrṇagandhāḥ sarvakālikāśca kusumagandhā nānāvātasamīritā atiramaṇīyā vīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vāyavo vāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:9206: 195.019 hastyaśvarathapattibalakāyasampannā yugyayānopaśobhitā vistīrṇātiramaṇīyavīthīmahāpathā ucchritavicitradhvajapatākā toraṇagavākṣārdhacandrāvanaddhā amarālaya iva śobhate/
S01divyav_u:9209_0: 195.025 bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāmanyataraṃ maṇigarbhaṃ nāma rājodyānaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalavṛkṣaviṭapopaśobhitaṃ
S01divyav_u:9211_0: bhadraśilāyāṃ rājādhānyāṃ rājābhūccandraprabho nāma abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko
S01divyav_u:9213: na ca maṇirvā pradīpo vā ulkā vā purastāt nīyate,
S01divyav_u:9214: api tu svakāt kāyāt rājñaścandraprabhasya prabhā niścaranti tadyathā candramaṇḍalādraśmayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9215: 195.032 anena kāraṇena rājñaścandraprabhasya candraprabha iti saṃjñā babhūva//
S01divyav_u:9216: 196.001 [196]tena khalu samayenāsmiñ jambudvīpe 'ṣḍaṣaṣṭinagarasahasrāṇi babhūvurbhadraśilārājadhānīprabhukhāni ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāṇi subhikṣāṇyākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi/
S01divyav_u:9217: 196.002 apīdānīṃ jambudvīpakā akarā abhūvann aśulkā atarapaṇyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9220: 196.004 tena khalu samayena catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāṇi jambudvīpe manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣaḥ pramāṇamabhūt/
S01divyav_u:9221: 196.005 rājā candraprabho bodhisattvo 'bhūt sarvaṃdadaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca/
S01divyav_u:9223: tena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nirgatya bahirdhā nagarasya caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu catvāro catvāro mahāyajñavāṭā māpitāśchatradhvajayūpapatākātyucchritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9232: 196.011 kumārāḥ kumārikāśca sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāḥ kṛtvā pradānāni dīyante/
S01divyav_u:9236: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā āḍhyā mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9238: yathā asmiñ jambudvīpe ekamanuṣyo 'pi padbhyāṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:9239: 196.016 sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā hastipṛṣṭhaiśca caturaśvayuktaiśca rathairuparisuvarṇamayai rūpyamayaiścātapatrairudyānenodyānaṃ grāmeṇa grāmamanuvicaranti sma/
S01divyav_u:9240: 196.018 tato rājñaścandraprabhasyaitadabhavat--kiṃ punarme itvareṇa dānena pradattena?
S01divyav_u:9243: yat sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā krīḍeyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:9246: 196.022 rājñā candraprabheṇa tāvanti rājārhāṇi vastrāṇyalaṃkārāṇi maulayaḥ paṭṭāścānupradattāḥ,
S01divyav_u:9247: yena sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyā maulidharāḥ paṭṭadharāśca saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9248: 196.023 yā rājñaścandraprabhasyākṛtistādṛśā eva sarve jambudvīpakā manuṣyāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9249: 196.024 tato rājñā candraprabheṇāṣṭaṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--sarve bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājakrīḍayā,
S01divyav_u:9252: 196.026 atha jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇāṃ śrutvā sarva eva rājakrīḍayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9254_0: 196.029 tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājalīlayā krīḍatām yaśca
S01divyav_u:9254_2: yaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ varṇamanojñaśabdo niścarati,
S01divyav_u:9255: tena sarvo jambudvīpo manojñaśabdanādito 'bhūt tadyathā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāmabhyantaraṃ devaputam [197]nṛttagītavāditaśabdena nirnāditam/
S01divyav_u:9256: 197.001 evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpavāsināṃ janakāyastena gītavāditaśabdena ekāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate/
S01divyav_u:9257: 197.002 tena khalu samayena bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dvāsaptatirayutakoṭīśatāni manuṣyāṇāṃ prativasanti sma/
S01divyav_u:9258: 197.004 teṣāṃ rājā candraprabha ṛṣṭo babhūva priyo manāpaśca/
S01divyav_u:9259: apīdānīṃ varṇākṛtiliṅgasthairyamasya nirīkṣamāṇā na tṛptimupayānti sma/
S01divyav_u:9260: 197.005 yasmiṃśca samaye rājā candraprabho mahāyajñavāṭaṃ gacchati,
S01divyav_u:9262: evaṃ cāhuh--devagarbho batāyaṃ rājā candraptabha iha jamudvīpe rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:9263: 197.007 na khalu manuṣyā īdṛgvarṇasaṃsthānā yādṛśā devasya candraprabhasyeti/
S01divyav_u:9265: tena tena strīsahasrāṇyavalokayanti--dhanyāstāḥ striyo yāsāmeṣa bharteti/
S01divyav_u:9270: 197.011 vyaktau paṇḍitau medhāvinau guṇaiśca sarvāmātyamaṇḍalaprativiśiṣṭau sarvādhikṛtau rājaparikarṣakau rājaparipālakau/
S01divyav_u:9272_0: 197.013 mahācandraścāgrāmātyo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ jambudvīpakān manuṣyān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu
S01divyav_u:9272_1: niyojayati--imān bhavanto jambudvīpakā manuṣyā daśa kuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartatheti /
S01divyav_u:9275: 197.016 mahācandrasyāgrāmātyasya rājā candraprabha iṣṭaścābhūt priyaśca manāapaśca/
S01divyav_u:9277: 197.018 yāvadapareṇa samayena mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--rājñaścandraprabhasya dhūmavarṇaiḥ piśācairmaulirapanītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9280: abhūdromaharṣah--mā haiva devasya candraprabhasya śiroyācanaka āgacchet/
S01divyav_u:9283: 197.021 tasya buddhirutpannā--na mayā rājñaścandraprabhasya svapno nivedayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9284: 197.022 api tu ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgāraṃ praveśya sthāpayitavyāni/
S01divyav_u:9287: 197.024 iti viditvā ratnamayāni śirāṃsi kārayitvā koṣakoṣṭhāgareṣu prakṣipya sthāpitavān/
S01divyav_u:9288: 197.025 apareṇa samayena mahīdhareṇāgrāmātyena svapno dṛṣṭah--sarvaratnamayaḥ potaścandraprabhasya kulasthaḥ śataśo viśīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9289: 197.026 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignah--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya rājyacyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya cāntarasya cāntarāya iti/
S01divyav_u:9290: 197.027 tena brāhmaṇā ye naimittikā vipaścikāścāhūya uktāh--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9293: 197.028 tatastairbrāhmaṇair naimittikairvipaścikaiśca samākhyātam--yādṛśo 'yaṃ tvayā svapno dṛṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9296_0: tato mahīdharo 'grāmātyaḥ svapnanirdeśaṃ śrutvā kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--atikṣipraṃ
S01divyav_u:9297: 197.032 athāpareṇa samayenārdhatrayodaśābhiramātyasahasraih[198] svapno dṛṣṭah--rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu yajñavāṭeṣu karoṭapāṇibhiryakṣaiścachatradhvajapatākāḥ pātitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:9299: 198.002 dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītāstrastāḥ saṃvignāh--mā haiva rājñaścandraprabhasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalamāgacchet,
S01divyav_u:9300: mā haiva asmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9303: tena śrutvā aṣṭaṣaṣṭinagarasahasreṣu ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--rājalīlayā bhavantaḥ sarve jambudvīpakā mānuṣyāḥ krīḍantu yāvadahaṃ jīvāmi/
S01divyav_u:9305: rājñaścandraprabhasya ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śrutvā sarva eva jambudvīpakā manuṣyā rājalīlayā krīḍitumārabdhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:9307_0: 198.010 tena khalu samayena jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ rājakrīḍayā krīḍatām yaśca
S01divyav_u:9307_1: rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ valgurmanojñaḥ śabdo niścarati,
S01divyav_u:9310: evameva tasmin kāle tasmin samaye sarvo jambudvīpanivāsī janakāyastena gītaśabdenaikāntasukhasamarpito 'tyarthaṃ ramate//
S01divyav_u:9311: 198.016 tena khalu samayena gandhamādane parvate raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma indrajālavidhijñaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9312: 198.017 aśrauṣīdraudrākṣo brāhmaṇo bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ candraprabho nāma rājā sarvaṃdado 'smītyātmānaṃ pratijānīte/
S01divyav_u:9316: 198.019 api tu duṣkarametadasthānamanavakāśo yadevamiṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpamuttamāṅgaṃ parityakṣyati yaduta śīrṣam,
S01divyav_u:9319: atha gandhamādananivāsinī devatā vikroṣṭumārabdhā--hā kaṣṭaṃ rajñaścandraprabhasya maitrātmakasya mahākāruṇikasya sattvavatsalasyānityatābalaṃ pratyupasthitamiti/
S01divyav_u:9325: 198.024 bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ nātidūre pañcābhijño ṛṣiḥ praivasati viśvāmitro nāṃnā pañcaśataparivāro maitrātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9326: 198.026 atha sa ṛṣiḥ sarvajambudvīpamākulaṃ dṛṣṭvā māṇavakānāmantrayate--yatkhalu māṇavakā jānīta sarvajambudvīpa etarhyākulākulo dhūmāndhakāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:9327: 198.027 sūryācandramasau evamahānubhāvau na bhāsato na tapato na virocataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9330: 198.029 rodanti kinnaragaṇā vanadevatāśca dhikkāramutsṛjanti devagaṇā pi na sthuḥ/
S01divyav_u:9331: 198.031 candro na bhāti na vibhāti sahasraraśmir naiva vādyavāditaravo 'pi niśāmyate 'tra//1//
S01divyav_u:9332: 199.001 [199]ete hi pādapagaṇāḥ phalapuṣpanaddhā bhūmau patanti pavanairapi cālitāni/
S01divyav_u:9333: 199.003 saṃśrūyate dhvanirayaṃ ca yathātibhīmo vyakto bhaviṣyati pure vyasanaṃ mahāntam//2//
S01divyav_u:9334: 199.005 ete bhadraśilānivāsaniratāḥ sarve saduḥkhā janā atyantapratiśokaśalyavihatāḥ praspandakaṇṭhānanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9335: 199.007 etāścandranibhānanā yuvatayo rodanti veśmottame sarve ca prarudanti tīvrakaruṇāḥ santaḥ śmaśāne yathā//3//
S01divyav_u:9336: 199.009 kiṃ kāraṇaṃ puranivāsijanāḥ samagrāḥ saṃpiṇḍitaṃ manasi duḥkhamidaṃ vahanti/
S01divyav_u:9338: 199.013 ete payodā vinadantyatoyā jalāśrayāḥ śokamamī vrajanti/
S01divyav_u:9339: 199.015 bhuvorivāmbhasi ca bālasamīraṇāstā vātāḥ pravānti ca kharā rajasā vimiśrāḥ//5//
S01divyav_u:9342: 199.019 api tu khalu māṇavakā rājñaścandraprabhasya caturṣu mahāyajñavāṭeṣu suvarṇabherīṇāṃ tāḍyamānānāṃ na bhūyo manojñaḥ svaro niścarati/
S01divyav_u:9345: tato nagaravivāsinī devatā raudrākṣaṃ brahmaṇaṃ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā yena rājā candraprabhāstenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:9346: 199.022 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--yatkhalu deva jānīyāh--adya devasya yācanaka āgamiṣyati hiṃsako viheṭhako 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī/
S01divyav_u:9349: 199.025 atha rājā candraprabhaḥ śiroyācanakamupaśrutya pramuditamanā vismayotphalladṛṣṭirdevatāmuvāca--gaccha devate,
S01divyav_u:9352: 199.027 atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ viditvā duḥkhinī durmanaskā vipratisāriṇī tatraivāntarhitā/
S01divyav_u:9356: tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa praviśan devatayā nivāritah--gaccha pāpabrāhmaṇa, mā praviśa/
S01divyav_u:9360: 200.003 yāvadetat prakaraṇaṃ rājñā candraprabheṇa śrutam--yācanako me nagaradvāre devatayā vidhāryate iti/
S01divyav_u:9361: 200.004 śrutvā ca punarmahācandramagrāmātyamāmantrayate--yatkhalu mahācandra jānīyāh--yācanako me nagaradvāri devatayā vidhāryate/
S01divyav_u:9363: evaṃ deveti mahācandro 'grāmātyo rājñaścandraprabhasya pratiśrutya nagaradvāraṃ gatvā tāṃ devatāmuvāca--yatkhalu devate jānīyāh--praviśatveṣa brāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:9365_1: jānīyāh--eṣa brāhmaṇo raudracitto niṣkāruṇiko rājñaścandraprabhasya vināśārthaṃ bhadraśilāmanuprāptaḥ /
S01divyav_u:9367: eṣa mayā devate upāyaścintito yenāyaṃ brāhmaṇo na prabhaviṣyati devasya śiro grahītumiti/
S01divyav_u:9368: 200.011 atha mahācandro 'grāmātyo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya nagaraṃ praviśya ratnadharānājñāpayati--ānīyantāṃ bhavanto ratnamayāni śirāṃsi/
S01divyav_u:9370: bhāṇḍāgārikai ratnamayānāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ rājadvāre rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9371: 200.014 mahācandreṇāgrāmātyena raudrākṣasya ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇyupadarśitāni--pratigṛhṇa tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa prabhūtāni ratnamayāni śīrṣāṇi/
S01divyav_u:9375: evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo mahācandramagrāmātyamidamavocat--na ratnamayairme śirobhiḥ prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:9377: api tvahamasya mahāpṛthivīpālasya sarvaṃdadasya sakāśamāgataḥ śiraso 'rthāya/
S01divyav_u:9378: 200.019 evamukte mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparau vyavasthitau--kimidānīṃ prāptakālamiti/
S01divyav_u:9379: 200.020 athaitadvṛttāntamupaśrutya rājā candraprabho mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau dūreṇa prakrośyaitadavocat--ānīyatāmeṣa matsamīpam/
S01divyav_u:9381_1: paridevamānau abhirudya devasya maitrātmakasya kāruṇikasya sattvavatsalāsyānekaguṇasamuditasya
S01divyav_u:9382: adyāsmākaṃ devena sārdhaṃ nānābhāvo bhaviṣyati vinābhāvo viprayogo visamyogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9383: 200.025 iti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
S01divyav_u:9384: atha rājā candraprabhaḥ paramatyāgaprativiśiṣṭaṃ tyāgaṃ parityakukāmo dūrata eva taṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ brāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:9386: 200.027 atha raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo yena rājā candraprabhastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9387: 200.028 upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ candraprabhaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā rājānaṃ candraprabhamidamavocat--
S01divyav_u:9388: 200.029 dharme sthito 'si vimale śubhabuddhisattva sarvajñatāmabhilaṣan hṛdayena sādho/
S01divyav_u:9389: 200.031 mahyaṃ śiraḥ sṛja mahākaruṇāgracetā mahyaṃ dadasva mama toṣakaro bhavādya//7//
S01divyav_u:9390_1: śrutvā pramuditamanāḥ prītivisphāritākṣo raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--hantedaṃ brāhmaṇa
S01divyav_u:9392: 201.004 priyo yathā yadyapi caikaputrakastathāpi me kharpamidaṃ gṛhāṇa/
S01divyav_u:9393: 201.006 tvaccintitānāṃ phalamastu śīghraṃ śiraḥpradānāddhi labheya bodhim//8//
S01divyav_u:9395: yadā ca rājā candraprabheṇa śiraso maulirapanītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9396: tatsamanantarameva sarveṣāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ maulayaḥ patitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9397: 201.010 bhadraśilāyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ caturdiśamulkāpātā diśodāhāśca prādurbhūtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9398: nagaradevatābhiśca śabdo niścāritah--asya rājñaścandraprabhasya pāpabrāhmaṇo śiraśchetsyatīti/
S01divyav_u:9399_1: śarīraparityāgaṃ viditvā sāśrudurdidavadanau rājñaścandraprabhasya pādau pariṣvajyāhatuh--dhanyāste
S01divyav_u:9399_2: puruṣā deva ya evamatyadbhutarūpadarśanaṃ vā drakṣyantīri /
S01divyav_u:9400_0: 201.014 tau abhimukhamudvīkṣyamāṇau rājani candraprabhe cittamabhiprasādya raudrākṣe
S01divyav_u:9400_1: ca brāhmaṇe maitryacittamutpādya nāvāṃ śakṣyāmo nirupamaguṇādhārāsya devasyānityatāṃ
S01divyav_u:9402_0: rājñaścandraprabhasyedamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ buddhvā tāṃ ca nagaranivāsinīnāṃ devatānāmārtadhvanimupaśrutya
S01divyav_u:9402_1: bhaumā yakṣā antarikṣacarāśca yakṣāḥ krinditumārabdhāh--hā kaṣṭamidānīṃ rājñaścandraprabhasya
S01divyav_u:9404: tato raudrākṣo brāhmaṇastaṃ mahājanakāyamavekṣya śiro grahītum/
S01divyav_u:9407: 201.022 evamukte rājā candraprabho raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamavocat--evaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kriyatām/
S01divyav_u:9410: atha rājā candraprabho rājā āsanādutthāya tīkṣaṇamasimādāya yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9411: 201.024 atha rājā candraprabhasya idamevamrūpaṃ vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhadraśilāyāṃ rājadhānyāmanekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vikrośamānāni pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni/
S01divyav_u:9413: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ samāśvāsayannāha--apramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmoṣviti/
S01divyav_u:9414: 201.027 saṃkṣepeṇa dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamādāya maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9415: 201.028 samanantarapraviṣṭasya rājñaścandraprabhasya maṇiratnagarbha udyāne bhadraśilāyāṃ chatrāṇi dhvajapatākāśca yena maṇiratnagarbhamudyānaṃ tenāvanāmitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9416: 201.029 tato rājā candraprabho maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya dvāraṃ pidhāya taṃ taṃ raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamāmantrayate--pratigṛhyatāṃ brāhmaṇa mamottamāṅgamiti/
S01divyav_u:9417: 201.031 evamukte raudrākṣo brāhmaṇo rājānaṃ candraprabhamuvāca--nāhaṃ śakṣyāmi devasya śiraśchettumiti/
S01divyav_u:9423: 202.003 evaṃ cāhuh--kathamidānīṃ tvaṃ pāpabrāhmaṇa rājñaścandraprabhasyādūṣiṇo 'napakāriṇo mahājanavatsalasyānekaguṇasampannasya śiraśchetsyasīti?
S01divyav_u:9424: tato rājā candraprabha udyānadevatā nivārayati--mā devatā mama śiroyācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruta/
S01divyav_u:9426: bhūtapūrvaṃ devatā mamottamāṅgam yācanakasya devatāyā antarāyaḥ kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9429: yadi tayā devatayā antarāyo na kṛto 'bhaviṣyat,
S01divyav_u:9431: 202.008 ataśca tvāmahamevaṃ bravīmi--mā me tvamuttamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ kuruṣveti/
S01divyav_u:9432: 202.009 asminneva te maṇiratnagarbha udyāne mayā sahasraśaḥ śiraḥparityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9434: 202.010 tasmāt tvaṃ devate mamottamāṅgayācanakasyāntarāyaṃ mā kuru/
S01divyav_u:9435: 202.011 eṣa eva devate sa pṛṣṭhībhūto maitreyo yo vyāghryā ātmānaṃ parityajya catvāriṃśatkalpasamprasthito maitreyo bodhisattva ekena śiraḥparityāgenāvapṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9436: 202.013 atha sā devatā rājñaścandraprabhasya maharddhitāmavetya tasmin rājani paraṃ prasādaṃ pravedayantī tūṣṇīmavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:9437: 202.014 atha rājā candraprabhaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9440: asmiṃs tyāgaṃ svaśiraḥparityāgam yena cāhaṃ satyena svaśiraḥ parityajāmi,
S01divyav_u:9441_0: na rājyārthāya na svargārthāya na bhogārthāya na śakratvāya na brahmatvāya na cakravartivijayāya
S01divyav_u:9441_1: nānyatra kathamahamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambuddhya adāntān sattvān damayeyam,
S01divyav_u:9447: 202.020 anena satyena satyavacanena saphalaḥ pariśramaḥ syāt,
S01divyav_u:9449: asya ca maṇiratnagarbhasyodyānasya madhye mahān stūpaḥ syāt sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9450: 202.022 ye ca sattvāḥ śāntakāyā mahācaityaṃ vanditukāmā gaccheyuḥ,
S01divyav_u:9451: te taṃ sarvastūpaprativiśiṣṭaṃ dhātuparaṃ dṛṣṭvā viśrāntā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:9453: janakāyā āgatya kārāṃ kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyāṇā bhaveyuriti/
S01divyav_u:9454: 202.024 evaṃ samyak praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃścampakavṛkṣe śikhāṃ baddhvā raudrākṣaṃ brāhmaṇamuvāca--āgaccha mahābrāhmaṇa,
S01divyav_u:9457: 202.027 tato rājā candraprabha ātmanaḥ kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca saṃjanya tasmiṃśca brāhmaṇe karuṇāsahagataṃ maitracittamutpādya śiraśichattvā raudrākṣāya brāhmaṇāya niryātitavān/
S01divyav_u:9458: 202.028 kālaṃ ca kṛtvā atikramya brahmalokaṃ praṇītatvācchubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9459: 202.029 samanantaraparityakte rājñā candraprabheṇa śirasi ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus triḥ kampitaḥ saṃkampitaḥ saṃprakampitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9463: padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tamālapatrāṇi divyāni [203]māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi,
S01divyav_u:9473: 203.005 tata ekatyāstasminneva pradeśe sthitvā dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā śubhakṛtsne devanikāye upapannā rājñaścandraprabhasya sabhāgatāyām/
S01divyav_u:9474: 203.006 apare dhyānānyutpādya tatraiva kālaṃ kṛtvā bhāsvare devanikāye upapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9476: 203.008 aparaiḥ saṃnipātya rājñaścandraprabhasya śarīraṃ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiścitāṃ citvā,
S01divyav_u:9480: gandhairmālyairdhūpairdīpaiḥ puṣpaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā candraprabhe rājani svacittamabhiprasādya kālagatāḥ ṣaṭsu devanikāyeṣu kāmāvacareṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9483: 203.013 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyā sā tena kālena samayenottarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānyabhūditi/
S01divyav_u:9486: eṣaiva sā takṣaśilā tena kālena tena samayena bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:9487: 203.015 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayenottarāpathe bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānyabhūditi/
S01divyav_u:9490: eṣaiva sā takṣaśilā tena kālena tena samayena bhadraśilā nāma rājadhānī babhūva/
S01divyav_u:9491: 203.015 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣuvaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena candraprabho nāma rājābhūditi/
S01divyav_u:9494: ahameva tena kālena tena samayena rājā candraprabho babhūva/
S01divyav_u:9495: 203.018 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena raudrākṣo nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūditi/
S01divyav_u:9498: eṣa eva sa tena kālena tena samayena devadatto babhūva/
S01divyav_u:9499: 203.020 syātkhalu yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā--anyau tau tena samayena mahācandramahīdharau agrāmātyau babhūvaturiti/
S01divyav_u:9525: ayaṃ tāvat khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayati--amī bhikṣavo dharmakathikā yuṃktamutkamuktapratibhānāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9530: 204.004 te kathayanti--tvaṃ tāvanmahalla khustikayā ekottarikayā dharmaṃ deśayasi/
S01divyav_u:9539: 204.008 sa saṃlakṣayati--yadi me utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kariṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:9541: 204.009 sa teṣāṃ śayitakānāṃ taṃ vihāramantarhāpayitvā mahāsamudraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9546: te kathayanti--ko 'pyasau devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā bhagavatyabhiprasanno buddhe dharme saṃghe kārān kurvan,
S01divyav_u:9549: bhagavānāha--yo 'sau bhikṣavo nirmito yadi ṣaḍvargikairbhikṣubhir na viheṭhito 'bhaviṣyat,
S01divyav_u:9557: 204.017 śrāvastyāṃ buddharakṣito nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9559: 204.018 sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:9560: tasya krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:9562: 204.020 tena sa gṛhapatiḥ sapatnīkaḥ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu pratikṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9563: apareṇa samayena sā tasya patnī āpannasattvā savṛttā/
S01divyav_u:9564: 204.021 āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya ca vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tat kulamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9575: 204.027 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām {atyayāt} prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:9576: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9577: 204.029 tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma?
S01divyav_u:9581: tasminneva divase pañcānāṃ vaṇikśatānāṃ pañca putraśatāni jātāni/
S01divyav_u:9583: 205.001 saṃgharakṣito dāraka unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:9586: tadā āyuṣmāñ śāriputrastasya vaineyakālaṃ jñātvā ekākyeva tatkulamupasaṃkramya nimittamupadarśayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9588: ajāta eva tvaṃ mayā āryaśāriputrasya paścācchramaṇo datta iti/
S01divyav_u:9589: 205.006 caramabhavikaḥ sa āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa pravrājita upasampādita āgamacatuṣṭayaṃ ca grāhitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:9590_0: 205.007 athāpareṇa samayena tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:9620: 205.023 atha tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni kṛtakautukamaṅgalasvastyayanāni śakṭairbhārairmūḍhaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitāni/
S01divyav_u:9621: 205.025 te nipuṇataḥ samudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudramavatīrṇā dhanahārakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9623: 205.027 te devatāyācanaṃ kartumārabdhāh--yo 'smin mahāsamudre devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā prativasati,
S01divyav_u:9626: 205.029 te kathayati--āryasaṃgharakṣito 'smākaṃ vayasyakaḥ sahajanmikaḥ sahapāṃśukrīḍanako bhadantaśāriputreṇānupradattako bhagavatānuparītakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9638: na tveva vayamārya saṃgharakṣita tvāṃ parityakṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9639: 206.004 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yaduktaṃ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamitīdaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:9640: 206.005 sa pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītvā ātmānaṃ mahāsamudre prakṣeptumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9649: iyaṃ śikhino viśvabhuvaḥ krakucchandasya kanakamuneḥ kāśyapasyeyaṃ bhagavato gandhakuṭī/
S01divyav_u:9651: bhagavataḥ sūtraṃ mātṛkā ca devamanuṣyeṣu pratiṣṭhitam/
S01divyav_u:9653: aho bata, āryaḥ saṃghāṃ rakṣita ihāpyāgamacatuṣṭayaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet/
S01divyav_u:9664: 206.015 sa eva teṣāmekaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṃgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9683: 206.021 tvamevaikaḥ sagauravaḥ sapratīśa iti karaṇīyaiśca sarvatra pūrvaṃgamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9693: sa bhīta utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako 'prāptakāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9695: kasmāt tvamutpāṇḍūtpāṇḍukaḥ kṛśāluko durbalako mlānako 'prāptakāyaḥ saṃvṛttah?
S01divyav_u:9701: 206.029 api tu icchasi tvaṃ jambudvīpaṃ gantum?
S01divyav_u:9712: te 'nupūrveṇa samudratīraṃ gatvā sarve te vaṇijaḥ śayitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9716: 207.005 asecanakā darśanena buddhaśca bhagavatāṃ varaḥ//1// iti/
S01divyav_u:9726: āryasaṃgharakṣito bhavanto maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yaḥ samudramadhye na kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:9731: 207.013 āyuṣmānapi saṃgharakṣitaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanasamaye sūryāṃśubhistāḍitaḥ pratibuddho yāvanna kiṃcitpaśyati/
S01divyav_u:9739: viśrāmayitvā vihāraṃ praveśito yāvat paśyati śobhanāṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtāṃ praṇītaṃ cāhāramupahṛtam/
S01divyav_u:9759: 207.024 tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9772: 207.029 te vayaṃ bhaktāgre raṇamutpādayitvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9775: jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ saṃghamadhye raṇamutpādayiṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:9776: 207.031 mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ//
S01divyav_u:9778: yāvat paśyati dvitīyaṃ vihāramudgataṃ mañcapīṭhavedikājālavātāyanaparikṣiptaṃ gavakṣaparimaṇḍitaṃ bhikṣūṃśca suprāvṛtān supraticchannāñ śāntāñ śānteryāpathe vyavasthitān/
S01divyav_u:9783: śobhanāṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiḥ kṛtvā praṇītaṃ cāhāraṃ samanvāhṛtya sa tairuktah--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita muṅkṣva/
S01divyav_u:9790: tairātasvaraṃ krandadbhistāvadayorasena parasparamātmā sikto yāvat kāladakālībhūtam/
S01divyav_u:9791: 208.008 tataḥ paścāt punarapi sa teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9792: 208.009 te ca bhikṣavaḥ punarapi śāntāḥ śānteryāpathenāvasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9801: 208.013 saṃghasya ca snehalābhe saṃpanne āgantukā bhikṣava āgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9802: tairasmābhiranāryaparigṛhītairevaṃ cittamutpāditam--na tāvadbhojayiṣyāmo yāvadete āgantukā bhikṣavo na prakrāntā bhaviṣyantīti/
S01divyav_u:9809: jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmāraocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:9810: mā asya evamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhāgino bhaviṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:9812_0: 208.020 sa saṃprasthito yāvat paśyati tṛtīyaṃ vihāramudgataṃ mañcapīṭhavidikājālavātāyanagavākṣaparimaṇḍitaṃ
S01divyav_u:9814: 208.022 sa tena vihāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūto dhmāyitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9816: 208.023 tataḥ paścāt punarapi teṣāṃ vihāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:9824: te kathayanti--bhadanta saṃgharakṣita vayaṃ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:9833: tairasmābhiramarṣajātaiḥ śuṣkāni kāṣṭhāni śuṣkāni tṛṇāni śuṣkāni gomayāni upasaṃhṛtya tasmin vihāro 'gnirdagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9835: 209.001 [209]te vayaṃ śaikṣāśaikṣān pudgalān dagdhvā iha pratyekanarakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9838: jambudvīpaṃ gatvā sabrahmacāriṇāmārocaya--mā āyuṣmantaḥ sabrahmacāriṇāmantike praduṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:9839: mā asyaivamrūpasya duḥkhadaurmanasyasya bhagino bhavino bhaviṣyatha tadyathā śramaṇaḥ kāśyapīyāḥ//
S01divyav_u:9840_0: 209.006 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃprasthito yāvat sattvānadrakṣīt stambhākārān kuḍyākārān
S01divyav_u:9840_1: vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārān rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārānudūkhalākārān
S01divyav_u:9845: kriyākāraṃ tāvat kurmah--bahubollakāḥ śramaṇāḥ śākyaputrīyā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:9862: āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitena sā kuṭikā siktā saṃmṛṣṭā saṃmārjitā sukumārīṃ gomayakāsiṃ cānupradattā/
S01divyav_u:9866: 209.019 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito bahiḥ kuṭikāyāḥ pādau prakṣālya kuṭikāṃ praviśya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupashtāpya/
S01divyav_u:9868: sā rātryāḥ prathame yāme yenāyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:9872: 209.023 na paśyasi mayā triyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham,
S01divyav_u:9880: 209.026 na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham?
S01divyav_u:9888: na paśyasi mayā kriyākāreṇa pratiśrayaṃ labdham?
S01divyav_u:9893: api tu nanūktaṃ bhagavatā bhayabhairavasahiṣṇunā te bhavitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:9894: 209.032 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--śobhanaṃ kathayati--sacet sa niṣkāsayiṣyati, [210]gamiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:9897: 210.003 na nagnacaryā na jaṭā na paṅko nānāśanaṃ sthaṇḍalaśāyikā vā/
S01divyav_u:9899: 210.007 alaṃkṛtaścāpi careta dharmaṃ dāntendrayaḥ śāntaḥ samyato brahmacārī/
S01divyav_u:9900: 210.009 sarveṣu bhūteṣu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇa sa bhikṣuḥ//3//
S01divyav_u:9903: ityeka upasaṃkrānto dvitīyastṛtīyo yāvat sarve upasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9909: 210.016 kurvantu maitrīṃ satataṃ prajāsu divā ca rātrau ca carantu dharmam//4// iti/
S01divyav_u:9918: te dṛṣṭasatyāḥ kathayanti--labhemo vayaṃ bhadanta saṃgharakṣita svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:9932: āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:9943: 211.003 athāyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājastata eva ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:9944: 211.004 yāvat tāni pañca vaṇikśatāni bhāṇḍaṃ pratisāmayanti/
S01divyav_u:9950: sa kathayati--imāni pañca kulaputraśatānyākāṅkṣanti svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:9957: 211.010 tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:9959: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣuvaḥ saṃgharakṣito bhikṣuḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:9962: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:9963: 211.014 ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito bhagavantamidamavocat--idaṃ bhadanta kulaputrasahasramākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:9965: te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitāh--eta bhikṣuvaścarata brahmacaryam/
S01divyav_u:9966: 211.017 bhagavato vācāvasāne muṇḍāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtāḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśravaḥ pātrakarakavyagrahastā varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:9967: 211.020 ehīti caoktā hi tathāgatena muṇḍāśca saṃghāṭiparītadehāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9968: 211.022 sadyaḥ praśāntendriyā eva tasthurevaṃ sthitā buddhamanorathena//5//
S01divyav_u:9971: 211.025 arhantaḥ saṃvṛttāstraidhātukavītarāgāḥ pūrvavadyāvat pūjyāśca abhivādyāśca saṃvṛttāḥ//
S01divyav_u:9972_0: 211.027 āyuṣmān saṃgharakṣito buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati--ihāhaṃ bhadanta sattvānadrākṣaṃ
S01divyav_u:9972_1: kuḍyākārān stambhākārān vṛkṣākārān patrākārān puṣpākārān phalākārāan rajjvākārān
S01divyav_u:9975: bhagavānāha--yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:9977: 212.001 te tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuḍyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9980: 212.002 yān saṃgharakṣita sattvānādrākṣīrvṛkṣākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śrāvakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:9981: 212.003 taiḥ sāṃghikāḥ puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ paudgalikaparibhogena bhuktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9982: 212.004 te tasya karmaṇo vipākena vṛkṣākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:9997: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena tapvākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10010: tvāmevāhamasminn udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭaye prāgeva khalastokam/
S01divyav_u:10012: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena udūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10013: 212.017 yāṃstvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvānadrākṣīḥ sthālyākārāṃste kāśyapasya samyaksambbuddhasya kalpikārakā āsan/
S01divyav_u:10014: 212.018 te bhikṣūṇāṃ bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayamānāḥ sthālikāṃ bhañjate/
S01divyav_u:10016: te tasya karmaṇo vipākena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10017: 212.020 yaṃ tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita sattvamadrākṣīrmadhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati,
S01divyav_u:10018: sa kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane pravrajita āsīllābhagrāhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10019: 212.021 tena yadvārṣikaṃ lābhaṃ tad dhaimantikaṃ pariṇāmitam,
S01divyav_u:10021: 212.022 tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnastantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati//
S01divyav_u:10025: 213.002 bhikṣuvaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kuto bhadanta tena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā?
S01divyav_u:10026_1: kāśyapo nāma śāstā lokam utpannastathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
S01divyav_u:10026_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:10027: 213.005 sa evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati--etāni bhikṣavo 'raṇyāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata/
S01divyav_u:10035: kecit tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu gatvā dhyāyanti//
S01divyav_u:10036: 213.011 anyatamaśca cirajātako nāgakumāraḥ suparṇinā pakṣirājena sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāmupariṣṭādapahriyate/
S01divyav_u:10037: 213.012 yāvat tena bhikṣavo dhyānādhyayanayogamanasikārayuktā viharanto dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10039: 213.013 prasādajātaḥ saṃlakṣayati--muktā hyete āryakā evaṃvidhād duḥkhāt/
S01divyav_u:10040: 213.014 cyutaḥ kālagato vārāṇasyāṃ ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10042: 213.015 so 'pareṇa samayena kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10054: ārya, tādṛśaḥ sa duṣṭānāgo yadvayaṃ sugatigamanamapi na saṃbhāvayāmaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10061: 213.023 ihaiva tvamāgamya divase divase bhaktakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā gaccha/
S01divyav_u:10062: sa nāgabhavane divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhuktvā āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:10065: ayaṃ te upādhyāyaḥ kutra bhuktvā āgacchati?
S01divyav_u:10067: 213.025 te kathayanti--nāgabhavane divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhujya pāribhujyāgacchati/
S01divyav_u:10069: sa kathayati--ayaṃ maharddhiko mahānubhāvo yena gacchati/
S01divyav_u:10082: tau upari vihāyasā [214]prakrāntau yāvat tau nāgairdṛṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:10097: tena tasya pātraṃ gṛhītam yāvat tatraikā odanamijya(?)
S01divyav_u:10103: 214.008 sa praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam,
S01divyav_u:10105: 214.010 tasya dṛṣṭa eva dharme ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ jalaṃ syanditumārabdham/
S01divyav_u:10115: 214.015 ihasthasyaiva me bhadanta pāṇibhyāṃ syandate jalam//1//
S01divyav_u:10117: tatra bhikṣavastena nāgakumāreṇa tatprathamataḥ śraddhā pratilabdhā//
S01divyav_u:10121: 215.002 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā saṃgharakṣitena karma kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:10122: yasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahābhoge kule jāto bhagavato 'ntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam?
S01divyav_u:10124: bhagavānāha--saṃgharakṣitenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāni kṛtāni upacitāni pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:10125: 215.005 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ nāma śāstā pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:10134: 215.010 maraṇasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--yanmayā kāśyape bhagavati samyaksambuddhe 'nuttare mahādakṣiṇīye yāvadāyurbrahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam,
S01divyav_u:10136: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksambuddhenottaro nāma māṇavo varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāmavaśyabhāgīyakasya bhāvyatāyāṃ buddho,
S01divyav_u:10145: 215.016 te kathayanti--vayamapyupādhyāyameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ/
S01divyav_u:10146: 215.017 karvaṭanivāsinā janakāyena śrutaṃ glāna āryaka iti/
S01divyav_u:10151: te kathayanti--vayamapyāryameva kalyāṇamitramāgamya tasyaiva bhagavato 'ntike sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryuḥ//
S01divyav_u:10160: tasya karmaṇo vipākenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule upapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10162: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mamāntike pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtamevaṃ ca vaineyakāryaṃ kṛtam//
S01divyav_u:10163: 215.027 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākah...pūrvavat//
S01divyav_u:10166: 216.002 yo 'sau svamāṃsatanubhiryajanāni kṛtvā tāvacciraṃ karuṇayā jagato hitāya/
S01divyav_u:10167: 216.003 tasya śramasya saphalīkaraṇāya santaḥ saṃmārjitaṃ śṛṇuta sāmpratabhāṣyamāṇam//1//
S01divyav_u:10169: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharatīti sūtraṃ vaktavyam/
S01divyav_u:10172: 216.013 evamanuśrūyate--yadā bhagavān parinirvāṇakālasamaye palālanāgaṃ vinīya kumbhakārīṃ caṇḍālīṃ gopālīṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:10174: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--asyāmānanda mathurāyāṃ mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya gupto nāma gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10175: 216.015 tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāma alakṣaṇako buddho yo mama varṣaśatapatinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ bhavi(kari)ṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10177: te 'ṣṭādaśahastāmāyāmena dvādaśahastāṃ vistāreṇa caturaṅgalamātrābhiḥ śaṇakābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:10178: 216.018 eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāṃ bhaviṣyatyavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:10182: atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya śāṇakavāsī nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10185: 216.022 mathurāyāmānanda naṭo bhaṭaśca dvau bhrātarau śreṣṭhinau bhaviṣyataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10187: 216.024 etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yadidaṃ naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanam/
S01divyav_u:10188: 216.025 athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantamidamavocat--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yadīdṛśamāyuṣmānupagupto bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10190: yathā atīte 'pyadhvani tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraiva urumuṇḍaparvate trayaḥ pārśvāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10195: sa tam yūthamapahāya yatra pārśve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti,
S01divyav_u:10197: 216.030 tasya tān pratyekabuddhān dṛṣṭvā prasādo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10198: sa teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīrṇaparṇāni mūlaphalāni copanāmayati/
S01divyav_u:10200: sa vṛddhānte praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā yāvannavāntaṃ gatvā paryaṅkenopaviśati,
S01divyav_u:10207: 217.003 tataḥ sa markaṭaḥ śocitvā paridevitvā ca dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ gato yatra pañca ṛṣiśatāni prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:10222: 217.009 te 'nācāryakā anupadeśakāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmānāmukhīkṛtya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkṛtavantaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10230: 217.015 tadāpi tena vinipatitaśarīreṇāpyatraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:10231: anāgate 'pyadhvani varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama atraivorumuṇḍe parvate bahujanahitaṃ kariṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10232: 217.016 tacca yathaivaṃ tathopadarśayiṣyāmah--yadā sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā urumuṇḍe parvate vihāraḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10236: 217.018 sa yāvat samanvāharati--yo 'sau tasya putra upagupto nāṃnā alakṣa.ṅko buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10240: 217.021 sa yadā abhiprasannastadā sthaviraḥ saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdhamekadivasaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10243: 217.023 yāvadgupto gandhikaḥ sthaviraṃ śāṇakavāsinamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--na khalu āryasya kaścit paścāccchramaṇah?
S01divyav_u:10256: 217.029 sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamadhigamyovāca--vatsa,
S01divyav_u:10279: 218.007 yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī samanvāharati--kimayaṃ sa upaguptah?
S01divyav_u:10282: yāvadguptasya gāndhikasya tṛtīyaḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇamasamprāptaśca divyavarṇam/
S01divyav_u:10283: 218.009 tasya vistareṇa jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā upagupta iti nāma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:10302: kīdṛśāste cittacetasikāḥ pravartante kliṣṭā vā akliṣṭā veti?
S01divyav_u:10307: yadi kevalaṃ cittaṃ parijñātuṃ na śakyasi,
S01divyav_u:10309: 218.020 tena tasya kṛṣṇikapaṭṭikā dattā pāṇḍurikā ca/
S01divyav_u:10326: tasyā dāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ gatvā gandhān krīṇāti/
S01divyav_u:10331: upagupto gāndhikadārako rūpasampannaścāturyamādhuryasampannaśca dharmeṇa vyavahāraṃ karori/
S01divyav_u:10332: 218.031 śrutvā ca vāsavadattāyā upaguptasakāśe sānurāgaṃ cittamutpannam/
S01divyav_u:10338: 219.002 tasyā buddhirutpannā--niyataṃ pañca purāṇaśatāni notsahate dātum/
S01divyav_u:10339: tayā yāvaddāsī upaguptasakāśaṃ preṣitā--na mamāryaputrasakāśāt kārṣāpaṇenāpi prayojanam/
S01divyav_u:10344: anyataraśca sārthavāha uttarāpathāt pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyaṃ gṛhītvā mathurāmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10347: 219.007 sa pañca puraṇaśatāni gṛhītvā bahūṃśca prābhṛtān vāsavadattāyāḥ sakāśāmabhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10348: 219.008 tato vāsavadattayā lobhākṛṣṭena taṃ śreṣṭhiputraṃ praghātayitvā^vaskare prakṣipya sārthavāhena saha ratimanubhutā/
S01divyav_u:10352: vāsavadattāṃ hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne chorayantu/
S01divyav_u:10353: 219.011 yāvat tairvāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
S01divyav_u:10354: 219.012 yāvadupaguptena śrutam--vāsavadattā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca cchittvā śmaśāne choritā/
S01divyav_u:10355: 219.013 tasya buddhirutpannā--pūrvaṃ tayā mama viṣayanimittaṃ darśanamākāṅkṣitam/
S01divyav_u:10356: idānīṃ tu tasyā hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca vikārtitau,
S01divyav_u:10360: 219.017 mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānāṃ śreyastadāsyāstu na darśanaṃ syāt//2//
S01divyav_u:10361: 219.019 idānīṃ tu tasyāḥ kāle 'yaṃ draṣṭuṃ gatamānarāgaharṣāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10364: 219.022 tasyāśca preṣikā pūrvaguṇānurāgāt samīpe 'vasthitā kākādīn nivārayati/
S01divyav_u:10366: yasya tvayā ahaṃ sakāśaṃ punaḥ punaranupreṣitā,
S01divyav_u:10372: 219.028 tataḥ preṣikāmuvāca--yau hastapādau karṇanāsaṃ ca maccharīrādvikartitau,
S01divyav_u:10376: tato vāsavadattā upaguptamagrataḥ sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--āryaputra,
S01divyav_u:10377: yadā maccharīraṃ svasthabhūtaṃ viṣayaratyanukūlaṃ tadā mayā āryaputrasya punaḥ punardūtī visarjitā/
S01divyav_u:10380: idānīṃ mama hastapādau karṇanāsau ca vikartitau,
S01divyav_u:10384: 220.005 babhūva gātraṃ mama darśanakṣamaṃ tadā na dṛṣṭo 'si mayālpabhāgyayā//5//
S01divyav_u:10385: 220.007 etarhi kiṃ draṣṭumihāgato 'si yadā śarīraṃ mama darśanākṣamam/
S01divyav_u:10391: 220.016 nirīkṣyamāṇā api yatnavadbhir nāpyatra dṛṣṭāsi bhavedyathāvat//8//
S01divyav_u:10392: 220.018 idaṃ tu rūpaṃ tava dṛśyametat sthitaṃ svabhāve racanādviyuktam/
S01divyav_u:10393: 220.020 te 'paṇḍitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ye prākṛte 'smin kuṇape ramante//9//
S01divyav_u:10395: 220.024 śirāsahasraiśca vṛte samantāt ko nāma rajyeta itaḥ śarīre//10//
S01divyav_u:10404: 221.006 saṃbuddhasya tu ye vacaḥ suvacasaḥ śṛṇvanti kurvantyapi te kāmāñ śramaśokaduḥkhajananān sadbhiḥ sadā garhitān/
S01divyav_u:10405: 221.008 tyaktvā kāmanimittamuktamanasaḥ śānte vane nirgatāḥ pāram yānti bhavārṇavasya mahataḥ saṃśritya mārgaplavam//14//
S01divyav_u:10409: 221.012 me tvāṃ sādhuṃ samāsādya buddhasya vacanaṃ śrutam//15//
S01divyav_u:10410: 221.013 yāvadupaguptena vāsavadattāyā anupūrvikāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
S01divyav_u:10412: tenātmīyayā dharmadeśanayā sahasatyābhisamayādanāgāmiphalaṃ vāsavadattayā ca srotāpattiphalaṃ prāptam/
S01divyav_u:10417: eṣāhaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharma ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ cetyāha--
S01divyav_u:10419: 221.024 tamamarabudhajanamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//17// iti//
S01divyav_u:10420: 221.025 yāvadupagupto vāsavadattāṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10422: 221.026 devataiśca mathurāyāmārocitam--vāsavadattayā upaguptasakāśāddharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni,
S01divyav_u:10424: 221.027 śrutvā ca mathurāvāsatavyena janakāyena vāsavadattāyāḥ śarīre pūjā kṛtā//
S01divyav_u:10425: 221.029 yāvat sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamabhigamyovāca--anujānīhi upaguptaṃ pravrājayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:10428: yadā na lābho na cchedo bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:10430: 221.031 yāvat sthaviraśāṇakavāsinā ṛddhyā tathā adhiṣṭhitam yathā [222]
S01divyav_u:10436: 222.002 tataḥ sthaviraḥ śāṇakavāsī guptaṃ gāndhikamuvāca--ayaṃ hi bhagavatā buddhena nirdiṣṭo mama varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:10439: 222.004 tataḥ sthavireṇa śāṇakavāsinā upagupto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatanaṃ nītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10444: tvaṃ bhagavatā nirdiṣṭo vaiṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mamopagupto nāma bhikṣurbhaviṣyatyalakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10446: 222.008 eṣo 'gro me ānanda śrāvakāṇāmavavādakānām yaduta upagupto bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:10450: mathurāyāṃ ca śabdo visṛtah--upagupto nāmālakṣaṇako buddho 'dya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:10455: paśyati pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanā kṛtā/
S01divyav_u:10456: 222.014 so 'pi pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10465: 222.018 yāvat dvitīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyasamprakāśanāyāmārabdhāyāṃ māreṇa cāsyāṃ parṣadi suvarṇavarṣamutsṛṣṭam,
S01divyav_u:10470: 222.021 yāvat tṛtīye śivase bahutarako janakāyo nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10473: 222.023 yāvat tṛtīye 'pi divase sthaviropaguptaḥ pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyā nyārabdhaḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
S01divyav_u:10477: 222.025 yāvadvītarāgo janakāyo divyāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā divyāṃśca śabdāñ śrutvā māreṇākṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10479: praītimanasā māreṇa sthaviropaguptasya śirasi mālā buddhā/
S01divyav_u:10482: 222.028 tasya buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ māro bhagavacchāsane mahāntaṃ vyākṣepaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:10485: tasya ca vinayāt sattvānugrahādahaṃ bhagavatā alakṣaṇako buddho nirdiṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10486: 222.030 yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ samanvāharati--kimasya vinayakāla upasthita āhosvinneti?
S01divyav_u:10488: 222.031 tataḥ sthaviropaguptena trayaḥ kuṇapā gṛhītāh--ahikṛṇapaṃ kurkurakuṇapaṃ manuṣyakuṇapam/
S01divyav_u:10490: 223.001 dṛṣṭvā ca mārasya prītirutpannā--upagupto 'pi mayā ākṛṣṭa iti/
S01divyav_u:10497: 223.005 bhikṣujanapratikūlā mālā baddhā yathaiva me bhavatā/
S01divyav_u:10499: 223.007 yatte balaṃ bhavati tatpratidarśayasva buddhātmajena hi sahādya samāgato 'si/
S01divyav_u:10502: paramapi ca svayamanupraviśya pipīlika ivādrirājamapanayituṃ na śaśāka/
S01divyav_u:10504: 223.013 yadi moktuṃ na śakyāmi kaṇṭhāt śvakuṇapaṃ svayam/
S01divyav_u:10507: 223.016 brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ śatakratuṃ vā dīptaṃ vā praviśa hutāśamarṇavaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:10508: 223.018 na kledaṃ na ca pariśoṣaṇaṃ na bhedaṃ kaṇṭhasthaṃ kuṇapamidaṃ tu yāsyatīha//21//
S01divyav_u:10515: 223.026 kāmaṃ mamāpi mahadasti balaṃ tathāpi nāhaṃ tathāgatasutasya balena tulyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10516: 223.028 tejasvināṃ na khalu na jvalane 'sti kiṃ tu nāsau dyutirhutavahe ravimaṇḍale yā//24//
S01divyav_u:10520: 224.002 śaghrīṃ tameva śaraṇaṃ vraja yaṃ sametya bhraṣṭo hi yaḥ kṣititale bhavatīha janturuttiṣṭhati kṣitimasāvavalambya bhūyaḥ//25//
S01divyav_u:10523: 224.008 tasya buddhasya sāmarthya pramātuṃ ko nu śaknuyāt//26//
S01divyav_u:10528: 224.014 mohāndhena hi tatra tatra sa mayā taistair nayaiḥ kheditastenāhaṃ ca tathāpi nāma balinā naivāpriyaṃ śrāvitaḥ//28//
S01divyav_u:10529: 224.016 atha kāmadhātvadhipatirmāro nāstyanyā gatiranyatropaguptakādeveti jñātvā sarvamutsṛjya sthaviropaguptasamīpamupetya pādayor nipatyovāca--bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:10530: kimaviditametadbhadantasya yathā bodhimūlamupādāya mayā bhagavato vipriyaśatāni kṛtāni? kutah?
S01divyav_u:10534: 224.022 sa mayāyāsito nātho na cāhaṃ tena hiṃsitaḥ//30//
S01divyav_u:10540: 224.026 kiṃ sarṣapeṇa samatāṃ nayasīha meruṃ khadyotakena raviṃ maṇḍalinā samudram/
S01divyav_u:10541: 224.028 anyā hi sā daśabalasya kṛpā prajāsu na śrāvakasya hi mahākaruṇāsti saumya//32//
S01divyav_u:10546: 225.002 brūhi brūhi śrīmatastasya bhāvaṃ saṅgaṃ chettuṃ kṣāntiguptavratasya/
S01divyav_u:10547: 225.004 yo 'sau mohānnityamāyāsito me tenāhaṃ ca prekṣito maitryeṇaiva//34//
S01divyav_u:10550: na ca buddhāvropitānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanyat prakṣālanamanyatra tathāgataprasādādeva/
S01divyav_u:10552: 225.009 tvaṃ nāpriyamiha proktaḥ priyāṇyeva tu lambhitaḥ//35//
S01divyav_u:10553: 225.010 nyāyenānena bhaktistava hṛdi janitā tenāgramatinā svalpāpi hyatra bhaktirbhavati matimatāṃ nirvāṇaphaladā/
S01divyav_u:10554: 225.012 saṃkṣepādyatkṛtaṃ te vṛjinamiha mune mohāndhamanasā sarvaṃ prakṣālitaṃ tattava hṛdayagataiḥ śraddhāmbuvisaraiḥ//36//
S01divyav_u:10556: 225.015 sthāne mayā bahuvidhaṃ parikhedito 'sau prāk siddhitaśca bhuvi siddhamanorathena/
S01divyav_u:10557: 225.017 sarvaṃ ca marṣitamṛṣipravareṇa tena putrāparādha iva sānunayena pitrā//37//
S01divyav_u:10558: 225.019 sa buddhaprasādāpyāyitamanāḥ suciraṃ buddhaguṇānanusmṛtya sthavirasya padayor nipatyovāca--
S01divyav_u:10559: 225.020 anugraho paraḥ kṛtastvayā niveśitam yanmayi buddhagauravam/
S01divyav_u:10560: 225.022 idaṃ tu kaṇṭhavyavalambi maitryā maharṣikopābharaṇaṃ visarjaya//38//
S01divyav_u:10563: sthavira uvāca--adyaprabhṛti bhikṣavo na viheṭhayitavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:10572: 225.029 trailokyanāthasya kāñcanādrinibhastasya na dṛṣṭo rūpakāyo me/
S01divyav_u:10574: 226.003 priyamadhikamato hi nāstiṃ me daśabalarūpakutūhalo hyāham//39//
S01divyav_u:10575: 226.005 māra uvāca--tena hi mamāpi samayaḥ śrūyatām/
S01divyav_u:10578: 226.008 buddhānusmṛtipeśalena manasā pūjām yadi tvaṃ mayi svalpāmapyupadarśayiṣyasi vibho dagdho bhaviṣyāmyaham/
S01divyav_u:10579: 226.010 kā śaktirmama vītarāgavihitāṃ soḍhuṃ praṇāmakriyāṃ hastanyāsamivodvahanti na gajasyairaṇḍavṛkṣāṅkurāḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:10584: 226.014 śūraṃ vañcayituṃ purā vyavasitenottaptahemaprabhaṃ bauddhaṃ rūpamacintyabuddhivibhavādāsīnmayā yatkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:10585: 226.016 kṛtvā rūpamahaṃ tadeva nayanaprahlādikaṃ dehināmeṣo 'pyarkamayūkhajālamamalaṃ bhāmaṇḍalenākṣipan//42//
S01divyav_u:10586: 226.018 atha sthavirah evamastu ityuktvā taṃ kuṇapamapanīya tathāgatarūpadarśanotsuko 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10587: 226.019 māraśca vanagahanamanupraviśya buddharūpaṃ kṛtvā naṭa iva suruciranepathyastasmādvanagahanādārabdho nikṣramitum/
S01divyav_u:10591_1: dakṣiṇe pārśve sthaviraśāradvatīputraṃ vāmapārśve sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanaṃ pṛṣṭhataścāyuṣmantamānandaṃ
S01divyav_u:10596: 227.005 sa buddhāvalambanayā smṛtyā tathāpyāsaktamanāḥ saṃvṛtto yathā buddhaṃ bhagavantamahaṃ paśyāmīti vyaktamupāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10599: 227.008 vaktreṇābhibhavatyayaṃ hi kamalaṃ nīlotpalaṃ cakṣuṣā kāntyā puṣpavanaṃ ghanaṃ priyatayā candraṃ samāptadyutim/
S01divyav_u:10600: 227.010 gāmbhīryeṇa mahodadhiṃ sthiratayā meruṃ raviṃ tejasā gatyā siṃhamavekṣitena vṛṣabhaṃ varṇena cāmīkaram//45//
S01divyav_u:10601: 227.012 sa bhūyasyā mātrayā harṣaṇāpūryamāṇahṛdayo vyāpinā svareṇovāca--
S01divyav_u:10605: 227.017 tenedaṃ jananetrakāntamamalaṃ rūpaṃ samutthāpitam yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ripurapyabhipramuditaḥ syātkiṃ punarmadvidhaḥ//47//
S01divyav_u:10606: 227.019 saṃbuddhālambanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ vismṛtya buddhasaṃjñāmadhiṣṭhāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa mārasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10607: 227.020 atha māraḥ sasambhramo 'bravīt--evaṃ taṃ bhadanta nārhasi samayaṃ vyatikramitum/
S01divyav_u:10609: māra uvāca--nanu pratijñātaṃ bhadantena--nāhaṃ bhavantaṃ praṇamiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:10611: 227.024 na khalu na viditaṃ me yasya vādipradhāno jalavihata ivāgnir nirvṛtiṃ saṃprayātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10612: 227.026 api tu nayanakāntāmākṛtiṃ tasya dṛṣṭvā tamṛṣimabhinato 'haṃ tvāṃ tu nābhyarcayāmi//48//
S01divyav_u:10616: yathā tvaṃ naiva mayā abhyarcito bhavasi,
S01divyav_u:10617: na ca mayā samayātikramaḥ kṛta iti/
S01divyav_u:10623: yāvaccaturthe divase māraḥ svayameva mathurāyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣitumārabdhah--yo yuṣmākaṃ svargāpavargasukhaṃ prārthayate,
S01divyav_u:10625: yaiśca yuṣmābhistathāgato na dṛṣṭaste sthaviropaguptaṃ paśyantu iti/
S01divyav_u:10628: 228.011 svargāpavargāya ca yasya vāñchā sa śraddhayā dharmamataḥ śṛṇotu//51//
S01divyav_u:10629: 228.013 dṛṣṭo na yairvā dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:10631: 228.017 yāvanmathurāyāṃ śabdo visṛtah--sthaviropaguptena māro vinīta iti/
S01divyav_u:10632: śrutvā ca yadbhūyasā mathurāvāstavyo janakāyaḥ sthaviropaguptasakāśaṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10633: 228.018 tataḥ sthaviropagupto 'nekeṣu brāhamaṇaśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu siṃha iva nirbhīḥ siṃhāsanamabhirūḍhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10635: 228.020 māṃ prati na te śakyaṃ siṃhāsanamaviduṣā samabhiroḍhum/
S01divyav_u:10636: 228.021 yaḥ sa siṃhāsanastho mṛga iva sa hi yāti saṃkocam//53//
S01divyav_u:10637: 228.022 siṃha iva yastu nirbhīr ninadati pravarāridarpanāśārtham/
S01divyav_u:10639: 228.024 yāvat sthaviropaguptena pūrvakālakaraṇīyāṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā satyāni saṃprakāśitāni/
S01divyav_u:10646: 228.028 tatra corumuṇḍaparvate guhā aṣṭadaśahastā dairdhyeṇa dvādaśahastā vistāreṇa/
S01divyav_u:10647: yadā te kṛtakaraṇīyāḥ saṃvṛttāstadā sthaviropaguptenābhihitam--yo madīyenāvavādena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati,
S01divyav_u:10650: 228.031 tasya yāvadāsamudrāyām {pṛthivyām} śabdo visṛtah--mathurāyāmupaguptanāmā[229] avavādakānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:10651_0: 229.001 tadyathā hi vinītakāmadhātvīśvare dvitīyaśāstṛkalpe mahātmani sthaviropagupte
S01divyav_u:10655: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:10660: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ sābhisaṃskāraṃ nagaradvāramindrakīle pādau vyavasthāpayanti,
S01divyav_u:10667: vatsā dāmāni cchittvā mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti/
S01divyav_u:10673: 229.021 aparāhatāni ca vāditrabhāṇḍāni madhuraṃ śabdaṃ niścārayanti/
S01divyav_u:10677: iyaṃ ca tasmin samaye pṛthivī ṣaḍanikāraṃ prakampate/
S01divyav_u:10681: 229.024 itīme cānye cādbhutadharmāḥ prādurbhavanti bhagavato nagarapraveśe/
S01divyav_u:10685: 229.030 atha buddhapraveśakālaniyataiḥ prātihāryairāvarhjitāḥ strīmanuṣyāstannagaramanilabalacalitabhinnavīcītaraṅgakṣubhitamiva mahāsamudraṃ vimuktoccanādaṃ babhūva/
S01divyav_u:10689: 230.001 [230]niṃnā connamate natāvanamate buddhānubhāvānmahī sthāṇuḥ śarkarakaṇḍakavyapagato nirdoṣatām yāti ca/
S01divyav_u:10690: 230.002 andhā mūkajaḍendriyāśca puruṣā vyaktendriyāstatkṣaṇaṃ saṃvādyantyanighaṭṭitāśca nagare nandanti tūryakhanāḥ//57//
S01divyav_u:10691: 230.005 sarvaṃ ca tannagaraṃ sūryasahasrātirekayā kanakamarīcivarṇayā buddhaprabhayā sphuṭaṃ babhūva/
S01divyav_u:10693: 230.007 sūryaprabhāmavabhartsya hi tasya bhābhirvyāptaṃ jagatsakalameva sakānanastham/
S01divyav_u:10694: 230.009 saṃprāpya ca pravaradharmakathābhirāmo lokaṃ surāsuranaraṃ hi samuktabhāvam//58//
S01divyav_u:10701: 230.013 yāvajjayena dārakena saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10705: 230.018 dhīreṇa vaktreṇa kṛtaprasādaḥ pāṃśuṃ dadau jātijarāntakāya//59//
S01divyav_u:10706: 230.020 sa bhagavate pratipādayitvā praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdhah--anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena ekacchatrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā syām,
S01divyav_u:10708: 230.022 tato munistasya niśābhya bhāvaṃ bālasya samyakpraṇidhiṃ ca buddhvā/
S01divyav_u:10709: 230.024 iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ kṣṛtravaśena dṛṣṭvā jagrāha pāṃśuṃ karuṇāyamānaḥ//60//
S01divyav_u:10712: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ vidarśayanti,
S01divyav_u:10717: te saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīciparyanteṣu gatvā ye śītanarakāsteṣūṣṇībhūtvā nipatanti,
S01divyav_u:10728: 231.004 te nirmite cittāni prasādayitvā narakavedanīyāni karmāṇi kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:10761: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato vāme karatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10764: 231.027 nākāraṇaṃ śaṅkhamṛṇālagauraṃ smitaṃ vidarśayanti jinā jitārayaḥ//36//
S01divyav_u:10765: 231.029 tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya vīra buddhyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:10771: 232.004 api tu sahetu sapratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitamupadarśayanti/
S01divyav_u:10772: 232.005 paśyasi tvamānanda dārakam yena tathāgatasya pātre pāṃśvañjaliḥ prakṣiptah?
S01divyav_u:10774: 232.006 ayamānanda dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāṃnā rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā,
S01divyav_u:10779: 232.010 astaṃgate mayi bhaviṣyati ekarājā yo 'sau hyaśoka iti nāma viśālakīrtiḥ/
S01divyav_u:10781: 232.014 ayamasya deyadharmo yattathāgatasya pāṃśvañjaliḥ pātre pakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10782: yāvadbhagavatā teṣāṃ sarva āyuṣmate ānandāya dattāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10785: 232.016 yāvadāyuṣmatā ānandena teṣāṃ sagomayena miśrayitvā yatra caṃkramati bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:10787: 232.018 tena khalu punaḥ samayena rājagṛhe bimbisāro rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:10798: pāṭaliputre nagare biṃdusāro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:10801: 232.023 tena ca samayena campāyāṃ nagaryāmanyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10802: tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī/
S01divyav_u:10803: 232.024 sā naimittikairvyākṛtā--āsyā dārikāyā rājā bhartā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10809: sa tāṃ duhitaraṃ grahāya pāṭaliputraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10810: 232.027 tena sā sarvālaṃkārairvibhūṣayitvā rājño bindusārasya bhāryārthamanupradattā--iyaṃ hi devakanyā dhanyā praśastā ceti/
S01divyav_u:10816: 232.031 sā rājñaḥ kṛśaśmaśruṃ prasādhayati yāvat suśikṣitā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:10819: 233.001 yāvat rājñā prītena vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ tvaṃ varamicchasīti?
S01divyav_u:10820: tayā abhihitam--devena me saha samāgamaḥ syāt/
S01divyav_u:10835: tasya vistareṇa jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kumārasya bhavatu nāma?
S01divyav_u:10842: atha rājā bindusāraha kumāraṃ parīkṣitukāmaḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaṃ parivrājakamāmantrayate--upādhyāya,
S01divyav_u:10844: piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakaḥ kathayati--tena hi deva kumārānādāya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ nirgaccha,
S01divyav_u:10857: aśokaḥ kathayati--rājā adya suvarṇamaṇḍape udyāne kumārān parīkṣayati/
S01divyav_u:10859: yāvadaśokastasmin mahallake 'bhiruhya suvarṇamaṇḍapamudyānaṃ gatvā kumārāṇāṃ madhye 'tra pṛthivyāṃ prastīrya niṣasāda/
S01divyav_u:10871: āha--yasya yānaṃ śobhanaṃ sa rājā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10887: aśokaḥ kathayati--abhedena vyākṛtam--yasya yānamagramāsanaṃ pānaṃ bhājanaṃ ceti,
S01divyav_u:10890: 234.003 mama hastiskandham yānaṃ pṛthivī āsanaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ bhājanaṃ śālyodanaṃ dadhivyañjanaṃ pānīyaṃ pānamiti//
S01divyav_u:10891: 234.005 tataḥ piṅgalavatsājīvaḥ parivrājakah aśoko rājā bhaviṣyatīti tasya mātaramārabdhaḥ sevitum/
S01divyav_u:10893: kataraḥ kumāro rājño bindusārasyātyayādrājā bhaviṣyatīti? āha--aśokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10900: 234.010 atha rājño bindusārasya takṣaśilā nāma nagaraṃ viruddham/
S01divyav_u:10901: tatra rājñā bindusāreṇa aśoko visarjitah--gaccha kumāra,
S01divyav_u:10912: 234.016 śrutvā takṣaśilānivāsinaḥ paurā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārge śobhāṃ kṛtvā pūrṇaghaṭamādāya pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10913: 234.017 pratyudgamya ca kathayanti--na vayaṃ kumārasya viruddhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:10915: api tu duṣṭāmātyā asmākaṃ paribhavaṃ kurvanti/
S01divyav_u:10919: tena tau vṛttyā saṃvibhaktau tasyāgrataḥ parvatān saṃchindantau saṃprasthitau/
S01divyav_u:10923: 234.023 yāvat susīmaḥ kumāra udyānāt pāṭaliputraṃ praviśati/
S01divyav_u:10925: 234.024 tasya susīmena kumāreṇa trīḍābhiprāyatayā khaṭakā pātitā/
S01divyav_u:10929: 234.026 tathā kariṣyāmi yathā rājaiva na bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:10940: 234.030 yāvadamātyairaśokaḥ kumāro haridrayā pralipto lakṣāṃ ca lohapātre kvāthayitvā kvathitena rasena lohapātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā chorayanti--aśokaḥ kumāro glānībhūta iti/
S01divyav_u:10942: tadā amātyairaśokaḥ kumāraḥ sarvālaṃkārairbhūṣayitvā[235] rājño bindusārasyopanītah--imaṃ tāvadrājye pratiṣṭhāpaya/
S01divyav_u:10946: aśokena cābhihitam--yadi mama dharmeṇa rājyaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:10949: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bindusārasya rājña uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ mukhādāgatam yāvatkālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10958: aśokenāpi pāṭaliputre nagare ekasmin dvāre eko nagnaḥ sthāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:10962: 235.009 rādhaguptena ca pūrvasmin dvāre yantramayo hastī sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10963: aśokasya ca pratimāṃ parikhāṃ khanayitvā khadirāṅgāraiśca pūrayitvā tṛṇenācchādya pāṃśunākīrṇā/
S01divyav_u:10971: 235.014 yadā aśoko rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ sa tairamātyairavajñayā dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:10975: api tu kaṇṭakavṛkṣāṃś chittvā puṣpavṛkṣān phalavṛkṣāṃśca paripālayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:10977: tato rājñā ruṣitena asiṃ niṣkośaṃ kṛtvā pañcānāmamātyaśatānāṃ śiraṃsi cchinnāni/
S01divyav_u:10978: 235.018 yāvadrājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayenāntaḥpuraparivṛto vasantakālasamaye puṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu pūrvanagarasyodyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:10979: 235.019 tatra ca paribhramatā aśokavṛkṣaḥ supuṣpito dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10980: 235.020 tato rājño mamāpi sahanāmā ityanunayo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10984: tasyāntaḥpureṇa roṣeṇa tasmādaśokavṛkṣāt puṣpāṇi śākhāśca cchinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:10989: 235.023 śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣajātena pañca strīśatāni kiṭikaiḥ saṃveṣṭya dagdhāni/
S01divyav_u:10990: 235.024 tasyemānyaśubhānyālokya caṇḍo rājā caṇḍāśoka iti vyavasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:10993: 235.026 api tu devasya vadhyaghātakāḥ puruṣāḥ sthāpayitavyāḥ,
S01divyav_u:11000: 235.029 caṇḍo duṣṭātmā mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca paribhāṣate,
S01divyav_u:11002: pipīlikān makṣikān mūṣikān matsyāṃśca jālena baḍiśena praghātayati/
S01divyav_u:11003: 235.031 caṇḍo dārakastasya caṇḍagirika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:11025: yastatra praviśettasya na bhūyo nirgama iti/
S01divyav_u:11030_0: yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
S01divyav_u:11030_1: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya ayoguḍānādīptān pradīptān
S01divyav_u:11032: jahvāmapi kaṇṭhamapi kaṇṭhamapi hṛdayamapi hṛdayasāmantamapi antrāṇyantraguṇānapi dagdhvā adhaḥ pragharati/
S01divyav_u:11033: 236.016 evaṃ duḥkhā hi bhikṣavo nārakāḥ sattvā narakeṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11034_0: 236.017 yāvannarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālibhūtāyāmuttānakān
S01divyav_u:11034_1: pratiṣṭhāpya ayomayena viṣkambhakena mukhadvāraṃ viṣkambhya kvathitaṃ tāmramāsye prakṣipanti,
S01divyav_u:11039_0: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvālībhūtāyāmavānmukhān
S01divyav_u:11039_3: saṃpratakṣṇuvanti aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi vṛttamapi maṇḍalamapi
S01divyav_u:11041_0: santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmau ādīptāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:11042: aṣṭāṃśamapi ṣaḍaṃśamapi caturasnamapi maṇḍalamapi unnatamapi avanatamapi śāntamapi viśāntamapi takṣṇuvanti/
S01divyav_u:11044_0: 236.031 santi sattvā narakeṣūpapannā yānnarakapālā gṛhītvā ayomayyāṃ bhūmāvādīptāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:11044_1: pradīptāyāṃ saṃprajvalitāyāmekajvalībhūtāyāmuttānakān pratiṣṭhāpya pañcaviṣaṭabandhanāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayanti,
S01divyav_u:11049: evaṃ pañca vedanā iti kurute sadṛśāśca kāraṇāḥ sattvānāmārabdhāḥ kārayitum//
S01divyav_u:11050: 237.004 yāvat śrāvastyāmanyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ patnyā saha mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11057: 237.007 sa ca samudraḥ sārthavāhaputro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11059: 237.008 sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya pāṭaliputraṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11070: 237.015 durlabhaṃ prāpya mānuṣyaṃ pravrajyāṃ ca sukhodayām/
S01divyav_u:11075: tataḥ sakaruṇairvacanaistaṃ bhikṣuḥ kramam yācati sma māsam yāvat/
S01divyav_u:11077: sa khalu maraṇabhayodvignahṛdayaḥ saptarātreṇa me na bhavitavyamiti vyāyatamatiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:11078_0: 237.020 atha saptame divase 'śokasya rājño 'ntaḥpurikāṃ kumāreṇa saha saṃraktāṃ nirīkṣamāṇāṃ
S01divyav_u:11078_1: saṃlapantīṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sahadarśanādeva ruṣitena rājñā tau dvāvapi taṃ cārakamanupreṣitau /
S01divyav_u:11083: 237.025 kva tadvadanakāntitvaṃ gātraśobhā kva sā gatā/
S01divyav_u:11087: 237.029 tena tāṃ rajanīṃ kṛtsnāam yujyatā buddhaśāsane/
S01divyav_u:11107: 238.011 tatastena nirghṛṇena dāruṇahṛdayena paralokanirapekṣeṇa roṣāviṣṭena bahūdakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ nararudhiravasāmūtrapurīṣasaṃkulāyāṃ mahālohyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11115: 238.015 atha rājani samāgate prāṇisahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu sa bhikṣurvaineyakālamavekṣamāṇah--
S01divyav_u:11116: riddhiṃ samutpādya sa tanmuhūrtaṃ lohyanatarasthaḥ salilārdragātraḥ/
S01divyav_u:11117: 238.018 nirīkṣamāṇasya janasya madhye nabhastalaṃ haṃsa ivotpapāt//76//
S01divyav_u:11120: 238.021 ardhena gātreṇa vavarṣa toyamardhena jajvāla hutāśanaśca/
S01divyav_u:11121: 238.023 varṣañ jvalaṃścaiva rarāja yaḥ khe dīptaucadhiprasravaṇeva śailaḥ//77//
S01divyav_u:11124: 238.029 manuṣyatulyaṃ tava saumya rūpam ṛddhiprabhāvastu narānatītya/
S01divyav_u:11125: 238.031 na niścayaṃ tena vibho vrajāmi ko nāma bhāvastava śuddhabhāva//79//
S01divyav_u:11126: 239.001 [239]tatsāmprataṃ brūhi mamedamartham yathā prajānāmi tava prabhāvam/
S01divyav_u:11127: 239.003 jñātvā ca te dharmaguṇaprabhāvān yathābalaṃ śiṣyavadācareyam//80//
S01divyav_u:11130: mahājanahitārthaṃ ca pratipatsyata iti matvā svaguṇamudbhāvayaṃstamuvāca--
S01divyav_u:11132: 239.009 buddhasya putro vadatāṃ varasya dharmānvayaḥ sarvabhaveṣvasaktaḥ//81//
S01divyav_u:11133: 239.011 dāntena dāntaḥ puruṣarṣabheṇa śāntiṃ gatenāpi śamaṃ praṇītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11136: mahārāja, tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtah--varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare 'śoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dharmarājaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11139: 239.017 idaṃ ca devena narakasadṛśaṃ sthānameva sthāpitam yatra prāṇisahasrāṇi nipātyante/
S01divyav_u:11144: 239.022 nāthasya saṃpūrya manorathaṃ ca vistārikān dharmadharān kuruṣva//83//
S01divyav_u:11145: 239.024 atha sa rājā buddhe samupajātaprasādaḥ kṛtakarasampuṭastaṃ bhikṣuṃ kṣamayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:11147: 239.027 śaraṇamṛṣimupaimi taṃ ca buddhaṃ gaṇavaramāryaniveditaṃ ca dharmam//84//
S01divyav_u:11165: 240.008 tato rājā bhagavaccharīradhātuṃ vistarīṣyāmīti caturaṅgena balakāyena gatvā ajātaśatrupratiṣṭhāpitaṃ droṇastūpamutpāṭya śarīradhātuṃ gṛhītavān/
S01divyav_u:11166_0: 240.010 yatroddhāraṇaṃ ca vistareṇa kṛtvā dhātupratyaṃśaṃ datvā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S01divyav_u:11166_1: evaṃ dvitīyaṃ stūpaṃ vitareṇa bhaktimato yāvatsaptadroṇādgrahāya stūpāṃśca pratiṣṭhāpya rāmagrāmaṃ gataḥ /
S01divyav_u:11172: 240.014 rāmagrāme tvaṣṭamaṃ stūpamadya nāgāstatkālaṃ bhaktimanto rarakṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:11175: 240.018 yāvadrājā caturaśītikaraṇḍasahasraṃ kārayitvā sauvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṃ teṣu dhātavaḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11176: 240.019 evaṃ vistareṇa caturaśītikumbhasahasraṃ paṭṭasahasraṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ haste datvā visarjitam--āsamudrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyameṣu nagareṣu yatra koṭiḥ paripūryate,
S01divyav_u:11180: 240.023 rājā cintayati--na yadi vaistārikā dhātavo bhaviṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:11186: 240.026 yāvadrājā kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā sthavirayaśasamabhigamyovāca--ayaṃ me manorathah--ekasmin divase ekasminmuhūrte caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:11188: 240.028 ahaṃ tasmin samaye pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchādayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:11189: yāvat tasmin divase sthavirayaśasā pāṇinā sūryamaṇḍalaṃ praticchāditam/
S01divyav_u:11192: 241.001 [241]tābhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ pūrvikābhyaḥ kṛtibhyo dhātuṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sa hyupādāya mauryaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11193: 241.003 cakre stūpānāṃ śāradābhraprabhānāṃ loke sāśīti śāsadahnā sahasram//87//
S01divyav_u:11198: 241.007 āryamauryaśrīḥ sa prajānāṃ hitārthaṃ kṛtsnaṃ stūpān kārayāmāsa lokam/
S01divyav_u:11199: 241.009 caṇḍāśokatvaṃ prāpya pūrvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dharmāśokatvaṃ karmaṇā tena lebhe//88//
S01divyav_u:11203: 242.002 sa idānīmacirajātaprasādo buddhaśāsane yatra śākyaputrīyān dadarśa ākīrṇe rahasi vā,
S01divyav_u:11204: tatra śirasā pādayor nipatya vandate sma/
S01divyav_u:11205: 242.003 tasya ca yaśo nāmāmātyaḥ paramaśrāddho bhagavati/
S01divyav_u:11208: santi hi śākyaśrāmaṇerakāścaturbhyo varṇebhyaḥ pravrajitā iti/
S01divyav_u:11210: atha sa rājā kenacit kālāntareṇa sarvasacivānuvāca--vividhānāṃ prāṇināṃ śirobhiḥ karyam/
S01divyav_u:11220: 242.011 tato yaśāmātyastasyaḥ śirasaḥ pratigrāhakamanāsādya savrīḍo rājānamupetyedamarthamuvāca--
S01divyav_u:11222: 242.015 śirastvidaṃ mānuṣamapraśastaṃ na gṛhyate mūlyamṛte 'pi rājan//1//
S01divyav_u:11223: 242.017 atha sa rājā tamamātyamuvāca--kimidamitīdaṃ mānuṣaśiro na kaścidgṛhṇātīti?
S01divyav_u:11232: tataḥ sa rājā tamamātyaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratyādiśannimamarthamuvāca--haṃ bhoḥ,
S01divyav_u:11236: 242.024 vināpi mūlyairvijugupsitatvāt pratigrahītā bhuvi yasya nāsti/
S01divyav_u:11237: 242.026 śirastadāsādya mameha puṇyam yadyarjitaṃ kiṃ viparītamatra//2//
S01divyav_u:11238: 242.028 jātiṃ bhavān paśyati śākyabhikṣuṣvantargatāṃsteṣu guṇānna ceti/
S01divyav_u:11240: 243.001 [243]āvāhakāle 'tha vivāhakāle jāteḥ parīkṣā na tu dharmakāle/
S01divyav_u:11241: 243.003 dharmakriyāyā hi guṇā nimittā guṇāśca jātiṃ na vicārayanti//4//
S01divyav_u:11244: 243.007 cittavaśena hi puṃsāṃ kalevaraṃ nindyate 'tha satkriyate/
S01divyav_u:11246: 243.009 yadi guṇaparivarjito dvijātiḥ patita iti prathito 'pi yātyavajñām/
S01divyav_u:11247: 243.011 na tu nidhanakulodgato 'pi jantuḥ śubhaguṇayukta iti praṇamya pūjyaḥ//7//
S01divyav_u:11249: 243.014 kiṃ te kāruṇikasya śākyavṛṣabhasyaitadvaco na śrutaṃ prājñaiḥ sāramasārakebhya iha yannṛbhyo grahītuṃ kṣamam/
S01divyav_u:11250: 243.016 tasyānanyathavādino yadi ca tāmājñāṃ cikīrṣāmyahaṃ vyāhantuṃ ca bhavān yadi prayatate naitat suhṛllakṣaṇam//8//
S01divyav_u:11251: 243.018 ikṣukṣodavadujijñato bhuvi yadā kāyo mama svapsyati pratyutthānanamaskṛtāñjalipuṭakleśakriyāsvakṣamaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11252: 243.020 kāyenāhamanena kiṃ nu kuśalaṃ śakṣyāmi kartuṃ tadā tasmānnāryamataḥ śmaśānanidhanāt sāraṃ grahītuṃ mayā//9//
S01divyav_u:11258: 243.028 na bhavati bahu śocyam yadvadevaṃ śarīre sucaritahṛtasāre naiti śoko 'ntakāle//12//
S01divyav_u:11259: 244.001 [244]sucaritavimukhānāṃ garvitānām yadā tu prasabhamiha hi mṛtyuḥ kāyakumbhaṃ bhinatti/
S01divyav_u:11260: 244.003 dahati hṛdayameṣāṃ śokavahnistadānīṃ dadhighaṭa iva bhagne sarvaśo 'prāptasāre//13//
S01divyav_u:11261: 244.005 kartuṃ vighnamato na me 'rhati bhavān kāyapraṇāmaṃ prati śreṣṭho 'smītyaparīkṣako hi gaṇayan mohāndhakārāvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11262: 244.007 kāyam yastu parīkṣate daśabalavyāhāradīpairbudho nāsau pārthivabhṛtyayorviṣamatāṃ kāyasya saṃpaśyati//14//
S01divyav_u:11263: 244.009 tvagmāṃsāsthiśirāyakṛtprabhṛtayo bhāvā hi tulyā nṛṇāmāhāryaistu vibhūṣaṇairadhikatā kāyasya niṣpadyate/
S01divyav_u:11264: 244.011 etatsāramiheṣyate tu yadimaṃ niśritya kāyādhamaṃ pratyutthānanamaskṛtādikuśalaṃ prājñaiḥ samutthāpyate//15// iti/
S01divyav_u:11265_1: praṇāmādibhyaḥ samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ
S01divyav_u:11265_2: samutthasya phalasya bahukalpaśaḥ sthāpayitvā sumeruvanmahāpṛthivībhyaḥ sārataratāmavekṣya
S01divyav_u:11268: 244.020 tatra yaśo nāṃnā saṃghasthavira uvāca--asti mahārāja/
S01divyav_u:11269: yadā bhagavataḥ parinirvāṇakālasamaye tadā apalālaṃ nāgaṃ damayitvā kumbhakālaṃ caṇḍālīgopālīṃ ca nāgaṃ mathurāmanuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11270: tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate--asyāmānanda mathutāyāṃ varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya gupto nāṃnā gāndhiko bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:11271: 244.023 tasya putro bhaviṣyatyupagupto nāṃnā avavādakānāmagro 'lakṣaṇako buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11276: atra varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanaṃ bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:11277: 244.026 etadagraṃ me ānanda bhaviṣyati śamathānukūlānāṃ śayyāsanānām yaduta naṭabhaṭikā nāmāraṇyāyatanam/
S01divyav_u:11281: 224.030 rājā āha--kiṃ punaḥ sa śuddhasattva utpannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11286: 245.001 [245]sarvajñalīlo hi sa śuddhasattvo dharmaṃ praṇītaṃ vadate gaṇāgre/
S01divyav_u:11288: 245.005 tena khalu samayena āyuṣmānupagupto 'ṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto naṭabhaṭikāraṇyāyatane prativasati/
S01divyav_u:11299: 245.016 yāvadrājñā sthaviropaguptasya sakāśaṃ dūto na preṣitaḥ sthaviradarśanāyāgamiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:11303: tato rājñā sthaviropaguptasyārthe nauyānenāgamiṣyatīti yāvacca mathurām yāvacca pāṭaliputramantarānnausaṃkramo 'vasthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11304: 245.019 atha sthaviropagupto rājño 'śokasyānugrahārthamaṣṭādaśabhirarhatsahasraiḥ parivṛto nāvamabhiruhya pāṭaliputramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11309: 245.026 śrutvā ca rājñā prītamanasā śatasahasramūlyo muktāhāraḥ svaśarīrādapanīya priyākhyāyino dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11314: 245.031 svargāpavargāya ca hetubhūtaṃ sa paśyatāṃ kāruṇikopaguptam//22//
S01divyav_u:11315: 246.001 [246]yebhir na dṛṣṭo dvipadapradhānaḥ śāstā mahākāruṇikaḥ svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:11317_0: 246.005 yāvadrājñā pāṭalipurre ghaṇṭāṃ ghoṣayitvā nagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā ardhatṛtīyāni
S01divyav_u:11317_1: yojanāni gatvā sarvavādyena sarvapuṣpagandhamālyena sarvapauraiḥ sarvāmātyaiḥ saha
S01divyav_u:11320: tadantaraṃ hastiskandhādavatīrya padmyāṃ nadītīramabhigamya ekaṃ pādaṃ nadītīre sthāpya dvitīyaṃ nauphalake sthaviropaguptaṃ sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya nau{saṃkramād} uttāritavān/
S01divyav_u:11321_0: 246.010 uttārya ca mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇopaguptasya pādayor nipatito
S01divyav_u:11321_1: mukhatuṇḍakena ca pādau anuparimārjya utthāya dvau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivītale nikṣipya
S01divyav_u:11322: 246.013 yadā mayā śatrugaṇānnihatya prāptā samudrābharaṇā saśailā/
S01divyav_u:11323: 246.015 ekātapatrā pṛthivī tadā me prītir na sā yā sthaviraṃ nirīkṣya//24//
S01divyav_u:11325: 246.019 tvadvarśanāccaiva pare 'pi śuddhyā dṛṣṭo mayādyāpratimaḥ svayambhūḥ//25//
S01divyav_u:11327: 246.022 śāntiṃ gate kāruṇike jinendre tvaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kuruṣe triloke/
S01divyav_u:11330: 246.028 vibho mamājñāṃ vada śīghramadya kartāsmi vākyaṃ śuddhasattvā//27//
S01divyav_u:11331: 247.001 [247]atha sthaviropagupto dakṣiṇena pāṇinā rājānaṃ śirasi parimārjayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:11333: 247.003 durlabhaṃ trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//28//
S01divyav_u:11334_0: 247.004 api ca mahārāja tena tena bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena tava
S01divyav_u:11334_1: ca mama {ca} śāsanamupanyastaṃ sattvasārathivareṇa gaṇamadhye parīttaṃ paripālyam yatnato 'smābhiḥ /
S01divyav_u:11340: 247.009 saṃśobhitā me pṛthivī samantādvaistārikā dhātudharāḥ kṛtāśca//29//
S01divyav_u:11342: 247.012 ātmā putraṃ gṛhaṃ dārān pṛthivī kośameva ca/
S01divyav_u:11348: 247.016 gate kāle na śocanti iṣṭam yānti surālayam//31//
S01divyav_u:11349: 247.017 yāvadrājā mahatā śrīsamudayena sthaviropaguptaṃ rājakule praveśayitvā sarvāṅgenānuparigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:11356: 247.025 dānaṃ manāpaṃ suśubhaṃ praṇītaṃ dattaṃ mayā hyapratipudgalasya/
S01divyav_u:11357: 247.027 na pāṃśudānaṃ hi mayā pradattam yathā tvayādāyi tathāgatasya//33//
S01divyav_u:11368: ayaṃ me manoratho ye bhagavatā buddhena pradeśā adhyuṣitāstānarceyam,
S01divyav_u:11370: 248.009 āha ca--ye buddhena bhagavatā pradeśā adhyuṣitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:11371: tānarcayannahaṃ gatvā cihnāni caiva kuryāṃ paścimāṃ janatāmanukampārtham/
S01divyav_u:11376: 248.013 gatvā cihnāni teṣveva kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ//37//
S01divyav_u:11377: 248.014 atha rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya gandhamālyapuṣpamādāya sthaviropaguptasahāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11378: 248.015 atha sthaviropagupto rājānamaśokaṃ sarvaprathamena lumbinīvanaṃ praveśayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin mahārāja pradeśe bhagavāñ jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11381: 248.018 jātamātreha sa muniḥ prakrāntaḥ saptapadaṃ bhuvi//38//
S01divyav_u:11384: 248.021 atha rājā sarvaśarīreṇa tatra pādayor nipatya utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:11390: 248.025 yayā dṛṣṭaḥ prajāyansa vane 'smin vadatāṃ varaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11391: 248.026 tramamāṇaḥ padān sapta śrutā vāco yayā muneḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:11393: atha sthaviropagupto yasya vṛkṣasya śākhamavalambya devī mahāmāyā prasūtā,
S01divyav_u:11395: 248.029 naivāsikā yā ihāśokavṛkṣe saṃbuddhadarśinī yā devakanyā/
S01divyav_u:11397: 249.001 [249]yāvat sā devatā svarūpeṇa sthaviropaguptasamīpe sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:11404: 249.006 śrutvāstvayā tasya nararṣabhasya vāco manojñāḥ prathamā vane 'smin//43//
S01divyav_u:11405: 249.008 devatā prāha--mayā hi dṛṣṭaḥ kanakāvadātaḥ prajāyamāno dvipadapradhānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11406: 249.011 padāni sapta kramāṇa eva śrutā ca vācamapi tasya śāstuḥ//44//
S01divyav_u:11409: devatā prāha--na śakyaṃ mayā vāgbhiḥ saṃprakāśayitum/
S01divyav_u:11412: 249.017 sasāgarāntā ca mahī saśailā mahārṇavasthā iva nauścāla//45//
S01divyav_u:11415: 249.020 atha sthaviropagupto rājānaṃ kapilavastu nivedayitvā dakṣiṇahastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyopanāmitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11416: 249.021 taṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇālaṃkṛtaśarīramasecanakadarśanaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā rājā sarvaśarīreṇa bodhisattvasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11420: tato rājñā śuddhodanena bodhisattvo devatānāmapyayaṃ deva iti tena bodhisattvasya devātideva iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:11421: 249.025 asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo brāhmaṇānāṃ naimittikānāṃ vipaścikānāmupadarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11422: 249.026 asmin pradeśe asitena ṛṣiṇā nirdiṣṭo buddho loke bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:11425: asmin pradeśe hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe śaradhanurgrahe tomaragrahe 'ṅkuśagrahe kulānurūpāsu vidyāsu pāragaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11427: asmin pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvo devatāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ ratimanubhūtavān/
S01divyav_u:11428: 249.031 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvo jīrṇāturamṛtasaṃdarśanodvigno vanaṃ saṃśritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11429: 249.032 asmin pradeśe jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣadya viviktam [250]pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhamanāśravasadṛśaṃ prathamadhyānaṃ samāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11430: 250.002 atha pariṇate madhyāhne atikrānte bhaktakālasamaye bhaktakālasamaye anyeṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyā prācīnaniṃnā prācīnapravaṇā prācīnaprāgbhārā,
S01divyav_u:11432: 250.003 dṛṣṭvā ca punā rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa bodhisattvasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11433: 250.004 anena dvāreṇa bodhisattvo devatāśatasahasraiḥ parivṛto 'rdharāteḥ kapilavastuno nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11434: 250.005 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena cchandakasyāśvamābharaṇāni ca datvā pratinivartitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11438: 250.009 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvo lubdhakasakāśāt kāśikairvastraiḥ kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi grahāya pravrajitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11445: 250.014 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ cīrṇam/
S01divyav_u:11448: 250.016 nāyaṃ mārgo hyabhijñāya iti jñātvā samutsṛjet//48//
S01divyav_u:11449: 250.017 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvena nandāyā nandabalāyāśca grāmikaduhitryoḥ sakāśāt ṣoḍaśaguṇitaṃ madhupāyasaṃ parimuktam/
S01divyav_u:11451: 250.019 asmin pradeśe nandāyā bhuktvā ca madhupāyasam/
S01divyav_u:11453: 250.021 asmin pradeśe bodhisattvaḥ kālikena nāgarājena bodhisamūlamabhigacchan saṃstutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11457: 250.025 atha rājā sthavirasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:11460: 250.028 atha kāliko nāgarājaḥ sthavirasamīpe sthitvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:11462: 250.029 atha sthaviro rājānamuvāca--ayaṃ sa mahārāja kāliko nāgarājā yena bhagavānanena mārgeṇa bodhimūlaṃ nirgacchan saṃstutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11465: 251.003 ākhyāhi me daśabalasya guṇaikadeśaṃ tatkīdṛśī vada bhavan sugate tadānīm//52//
S01divyav_u:11471_0: atha sthaviropagupto rājānaṃ bodhimūlamupanāmayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin
S01divyav_u:11471_1: pradeśe mahārāja bodhisattvena mahāmaitrīsahāyena sakalaṃ mārabalaṃ jitvā anuttarā
S01divyav_u:11473: 251.013 iha munivṛṣabheṇa bodhimūle namucibalaṃ vikṛtaṃ nirastamāśu/
S01divyav_u:11477: atha sthaviropagupto rājānamaśokamuvāca--asmin pradeśe bhagavāṃś caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sakāśāccatvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇi grahāyaikaṃ pātramadhimuktam/
S01divyav_u:11481: mupanīya dakṣiṇaṃ hastamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin pradeśe mahārāja bhagavatā triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravarjitatam/
S01divyav_u:11486: asmin pradeśe rājño bimbisārasya dharmaṃ deśitam/
S01divyav_u:11489: 251.028 asmin pradeśe bhagavatā śakrasya devendrasya dharmo deśitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11492: 251.030 asmin pradeśe bhagavān deveṣu trāyastriṃśoṣu varṣā māturjanayitryā dharmam [252]deśayitvā devagaṇaparivṛto 'vatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11493_0: 252.001 vistareṇa yāvat sthaviro rājānamaśokaṃ kuśinagarīmupanāmayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karatalamabhiprasāryovāca--asmin
S01divyav_u:11493_1: pradeśe mahārāja bhagavān sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinivṛtaḥ /
S01divyav_u:11499: atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya parivirvāṇe śatasahasraṃ datvā caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pādayor nipatyovāca--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:11500: ayaṃ me mano rathah--ye ca bhagavatā śrāvakā agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S01divyav_u:11504: sthaviro rājānamaśokaṃ jetavanaṃ praveśayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ karamabhiprasāryovāca--ayaṃ mahārāja sthaviraśāriputrasya stūpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11506: rājā āha--ke tasya tasya guṇā babhūvah?
S01divyav_u:11507: sthavira uvāca--sa hi dvitīyaśāstā dharmasenādhipatirdharmacakraparavartanaḥ prajñāvatāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:11515: 252.023 tato rājā prītamanāḥ sthaviraśāradvatīputrastūpe śatasahasraṃ datvā kṛtājñaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:11518: 252.026 yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpamupadarśannuvāca--idaṃ mahārāja sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:11521: sthavira uvāca--sa hi ṛddhimatāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:11522: yena dakṣiṇena pādāṅguṣṭhena śakrasya devendrasya vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ prakampitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11529: 253.005 yāvadrājā mahāmaudgalyāyanasya stūpe śatasahasraṃ datvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:11535: sthavira uvāca--sa hi mahātmā alpecchānāṃ saṃtuṣṭānāṃ dhutaguṇavāditāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:11544: 253.016 tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviramahākāśyapasya stūpe datvā kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:11547: 253.019 yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthaviravatkulasya stūpaṃ darśayannuvāca--idaṃ mahārāja sthavirabatkulasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:11550: sthavira uvāca--sa mahātmā alpābādhānāmagro nirdiṣṭo bhagavatā/
S01divyav_u:11557: 253.024 ājñāpradīpena manogṛhasthaṃ hataṃ tamo yadyapi kṛtaṃ hi tena yathā kṛtaṃ sattvahitaṃ tadanyaiḥ//67//
S01divyav_u:11558: 253.028 sā pratyāhatā tasyaiva rājñaḥ pādamūle nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:11559: yāvadamātyā vismitā ūcuh--aho tasya mahātmano 'lpecchatā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:11561: yāvat sthaviropaguptaḥ sthavirānandasya stūpamupadarśayannuvāca--idaṃ sthavirānandasya stūpam/
S01divyav_u:11564: 253.031 sthavira uvāca--sa hi bhagavata upasthāyako babhuva,
S01divyav_u:11574: 254.007 yattaccharīraṃ vadatāṃ varasya dharmātmano dharmamayaṃ viśuddham/
S01divyav_u:11575: 254.009 taddhāritaṃ tena viśokanāṃnā tasmādviśeṣeṇa sa pūjanīyaḥ//70//
S01divyav_u:11578: 254.015 yadā samudraṃ salilaṃ samudre kurvīta kaścinna hi goṣpadena/
S01divyav_u:11580: 254.019 atha rājā sthavirāṇāṃ stūpārcanaṃ kṛtvā sthaviropaguptasya pādayor nipatya prītimanā uvāca--
S01divyav_u:11581: 254.021 mānuṣyaṃ saphalīkṛtaṃ kratuśatairiṣṭena saṃprāpyate rājyaiśvaryaguṇaiścalaiśca vibhavaiḥ sāraṃ gṛhītaṃ param/
