S01divyav_u:11582: 254.023 lokaṃ caityaśatairalaṃkṛtamidaṃ śvetābhrakūṭaprabhairasyādyāpratimasya śāsanamidaṃ kiṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ duṣkaram//73// iti/
S01divyav_u:11584: 254.026 yāvadrājñā aśokena jātau bodhau dharmacakre parinirvāṇe ekaikaśatasahasraṃ dattam,
S01divyav_u:11585: tasya bodhau viśeṣataḥ prasādo jātah--iha bhagavatānuttarā samyaksambodhirabhisambuddheti/
S01divyav_u:11589: 254.029 tasyā buddhirutpannā--ayaṃ rājā mayā sārdhaṃ ratimanubhavati,
S01divyav_u:11592: 254.030 tayā mātaṅgī vyāharitā--śakyasi tvaṃ bodhiṃ mama sapatnīṃ praghātitum?
S01divyav_u:11602: 255.003 sarvajñatā cādhigatā narendra bodhidrumo 'sau nidhanaṃ prayāti//74//
S01divyav_u:11603: 255.005 śrutvā ca rājā mūrcchito bhūmau patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11606: 255.007 dṛṣṭvānvahaṃ taṃ drumarājamūlaṃ jānāmi dṛṣṭo 'dya mayā svayambhūḥ/
S01divyav_u:11607: 255.009 nāthadrume caiva gate praṇāśaṃ prāṇāḥ prayāsyanti mamāpi nāśam//59//
S01divyav_u:11617: 255.015 vistareṇa yāvatayā sūtraṃ muktvā vṛkṣasāmantena khanitvā divase kṣīrakumbhasahasreṇa pāyayati/
S01divyav_u:11622: 255.017 śrutvā ca prītamanā bodhivṛkṣaṃ nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca--
S01divyav_u:11627_0: 255.023 atha rājā sauvarṇarūpyavaiḍūryasphaṭikamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ sahasraṃ gandhodakena
S01divyav_u:11627_1: pūrayitvā prabhūtaṃ cānnapānaṃ samudrānīya gandhamālyapuṣpasaṃcayaṃ kṛtvā snātvā
S01divyav_u:11627_2: āhatāni vāsāṃsi navāni dīrghadaśāni prāvṛtya aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupoṣya dhūpakaṭacchukamādāya
S01divyav_u:11629: 255.027 samyaggatā ye sugatasya śiṣyāḥ śāntendriyā nirjitakāmadoṣāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11633: 256.005 vasanti kāśmīrapure suramye ye cāpi dhīrāstamasāvane 'smin/
S01divyav_u:11634: 256.007 mahāvane revatake raye 'ryā anugrahāryaṃ mama te 'bhyupeyuḥ//80//
S01divyav_u:11636: 256.011 jinasutāḥ khalu dhyānaratāḥ sadā samudayāntviha te 'dya kṛpābalāḥ//81//
S01divyav_u:11637: 256.013 śairīṣake ye pravare vimāne vasanti putrā vadatāṃ varasya/
S01divyav_u:11638: 256.015 anugrahārthaṃ mama te viśokā hyāyantu kāruṇyaniviṣṭabhāvāḥ//82//
S01divyav_u:11641: 256.019 evamukte ca rājñā trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ saṃnipatitāni/
S01divyav_u:11648: rājā āha--asti sthavira tvatsakāśādanyo vṛddhatara iti?
S01divyav_u:11652: 256.026 atha rājā kadambapuṣpavadāhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati--asti kaścidbuddhadarśī bhikṣurdhriyata iti?
S01divyav_u:11653: sthavira uāca--asti mahārāja piṇḍolabharadvājo nāṃnā buddhadarśī tiṣṭhata iti/
S01divyav_u:11663: atha sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājo 'nekairarhatsahasrairardhacandrākāreṇopagūḍho rājahaṃsa iva gaganatalādavatīrya vṛddhānte niṣasāda/
S01divyav_u:11665: 257.008 adrākṣīdrājā piṇḍolabharadvājaṃ śvetapalitaśirasaṃ pralambabhrūlalāṭaṃ nigūḍhākṣitārakaṃ pratyekabuddhāśrayam/
S01divyav_u:11666: 257.009 dṛṣṭvā ca rājā mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājasya pādayoḥ patitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11667: 257.010 mukhatuṇḍakena ca pādāvanuparimārjya utthāya tau jānumaṇḍalau pṛthivītale pratiṣṭhāpya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvājaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:11668: 257.012 yadā mayā śatrugaṇānnihatya prāptā samudrābharaṇā saśailā/
S01divyav_u:11669: 257.014 ekātaputrā pṛthaivī tadā me prītir na yā me sthaviraṃ nirīkṣya//86//
S01divyav_u:11673: 257.017 api ca sthavira dṛṣṭaste trailokyanātho gururme bhagavān buddha iti?
S01divyav_u:11674: tataḥ sthavirapiṇḍolabharadvāja ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ bhruvamunnāmya rājānamaśokam uvāca--
S01divyav_u:11680: sthavira uvāca--yadā mahārāja bhagavān vijitamāraparivāraḥ pañcabhirarhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ prathamato rājagṛhe varṣāmupagataḥ,
S01divyav_u:11685: 257.027 yadā rājagṛhe varṣā uṣitaḥ sa tathāgataḥ//88//
S01divyav_u:11687: 257.029 yathā paśyasi māṃ sākṣādevaṃ dṛṣṭo mayā miniḥ//89//
S01divyav_u:11688: 257.030 yadāpi mahārāja bhagavatā śrāvastyāṃ tīrthyān bijayārthaṃ vijayārthaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ kṛtam,
S01divyav_u:11693: 258.001 tīrthyā yadā bhagavatā kupathaprayātā ṛddhiprabhāvavidhinā khalu nirgṛhītāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11694: 258.003 vikrīḍitaṃ daśabalasya tadāṃ hyudāraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tu nṛpa harṣakaraṃ prajānām//10//
S01divyav_u:11695: 258.005 yadāpi mahārāja bhagavatā deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā uṣitvā māturjanayitryā dharmaṃ deśayitvā devagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sāṃkāśye nagare 'vatīrṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11700: 258.008 yadāvatīrṇo vadatāṃ variṣṭho varṣāmuṣitvā khalu devaloke/
S01divyav_u:11701: 258.010 tatrāpyahaṃ saṃnihito babhūva dṛṣṭo mayāsau muniragrasattvaḥ//91//
S01divyav_u:11702: 258.012 yadā mahārāja sumāgadhayā anāthapiṇḍadaduhitryā upanimantritaḥ pañcabhirarhacchataiḥ sārdham ṛddhyā puṇḍravardhanaṃ gataḥ,
S01divyav_u:11703: tadāhaṃ parvataśailaṃ grahāya gaganatalamākramya puṇḍravardhanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11704: 258.014 tannimittaṃ ca me bhagavatā ājñākṣiptā--na tāvat te parinirvātavyam yāvaddharmo nāntarhita iti/
S01divyav_u:11707: 258.018 tadā gṛhītvārdhabalena śailaṃ jagāma tūrṇaṃ khalu puṇḍravardhanam//92//
S01divyav_u:11708: 258.020 ājñā tadā śākyakuloditena dattā ca me kāruṇikena tena/
S01divyav_u:11709: 258.022 tāvanna te nirvṛtirabhyupeyā antarhito yāvadayaṃ na dharmaḥ//93//
S01divyav_u:11710: 258.024 yadāpi mahārāja tvayā pūrvaṃ bālabhāvādbhagavato rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭasya saktuṃ dāsyāmīti pāṃśvañjalirbhagavataḥ pātre prakṣiptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:11712: tvaṃ na bhagavatā nirdiṣṭah--ayaṃ dārako varṣaśataparinirvṛtasya mama pāṭaliputre nagare aśoko nāma rājā bhaviṣyati caturbhāgacakravartī dhārmiko dharmarājā,
S01divyav_u:11734: 259.009 kiṃ tu buddhasmṛtipratibodhito 'haṃ bodhisnapanaṃ tāvat kariṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:11744: 259.014 pāṇinā vardhitamātre ca kuṇālena sarvajanakāyena hāsyaṃ muktam/
S01divyav_u:11745: tato rājā hāsyaṃ muktvā kathayati--aho rādhagupta,
S01divyav_u:11751: rājā āha--śatasahasratryaṃ dāsyāmītyāryasaṃghe kumbhasahasreṇa ca bodhiṃ snapayiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:11757: ruṣitaṃ ca rājānamavekṣya rādhagupto rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:11758: kasya śaktir narendreṇa sārdhaṃ vispardhituṃ bhavet?
S01divyav_u:11762_0: kośaṃ sthāpayitvā rājyamantaḥpuramamātyagaṇamātmānaṃ ca kuṇālaṃ suvarṇarūpyasphaṭikavaiḍūryamayānāṃ
S01divyav_u:11766: 259.025 rājyaṃ samṛddhaṃ saṃsthāpya kośamantaḥpurāṇi cāmātyagaṇaṃ ca sarvam/
S01divyav_u:11767: 259.027 dadāmi saṃghe guṇapātrabhūte ātmā kuṇālaṃ ca guṇopapannam//97//
S01divyav_u:11768_0: 259.029 tato rājā piṇḍolabharadvājapramukhe bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayitvā bodhivṛkṣasya
S01divyav_u:11768_1: ca caturdiśaṃ vāraṃ baddhvā svayameva ca vāramabhiruhya caturbhiḥ kumbhasahasrairbodhisanapanaṃ kṛtavān /
S01divyav_u:11769: 259.030 kṛtamātre ca bodhisnapane bodhivṛkṣo yathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11775: 260.005 atha rājā bodhisnapanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pariveṣṭumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11779: tathā te pariveṣṭavyam yathā te kṣatir na syāditi/
S01divyav_u:11780: 260.007 tato rājā svahastena pariveṣaṇam yāvannavakāntaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11781: tatra dvau śrāmaṇerau saṃrañjanīyaṃ dharmaṃ samādāya vartataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11793: 260.012 api tu asti dvau śrāmaṇerau bālakrīḍayā krīḍataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11796: 260.014 śrutvā ca rājñaḥ prītimanaso buddhirutpannā--tau śrāmaṇerau āgamya bhikṣusaṃghaṃ paṭenācchādayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:11797: 260.015 tatastau śrāmaṇerau rājño 'bhiprāyamavagamya bhūyo 'nye 'smābhiḥ svaguṇā udbhavayitavyā iti,
S01divyav_u:11804: 260.019 śrutvā ca rājño buddhirutpannā--mayā kevalaṃ cintitam,
S01divyav_u:11809: 260.023 yasyedṛśaḥ sādhujane prasādaḥ kāle tathotsāhi kṛtaṃ ca dānam//100//
S01divyav_u:11811_0: 260.026 tato rājā aśokaḥ pañcavārṣike paryavasite sarvabhikṣūṃs tricīvareṇācchādya
S01divyav_u:11812: 260.028 bhūyasā bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitamiti//
S01divyav_u:11813: 260.029 yasminneva divase rājñā aśokena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam,
S01divyav_u:11814: tasminneva divase rājño 'śokasya padmāvatī nāṃnā devī prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:11821: 261.001 [261]prītiḥ parā me vipulā hyavāptā mauryasya vaṃśasya parā vibhūtiḥ/
S01divyav_u:11822: 261.003 dharmeṇa rājyaṃ mama kurvato hi jāto dharmavivardhano 'stu//101//
S01divyav_u:11825: atha rājā kumāraṃ nirīkṣya prītamanāḥ kathayati--
S01divyav_u:11827: 261.009 alaṃkṛtaṃ śobhati yasya vaktraṃ saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ vibhāti//102//
S01divyav_u:11832: asti himavati parvatarāje kuṇāle nāma pakṣī prativasati,
S01divyav_u:11838: tasyordhvato yojanam yakṣāḥ śṛṇvantyadho yojanaṃ nāgāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11840: atha rājā kuṇālasya netrāṇi suciraṃ nirīkṣya na kiṃcidviśeṣaṃ paśyati/
S01divyav_u:11844: 261.022 netrānurāgeṇa sa pārthivendraḥ sutaḥ kuṇāleti tadā babhāṣe/
S01divyav_u:11845: 261.024 tato 'sya nāma prathitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tasyāryasattvasya nṛpātmajasya//104//
S01divyav_u:11847: tasya kāñcanamālā nāma dārikā patnyarthe ānītā/
S01divyav_u:11848: 261.027 yāvadrājā aśokaḥ kuṇālena saha kurkuṭārāmaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11851: tena rājño 'bhihitam--kimarthaṃ kuṇālaḥ svakarmaṇi na niyujyate?
S01divyav_u:11854: 261.030 tataḥ kuṇālaḥ sthavirasya pādayor nipatya kathayati--sthavira,
S01divyav_u:11860: 262.005 sa ca tathā abhyāsaṃ karoti manasikāraprayuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11863: tiṣyarakṣitā ca nāṃnā aśokasyāgramahiṣā taṃ pradeśamabhigatā/
S01divyav_u:11864: 262.007 sā taṃ kuṇālamekākinaṃ dṛṣṭvā nayanānurāgeṇa gātreṣu pariṣvajya kathayati--
S01divyav_u:11865: 262.009 dṛṣṭvā tavedaṃ nayanābhirāmaṃ śrīmadvapurnetrayugaṃ ca kāntam/
S01divyav_u:11866: 262.011 daṃdagyate me hṛdayaṃ samantāddāvāgninā prajvalateva kakṣam//106//
S01divyav_u:11867: 262.013 śrutvā kuṇāla ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ karṇau pidhāya kathayati--
S01divyav_u:11868: 262.014 vākyaṃ na yuktaṃ tava vaktumetat sūnoḥ purastājjananī mamāsi/
S01divyav_u:11869: 262.016 adharmarāgaṃ parivarjayasva apāyamārgasya hi eṣa hetuḥ//107//
S01divyav_u:11874: 262.022 mama bhavatu maraṇaṃ mā tu sthitasya dharme viśuddhabhāvasya/
S01divyav_u:11875: 262.023 na tu jīvitena kāryaṃ sajjanadhikkṛtena mama//109//
S01divyav_u:11876: 262.024 svargasya dharmalopo yato bhavati jīvitena kiṃ tena/
S01divyav_u:11888: 263.003 snehācca yogyaṃ manasā ca buddhvā ājñāpayāmāsa vidhāya yātrām//111//
S01divyav_u:11889: 263.005 atha rājā aśoko nagaraśobhāṃ mārgaśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā jīrṇāturakṛpaṇānāthāṃśca mārgādapanīya ekarathe 'bhiruhya kumāreṇa saha pāṭaliputrānnirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:11890: 263.006 anuvrajitvā nivartamānaḥ kuṇālaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya nayanaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:11891: 263.008 dhanyāni tasya cakṣūṃṣi cakṣuṣmantaśca te janāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11897: 263.014 śriyā vivṛddhe hi sukhānukūle paśyāmi netre 'dya vinaśyamāne//113//
S01divyav_u:11899: 263.018 puraṃ vipanne nayane tu tasya bhaviṣyati śokaparītacetāḥ//114//
S01divyav_u:11901: śrutvā ca takṣaśilāpaurā ardhatrikāṇi yojanāni mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā pūrṇakumbhaiḥ pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11916: śrutvā ca tiṣyarakṣitā cintayati--yadi kuṇālaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāsyati,
S01divyav_u:11921: tatastiṣyarakṣitayā vaidyānāmabhihitam--yadi kaścidīdṛśena[264] vyādhinā spṛṣṭaḥ strī vā puruṣo vā āgacchati,
S01divyav_u:11930: 264.005 jīvitād vyaparopya kukṣiṃ pāṭayitvā paśyati ca tasya pakvāśayasthāne antrāyāṃ kṛmirmahān prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11934: 264.007 yāvat tatra maricān peṣayitvā dattaṃ na ca mriyate/
S01divyav_u:11938: etacca prakaraṇaṃ tayā rajñe niveditam--deva pālāṇḍuṃ parimuṅkṣva,
S01divyav_u:11949: 264.012 tena parituṣṭena tiṣyarakṣitā vareṇa pravāritā--kiṃ te varaṃ prayacchāmi?
S01divyav_u:11954: tasyā buddhirutpannā--idānīṃ mayā asya kuṇālasya vairaṃ niryātitavyam/
S01divyav_u:11955: 264.015 tayā kapaṭalekho likhitastakṣaśilakānāṃ paurāṇām--kuṇālasya nayanaṃ vināśayitavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:11957: 264.017 rājā hyaśoko balavān pracaṇḍa ājñāpayattakṣaśilājanaṃ hi/
S01divyav_u:11958: 264.019 uddhāryatāṃ locanamasya śatrormauryasya vaṃśasya kalaṅka eṣaḥ//116//
S01divyav_u:11961: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitā śayitasya rājñastaṃ lekhaṃ dantamudrayā mudrayiṣyāmīti rājñaḥ sakāśamabhigatā/
S01divyav_u:11968: 264.025 evaṃ dvirapi rājā bhītaḥ pratibuddhaḥ kathayati--devi,
S01divyav_u:11969: svapno me na śobhano dṛṣṭa iti/
S01divyav_u:11973: yāvat tiṣyarakṣitayā rājñaḥ śayitasya sa lekho dantamudrayā mudrayitvā takṣaśilāṃ preṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:11974: 264.028 yāvadrājñā śayitena svapne dṛṣṭaṃ dantā viśīrṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:11975: 264.029 tato rājā tasyā eva rātreratyaye naimittikānāhūya kathayati--kīdṛśa eṣāṃ svapnānāṃ vipāka iti?
S01divyav_u:11979: 264.031 dantā yasya viśīryante svapnānte prapatanti ca/
S01divyav_u:11980: 264.032 cakṣurbhedaṃ ca putrasya putranāśaṃ ca paśyati//117//
S01divyav_u:11983: 265.003 yā devatā śāsturabhiprasannā dharme ca saṃghe ca gaṇapradhāne/
S01divyav_u:11984: 265.005 ye cāpi loke ṛṣayo variṣṭhā rakṣantu te 'smattanayaṃ kuṇālam//118//
S01divyav_u:11986: atha takṣaśilāḥ paurajānapadā lekhadarśanāt kuṇālasya guṇavistaratuṣṭā notsahante tadaptiyaṃ niveditum/
S01divyav_u:11987: 265.008 ciraṃ vicārayitvā rājā duṣṭaśīlaḥ svaputrasya na marṣayati,
S01divyav_u:11994: tataḥ kuṇālo vācayitvā kathayati--viśrabdham yathātmaprayojanaṃ kriyatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:12009: 265.022 paśyānityamidaṃ sarvaṃ nāsti kaścid dhruve sthitaḥ//121//
S01divyav_u:12013: 265.027 utpāṭane 'haṃ na bibhemi saumya netradvayasyāsthiratāṃ hi paśye//123//
S01divyav_u:12014: 265.029 utpāṭe vā na vā netre yathā vā manyate nṛpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12016: 265.031 tataḥ kuṇālastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--tena hi bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:12018: 265.032 yāvat sa puruṣaḥ kuṇālasya nayanamutpāṭayituṃ pravṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12022: 266.003 teṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu rudatsu kuṇālasyaiva nayanamutpāṭya haste dattam/
S01divyav_u:12024: 266.005 rūpāṇi kasmānna nirīkṣase tvam yathāpurā prākṛta māṃsapiṇḍa/
S01divyav_u:12025: 266.007 te vañcitāste ca vigarhaṇīyā ātmeti ye tvāmabudhāḥ//126//
S01divyav_u:12027: 266.011 evaṃ pravīkṣanti sadāpramattā ye tvāṃ na te duḥkhamanuprayānti//127//
S01divyav_u:12030: 266.015 tataḥ kuṇālo dṛṣṭasatyastaṃ puruṣamuvāca--idānīṃ dvitīyaṃ viśrabdhaṃ nayanamutpāṭya haste datta/
S01divyav_u:12031: 266.016 atha kuṇālo māṃsacakṣuṣyuddhṛte prajñācakṣuṣi ca viśuddhe kathayati--
S01divyav_u:12039: api tu tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
S01divyav_u:12041: 266.025 ciraṃ sukhaṃ caiva sā tiṣyanāṃnī āyurbalaṃ pālayate ca devī/
S01divyav_u:12042: 266.027 saṃpreṣito 'yaṃ hi yayā prayogo yasyānubhāvena kṛtaḥ svakārtham//132//
S01divyav_u:12044: śrutvā ca bhartṛtayā kuṇālasamīpamupasaṃkramya parṣadamavagāhya kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ rudhirāvasiktagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā sūrcchitā bhūmau patitā/
S01divyav_u:12047: 267.001 [267]netrāṇi kāntāni manoharāṇi ye māṃ nirīkṣañjanayanti tuṣṭim/
S01divyav_u:12048: 267.003 te me vipannā hyanirīkṣaṇīyāstyajanti me prāṇasamāḥ śarīram//133//
S01divyav_u:12053: 267.007 karmātmakaṃ lokamidaṃ viditvā duḥkhātmakaṃ cāpi janaṃ hi matvā/
S01divyav_u:12054: 267.009 matvā ca lokaṃ priyaviprayogaṃ kartuṃ priye nārhasi bāṣpamokṣam//134//
S01divyav_u:12055: 267.011 tataḥ kuṇālo bhāryayā saha takṣaśilāyā niṣkāsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12066: 267.016 tataḥ kuṇālo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye vīṇāṃ vādayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12073: 267.020 yadi tava bhavaduḥkhapīḍitā bhavati doṣaviniśritā matiḥ/
S01divyav_u:12074: 267.022 sukhamiha ca yadīcchasi dhruvaṃ tvaritamihāyatanāni saṃtyajasva//136//
S01divyav_u:12077: 267.025 gītaṃ kuṇālena mayi prasaktaṃ vīṇāsvaraṃ caiva śrutiścireṇa/
S01divyav_u:12078: 267.027 abhyāgato 'pīha gṛhaṃ nu kaṃcinna cecchati draṣṭumayaṃ kumāraḥ//137//
S01divyav_u:12080: 267.030 na khalveṣa kiṃ gītasya kuṇālasadṛśo dhvaniḥ/
S01divyav_u:12089: 268.003 andhaka eṣa vanīpakaḥ patnyā saha devasya yānaśālāyamavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12090: śrutvā ca rājā saṃvignaścintayāmāsa--yathā mayā svapnānyaśobhanāni dṛṣṭāni,
S01divyav_u:12093: 268.006 svapnāntare nimittāni yathā dṛṣṭāni me purā/
S01divyav_u:12094: 268.007 niḥsaṃśayaṃ kuṇālasya netre vai nidhanaṃ gate//140//
S01divyav_u:12097: 268.010 na hi me śāmyate cetaḥ sutavyasanacintayā//141//
S01divyav_u:12098: 268.011 yāvat puruṣo yānaśālāṃ gatvā kuṇālamuvāca--kasya tvaṃ putraḥ, kiṃ ca nāma?
S01divyav_u:12101: 268.014 kṛtsneyaṃ pṛthivī yasya vaśe vartani kiṃkara//142//
S01divyav_u:12102: 268.015 tasya rājñastvahaṃ putraḥ kuṇāla iti viśrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12104: 268.017 tataḥ kuṇālaḥ patnyā saha rājño 'śokasya samīpamānītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12105: atha rājā aśokah {paśyati} kuṇālamuddhṛtanayanaṃ vātātapaparidagdhagātraṃ rathyācolakasaṃghātapratyavareṇa vāsasā lakṣyālakṣyapracchāditakaupīnam/
S01divyav_u:12106: 268.019 sa tamapratyābhijñāya ākṛtimātrakaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā kathayati--tvaṃ kuṇāla iti?
S01divyav_u:12111: 268.021 tataḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣya netroddhṛtaṃ śokaparītacetāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12112: 268.023 rājā hyaśokaḥ patito dharaṇyāṃ hā putraśokena hi dahyamānaḥ//144//
S01divyav_u:12114: atha rājā kathaṃcit saṃjñāmupalabhya kuṇālamutsaṅge sthāpayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:12116: 268.027 tato muhūrtaṃ nṛpa āśvasitvā kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya rasāśrukaṇṭhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12117: 268.028 muhuḥ kuṇālasya mukhaṃ pramṛjya bahūni rājā vilalāpa tatra//145//
S01divyav_u:12118: 268.030 netre kuṇālapratime vilokya sutaṃ kuṇāleti purā babhāṣe/
S01divyav_u:12119: 269.001 [269]tadasya netre nidhanaṃ gate te putraṃ kuṇāleti kathaṃ ca vakṣye//146//
S01divyav_u:12121: 269.004 kathaya kathaya sādhu putra tāvadvadanamidaṃ tava cārunetram/
S01divyav_u:12123: 269.008 akaruṇahṛdayena tena tāta munisadṛśasya na sādhu sādhubuddheḥ/
S01divyav_u:12125: 269.012 vada suvadana kṣiprametadarthaṃ vrajati śarīramidaṃ purā vināśam/
S01divyav_u:12128: 269.017 rājannatītaṃ khalu naiva śocyaṃ kiṃ na śrutaṃ te munivākyametat/
S01divyav_u:12129: 269.019 yatkarmabhiste 'pi jinā na muktāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ sudṛḍhaistathaiva//250//
S01divyav_u:12130: 269.021 labdhāḥ phalasthāśca pṛthagjanāśca kṛtāni kāmānyaśubhāni dehinām/
S01divyav_u:12131: 269.023 svayaṃkṛtānāmiha karmāṇāṃ phalaṃ kathaṃ tu vakṣyāmi parairidaṃ kṛtam//151//
S01divyav_u:12134: 269.027 na śastravajrāgniviṣāṇi pannagāḥ kurvanti pīḍāṃ nabhaso 'vikāriṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12135: 269.029 śarīralakṣyeṇa dhṛtena pārthiva patanti duḥkhānyaśivāni dehinām//153//
S01divyav_u:12137: 269.032 kenoddhṛtāni nayanāni sutasya mahyaṃ ko jīvitaṃ sumadhuraṃ tyajituṃ vyavastaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12138: 270.001 [270]śokānalo nipatito hṛdaye pracaṇḍah ācakṣva putra kasya harāmi daṇḍam//154//
S01divyav_u:12139: 270.003 yāvadrājñā aśokena śrutam--tiṣyarakṣitāyā ayaṃ prayoga iti/
S01divyav_u:12141: 270.005 kathaṃ hi dhanye na nimajjase kṣitau cchindāmi śīrṣaṃ paraśuprahāraiḥ/
S01divyav_u:12144: 270.010 utpāṭya netre paripātayāmi gātraṃ kimasyā nakharaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:12145: 270.012 jīvantiśūlāmatha kārayāmi cchindāmi nāsāṃ krakacena vāsyāḥ//156//
S01divyav_u:12146: 270.014 kṣureṇa jihvāmatha kartayāmi viṣeṇa pūrṇāmatha ghātayiṣye/
S01divyav_u:12149: 270.020 anāryakarmā yadi tiṣyarakṣitā tvamāryakarmā bhava mā vadha striyam//158//
S01divyav_u:12150: 270.022 phalaṃ hi maitryā sadṛśaṃ na vidyate prabhostitakṣā sugatena varṇitā/
S01divyav_u:12151: 270.024 punaḥ praṇasya pitaraṃ kumāraḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ sūnṛtavāgjagāda//159//
S01divyav_u:12152: 270.026 rājanna me duḥkhamalo 'sti kaścittīvrāpalāre 'pi na manyutāpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12153: 270.028 manaḥ prasannam yadi me jananyām yenoddhṛte me nayane svayaṃ hi/
S01divyav_u:12154: 270.030 tattena satyena mamāstu tāvannetradvayaṃ prāktanameva sadyaḥ//160//
S01divyav_u:12156: yāvadrājñā aśokena tiṣyarakṣitā amarṣitena jatugṛhaṃ praveśayitvā dagdhā,
S01divyav_u:12158: 271.001 [271]bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaśayacchettāramāyuṣmantaṃ sthaviropaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ kuṇālena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena nayanānyutpāṭitāni?
S01divyav_u:12172: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya tataḥ karmāvaśeṣeṇa pañca janmaśatāni tasya nayanānyutpāṭitāni//
S01divyav_u:12173: 271.011 kiṃ karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākenocce kule upapannaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12176: 271.013 tena hyāyucmantaḥ śrūyatām--bhūtapūrvamatīte 'dhvani catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksambuddho loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:12177: 271.014 yadā krakucchandaḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12178: tasya aśokena rājñā catūratnamayaṃ stūpaṃ kāritam/
S01divyav_u:12183: atra janakāyo gatvā viśīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā śocitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12188: 271.020 tatastena ca tatra krakucchandasya samyaksambuddhasya kāyapramāṇikā pratimā babhūva viśīrṇā,
S01divyav_u:12198: tena karmaṇo vipākena kuṇākaḥ prāsādikaḥ samṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12200: tasya karmaṇo vipākena kuṇālena śākyamuniḥ samyaksambuddhastādṛśa eva śāstā samārāgito na virāgitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12205: 272.002 yadā rājñā aśokena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
S01divyav_u:12206: tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ pañcavārṣikaṃ ca kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:12207: 272.003 trīṇi śatasahastāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatraiko 'rhatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:12216: atha rājā aśoko 'pareṇa samayena mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12219: tenābhigamya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā sa ṛṣiḥ pṛṣṭah--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:12232: 272.015 vītaśoka uvāca--asya kaṣṭena tapasā rāgo 'dyāpi na bādhyate,
S01divyav_u:12234: 272.016 kuta eṣāṃ rāgaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? āha ca--
S01divyav_u:12235: 272.017 kaṣṭe 'smin vijane vane nivasatāṃ vāyvambumūlāśināṃ rāgo naiva jito yadīha ṛṣiṇā kālaprakarṣeṇa hi/
S01divyav_u:12236: 272.019 bhuktavānnaṃ sadhṛtaṃ prabhūtapiśitaṃ dadhyuttamālaṃkṛtaṃ śākyeṣvindriyanigraho yadi bhavedvindhyaḥ plavetsāgare//1//
S01divyav_u:12237: 272.021 sarvathā vañjito rājā aśoko yacchramaṇeṣu śākyaputrīyeṣu kārāṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:12238: etacca vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā upāyajño 'mātyānuvāca--ayaṃ vītaśokastīrthyābhiprasannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12242: rājā āha--yadā ahaṃ rājā alaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāṃ praviṣṭo bhavāmi,
S01divyav_u:12243: tadā yūyaṃ vītaśokasyopāyena mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādayiṣyatha/
S01divyav_u:12245: yāvadrājā rājālaṃkāraṃ mauliṃ paṭṭaṃ cāpanayitvā snānaśālāyāṃ praviṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12247: 272.027 imaṃ tāvadrājālaṃkāraṃ pravaramauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣīdayiṣyāmah--kiṃ śobhase na veti/
S01divyav_u:12248: 272.028 taistadābharaṇamauliṃ paṭṭaṃ ca baddhvā siṃhāsane niṣādito rājñaśca niveditam/
S01divyav_u:12249: 272.029 tato rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ rājālaṃkāraṃ maulipaṭṭabaddhaṃ ca siṃhāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--adhyāpyahaṃ jīvāmi/
S01divyav_u:12252: tato yāvadvadhyaghātakā nīlāmbaravasanāḥ pralambakeśā ghaṇṭāśabdapāṇayo rājñaḥ pādayor nipatyovāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:12261: mama bhrātuḥ snehādasya saptāhaṃ rājyaṃ prayacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:12267: divase gate vītaśokasyāgrataḥ sthitvā ārocayanti--nirgataṃ vītaśoka ekaṃ divasam/
S01divyav_u:12270: vistareṇa yāvatsaptāhadivase vītaśoko rājālaṃkāravibhūṣito rājño 'śokasya samīpamupanītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12273: vītaśoka uvāca--na me dṛṣṭaṃ vā syācchrutaṃ veti/
S01divyav_u:12275: 273.010 yena śrutaṃ bhavedgītaṃ nṛtyaṃ cāpi nirīkṣitam/
S01divyav_u:12278: idaṃ mayā rājyaṃ saptāhaṃ tava dattam,
S01divyav_u:12283: 273.013 kathaṃ tvaṃ kathayasi--naiva me dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutamiti?
S01divyav_u:12285: 273.015 na me dṛṣṭaṃ nṛtyaṃ na ca nṛpa śruto gītaninado na me gandhā ghrātā na khalu rasā me 'dya viditāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12286: 273.017 na me spṛṣṭaḥ sparśaḥ kanakamaṇihārāṅgajanitaḥ samūho nārīṇāṃ maraṇaparibaddhena manasā//3//
S01divyav_u:12287: 273.019 striyo nṛttaṃ gītaṃ bhavaśayanānyāsanavidhirvayo rūpaṃ lakṣmīrbahuvividharatnā ca vasudhā/
S01divyav_u:12288: 273.021 nirānandā śūnyā mama nṛpa varaśayyā gatasukhā sthitān dṛṣṭvā dvāre vadhakapuruṣānnīlavasanān//4//
S01divyav_u:12292: 273.026 nādrākṣaṃ nṛpate nṛttaṃ na ca bhoktuṃ manaḥspṛhā//6//
S01divyav_u:12296: mā tāvat tavaikajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava rājaśriyaṃ prāpya harṣo notpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12297: 273.030 kiṃ punarbhikṣavo janmaśatamaraṇabhayabhītāḥ sarvāṇyupapattyāyatanāni duḥkhānyanusṛtāni paśyanti/
S01divyav_u:12309: 274.004 mā tāvadekajanmikasya maraṇabhayāttava na jāyate harṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12313: 274.008 teṣāṃ tu vastraśayanāsanabhojanādi mokṣo 'bhiyuktamanasāṃ janayeta saṅgam/
S01divyav_u:12315: 274.012 kathaṃ ca teṣāṃ na bhavedvimokṣo mokṣārthināṃ janmaparānmukhānām/
S01divyav_u:12319: eṣo 'haṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ceti/
S01divyav_u:12322: 274.020 budhavibudhamanujamahitaṃ jinaṃ virāgaṃ ca saṃghaṃ ca//12//iti/
S01divyav_u:12323: 274.021 atha rājā aśoko vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--na tvaṃ mayā parityaktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12324: api tu buddhaśāsanābhiprasādārthaṃ tava mayā eṣa upāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12336: tata utthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ sthavitamuvāca--labheyāhaṃ svakhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:12340: tato vītaśoko yena rājā aśokastenopasaṃkramya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:12342: 274.030 pravrajiṣyāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikām/
S01divyav_u:12344: 275.001 [275]udbhrānto 'smi niraṅkuśo rājā iva vyāvartito vibhramāt tvadbuddhiprabhavāṅkuśena vidhivadbuddhopadeśairaham/
S01divyav_u:12345: ekaṃ tvamarhasi me varaṃ pradarśituṃ tvaṃ pārthivānāṃ pate lokālokavarasya śāsanavare liṅgaṃ śibhaṃ dhārayet//13//
S01divyav_u:12346: 275.005 śrutvā ca rājā sāśrukaṇṭho vītaśokaṃ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajyovāca--vītaśoka,
S01divyav_u:12352: vyābādhe khalvapi bhaiṣajyamasulabhaṃ pūtimūtraṃ ca bhojanam/
S01divyav_u:12356: 275.010 naiva hi jāne taṃ nūnaṃ viṣayatṛṣito 'nāyāsavihataḥ pravrajyāṃ prāptukāmo na ripuhṛtabalo naivārthakṛpaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12357: 275.012 duḥkhārtaṃ mṛtyuneṣṭaṃ vyasanaparigataṃ dṛṣṭvā jagadidaṃ panthānaṃ janmabhīruḥ śivamabhayamahaṃ gantuṃ vyavasitaḥ//14//
S01divyav_u:12358: 275.014 śrutvā ca rājā aśokaḥ satvaraṃ praruditumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12360: 275.016 saṃsāradolāmabhiruhya lolam yadā nipāto niyataḥ prajānām/
S01divyav_u:12361: 275.018 kimarthamāgacchati vikriyā te sarveṇa sarvasya yadā viyogaḥ//15//
S01divyav_u:12376: athāyuṣmato vītaśokasyārhattvaṃ prāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedina etadabhavat--asti khalu me--pūrvaṃ rājño 'śokasya gṛhadvāramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12378: rājño 'śokasya nivedaya--vītaśoko dvāri tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti/
S01divyav_u:12385: dṛṣṭvā ca rajā aśokaḥ saṃhāsanādutthāya mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamānaḥ prarudannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:12386: 276.001 [276]bhūteṣu saṃsargagateṣu nityaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi māṃ naiti yathā vikāram/
S01divyav_u:12389: sa paśyati--āyuṣmato vītaśokasya pāṃśukūlaṃ ca cīvaraṃ mṛṇmayaṃ pātram yāvadannaṃ bhaikṣyaṃ lūhapraṇītam/
S01divyav_u:12390: 276.006 dṛṣṭvā ca rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--deva,
S01divyav_u:12397: 276.011 nirāśravam yasya mano viśālaṃ nirāmayaṃ copacitaṃ śarīram/
S01divyav_u:12398: 276.013 svacchandato jīvitasādhanaṃ ca nityotsavaṃ tasya manuṣyaloke//18//
S01divyav_u:12402: 276.018 atyuddhṛtamiva manye yaśasā pūtaṃ puramiva mahaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:12404: 276.020 atha rājā aśokaḥ sarvāṅgena parigṛhya prajñapta evāsane niṣādayāmāsa,
S01divyav_u:12406: 276.021 bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātramāyuṣmato vītaśokasya purato niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:12407: 276.022 athāyuṣmān vītaśoko rājānamaśokaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:12409: 276.025 durlabhā trīṇi ratnāni nityaṃ pūjaya pārthiva//21//
S01divyav_u:12411: 276.027 atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ pañcabhiramātyaśataiḥ parivṛto 'nekaiśca paurajanapadasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamanuvrajitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12415: 277.001 [277]tata āyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ svaguṇānudbhāvayan paśyataḥ sarvajanakāyasya ṛddhyā vaihāyasamutpatya prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12416: 277.002 atha rājā aśokaḥ kṛtakarapuṭaḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto gaganatalāvasaktadṛṣṭirāyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokaṃ nirīkṣamāṇa uvāca--
S01divyav_u:12422: 277.009 ṛddhyā khalvavabhartsatāḥ paramayā śrīgarvitāste vayaṃ buddhyā khalvapi nāmitāḥ śirasitāḥ prajñābhimānodayam/
S01divyav_u:12423: 277.011 prāptārthena phalāndhabuddhimanasaḥ saṃvejitāste vayaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa sabāṣpadurdinamukhāḥ sthāne vimuktā vayam//25//
S01divyav_u:12424: 277.013 tatrāyuṣmān vītaśokaḥ pratyantimeṣu janapadeṣu śayyāsanāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12426: 277.014 śrutvā ca rājñā aśokena bhaiṣajyamupasthāyikāśca visarjitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12427: tasya tena vyādhinā spṛṣṭasya śiraḥ khustamabhavat/
S01divyav_u:12433: 277.017 tasmiṃśca samaye puṇḍravardhananagare nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
S01divyav_u:12439: 277.020 dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā ruṣitenābhihitam--puṇḍravardhane sarve ājīvikāḥ praghātayitavyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12441: tataḥ pāṭaliputre bhūyo 'nyena nirgranthopāsakena buddhapratimā nirgranthasya pādayor nipātitā citrārpitā/
S01divyav_u:12442: 277.022 śrutvā ca rājñā amarṣitena sa nirgranthopāsakaḥ sabandhuvargo gṛhaṃ praveśāyitvā agninā dagdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12443: 277.023 ājñaptaṃ ca--yo me nirgranthasya śiro dāsyati,
S01divyav_u:12446: sa cāyuṣmān vītaśoka ābhīrasya gṛhe rātriṃ vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12447: 277.025 tasya ca vyādhinā kliṣṭasya lūhāni cīvarāṇi,
S01divyav_u:12453: 277.028 tataḥ sa ābhīro 'siṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā āyuṣmantaṃ vītaśokamabhigataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12454: 277.029 āyuṣmatā ca vītaśokena pūrvānte jñānaṃ kṣiptam/
S01divyav_u:12459: dṛṣṭvā ca rājñā aśokena parijñātam--viralāni cāsya śirasi romāṇi na vyaktimupagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:12468: 278.003 yāvadrājñā abhayapradānaṃ dattam--na bhūyaḥ kaścit praghātayitavyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:12469: 278.004 tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāramāyuṣmantamupaguptaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ karma kṛtamāyuṣmatā vītaśokena yasya karmaṇo vipākena śastreṇa praghātitah?
S01divyav_u:12470: sthavira uvāca--tena hyāyuṣmantaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu/
S01divyav_u:12472: 278.007 bhutapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatamo lubdho mṛgān praghātayitvā jīvikāṃ kalpayati/
S01divyav_u:12474: sa tatra lubdho gatvā pāśān yantrāṃśca sthāpayitvā mṛgān praghātayati/
S01divyav_u:12477: anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhastasminnudapāne āhārakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā udapānāduttīrya vṛkṣamūle paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12479: 278.011 sa lubdha āgatya paśyati--neiva mṛgā udapānamabhyāgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12482: 278.013 tenāsiṃ niṣkoṣaṃ kṛtvā sa pratyekabuddhaḥ praghātitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:12488: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu duḥkhamanubhūya pañca janmaśatāni manuṣyeṣūpapannaḥ śastreṇa praghātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12493: 278.019 tena dāyakadānapatayaḥ saṃghabhaktaṃ kārāpitāstarpaṇāni yavāgūpānāni nimantraṇakāni/
S01divyav_u:12503: 279.002 yadā rājñā aśokena ardhāmalakadānena bhagavacchāsane śraddhā pratilabdhā,
S01divyav_u:12504: sa bhikṣūnuvāca--kena bhagavacchāsane prabhūtaṃ dānaṃ dattam?
S01divyav_u:12507: bhikṣava ūcuh--koṭiśataṃ tena bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:12508: 279.005 śrutvā ca rājā aśokaścintayati--tena gṛhapatinā bhūtvā koṭiśataṃ bhagavachāsane dānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:12518: trīṇi śatasahasrāṇi bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojitāni yatrekarmahatāṃ dvau śaikṣāṇāṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakānāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:12519: 279.010 kośaṃ sthāpayitvā mahāpṛthivīmantaḥpurāmātyagaṇamātmānaṃ kuṇālaṃ ca āryasaṃghe niryātayitvā catvāri śatasahasrāṇi dattvā niṣkrītavān/
S01divyav_u:12522: atha rājā idānīṃ na bhaviṣyāmīti viklavībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12523: 279.013 tasya rādhagupto nāmāmātyo yena saha pāṃśudānaṃ dattam/
S01divyav_u:12524: 279.014 tadā sa rājānamaśokaṃ viklavībhūtamavekṣya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--
S01divyav_u:12526: 279.017 padmānanaśrīśatasamprapītaṃ kasmāt sabāṣpaṃ tava deva vaktram//1//
S01divyav_u:12528: nāhaṃ dravyavināśaṃ na rājyanāśanaṃ na cāśrayaviyogaṃ śocāmi,
S01divyav_u:12530: 279.021 nāhaṃ punaḥ sarvaguṇopapannaṃ saṃghaṃ samakṣaṃ naradevapūjitam/
S01divyav_u:12533: ayaṃ me manoratho babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsane dānaṃ dāsyāmīti,
S01divyav_u:12535: 279.026 tato rājñā aśokena catvāraḥ koṭyaḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ kurkuṭārāmaṃ praṣayitumārabdhaḥ//
S01divyav_u:12536: 279.028 tasmiṃśca samaye kuṇālasya saṃpadir nāma putro yuvarājye pravartate/
S01divyav_u:12554: atha rājā aśokaḥ saṃvigno 'mātyān paurāṃśca saṃnipātya kathayati--kaḥ sāmprataṃ pṛthivyāmīśvarah?
S01divyav_u:12558: 280.008 dākṣiṇyādanṛtaṃ hi kiṃ kathayata bhraṣṭādhirājyā vayaṃ śeṣaṃ tvāmalakārdhamityavasitam yatra prabhutvaṃ mama/
S01divyav_u:12559: 280.010 eśvaryaṃ dhignāryamuddhatanadītoyapraveśopamaṃ martyendrasya mamāpi yatpratibhayaṃ dāridryamabhyāgatam//3//
S01divyav_u:12561: saṃpattayo hi sarvā vipattinidhanā iti pratijñātam yadavitathavādinā gautamena,
S01divyav_u:12563: 280.014 pratiśiṣyate 'smanne cirādājñā mama yāvatī yathā manasā/
S01divyav_u:12566: 280.018 bhraṣṭasvāyatano na bhāti kṛpaṇaḥ saṃpratyaśoko nṛpah chinnāmlānaviśīrṇapatrakusumaḥ śuṣyatyaśoko yathā//5//
S01divyav_u:12567: 280.020 tato rājā aśokaḥ samīpo gataṃ puruṣamāhūyovāca--bhadramukha,
S01divyav_u:12568: pūrvaguṇānurāgādbhraṣṭaiśvaryasyāpi mama imaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ vyāpāraṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:12569: 280.021 idaṃ mamārdhāmalakaṃ grahāya kurkuṭārāmaṃ gatvā saṃghe niryātaya/
S01divyav_u:12570: 280.022 madvacanācca saṃghasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā vaktavyam--jambudvīpaiśvaryasya rājña eṣa sāmprataṃ vibhava iti/
S01divyav_u:12571: 280.023 idaṃ tāvadapaścimaṃ dānaṃ tathā paribhoktavyam yathā me saṃghagatā dakṣiṇā vistīrṇā syāditi/
S01divyav_u:12573: 280.025 idaṃ pradānaṃ caramaṃ mamādya rājyaṃ ca taṃ caiva gataṃ svabhāvam/
S01divyav_u:12575: 280.029 tatathā bhujyatām yena pradānaṃ mama paścimam/
S01divyav_u:12576: 280.030 yathā saṃghagatā me 'dya vistīrṇā dakṣiṇā bhavet//7//
S01divyav_u:12577: 280.031 evaṃ deveti s puruṣo rājño 'śokasya pratiśrutya tadardhāmalakaṃ kurukuṭārāmaṃ gatvā vṛddhānte sthitvā kṛtāñjalistadardhāmalakaṃ saṃghe niryātayannuvāca--
S01divyav_u:12578: 281.001 [281]ekacchatrasamucchrayāṃ vasumatīmājñāpayan yaḥ purā lokaṃ tāpayati sma madhyadivasaprāpto divā bhāskaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:12579: 281.003 bhāgyacchidramavekṣya so 'dya nṛpatiḥ svaiḥ karmābhirvañcitaḥ saṃprāpte divasakṣaye raviriva bhraṣṭaprabhāvaḥ sthitaḥ//8//
S01divyav_u:12580: 281.005 bhaktyavanatena śirasā praṇamya saṃghāya tena khalu dattamidamāmalakasyārdhaṃ lakṣmīcāpalyacihnitam/
S01divyav_u:12583: 281.007 kutah? evaṃ hyuktaṃ bhagavatā--paravipattiḥ saṃvejanīyaṃ sthānamiti/
S01divyav_u:12587: 281.011 mṛtyaiḥ sa bhūmipatiradya hṛtādhikāro dānaṃ prayacchati kilāmalakārdhametat/
S01divyav_u:12589: 281.015 yāvattadardhāmalakaṃ cūrṇayitvā yūṣe prakṣipya saṃghe cāritam/
S01divyav_u:12592: atha rādhagupto 'śokasya pādayor nipatya kṛtāñjaliruvāca--devaḥ pṛthivyāmīśvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:12593_0: 281.017 atha rājā aśokaḥ kathaṃcidutthāya caturdiśamavalokya saṃghāya añjaliṃ kṛtvovāca--eṣa
S01divyav_u:12593_1: idānīṃ mahatkośaṃ sthāpayitvā imāṃ samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ bhagavacchrāvakasaṃghe niryātayāmi /
S01divyav_u:12596: 281.022 dadāmyahaṃ bhūtadharāṃ samandarāṃ saṃghāya tasminnupabhujyate phalam//11//
S01divyav_u:12598: 281.025 dānenāhamanena nendrabhavanaṃ na brahmaloke phalaṃ kāṅkṣāmi drutavārivegacapalaṃ prāgeva rājaśriyam/
S01divyav_u:12599: 281.027 dānasyāsya phalaṃ tu bhaktimahato yanme 'sti tenāpnuyāṃ cittaiśvaryamahāryamāryamahitaṃ nāyāti yadvikriyām//12//
S01divyav_u:12601: tato rājā mahāpṛthivīṃ saṃghe datvā kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12602: 281.030 yāvadamātyair nīlapītābhiḥ śibikābhir nirhāritvā śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S01divyav_u:12606: rādhagupta uvāca--eṣa rājño 'śokasya manorathe babhūva--koṭiśataṃ bhagavacchāsena dānaṃ dāsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:12609: yāvadamātyaiścatasraḥ koṭyo bhagavacchāsane dattvā pṛthivīṃ niṣkrīya saṃpadī rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12614: 282.005 so 'mātyānāmantrayate--ka uapāyaḥ syādyadasmākaṃ nāma ciraṃ tiṣṭhet?
S01divyav_u:12615: nairabhihitam--devasya ca vaṃśādaśoko nāṃnā rājā babhūveti/
S01divyav_u:12625: yāvadrājā puṣyamitraścaturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhayitvā bhagavacchāsanaṃ vināśayiṣyāmīti kukkuṭārāmaṃ nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12632: 282.014 yāvatpuṣyamitro yāvat saṃghārāmaṃ bhikṣūṃśca praghātayan prasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12647: 282.020 yāvatsā duhitā tena kṛmiśasya dattā bhagavacchāsanaparitrāṇāryaṃ parigrahaparipālanārthaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:12648: 282.021 puṣyamitrasya rājñaḥ pṛṣṭhato yakṣo mahān pramāṇe yūyam(?)/
S01divyav_u:12652: kṛmiśena ca yakṣeṇa mahāntaṃ parvatamānayitvā puṣyamitro rājā sabalavāhano 'vaṣṭabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12654: yadā puṣyamitro rājā praghātitastadā mauryavaṃśaḥ samucchinnaḥ//
S01divyav_u:12658: 283.002 punarapi mahārāja yanmayā anuttarasamyaksambodhiprāptaye dānāni dattāni,
S01divyav_u:12665_0: 283.005 tatrottarapāñcālo mahādhano nāṃnā dastināpure rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ
S01divyav_u:12665_1: ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca śāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍmarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagataṃ
S01divyav_u:12667: tasmiṃśca nagare mahāhrada utpalakumudapuṇḍrīkasampanno haṃsakāraṇḍavacakravākopaśobhito ramaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12668: 283.008 tatra ca hrade janmacitrako nāṃ nāgapotaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:12674: dakṣiṇapāñcālastu rājā adharmabhūyiṣṭhaścaṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśo 'dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
S01divyav_u:12676: 283.013 adharmabhūyiṣṭhatayā cāsya devo na kālena kālaṃ samyagvāridhāramutsṛjati/
S01divyav_u:12677: 283.014 tato 'sau mahājanakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ svatrastaḥ svajīvitāpekṣayā rāṣṭraparityāgaṃ kṛtvā uttarapāñcālasyaiva rājño viṣayaṃ gatvā prativasati/
S01divyav_u:12678: 283.015 yāvadapareṇa samayena dakṣiṇapāñcālo rājā mṛgayāvyapadeśena janapadān vyavalokanāya nirgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12681: 283.017 sa janakāyaḥ kva gata iti kathayati/
S01divyav_u:12690: 283.020 tasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāśca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskaradurbhikṣarogāpagatāḥ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsampannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12694: 283.023 yato 'sau janakāyaḥ saṃtrastaḥ saṃvegamāpanna uttarapāñcālasya rājño viṣayaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12696: ko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādenāsau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset?
S01divyav_u:12697: amātyā āhuh--yadi deva uttarapāñcālavaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayasi,
S01divyav_u:12699: nacirādasau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativaset/
S01divyav_u:12705: yathā asau janakāyaḥ punarāgatya eṣu grāmanagareṣu prativasatīti/
S01divyav_u:12714: 284.003 rājā āha--ko 'sau upāyaḥ syādyenāsau nāgapota ihānīyeta?
S01divyav_u:12719: tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā svavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--ya uttarapāñcālarājaviṣayājjanmacitrakaṃ nāma nāgapotakamānayati,
S01divyav_u:12729: tato 'sau ahituṇḍikaḥ pratyayitasya puruṣasya haste suvarṇapiṭakaṃ sthāpayitvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12731: nimittīkṛtah--asau jñmacitro nāgapotaka etasmin pradeśe tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:12739: tasya hradasya nātidūre dvau lubdhakau prativasataḥ,
S01divyav_u:12747: janmacitro nāgapotaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ko 'nyo 'sti mama śaraṇamṛte halakāt lubdhakāt?
S01divyav_u:12748: tato manuṣyaveṣamāsthāya halakasya lubdhakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12750_0: kiṃ tvaṃ jānīṣe kasyānubhāvāddhanasya rājño janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca subhikṣākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca
S01divyav_u:12751: sa kathayati--jāne sa rājā dhārmiko dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati,
S01divyav_u:12753: 284.025 asmin pradeśe janmacitrako nāma nāgapitakaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:12765: jānīṣe tvaṃ kataro 'sau nāgapotaka iti? na jāne/
S01divyav_u:12770: 285.001 [285]āgatya asya hradasya catasṛṣu dikṣu khadiraśalākānnikhanya nānāraṅgaiḥ sūtrairveṣṭayitvā mantrānāvartayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:12773: tadā hradamadhyāt kvathamānaṃ pānīyamutthāsyati ahaṃ cotthāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:12774: 285.003 tadā tvayāsau ahituṇḍikaḥ śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍayitavyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12776: 285.004 mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:12784: yāvadasau lubdhakaḥ saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gopayitvā avasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12786: 285.010 tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakā nikhātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:12791: 285.013 mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:12794: 285.015 tato nāgo mantrapāśavinirmukto hradādabhyudgamya lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavān,
S01divyav_u:12804: 285.019 asyānubhāvādyuṣmābhiḥ saha viyogo na jāta iti/
S01divyav_u:12805: tābhyāmasau vareṇa pravārito vividhāni ca ratnāni dattāni/
S01divyav_u:12807: tasya ca hradasya nātidūre puṣpaphalasalilasampanne nānāśakunikūjite ṛṣeragramāśramapadam/
S01divyav_u:12808: 285.021 tatra ca nāgapotakena sārdhaṃ vṛttakaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam/
S01divyav_u:12809: 285.022 tata ṛṣiḥ kathayati--kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena?
S01divyav_u:12812: 285.023 tato lubdhako 'moghapāśe saṃjātatṛṣṇah ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhavanaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:12814: 285.025 tasyaitadabhavat--eṣa sa pāśo yo mayā prārthanīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12816: tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotakena anyaiśca nāgaiḥ sasambhramaiḥ pratisaṃmodito ratnaiśca pravāritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12822: 285.028 lubdhaka āha--yuṣmākameṣa kadācit karhicit garutmatopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati/
S01divyav_u:12828: ten mātāpitarau avalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12829: 285.032 tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivīlabdhaprakhyena sukhasaumanasyenāpyāyitamanā amoghapāśamādāya nāgabhavanādabhyudgamya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ//
S01divyav_u:12830: 286.001 [286]yāvadapareṇa samayena dhano rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:12831: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā/
S01divyav_u:12832: 286.002 sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛham/
S01divyav_u:12834: mamātyayātsvakulavaṃśacchede rāṣṭrāpahāraḥ sarvasantasvāpateyamaputramiti kṛtvā anyarājavidheyo bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:12842: 286.008 sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityāvubaddhā api devatā āyācate/
S01divyav_u:12843: 286.009 asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraśceti/
S01divyav_u:12848: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:12851: 286.012 mātā cāsya kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī ca/
S01divyav_u:12853: 286.013 eṣā trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca/
S01divyav_u:12868: sā āttamanāḥ svāminn ārocayati--diṣṭyā vardhasva āryaputra/
S01divyav_u:12870: yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:12872: 286.020 so 'pyāttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvaṃ kāyamunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya udānamudānayati--apyevāhaṃ cirakālābhilaṣitaṃ putramukhaṃ paśyeyam/
S01divyav_u:12878: asmākaṃ cāpyatītakālagatānāmalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāṃnā dakṣiṇāmādekṣyati--idaṃ tayoryatratatropapannayorgacchatoranugacchatu iti/
S01divyav_u:12881: 286.027 na cāsyāḥ kiṃcidamanojñaśabdaśravaṇam yāvadeva garbhasya paripākāya/
S01divyav_u:12882: 286.028 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayātprasūtā/
S01divyav_u:12883: 286.029 dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaśchatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇaḥ saṃgatabhrūstuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12893: 287.003 tasyaivaṃ trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātakarma karoti/
S01divyav_u:12894: 287.004 tasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitumārabdham--kiṃ bhavatu dāraksya nāmeti?
S01divyav_u:12895: amātyāḥ kathayanti--ayaṃ dārako dhanasya rājñaḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:12898: 287.006 sudhano dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nudatto dvābhyāmaṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām/
S01divyav_u:12899: 287.007 so 'ṣṭābhirdhātrībhirunnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navatītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍairvā anyaiścottaptottaptairupakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:12901_0: 287.010 sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttastadā lipyāmupanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāmuddhāre
S01divyav_u:12901_1: nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ
S01divyav_u:12902: 287.012 so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12903: sa yāni tāni bhavanti rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryamanuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalamabhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthagbhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni,
S01divyav_u:12904_0: tasyathā--hastigrīvāyāmaśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe 'ṅkuśagrahe
S01divyav_u:12904_1: pāśagrahe chedye bhedye muṣṭibandhe padabandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe 'kṣuṇṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyām /
S01divyav_u:12906: 287.017 tasya pitrā trīṇyantaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyeṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasam/
S01divyav_u:12911: 287.019 tataḥ sudhanakumāra upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati//
S01divyav_u:12912: 287.021 yāvadapareṇa samayena halako lubdhako mṛgayāmanveṣamāṇastena tenānuvicarannanyatamaṃ parvatamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12913: 287.022 tasya ca parvatasyādhastādṛṣerāśramapadaṃ paśyati puṣpaphalasampannaṃ nānāpakṣigaṇavicāritam/
S01divyav_u:12917: 287.025 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ papraccha--bhagavan,
S01divyav_u:12920: 287.027 asti tvayā iyatā kālenāsmin pradeśe kaścidāścaryādbhutadharmo dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā?
S01divyav_u:12924: 287.029 eṣā brahmasabhā nāma puṣkiriṇī utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā nānāpakṣigaṇaniṣevitā himarajatatuṣāragaurāmbusampūrṇā surabhikusumapūrṇatoyā/
S01divyav_u:12925: 287.030 asyāṃ puṣkiriṇyāṃ pañcadaśamyāṃ manoharā nāma drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā pañcakinnarīśataparivārā nānāvidhasnānodvartanairāgatya snāti/
S01divyav_u:12927: 288.001 ahamapi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā mahatā prītisaumanasyena saptāhamatināmayāmi/
S01divyav_u:12929: 288.002 atha halakasya lubdhakasyaitadabhavat--śobhano 'yaṃ mayā amoghaḥ pāśo nāgāllabdho manoharāyāḥ kinnaryāḥ kṣepsyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:12930: 288.003 so 'pareṇa samayena pūrṇapañcadaśyāmamoghaṃ pāśamādāya hradatīrasamīpe puṣpaphalaviṭapagahanamāśritya avadhānatatparo 'vashtitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12931: 288.004 yāvanmanoharā kinnarī pañcaśataparivāritā tādṛśyaiva vibhūtyā brahmasabhāṃ puṣkiriṇīmavatīrṇā snātum/
S01divyav_u:12932: 288.005 tatsamantaraṃ ca halakena lubdhakena amoghaḥ pāśaḥ kṣiptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12934: 288.006 tayā amoghapāśaśritayā hrade mahāhatanādaḥ kṛto bhīṣaṇaśca śabdo niścāritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12935: yaṃ śrutvā pariśiṣṭaḥ kinnarigaṇa itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrānto manoharāṃ nirīkṣitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12943: 288.011 mā naiṣīstvaṃ hi mā sprākṣīr naitattva suceṣṭitam/
S01divyav_u:12944: 288.012 rājabhogyā surūpāhaṃ na sādhu grahaṇaṃ tava//1// iti/
S01divyav_u:12957: adrākṣītsa lubdhakaḥ sudhanaṃ rājakumāramabhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikam/
S01divyav_u:12964: upasaṃkramya pādayor nipatya kathayati--idaṃ mama devasya strīratnaṃ prābhṛtamānītam,
S01divyav_u:12966_0: 288.021 adrākṣītsudhanakumāro manoharāṃ kinnarīmabhirūpāṃ darśanīyāṃ prāsādikāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
S01divyav_u:12969: 288.030 tāṃ pratikīrṇahārāmuttaptajāmbūnadacārupūrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ sahasā papāta viddho dṛḍharāgaśareṇa/
S01divyav_u:12972: 289.005 dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sudhana indusamānvaktrāṃ prāvṛḍaghanāntaraviniścariteva vidyuta/
S01divyav_u:12973: 289.007 tatsnehamanmathavilāsasamudbhavena sadyaḥ sa cetasi nu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ//2//
S01divyav_u:12976: 289.010 tataḥ sudhano rājakumāro manoharayā rūpayauvanaguṇena sughanaḥ kumāronekaiścopacāraśataistathā apahṛto yathā muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti/
S01divyav_u:12981: sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca saṃvibhaktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12984: 289.014 sa kathayati--yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye 'vasthāpitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12986: 289.016 eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparamparayā śrutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:12990: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rājño vijite 'nyatamaḥ kārvaṭikaḥ prativiruddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:12997: 289.022 brāhmaṇa purohitaḥ saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ sa kumārasya vadhopāyakāla iti/
S01divyav_u:13007: 289.026 evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutya antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13011: sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:13013: nirgataḥ kumāro 'ntaḥpurāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na prativasatīti/
S01divyav_u:13014: 289.030 evaṃ deveti amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya balaugho hastyaśvarathapadātisampanno 'nakapraharaṇopakaraṇayuktaḥ sajjīkṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13031: 290.008 sa evaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ saṃdiśya abhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryanir nāditaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13032: 290.009 anupūrveṇa janapadānatikramya tasya kārvaṭikasya nātidūre 'nyataṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya vāsamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13035: tasya tena pathā gacchataḥ khagapathena yānamavasthitam/
S01divyav_u:13043: na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā karaṇīyeti viditvā pāñcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate--ehi tvaṃ pāñcika,
S01divyav_u:13045: 290.017 na ca te kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti/
S01divyav_u:13046: tatheti pāñcikena yakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṅgo balakāyo nirmitah--tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣaḥ,
S01divyav_u:13049: 290.019 tato nānāvidhakhaṅgamuśalatomarapāśacakraśaraparaśvadhādiśastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaudhena pāñciko 'nuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13052: 290.023 tataste karvaṭanivāsinastaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā tacca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādamāpannāḥ papracchuh--kuta eṣa balaugha āgacchatīti?
S01divyav_u:13055: 290.025 tasya ca balaugho yadi ciraṃ vidhārayiṣyatha,
S01divyav_u:13058: 290.027 vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13061: tata ucchritadhvajapatākāpūrṇakalaśā nānāvidhatūryanir nāditaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13067: 291.001 dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭah--gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitam,
S01divyav_u:13069_0: 291.002 tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghukadhvevotthāya mahāśayane
S01divyav_u:13069_1: niṣadya kare kapokaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitah--mā haiva me atonidānaṃ rājyaccyutirbhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:13071: 291.005 sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purohitāya nivedayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:13085: tato devena snānaprayatena tāṃ puṣkariṇīmekena so 'ānenāvataritavyam,
S01divyav_u:13106: 291.021 śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām//7// iti/
S01divyav_u:13107: 291.022 ātmābhinandino na kiṃcinna pratipadyanta iti tenādhivāsitam/
S01divyav_u:13113: 291.026 tāḥ pramuditā dṛṣṭvā manoharā pṛcchati--kim yūyamatīva praharṣitā iva?
S01divyav_u:13114: yāvadaparayā sa vṛttānto vistareṇa manoharāyā niveditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13115: 291.027 tato manoharā saṃjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:13121: tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni,
S01divyav_u:13125: 291.032 tato rājā yathādiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkiriṇimavatīryottīrṇah[292]/
S01divyav_u:13130: 292.004 nāgīva bandhanānmuktā eṣā gacchāmi sāmpratam//8// iti/
S01divyav_u:13137: 292.007 tato manoharāyāḥ khagapathena gacchantyā etadabhavat--yadahametāmavasthāṃ prāptā,
S01divyav_u:13141: 292.009 tena hi yasyāmi tāvadasyaiva ṛṣeḥ sakāśāmiti/
S01divyav_u:13147: tadvijñāpayāmi--yadi yadā kadācitsudhanaḥ kumāra āgacchati māṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ,
S01divyav_u:13160: tata utkūlako jalapatha ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
S01divyav_u:13166: 292.019 ajavaktrameṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasarūpī piṅgalāguhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahānajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
S01divyav_u:13169: 292.022 ayaṃ bhuktena bāṇena hantavyo mama kāraṇāt/
S01divyav_u:13175: 292.028 yadā paśyettatra kīlakaṃ lalāṭe tasyā nikhānayet//11//
S01divyav_u:13180: 293.001 [293]raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
S01divyav_u:13184: 293.005 āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//15//
S01divyav_u:13194: tato manoharā tam ṛṣimevamuktvā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntā//
S01divyav_u:13195: 293.012 yāvatsudhanaḥ kumārastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ saṃnāmya gṛhītaprābhṛto hastināpuramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13197: 293.013 tataḥ kumāro mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13218: sa cintāparaḥ praviśya manoharāṃ na paśyati/
S01divyav_u:13219: 293.021 itaścāmutaśca saṃbhrāntaḥ śūnyahṛdayaḥ śabdaṃ kartumārabdhah--manohare manohare iti/
S01divyav_u:13234: 293.029 hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//18//
S01divyav_u:13235: 293.030 manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
S01divyav_u:13236: 294.001 [294]saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//19// iti/
S01divyav_u:13241: 294.004 sa pitur nairguṇyamakṛtajñatāṃ ca jñātvā kathayati--kutra gatā katareṇa vā patheti?
S01divyav_u:13244: 294.007 uṣito dharmarājena yatra yātā manoharā//20// iti/
S01divyav_u:13250: 294.012 hṛdayaṃ dahyate caiva rahitasya tayā bhṛśam//22//
S01divyav_u:13251: 294.013 manobhirāmā ca manoharā ca manonukūlā ca manoratiśca/
S01divyav_u:13252: 294.015 saṃtaptadeho 'smi manoharāṃ vinā kuto mamedaṃ vyasanaṃ samāgatam//23// iti/
S01divyav_u:13257: sa tayā samāśvāsyamāno 'pi śokasaṃtāpasaṃtaptastasyāḥ pravṛttiṃ samanveṣamāṇa itaścāmutaśca paribhramitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13259: 294.020 sa halakasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ pṛcchati--manoharā kutastvayā labdheti?
S01divyav_u:13265: 294.023 eṣa ca vṛttānto rājñā śrutah--manoharāviyogātkumāro 'tīva viklava iti/
S01divyav_u:13270: na śakyaṃ mayā tāmanānīya antaḥpurasthena bhavitum/
S01divyav_u:13275: 294.028 uktaṃ ca--pañceme rātryā alpaṃ svapanti bahu jāgārti/
S01divyav_u:13286: sa rātryā vyutthāya nīlotpalamālābaddhaśirā[295] yena rakṣiṇaḥ puruṣā na santi,
S01divyav_u:13287: tena tāṃ mālāṃ dhvaje baddhvā avatīrṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13290: 295.003 bhoḥ pūrṇacandra rajanīkara tārarāja tvaṃ rohiṇīnayanakānta susārthavāha/
S01divyav_u:13291: 295.005 kaccitpriyā mama manoharaṇaikadakṣā dṛṣṭā tvayā bhuvi manoharanāmadheyā//24// iti/
S01divyav_u:13295: 295.008 he tvaṃ kuraṅgi tṛṇavāripalāśabhakṣe svastyastu te cara sukhaṃ na mṛgārirasmi/
S01divyav_u:13296: 295.010 dīrghekṣaṇā mṛgavadhūkamanīyarūpā dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//25//
S01divyav_u:13297: 295.012 sa tāmatikramya anyatamaṃ pradeśaṃ gato dadarśa vanaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopaśobhitaṃ bhramarairupabhujyamānasāram/
S01divyav_u:13304: 295.021 rāgāgninā tava samo na viṣāgnirugro dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//27//
S01divyav_u:13307: 295.025 bhoḥ kokilottama vanāntaravṛkṣavāsin nārī manohara patatrigaṇasya rājan/
S01divyav_u:13315: 296.007 vande ṛṣe nataśirā vada me laghu tvaṃ dṛṣṭā tvayā mama manoharanāmadheyā//30//
S01divyav_u:13316: 296.009 tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ svāgatavacanāsanadānakriyādipuraḥsaraḥ pratisaṃmodya uvāca--
S01divyav_u:13317: 296.011 dṛṣṭā sā paripūrṇacandravadanā nīlotpalābhāsvarā rūpeṇa priyadarśanā subadanā nīlañcatabhrūlatā/
S01divyav_u:13318: 296.013 tvaṃ svastho bhuvi bhujyatāṃ hi vividhaṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ ca prabho pañcātsvasti gamiṣyasīti manasā nātrāsti me saṃśayaḥ//31//
S01divyav_u:13319: 296.015 idaṃ hyavocadvacanaṃ ca subhrūḥ kumāra tṛṣṇā tvayi bādhate me/
S01divyav_u:13320: 296.017 mahacca duḥkhaṃ vasatāṃ vaneṣu yātāṃ ramāṃ drakṣyasi niṣcayena//32// iti/
S01divyav_u:13328: 296.021 kumāra, idaṃ ca tayā samākhyātam--uttare digbhāge trayaḥ kālaparvatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:13331: 296.022 tatpradeśena tvayā imāni bhaiṣajyāni samudānetavyāni--tadyathā sūdayā nāmauṣadhistayā ghṛtaṃ paktvā pātavyam/
S01divyav_u:13332: 296.023 tena ca te na tṛṣā na bubhukṣā,
S01divyav_u:13339: tataḥ kūlako jalapathaḥ khadiraka ekadhārako vajrakaḥ kāmarūpī/
S01divyav_u:13347: ajavaktro meṇḍhakaḥ puruṣo rākṣasīrūpī piṅgalāyāṃ guhāyāṃ lālāsrotasā mahatā ajagaro vegena pradhāvati/
S01divyav_u:13356: 297.007 yadā paśyettadā kīlaṃ lalāṭo tasyā nikhānayet//35//
S01divyav_u:13361: 297.012 raṅgā pataṅgā tapanī citrā rudantī hasantī āśīviṣā vetranadī ca/
S01divyav_u:13365: 297.016 āśīviṣāyāṃ nānāvidhāḥ sarpā vetranadyāṃ tu śālmaliḥ//39//
S01divyav_u:13375: 297.022 tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro yathopadiṣṭānauṣadhimantrāgadaprayogān samudānīya tasya ṛṣeḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13376: 297.023 tatastena yathopadiṣṭāḥ sarve samudānītāḥ sthāpavitvā vānaram/
S01divyav_u:13385: 297.027 candrasya khe vicarataḥ kva sahāyabhāvo daṃṣṭrābalena balinaśca mṛgādhipasya/
S01divyav_u:13386: 297.029 agneśca dāvadahane kva sahāyabhāvah asmadvidhasya ca sahāyabalena kiṃ syāt//41//
S01divyav_u:13387: 298.001 [298]kiṃ bho mahārṇavajalaṃ na vigāhitavyaṃ kiṃ sarpadaṣṭa iti naiva cikitsanīyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:13388: 298.003 vīryaṃ bhajetsumahadūrjitasattvadṛṣṭam yatne kṛte yadi na siddhyati ko 'tra doṣaḥ//42// iti/
S01divyav_u:13390: anupūrveṇa parvatanadīguhāprapātādīni bhaiṣajyamantrāgadaprayogeṇa vinirjitya drumasya kinnararājasya bhavanasamīpaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13391: 298.007 kumāro 'paśyannagaramadūraṃ śrīmadudyānopaśobhitaṃ nānāpuṣpaphalopetaṃ nānāvihagasevitaṃ taḍāgadīrghikāvāpikinnaraiḥ samupāvṛtam/
S01divyav_u:13393: tatastāḥ sudhanakumāreṇābhihitāh--kimanena bahunā pānīyena kriyata iti?
S01divyav_u:13394: tāḥ kathayanti--asti drumasya kinnararājasya duhitā manoharā nāma/
S01divyav_u:13397: 298.011 sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ pṛcchati--kimete ghaṭāḥ samastāḥ sarve tasyā upari nipātyante,
S01divyav_u:13403: 298.014 sā ca kinnarī abhihitā--anena tvayā ghaṭena manoharā tatprathamataraṃ snāpayitavyā/
S01divyav_u:13405: 298.015 tatastayāsau ghaṭaḥ prathamataraṃ manoharāyā mūrdhni nipātito yāvadaṅgulimudrā utsaṅge nipatitā/
S01divyav_u:13412: tato manoharā pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--tāta,
S01divyav_u:13416: sa kathayati--tamahaṃ khaṇḍaśataṃ kṛtvā catasṛṣu śikṣu kṣipeyam/
S01divyav_u:13423: tasyāhaṃ tvāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ prabhūtacitropakaraṇaiḥ kinnarīsahasraparivṛtāṃ bhāryārthaṃ dadyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:13424: 298.024 tato manoharayā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditayā sudhanaṃ kumāro divyālaṃkāravibhūṣito drumasya kinnararājasyopadarśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13425: 298.025 tato drumaḥ kinnnararājaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ dadarśa abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prasādikaṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:13427: 298.027 tatastasya jijñāsāṃ kartukāmena sauvarṇāḥ stambhā ucchritāḥ,
S01divyav_u:13441: tato bodhisattvo nṛttagītavīṇāpaṇavasughoṣakavallarīmṛdaṅgādinānāvidhena daivatopasaṃhṛtena vāditraviśeṣeṇa samantādāpūryamāṇe 'nekaiḥ kinnarasahasraiḥ pativṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13446: 299.011 nīlotpaladalābhenāsinā gṛhītena paśyato drumasya kinnararājasya sauvarṇastambhasamīpaṃ gatvā tān stambhān kadalīcchedena khaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ chettumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13447: 299.012 tatastāṃs tilaśo 'vakīrya sapta tālān sapta bherīḥ sapta ca sūkarān bāṇena vidhya sumeruvadakampyo 'vasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13449: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kinnararājaḥ paraṃ vismayamupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13450: 299.015 tataḥ kinnarīsahasrasya manoharāsamānarūpasya madhye manoharāṃ sthāpayitvā sudhanaḥ kumāro 'bhihitah--ehi kumāra,
S01divyav_u:13453: 299.018 yathā drumasya duhitā mameha tvaṃ manoharā/
S01divyav_u:13457: ayaṃ sudhanaḥ kumāro balavīryaparākramasamanvito manoharāyāḥ pratirūpaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13460_0: 299.022 tato drumaḥ kinnararājaḥ kinnaragaṇena saṃvarṇitaḥ sudhanaṃ kinnarābhimetena
S01divyav_u:13460_1: mahatā satkāreṇa puraskṛtya manoharāṃ divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā
S01divyav_u:13461: eṣā te manoharā kinnarīpativṛtā bhāryārthāya dattā/
S01divyav_u:13464: 299.025 paraṃ tāteti sudhanaḥ kumāro drumasya kinnararājasya pratiśrutya kinnarabhavanastho manoharayā sārdhaṃ niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:13465: 299.027 so 'pareṇa samayena svadeśamanusmṛtya mātāpitṛviyogajena duḥkhenātyāhato manoharāyā nivedayati--mātāpitṛviyogajaṃ me duḥkhaṃ bādhata iti/
S01divyav_u:13466: 299.028 tato manoharayā eṣa vṛttānto vistareṇa pitur niveditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13470: 299.030 tato drumeṇa kinnararājena prabhūtaṃ maṇimuktāsuvarṇādīn dattvā anupreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13473: 300.001 tato hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ nānāmanohareṇa surabhinā gandhaviśeṣeṇa sarvā digāmoditam/
S01divyav_u:13477: 300.004 tataḥ kumāro 'nekanaravarasahasraparivṛto manoharayā sārdhaṃ hastināpuraṃ nagaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13478: 300.005 tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya vividhāni ratnānyādāya pituḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13482: 300.007 tato dhanena rājñā atibalavīryaparākrama iti viditvā rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13483: 300.008 sudhanaḥ kumāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--yanmama manoharayā sārdhaṃ samāgamaḥ saṃvṛtto rājyābhiṣekaścānuprāptaḥ,
S01divyav_u:13487: 300.010 tena hastināpure nagare dvādaśa varṣāṇi nirgaṭo yajña iṣṭaḥ//
S01divyav_u:13488: 300.011 syātkhalu te mahārāja anyaḥ sa tena kālena samayena sudhanaḥ kumāro veti?
S01divyav_u:13490: 300.012 api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ vartamānaḥ sudhano nāma rājā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:13494: kiṃ tu taddānaṃ tacca vīryamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksamboderhetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ saṃbhāramātrakam//
S01divyav_u:13496: āttamanasaste ca sarve lokā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//
S01divyav_u:13500: 301.002 tatra bhagavbānāyuṣmantamāmantrayate--sma āgamaya ānanda yena śrāavastīti/
S01divyav_u:13502: 301.003 atha bhagavān yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13506_0: dadarśa sa brāhmaṇo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakcaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṃ
S01divyav_u:13506_1: vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam /
S01divyav_u:13508: 301.008 na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścattasya kalyatāṃ janayati,
S01divyav_u:13513: 301.010 sa tāṃ peyāmādāya laghuladhveva yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13517: 301.012 tato bhagavatā brāhmaṇasya jīrṇakūpo darśitah--sacette brāhmaṇa parityaktā,
S01divyav_u:13521: yathāpi tadbuddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena/
S01divyav_u:13522: 301.014 tato bhagavatā sa brāhmaṇo 'bhihitah--cāraya mahābrāhmaṇa peyāmiti/
S01divyav_u:13524: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitā yathā sarvasaṃghena pītā/
S01divyav_u:13526: 301.017 tato 'sau brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasanno bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:13527: 301.018 tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:13528: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:13531: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:13532: 301.021 upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatamabhiprasannam/
S01divyav_u:13533_0: 301.022 athāsau brāhmaṇo vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva kṛṣīvalaḥ śūra iva
S01divyav_u:13533_1: vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvaroganirmukta ivāturo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ
S01divyav_u:13533_2: pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yāvatkṣetraṃ gataḥ /
S01divyav_u:13534: 301.025 paśyati tasmin kṣetre sauvarṇān yavān saṃpannān/
S01divyav_u:13560: yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe pañcakārṣaśatānyutpāḍūtpāṇḍukāni sphuṭitapāṇipādāni śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitāni laṅgalāni vāhayanti/
S01divyav_u:13561: 302.006 te 'pi balīvardā baddhaiḥ prayoktraiḥ pratodayaṣṭibhiḥ kṣatavikṣatagātrā muhurmuhur niśvasanto vahanti/
S01divyav_u:13562: 302.007 tadṛśuste kārṣākā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ pūrvavadyāvadupacitakuśalamūlasattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:13565: 302.010 dṛṣṭvā ca punarvineyāpekṣayā mārgādapakramya purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13566: eta kārṣakā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13567: 302.011 tato bhagavatā teṣāṃ kārṣakāṇāmāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:13568: pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:13573: 302.016 te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājitāḥ pūrvavadyāvatte 'vasthitā buddhamanorathena/
S01divyav_u:13576: te 'pi balīvardā yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi ca cchittvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13578: 302.019 teṣāṃ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padārthairdharmo deśitaḥ pūrvavadyāvadyathā gaṅgāvatāre haṃsamatsyakūrmāṇām yāvad dṛṣṭasatyāḥ svarbhavanaṃ gatāḥ//
S01divyav_u:13579: 302.021 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ nu taiḥ kārṣakapūrvakairbhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtam yena kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S01divyav_u:13584: bhagavānāha--ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
S01divyav_u:13585: 302.026 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminneva bhadrakalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:13588: 302.028 tasya śāsane etāni pañca karṣakaśatāni pravrajitānyabhūvan/
S01divyav_u:13589: tatraibhir na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13590: 302.029 kiṃ tu śraddhādeyaṃ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṃgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenābhināmitam//
S01divyav_u:13591: 303.001 [303]kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni,
S01divyav_u:13595: yadebhirvihārasvāmisantakaṃ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhujya na paṭhitaṃ na svādhyāyitaṃ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:13597: tena karmaṇā pañca janmaśatāni tasya vihārasvāminaḥ kārṣakāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13599: yadebhiḥ kāśayapasya samyaksambuddhāsya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṃ caritam,
S01divyav_u:13600: tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:13601: 303.007 te ca balīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitā āsan/
S01divyav_u:13611: 303.013 tatra bhagavānāyucmantamāmantrayate sma--āgamaya ānanda yena toyikā/
S01divyav_u:13615: 303.015 athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātraṃ pūrvavadyāvatsamantato bhadrakam/
S01divyav_u:13620: 303.018 tatko 'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na karmaparihāṇi syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti?
S01divyav_u:13623: 303.020 tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenābhivādanaṃ kṛtam--abhivādaye buddhaṃ bhagavantam/
S01divyav_u:13628: evamanena dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ vandanā kṛtā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:13631: 303.025 athāyuṣmānānando laghulaghveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat--niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane/
S01divyav_u:13632: 303.027 evamayaṃ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṃ samyaksambuddhābhyāṃ paribhukto bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:13636: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghātamavikopitaṃ draṣṭum?
S01divyav_u:13642: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikam [304]
S01divyav_u:13644: tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikādayo 'pi prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti/
S01divyav_u:13645: 304.002 nāgāḥ saṃlakṣayanti--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavatā laukikaṃ cittamutpāditam?
S01divyav_u:13648: 304.004 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--gṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam/
S01divyav_u:13651: 304.006 rājñā prasenajitā śrutam--bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ darśanāya avikopitaḥ kaśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṃghāta ucchrāpita iti/
S01divyav_u:13652: 304.007 śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sārdhamantah--pureṇa kumārauramātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajanapadaiśca draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13656: anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṃ saṃprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṃcodyamānāni/
S01divyav_u:13658: 304.011 taiḥ śrutam--antarhito 'sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śīrarasaṃghāta iti/
S01divyav_u:13659: 304.012 śrutvā ca punasteṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam--vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṃ jātamiti//
S01divyav_u:13661: evaṃ cetasā cittamabhisaṃskṛtam--asmānme padāvihārāt kiyatpuṇyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti?
S01divyav_u:13662: atha bhagavāṃstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṃjananārthaṃ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣite--
S01divyav_u:13663: 304.016 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13664: 304.018 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//2//
S01divyav_u:13668: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāpi cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:13669: 304.023 śataṃsahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍaṃ jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13682: 305.008 śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13683: 305.010 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṃ prakaroti vidvān//5// iti/
S01divyav_u:13687: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:13689: 305.017 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṃ prakaroti vidvān//6// iti/
S01divyav_u:13693: atha bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:13694: 305.022 śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:13695: 305.024 yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṃ prakaroti vidvān//7// iti/
S01divyav_u:13698: muktapuṣpāṇāṃ mālavihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ca iyatpuṇyamuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S01divyav_u:13703: 306.005 eṣāṃ hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate/
S01divyav_u:13707: 306.008 atha bhagavāṃsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:13713: 306.014 tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:13724: 306.018 yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:13725: 306.019 sārdhaṃ tatra brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhistasmin pradeśe mahaḥ sthāpitah--toyikāmahastoyikāmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:13730: ekasmin samaye bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ/
S01divyav_u:13731_0: 307.003 satkṛto bhagavān gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito bhikṣubhibhikṇyupāsakopāsikai rājñā
S01divyav_u:13732: 307.005 lābhī ca bhagavān prabhutānāṃ praṇītānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ divyānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S01divyav_u:13734_0: 307.007 tena khalu punaḥ samayena ayameva bhagavato 'nurūpa udāraḥ kalyāṇakīrtiśabda
S01divyav_u:13734_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:13735: 307.010 sa imāṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīṃ prajāṃ sadevamanuṣīṃ svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati/
S01divyav_u:13736: 307.011 sa dharmaṃ deśayatyādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇāṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam/
S01divyav_u:13737: 307.012 svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma/
S01divyav_u:13738: 307.013 tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--evaṃ ca bhikṣavaḥ sattvā jānīyuh--dānaṃ dānaphalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca vipākam,
S01divyav_u:13739: apīdānīm yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:13741: na cotpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭheyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:13742: 307.016 yasmāttarhi bhikṣavaḥ sattvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam yathāhaṃ jāne dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam,
S01divyav_u:13743: tasmātsattvā yo 'sau caramaḥ kavalaḥ paścima ālopaḥ,
S01divyav_u:13745: utpannaṃ cauṣāṃ mātsaryamalaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati//
S01divyav_u:13746: 307.020 bhikṣavaḥ sarvasaṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantamapṛcchan--āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvacca bhagavata etarhi yācakāḥ priyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13750: 307.023 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvanyuttarāpatheṣu janapadeṣu utpalāvatī nāṃ nagarī rājadhānī babhūva ṛddhā ca sphaītā ca kṣemā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca/
S01divyav_u:13751: 307.024 athāpareṇa samayena utpalāvatyāṃ nagararājadhānyāṃ durbhikṣamabhūd durjīvaṃ durlabhapiṇḍaṃ nasukaramapatāne pragrahaṇe yāpayitum/
S01divyav_u:13752: 307.026 tena khalu samayenotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpāvatī nāma strī babhūva abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śubhavarṇapuṣkalanayā samanvāgatā/
S01divyav_u:13753: 307.027 atha rūpāvatī strī svānniveśanānniṣkramya utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jaṅghāvihāramanukrāmati/
S01divyav_u:13755: tasmin khalu samaye tasminnapavarake strī prasūtā,
S01divyav_u:13756: dārakaṃ prajātā abhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:13757: 307.030 taṃ sā strī kṣutkṣāmaparītā raikṣacittā dārakaṃ gṛhṇāti,
S01divyav_u:13759: 307.031 tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpāvatī strī etadavovat--kimidaṃ bhagini kartukāmāsi?
S01divyav_u:13762: 308.001 rūpāvatī āha--tenabhagini niveśane kiṃcitsaṃvidyate 'nnaṃ vā pānaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā?
S01divyav_u:13764: 308.002 na me bhagini kiṃcitsaṃvidyate niveśane annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā khādyaṃ vā bhojanaṃ vā svādanīyaṃ vā lehyaṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:13772: 308.006 na tāvattvaṃ dvāraśālāyā nirgatā bhaviṣyasi yāvanme vāyava ākramiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:13773: 308.007 yathā rūpāvatyā etadabhavat--yadi dārakaṃ gṛhītvā gamiṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:13778_0: tasyā etadabhavat--anaparādhyāśayavati saṃsāre bahūni duḥkhānyanubhūtāni asakṛ nnarakeṣvasakṛttiryakṣvasakṛd
S01divyav_u:13778_1: yamaloke 'sakṛ nmanuṣyalokeṣu hastacchedāḥ pādacchedāḥ karṇacchedā karṇanāsācchedā
S01divyav_u:13779: 308.012 ko mayā tenārtho 'nuprāpto yadā āhamātmanaḥ sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca saṃjanayitvā imāṃ striyaṃ svena rudhireṇa māṃsena saṃtarpya imaṃ dārakaṃ parimocayeyam/
S01divyav_u:13780: 308.014 rūpāvatī pṛcchati--asti te bhagini niveśane śastram?
S01divyav_u:13785: 308.016 tato rūpāvatyā svayameva śastraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gṛhītvā tau stanau cchittvā tāṃ striyaṃ svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayati sma/
S01divyav_u:13786: 308.017 saṃtarpya ca tāṃ striyametadavocat--yatkhalu bhagini jānīyāh--ayaṃ dārako mayā svakena māṃsarudhireṇa krītaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13787: 308.018 sāhaṃ tava nikṣepamanuprayacchāmi--mā bhūyo dārakaṃ bhakṣayiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:13790: 308.020 atha rūpāvatī strī rudhireṇoddharatā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:13792: strīṃ rudhireṇoddharatā pradharatā dūrata eva agacchantīm/
S01divyav_u:13793: 308.022 dṛṣṭvā ca punā rūpāvatīmetadavocat--kenedamevamrūpaṃ rūpāvati viprakāraṃ kṛtam?
S01divyav_u:13795: 308.023 ārocayitvā etadavocat--prajñapaya āryaputra tasyā striyā bhaktam/
S01divyav_u:13798: yenāryaduhitaḥ satyena satyavacanena ayamevamrūpa āścaryādbhuto dharmo na kadācid dṛṣṭo vā śruto vā,
S01divyav_u:13799: tena satyena satyavacanena ubhau tava stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhavetām/
S01divyav_u:13800: 308.026 sahakṛtenāsminnevamrūpe satyavacane tasyā asminneva kṣaṇe ubhau stanau yathāpaurāṇau prādurbhūtau//
S01divyav_u:13801: 308.028 atha śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhavat--atityāgo 'tityāgagauravatā yā rūpāvatyā striyā kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13802: 308.029 mā haiva sā rūpāvatī strī ataḥ śakrabhavanāccyāvayet/
S01divyav_u:13804_1: suvarṇadaṇḍena maṇivālavyajanena vījyamānastadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ bāhuṃ
S01divyav_u:13805: evameva śakro devānāmindro deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣvantarhita utpalāvatyām [309]rājadhānyāṃ pratyasthāt/
S01divyav_u:13806: 309.001 atha śakro devānāmindra utpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ bhaikṣyamanvāhiṇḍan yana rūpāvatyāḥ striyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya dvāri sthitvā bhaikṣyamutkrośate/
S01divyav_u:13807: 309.002 tato rūpāvatī strī bhaikṣamādāya yena sa brāhmaṇaveṣadharaḥ śakraḥ,
S01divyav_u:13809: 309.003 atha sa śakro devānāmindro rūpāvatīṃ striyametadvocat--satyaṃ te rūpāvari dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau?
S01divyav_u:13811: 309.005 sa tāmāh--evaṃ te rūpāvatī ubhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā abhūccittasya vipratisārah?
S01divyav_u:13812: sā āha--na me ubhau stanau parityajantyā abhūccittasya vipratisāraḥ/
S01divyav_u:13815: 309.008 yena satyena brahman satyavacanenobhau stanau parityajāmīti parityajantyāḥ parityajya vā nābhūccittasyānyathātvam,
S01divyav_u:13817: api ca brahman yena satyena mayā dārakasyārthāyobhau stanau parityaktau,
S01divyav_u:13818: na rājyārthaṃ na bhogārthaṃ na śakrārthaṃ na rājñāṃ cakravartināṃ viṣayārthaṃ nānyatrāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambudhya adāntān damayeyam,
S01divyav_u:13822: tena satyena satyavacanena mama strīndriyamantardhāya puruṣendriyaṃ prādurbhavet/
S01divyav_u:13825: atha khalu śakro devendrastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātas tata eva ṛddhyā vaihāyasamabhyudgamyodānamudānayati--rūpāvatyāḥ strīndriyamantarhitam,
S01divyav_u:13827: 309.016 rūpāvatyāḥ striyo rūpāvataḥ kumāra iti saṃjñā utpāditā//
S01divyav_u:13828: 309.018 athāpareṇa samayenopalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā aputraḥ kālagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13829: tatra piṇḍatajātīyānāṃ mahāmātrāṇāmetadabhūt--yannu vayamutpalāvatyāṃ rāhadhānyāṃ rāhānaṃ sthāpayema/
S01divyav_u:13831: te rūpāvataṃ kumāramutpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājānaṃ sthāpayanti/
S01divyav_u:13834: 309.022 kāyasya bhedāttasyāmevotpalāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāmanyatamasya śroṣṭhino gṛhapateragramahiṣyāḥ kukṣāvupapannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13835: 309.023 sā pūrṇānāmaṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāddārakaṃ janayati abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:13838: 309.025 athānyatarā strī yena sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:13839: 309.026 upasaṃkramya śreṣṭhinaṃ gṛhapatimetadavocat--yatkhalu gṛhapate jānīyāh--te dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13842_0: 309.028 atha sa śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ prītasaumanasyajātas tasyā
S01divyav_u:13842_1: eva rātryā atyayādye jānanti brahmaṇā lakṣaṇyā naibhittikā vaipañcikā bhūmyantarikṣamantrakuśalā
S01divyav_u:13843: sa tān saṃnipātya dārakamupadarśayati--yatkhalu brāhmaṇā jānīdhvam--ayamagramahiṣyā dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikāḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13846: 309.033 tadasya brāhmaṇā dārakasya lakṣaṇāni prekṣya [310]nāma avasthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:13847: 310.001 tasye ta brāhmaṇā lakṣaṇanaimittikā vipañcikā bhūmyantarīkṣamantrakuśalā nakṣatraśukragrahacatiteṣu kovidā dārakamupagatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:13848: 310.002 ṭe saṃlakṣya vadanti--te gṛhapate dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:13849: 310.003 asya jātamātrasya tādṛśī kāyātprabhā muktā yayā candraprabhā niṣprabhīkṛtā/
S01divyav_u:13851: 310.005 atha śreṣṭhī gṛhapatistān brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā visarjya candraprabhasya dārakasya catasro dhātrīranuprayacchati aṅkadhātrī maladhātrī stanadhātrī karīḍāpaṇilā dhātrī/
S01divyav_u:13857: 310.009 krūḍāpanikā dhātryucyate yāni tāni dārakāṇāṃ dakṣakāṇāṃ taruṇakānāṃ ktīḍāpanikāni bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:13859: syapeṭārikā vaṃśaghaṭikā saṃdhāvaṇikā hastivigrahā aśvavigrahā balīvardavigrahāḥ kathayanti dhanurgrahāḥ kāṇḍakaṭacchupūrakūrcabhaiṣajyasthavikāśca purataḥ patikṛṣyante/
S01divyav_u:13862: tadainaṃ mātāpitarau susnātaṃ suviliptaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā saṃbahulairdārakaiḥ parivṛttaṃ lipiṃ prāpayante/
S01divyav_u:13863: 310.014 tena khalu samayena tasyāṃ lipiśālāyāṃ pañcamātrakadārakaśatāni lipiṃ śikṣanti/
S01divyav_u:13864: 310.015 atha candraprabho dārakastān dārakānetadavocat--etaddārakā vayaṃ sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimabhisambodhau cittamutpādayema/
S01divyav_u:13868: tadyathā--dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā/
S01divyav_u:13871: 310.019 sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastramādāya madhusarpiśca yenānyataraṃ mahāśmaśānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13872: 310.020 śastreṇātmanaḥ kāyaṃ kṣaṇitvā madhusarpiṣā mrakṣayitvā tasmin sa mahāśmaśāne ātmānaṃ vadhāyotsṛjati/
S01divyav_u:13873: 310.021 tena ca samayena tasmin mahāśmaśāne uccaṃgamaḥ pakṣī prativasati/
S01divyav_u:13874: 310.022 sa candraprabhasya dārakasyāṅge sthitvā dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayati,
S01divyav_u:13876: 310.023 dvirapi trirapi uccaṃgamaḥ prāṇī candraprabhasya dārakasya dakṣiṇaṃ nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā punarmuñcati/
S01divyav_u:13877: 310.024 atha candraprabho dāraka uccaṃgamaṃ pakṣiṇamidamavocat--kimidaṃ pakṣi mama nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayitvā utpāṭayitvā punaḥ pramuñcasi?
S01divyav_u:13881: candraprabha āha--sacenmama pakṣī sahasrakṛtvo nayanaṃ gṛhītvā utpāṭayatu,
S01divyav_u:13889: abhirūpaṃ darśanīyaṃ prāsādikāṃ śubhayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatam/
S01divyav_u:13890: 310.032 tasya mātāpitarau brāhmaprabha iti nāma sthāpitavantau/
S01divyav_u:13894: sa pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakāni svayameva mantrān vācayati/
S01divyav_u:13895: 311.002 yadā brahmaprabho māṇavakaḥ ṣoḍaśavarṣo jātyā saṃvṛttaḥ,
S01divyav_u:13901: sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:13903: 311.006 brahmaprabhamāṇavako mātāpitroḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya utpalāvatyā rājadhānyā niṣkramya yenānyataradvanaṣaṇḍaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13904: 311.007 tena khalu samayena tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe dvau brāhmaṇarṣī prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:13905: 311.008 apaśyatāṃ brāhmaṇarṣīṃ brahmaprabhaṃ māṇavakaṃ dūrata evāgacchantam/
S01divyav_u:13910: sa āha--icchāmyahaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya tapastaptuṃ duṣkaraṃ caritum/
S01divyav_u:13915: 311.012 atha brahmaprabho māṇavako 'nyatarasmin pradeśe kuṭīṃ kārayitvā caṃkramaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sattvānāmarthāya tapastaptavān/
S01divyav_u:13916: 311.013 athāpareṇa samayena brahmaprabhasya kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
S01divyav_u:13918: 311.014 tāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca yena punastau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13919: upasaṃkramya tau ca brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu ṛṣī jānītām--iha me kuṭyā nātidūre vyāghrī gurviṇī vāsamupagatā/
S01divyav_u:13922: 311.017 athāpareṇa samayena vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā icchati svakau potakau bhakṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:13926: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryena tau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13927: 311.019 upasaṃkramya punaryena tau dvau brahmarṣī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13928: 311.020 upasaṃkramya dvau brahmarṣī etadavocat--yatkhalu brāhmaṇau jānītām--sā vyāghrī prasūtā kṣutkṣāmaparītā svakau potakau bhakṣayitumicchati/
S01divyav_u:13929: 311.021 ekaṃ potakaṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyaṃ muñcati na bhakṣayati/
