S01divyav_u:13932: atha tau brahmarṣī yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntau/
S01divyav_u:13938: 311.026 dṛṣṭvā ca punastau brahmarṣī etadavocat--nanu brāhmaṇau,
S01divyav_u:13941: tau āhatuh--ka utsahate tiryagyonigatasyārthāya jīvitaṃ parityaktum?
S01divyav_u:13943: 311.029 atha sa brahmaprabho māṇavako yena sā vyāghrī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:13947: atha brahmaprabhasya māṇavasyaitadabhavat--iyaṃ mama vyāghrī sāvijñānakaṃ kāyaṃ na bhakṣayati/
S01divyav_u:13949_0: tatastīkṣṇaṃ ca veṇupeśīṃ tīkṣṇāṃ gṛhītvā idamevaṃ rūpaṃ satyavacanamakarot--samanvāharantu

S01divyav_u:14476: 326.004 tadyathā brāhmaṇa amīṣāmapi jalajānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ padmotpalasaugandhakamṛdugandhikādīnāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:14477: 326.005 yaduta rūpataśca gandhataśca saṃsthānataśca varṇataśca nānākaraṇaṃ parjñāyate/
S01divyav_u:14478: 326.006 na tveva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate/
S01divyav_u:14479: tadyathā puṣkarasārinn amī brāhmaṇā iti kṣatriyā iti vaiśyā iti śūdrā iti/
S01divyav_u:14489: tasmātkṣatriyā api vaiśyā api śūdrā apyutpannāḥ//
S01divyav_u:14490: 326.016 evaṃ prasūtiryadi tattvataḥ syāttato hi syādvarṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14491: 326.018 yadi brāhmaṇā brahmalokaṃ vrajeyustrayaśca varṇā na vrajeyuḥ svargam/
S01divyav_u:14492: 326.020 evaṃ bhavedvarṇakṛto viśeṣo na cenna catvāro bhavanti varṇāḥ//60//
S01divyav_u:14493: 326.022 yasmāddhi varṇaścaturtha evaṃ prayāti svargaṃ svakṛtena karmaṇā/
S01divyav_u:14494: 326.024 yatastapaścārṣamiha praśastaṃ tasmād dvijāter na viśeṣaṇaṃ syād//61//
S01divyav_u:14496: 326.028 caturviṣāṇo bahupād dviśīrṣa evaṃ kṛte varṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ//62//
S01divyav_u:14497: 327.001 [327]rāgaiśca nāma paraghātanaṃ ca evamprakāraṃ ca viheṭhanaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:14498: 327.003 sattvasya vai karmaṇo dhvaṃsanaṃ ca etānyakalyāṇakṛtāni vipraiḥ//63//
S01divyav_u:14499: 327.005 yuddhaṃ vivādaṃ kalahānyabhīkṣṇaṃ goprokṣaṇaṃ cintitaṃ brāhmaṇairhi/
S01divyav_u:14500: 327.007 atharvaṇaṃ karmaṇā trāsanaṃ ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ//64//
S01divyav_u:14501: 327.009 pāpecchatā bahujanavañcanaṃ ca śāṭhyaṃ ca dhauryaṃ ca tathaiva kalpam/
S01divyav_u:14502: 327.011 evaṃ pareṣāmahitaṃ vicintya kadā ca te svargamito vrajeyuḥ//65//
S01divyav_u:14503: 327.013 ye brāhmaṇā ugratapā vinītā vratena śīlena sadā hyupetāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14504: 327.015 ahiṃsakā ye damasamyame ratāste brāhmaṇā brahmapuraṃ vrajanti//66//
S01divyav_u:14505: 327.017 sahāsthimāṃsaḥ sanakhaḥ sacarmā duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ mūtrapurīṣamekam/
S01divyav_u:14506: 327.019 pañcendriyair nāsti yato viśeṣastasmānna vai varṇacatuṣka eṣaḥ//67//
S01divyav_u:14507: 327.021 tadyathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasyacitpuruṣasya catvāraḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:14508: sa teṣāṃ nāmāni kuryāt--nandaka iti vā jīvaka iti vā aśoka iti vā śatāyuriti vā/
S01divyav_u:14509: 327.022 iṣṭāśca punarbho etasya puruṣasya putrā bhaveyuḥ/
S01divyav_u:14514: 327.025 nāmataḥ punarbrāhmaṇa teṣāṃ nānākaraṇaṃ prajñāyate na jātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14516: iha khalu punarbrahmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putro jāyate/
S01divyav_u:14518: 327.027 mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ/
S01divyav_u:14521: 327.029 parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa samyageva--ko 'tra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/
S01divyav_u:14523: 327.031 kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaśca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//69//
S01divyav_u:14526: 328.003 evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ ko jātikṛto viśeṣaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14527: 328.004 yasmānna jāterviśeṣaṇo 'sti tasmānna vai varṇacatuṣka eva//69//(a)
S01divyav_u:14528: 328.005 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--saṃjñāmātramidaṃ lokasya yadidaṃ brāṃhaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāka iti vā/
S01divyav_u:14530: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:14532: 328.008 idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājāsya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat--kiṃ punarbhavatā ṛgvedo 'dhītaḥ,
S01divyav_u:14543: athavā aṅgavidyā vā vastravidyā vā śivāvidyā śakunividyā vā tvayādhītā?
S01divyav_u:14544: athavā rāhucaritaṃ vā śukracaritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ tvayādhītam?
S01divyav_u:14545: athavā lokāyataṃ bhavatā bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītah?
S01divyav_u:14546: 328.014 evamukte triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇametadavocat--etacca mayā brāhmaṇā adhītaṃ bhūyaścottaram/
S01divyav_u:14548: yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt--ahamasmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti,
S01divyav_u:14549: tatra te brāhmaṇa saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14550: 328.016 na khalvevaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānāmetadabhavat--yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:14552: 328.019 atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ cobhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato 'nye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā,
S01divyav_u:14554: 328.020 athātra brāhmaṇa tadanyatamānāṃ sattvānāmetadabhavat--parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14555: 328.021 yannu vayaṃ svaparigrahamapahāya araṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇakuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā praviśya dhyāyema iti/
S01divyav_u:14556: 328.023 atha te sattvāstaṃ parigrahamapahāyā araṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapālāśakaistṛṇakuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā tatraiva praviśya dhyāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:14557: 328.025 te tatra sāyamāsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetośca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma//
S01divyav_u:14558: 328.027 atha teṣāṃ grāmavāsināṃ satvānāmetadabhavat--duṣkarakārakā bata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigrahamutsṛjya grāmanigamajanapadebhyo bahir nirgatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14559: 328.028 teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhmaṇā iti saṃjñā udapādi/
S01divyav_u:14560: 328.029 te ca punargrāmavāsinaḥ sattvāstānatīva satkurvanti sma/
S01divyav_u:14562: 329.001 [329]atha etṣāmeva sattvānāmanyatame sattvāstāni dhyānānyasambhāvayanto grāmeṣvavatīrya mantrapadān svādhyāyanti sma/
S01divyav_u:14566: 329.003 ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya//
S01divyav_u:14567: 329.005 athānyatame sattvā vivekakālapratisamyuktān kārmāntān vividhānarthapratisamyuktān kurvanti sma/
S01divyav_u:14569: 329.007 athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/
S01divyav_u:14571: 329.009 bhūtapūrvaṃ brāhmaṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūmādāya rathamāruhya anyatamasminnaraṇyapradeśe gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:14573: tasmānmātaṅgam {mā tvaṃ gāmah} iti saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:14574: 329.011 kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā pravṛttā//
S01divyav_u:14575: 329.012 bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlavratasamācāreṇa samyak,
S01divyav_u:14580: pravrajitvā parāñ jayanti kleśāñ jayantīti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi//
S01divyav_u:14581: 329.017 api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/
S01divyav_u:14604: 329.027 tadyathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahmasamā mahāsamā mahāyāgikāḥ sātyamugrāḥ samantavedāḥ//
S01divyav_u:14615: ete brāhmaṇā ekaviṃśatyadhvaryavo bhūtvā ekottaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14616: 330.002 tadyathā kaṭhāḥ kaṇimā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ praṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14632: 330.010 anumānamapi brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśabhedaśatāni ṣoḍaśabhedāśca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ pauraṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14633: 330.011 chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokayate vā padamīmāṃsāyāṃ vā/
S01divyav_u:14636: tatte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--saṃjñāmātrakametallokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:14638: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitamutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:14640: 330.016 idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo 'sthāt//
S01divyav_u:14641: 330.018 dadarśa triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitam/
S01divyav_u:14642: 330.019 dṛṣṭvā ca punaridamabravīt--yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syādasadṛśena saha saṃbandho bhaviṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:14645: ye pramāṇaśrutiśīlaprajñādayo guṇā agryā lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/
S01divyav_u:14646: 330.022 yadapi te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt--ye vājapeyam yajñam yajanti,
S01divyav_u:14647: aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yajanti,
S01divyav_u:14648: sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/
S01divyav_u:14651: vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñam yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ puruṣamedhaṃ śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajña ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/
S01divyav_u:14652: 330.026 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--na hyeṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/
S01divyav_u:14653: ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14656: 330.029 praśaṃsāṃ vittalābhaṃ ca pratya svarge ca modanam//70//
S01divyav_u:14657: 330.030 yairbrāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:14658: yairaśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣamedho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ,
S01divyav_u:14662: ye 'śvamedham ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍam yajñam yakṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:14664: 331.002 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi--ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ saṃbandham yojanayasva/
S01divyav_u:14668: 331.005 śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutirjñānaṃ dayaiva ca//
S01divyav_u:14673: aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke pravartante/
S01divyav_u:14683: 331.012 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ sapta gautrāṇi svākhyāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:14684: tāni śrūyantām--tadyathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kāśyapā vāsiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ityetāni brāhmaṇa sapta gotrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:14686: atra ye gautamāste kauthumāste gagarste bhāradvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇāste vaikhānasāste vajrapādāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14687: 331.015 tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāste maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste bahujātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14688: 331.016 tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyāsta maitreyāste bhārgavāste sāvarṇyāste salīlāste bahujātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14689: tatra ye kautsāste maudgalyāyanāste gauṇāyanāste lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste somabhuvāh{vah}/
S01divyav_u:14690: 331.017 tatra ye kauśikāste kātyāyanāste darbhakātyāyanāste valkalinaste pakṣiṇaste laukākṣāste lohitāyanāh (lohityāyanāḥ/)/
S01divyav_u:14691: 331.018 tatra ye kāśyapāste maṇḍanāsta iṣṭāste śauṇḍāyanāste rocaneyāste 'napekṣāste 'gniveśyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14692: 331.019 tatra ye kāśyapāste jātukarṇyāste dhānyāyanāste pārāśarāste vyāghranakhāste āṇḍāyanāsta aupamanyavāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14693: 331.021 tatra ye māṇḍavyāste bhāṇḍāyanāste dhomrāyaṇāste kātyāyanāste khalvavāahanāste sugandhārāyaṇāste kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14694: 331.022 ityetāni brāhmaṇa evamekonapañcāśadgotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni cchandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyām/
S01divyav_u:14695: 331.023 anyāni ca gotrāṇi vistarato mayā vācitāni/
S01divyav_u:14698: tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:14700: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramutsṛja bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:14702: 331.029 idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tūṣṇīmbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparaḥ sthito 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:14703: 331.030 adrākṣīt triśaṅkurmātaṅgarājah [332]puskarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīmbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandhamadhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitam/
S01divyav_u:14705: 332.003 yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalam/
S01divyav_u:14712: 332.010 bhavette bhavinī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//75//
S01divyav_u:14713: 332.011 yadi tāvadayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayam/
S01divyav_u:14715: 332.013 atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā vā punaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14716: 332.014 na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//77//
S01divyav_u:14717: 332.015 na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
S01divyav_u:14719: 332.017 teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
S01divyav_u:14720: 332.018 atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//79//
S01divyav_u:14725: 332.023 manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṃkarī/
S01divyav_u:14726: 332.024 kākavāṇī ca mantraṃ ca indrajālaṃ ca bhañjanī//82//
S01divyav_u:14732: 332.030 na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//85//
S01divyav_u:14735: 333.003 na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//86//
S01divyav_u:14736: 333.004 kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahāmunim/
S01divyav_u:14738: 333.006 na hyasau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//87//
S01divyav_u:14739: 333.007 ye ca te manujā āsaṃs tejasā tapasā yutāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14741: 333.009 na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//88//
S01divyav_u:14744: 333.012 tasmātte brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya yaduta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:14746: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:14748: 333.015 idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--kiṃgotro bhavān?
S01divyav_u:14779: 333.025 bhūtapūrvaṃ brāhmaṇa atīte 'dhvani vasur nāma ṛṣirbabhūva/
S01divyav_u:14781: tena tatra takṣakaduhitā kapilā nāma āsaditā bhāryārtham/
S01divyav_u:14782: sa tatra saṃraktacittastayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunamagacchat/
S01divyav_u:14784: 333.028 ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhāṇastasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/
S01divyav_u:14789: 333.031 iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñānaśodhanārthamimameva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divārātraṃ japati sma/
S01divyav_u:14804: 334.007 kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:14805: 334.009 tasmādbhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmāṃs tato 'tulaṃ prāpsyatha brahmalokam//91//
S01divyav_u:14806: 334.011 itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā,
S01divyav_u:14814_0: 334.015 kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyah āśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī
S01divyav_u:14814_1: uttaraphalgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā anurādhā jyeṣṭā mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā
S01divyav_u:14814_2: uttarāṣāḍhā abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā
S01divyav_u:14816: 334.019 katitārakāṇi katisaṃsthānāni katimuhūrtayogāni kimāhārāṇi kiṃdaivatāni kiṃgotrāṇi?
S01divyav_u:14817: 334.021 kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣurasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ dadhyāhāramagnidaivataṃ vaiśyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14818: 334.022 rohiṇīnakṣatraṃ pañcatārakaṃ śakaṭākṛtisaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mṛgamāṃsāhāraṃ prajāpatidaivataṃ bhāradvājaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14819: 334.023 mṛgāśirānakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ mṛgaśīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ phalamūlāhāraṃ somadaivataṃ mṛgāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14820: 334.024 ārdrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ sarpirmaṇḍāhāraṃ sūryadaivataṃ hārītāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14821: 334.026 punarvasunakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhyāhāram aditidaivataṃ vāsiṣṭhaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14822: 334.027 puṣyanakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ vardhamānasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhumaṇḍāhāraṃ bṛhaspatidaivatam aupamanyavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14823: 334.028 āśleṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ pāyasabhojanaṃ sarpadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14824: 334.029 itīmāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi pūrvadvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:14825: 334.031 maghānakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ nadīkubjasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilakṛsarāhāraṃ titṛdaivatam [335]piṅgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14826: 335.001 pūrvaphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ bilvabhojanaṃ bhavadaivataṃ gautamīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14827: 335.002 uttaraphalgunīnakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāramaryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14828: 335.003 hastanakṣatraṃ pañcatāraṃ hastasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ śyāmākabhojanaṃ sūryadaivataṃ kāśyapaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14829: 335.004 citrānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraghṛtapūpāhāraṃ tvaṣṭṛdaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14830: 335.005 svātīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ mudgakṛsaraphalāhāraṃ vāyudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14831: 335.007 viśākhānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ viṣāṇasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilapuṣpāhāramindrāgnidaivataṃ śākhāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14833: 335.009 anurādhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ ratnāvalīsaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ surāmāṃsāhāraṃ mitradaivatamālambāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14834: 335.010 jyeṣṭhānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogaṃ śāliyavāgūbhojanamindradaivataṃ dīrghakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14835: 335.011 mūlanakṣatraṃ saptatāraṃ vṛścikasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14836: 335.012 pūrvāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikramasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ nyagrodhakaṣāyāhāraṃ toyadaivataṃ darbhakātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14837: 335.013 uttarāṣāḍhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ gajavikramasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhulājāhāraṃ viśvadaivataṃ maudgalāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14838: 335.015 abhijinnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ gośīrṣasaṃsthānaṃ ṣaṇmuhūrtayogaṃ vāyvāhāraṃ brahmadaivataṃ brahmāvatīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14839: 335.016 śravaṇānakṣatraṃ tritāram yavamadhyasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14840: 335.017 ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:14841: 335.019 dhaniṣṭhānakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ śakunasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ kulatthapūpāhāraṃ vasudaivataṃ kauṇḍinyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14842: 335.020 śatabhiṣānakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcadaśamuhūrtayogam yavāgubhojanaṃ varuṇadaivataṃ tāṇḍyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14843: 335.021 pūrvabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsarudhirāhāramahirbudhnyadaivataṃ jātūkarṇyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14844: 335.022 uttarabhādrapadānakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ padakasaṃsthānaṃ pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ māṃsāhāram aryamādaivataṃ dhyānadrāhyāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14845: 335.024 revatīnakṣatramekatāraṃ tilakasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ madhupāyasabhojanaṃ gandharvadaivataṃ maitrāyaṇīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14846: 335.026 bharaṇīnakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ bhagasaṃsthānaṃ triṃśanmuhūrtayogaṃ tilataṇḍulāhāram yamadaivataṃ bhārgavīyaṃ gotreṇa/
S01divyav_u:14847: 335.027 ityetāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta nakṣatrāṇi uttaradvārakāṇi//
S01divyav_u:14848: 335.028 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ ṣaṇnakṣatrāṇi pañcacatvāriṃśanmuhūrtayogāni/
S01divyav_u:14849: 335.029 tadyathā--rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
S01divyav_u:14851: tadyathā--ārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/
S01divyav_u:14854: 336.001 [336]amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrvadvārikāṇāṃ kṛttikā prathamā nāmā,
S01divyav_u:14856: 336.002 amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ dakṣiṇadvārīkāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma,
S01divyav_u:14858: 336.003 amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmanurādhā prathamā nāma,
S01divyav_u:14860: 336.004 amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāmuttaradvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā nāma,
S01divyav_u:14862: 336.006 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
S01divyav_u:14864: yaduta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvasuḥ punarvasuḥ svātiśca/
S01divyav_u:14870: 336.009 śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/
S01divyav_u:14874: yaduta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti//
S01divyav_u:14875: 336.011 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭhāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā bhavanti--ṛṣabhānusārī yogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14878: tatra nakṣatram yadi purastādgacchati candraśca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
S01divyav_u:14880: 336.013 yaduta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca pṛṣṭhataḥ,
S01divyav_u:14882: 336.014 yadi punaścandro nakṣatraṃ cobhau samau yugapad gacchataḥ,
S01divyav_u:14884: 336.016 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14886: tadyathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho 'ṅgārakaḥ sūryastārādhipatiśceti//
S01divyav_u:14887: 336.018 evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiśca bhavati? taducyate/
S01divyav_u:14888: 336.019 hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ dvādaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14890: grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāmaṣṭādaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14892: varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyāmaṣṭabhyāṃ caturdaśamuhūrto divase bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14902: tadyathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14908: 336.029 āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavatipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14909: ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śveto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14910: 336.030 dvādaśapauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14911: 336.031 ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śarapathe nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14914: 337.002 tripauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sumukho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14915: sthite madhyāhne vajrako nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14916: 337.003 parivṛto madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14922: 337.006 avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavatipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:14924: 337.008 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:14941: iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn imāni triṃśanmuhūrtāni yairahorātraṃ prajñāyate//
S01divyav_u:14954: caturojāḥ śvetaḥ samṛddhaḥ śarapatho 'tisamṛddha udgataḥ sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarvaraso vasuḥ sundaraḥ parabhayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14955: 337.020 raudrastārāvacaraḥ samyamaḥ sāmpraiyako 'nanto gardabho rākṣaso 'vayavo brahmā ditirarko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnirabhijit/
S01divyav_u:14971: 337.029 yadā caivaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/
S01divyav_u:14972: etena nāḍikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍike eko muhūrtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14981: 338.003 etena punarakṣinimeṣeṇa ṣoḍaśakoṭyo 'ṣṭapañcāśañca śatasahasrāṇi aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:14998: paramāṇūnāṃ koṭiśatasahasrāṇi caturviṃśatiścaikonatriṃśatkoṭisahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śatasahasrāṇi/
S01divyav_u:15005: 338.014 dve koṭī pañcaviṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatānyaṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15010: 338.017 paramāṇūnāmaṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate aśītiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15016: dve koṭiśate tisraśca koṭaya ekonatriṃśacca śatasahasrāṇi catuḥsaptatisahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiśca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15022: koṭiśatamaṣṭapañcāśacca koṭayo dviraśītiśca śatāshasrāṇi ekaṣaṣṭiśca sahasrāṇi pañcaśatāni triṃśacca paramāṇavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15025: atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatravyākaraṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tacchrūyatām/
S01divyav_u:15034: 339.001 maghāyāṃ jāto matimān bhavati, mahātmā ca/
S01divyav_u:15047: 339.006 mūle jātaḥ putravān bhavati, yaśasvī ca/
S01divyav_u:15062: atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatranirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15065: 339.014 kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:15067: 339.016 rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15074: 339.023 punarvasau niviṣḍe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
S01divyav_u:15076: 339.025 śrīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
S01divyav_u:15082: 339.031 maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15086: 340.003 uttarāyāṃ tu phalgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
S01divyav_u:15087: 340.004 mūrkhā janā strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//102//
S01divyav_u:15088: 340.005 haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahādhanāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15089: 340.006 parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//103//
S01divyav_u:15090: 340.007 citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strījitāḥ sarvamānavāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15093: 340.010 lubdhāḥ krūrāśca mūrkhāśca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//105//
S01divyav_u:15094: 340.011 viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:15106: 340.023 abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15117: 341.004 pūrṇaṃ ca dhanadhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//117//
S01divyav_u:15118: 341.005 pure niviṣṭe revatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:15124: 341.011 purāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatrayogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
S01divyav_u:15125: 341.013 iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayettu pūrve ca janme 'dhigataṃ mayedam//121//
S01divyav_u:15127: 341.016 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthānanirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15158: ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇāṃ sthānanirdeśavyākaraṇo nāmādhyāyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:15162: 342.001 [342]kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15168: 342.005 rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15172: eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
S01divyav_u:15177: 342.009 mṛgaśīrṣe grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15185: 342.012 ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15192: trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--jvaraḥ śvāso galagrahaśca/
S01divyav_u:15195: 342.016 punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15202: 342.019 puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15210: tatra trayo rogāśca bhavanti--gāṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca/
S01divyav_u:15212: 342.023 āśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15221: 342.027 maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:15226: 342.030 pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15229: tacca sasyaṃ janayitvā paracakrapīḍitā manuṣyā na sukhenopabhuñjate/
S01divyav_u:15230: 342.032 paśūnāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cātra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:15232: 343.001 [343]uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15239: 343.005 haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15245: 343.008 citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15251: 343.011 svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15256: 343.013 viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15263: 343.016 anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15265: 343.017 jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse cātra dṛḍāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:15267: 343.018 jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15277: 343.022 mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15285: 343.026 pūrvasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15292: 343.029 uttarasyāmāṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15299: trayaścātra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti--gaṇḍaḥ kacchaḥ kaṇṭharoga iti/
S01divyav_u:15301: 344.001 [344]abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15307: 344.004 śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15315: 344.007 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15325: 344.011 śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15331: manuṣyā dārakadārikāśca skandhe kṛtvā deśāntaraṃ gacchanti/
S01divyav_u:15333: 344.015 pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15338: dvau cātra mahāvyādhī bhavatah--prathamaṃ pittatāpajvaro bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15342: 344.020 uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15351: 344.024 etāśca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca saṃpādayanti/
S01divyav_u:15353: 344.025 revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devo pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15363: 344.030 aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yadyatra devaḥ pravarṣati,
S01divyav_u:15382: 345.006 amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe phalavipākaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:15383: 345.007 kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candragraho bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15434: 345.027 evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yasminnakṣatre candragraho bhavati tasya tasya deśasya pīḍā bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15447: 346.008 navaṃ ca cchādayedvastraṃ krayaṇaṃ nātra kārayet//126//
S01divyav_u:15451: 346.012 taijasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayecca krīṇīta ca//128//
S01divyav_u:15452: 346.013 āyuṣyaṃ ca śiraḥsnānaṃ strīṇāṃ viṣkambhaṇāni ca/
S01divyav_u:15453: 346.014 pravarṣaṇaṃ ced devasya nātra vairaṃ praśāmyati//129//
S01divyav_u:15455: 346.016 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca yajñaśīlo 'tra jāyate//130// kṛttikāsu//
S01divyav_u:15460: 346.021 ṛṇaṃ na dadyāttatraiva vairamatra tu vardhate/
S01divyav_u:15462: 346.023 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:15464: 346.025 āyuṣmān paśumān dhanyo mahābhogo 'tra jāyate//134// rohiṇyām//
S01divyav_u:15465: 346.026 saumyaṃ mṛgaśiro vidyād ṛju tisraśca tārakāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15466: 346.027 mṛdūni yāni karmāṇi tāni sarvāṇi kārayet/
S01divyav_u:15467: 346.028 yāni karmāṇi rohiṇyāṃ tāni sarvāṇi kārayet//135//
S01divyav_u:15468: 346.029 sakṣīrān vāpayed vṛkṣān bījāni kṣīravanti ca/
S01divyav_u:15474: 347.003 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭiṃ cātra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15475: 347.004 svapnaśīlastathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate//
S01divyav_u:15478: 347.005 ārdrāyāṃ mṛgayedarthān bhadraṃ karma ca kārayet/
S01divyav_u:15492: 347.018 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma cātra praśasyate//145//
S01divyav_u:15502: 347.026 purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvajāgraṃ ca prakārayet//149//
S01divyav_u:15504: 347.028 na ca rogo na cauraśca kṣemaṃ cātra sadā bhavet//150//
S01divyav_u:15507: 347.031 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca mahābhogaḥ prajāyate//151// puṣye//
S01divyav_u:15520: 348.013 saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate/
S01divyav_u:15521: 348.014 dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet//157// maghāsu//
S01divyav_u:15527: 348.020 bhāgam ye copajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet//160//
S01divyav_u:15530: 348.023 naṣṭaṃ viddhaṃ kṛtaṃ cāpi na tadastīti nirdiśet//
S01divyav_u:15535: 348.026 athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā sarvamastīti nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15542: 348.031 cauryaṃ ca sidhyate tatra tacca vidvān vivarjayet//165//
S01divyav_u:15547: 349.005 rājānaṃ bhūṣitaṃ paśyet senāvyūhaṃ ca darśayet//167//
S01divyav_u:15548: 349.006 hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ dravyaṃ nagarāṇi ca māpayet/
S01divyav_u:15550: 349.008 gaṇakānāṃ ca vidyāṃ ca vādyaṃ nartanagāyanam/
S01divyav_u:15583: 350.008 kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca sarvakarmāṇi kārayet//181//
S01divyav_u:15585: 350.010 āyuṣmāṃśca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī//182//
S01divyav_u:15595: 350.018 ṛṇaṃ vai yatpurāṇaṃ syādartho vāsyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15598: 350.021 nadīṣu snapanaṃ caiva mūle sarvān prayojayet//187//
S01divyav_u:15602: 350.025 athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā naitadastīti nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:15604: 350.027 āṣāḍhāyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ saritaśca sarāṃsi ca/
S01divyav_u:15606: 350.029 utpādyāni ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūlaphalāni ca/
S01divyav_u:15608: 350.031 yāni cogrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyantyatra tu tāni ca//191//
S01divyav_u:15617: 351.007 śreṇībandhaṃ ca rājā tu samayaṃ cātra kārayet//194//
S01divyav_u:15624: 351.012 abhijiti na kurvīta brahmadevasya hyarcanam//197// abhijiti//
S01divyav_u:15625: 351.013 śravaṇe na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15626: 351.014 gītaśikṣādhyayanaṃ ca na cireṇa hi sidhyati//198//
S01divyav_u:15632: 351.020 naṣṭaṃ ca labhyate tatra śravaṇasthe niśākare//201// śravaṇe//
S01divyav_u:15637: 351.025 medhāvī ca yaśasvī ca mahābhogī mahādhanaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15639: 351.027 naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ praviddhaṃ vā kleśenaivātra labhyate/
S01divyav_u:15648: 352.004 ādeyaṃ ca tadādadyād vyayaṃ cātra na kārayet//208//
S01divyav_u:15650: 352.006 bhiṣakkarma ca kurvīt bhaiṣajyāni ca saṃharet//209//
S01divyav_u:15651: 352.007 nidhiṃ vā khānayettatra nidadhyādapi vā nidhim/
S01divyav_u:15652: 352.008 dhanaṃ cātra prayuñjīt bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet//210//
S01divyav_u:15660: 352.014 dīrghaśrotro mahābhogo jñātīnāṃ ca sadā priyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15662: 352.016 pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya caṇḍāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ samādiśet//
S01divyav_u:15665: 352.017 uttarasyāṃ tu kurvīt āyuṣyaṃ puṣṭikarma ca/
S01divyav_u:15666: 352.018 na ca dakṣiṇato gacchetpuraṃ cātra pradāpayet//214//
S01divyav_u:15668: 352.020 atrāpi triguṇaṃ vindedādānam yadi vā vyayam/
S01divyav_u:15673: 352.023 koṣṭhāgārāṇi kurvīt kiṇvaṃ cātra na kārayet//216//
S01divyav_u:15674: 352.024 surākarma ca kurvīd dhiraṇyaṃ govrajāni ca/
S01divyav_u:15683: 353.002 yānāni ca hayān damyān dantinaśca prayojayet//220//
S01divyav_u:15690: 353.009 bhṛtiṃ copanayedatra bhāryāṃ ca na vivāhayet/
S01divyav_u:15697: 353.016 teṣāṃ madhye yadā sarve śasyānyoṣadhayo 'pi ca/
S01divyav_u:15701: 353.020 catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dhruvāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:15709: yāni cānyāni uktāni karmāṇi tāni kārayet/
S01divyav_u:15710: 353.023 atha naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ cāpi hṛtaṃ ca vā/
S01divyav_u:15712: 353.025 athātra jāto dhanyo 'sau vidyātmā ca yaśasvī ca/
S01divyav_u:15714: 353.027 catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi kṣiprāṇi bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:15717: svādhyāyaṃ mantrasamārambhaṃ pravāsaprasthānaṃ gāśca turaṅgānapyatra yojayet/
S01divyav_u:15721: athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā,
S01divyav_u:15726: 354.004 kṣatriyaṃ dānaśīlaṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ ca purohitam//231// iti//
S01divyav_u:15727: 354.005 pañca khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dāruṇāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:15729: 354.006 maghā trīṇi ca pūrvāṇi bharaṇī ceti pañcamī/
S01divyav_u:15730: 354.007 athātra dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā na bhaviṣyati//232//
S01divyav_u:15733: tadyathā--ārdrā āśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā bharaṇī ceti/
S01divyav_u:15738: kṛttikā ca maghā mūlā trīṇi pūrvāṇi/
S01divyav_u:15740: mṛgaśirā puṣyā hastā citrā anurādhā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā revatī aśvinī ceti imāni nava nakṣatrāṇi pañcādbhāgīyāni triṃśanmuhūrtayogāni kṣetrāṇi ca//
S01divyav_u:15741: 354.014 api ca brāhmaṇa śubhāśca muhūrtā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:15750: 354.018 athātra kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhirvā bhavatīti taducyate/
S01divyav_u:15758: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse maghā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15772: varṣāṇāṃ caturthe māse citrā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15786: hemantānāṃ dvitīye māse amāvāsyāyāṃ jyeṣṭhā bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15793: 355.004 hemantānāṃ tṛtīye māse pūrvāṣāḍhā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15800: hemantānāṃ caturthe māse śravaṇā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15807: 355.010 grīṣmāṇāṃ prathame māse uttarabhādrapadā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15821: grīṣmāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse kṛttikā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15828: 355.018 grīṣmāṇāṃ caturthe māse mṛgaśirā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:15851: 355.029 candra ādityaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro 'ṅgārako budhaśca ime grahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15854: 355.031 bharaṇī kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā etatsādhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:15855: ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyo 'śleṣā etatsādhāraṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:15856: 355.032 maghā atha phalgunadvayaṃ hastā citrā etatsādhāraṇam [356]tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:15857: 356.001 svātī viśākhā anurādhā etatsādhāraṇaṃ caturthaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:15858: jyeṣṭhā mūlāṣāḍhā dvayamatra sarvāṇi mahābhayāni bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:15860: abhijicchravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ubhe bhādrapade caitatsādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:15863: tasya tasya janapadasya sattvasya vā pīḍā nirdeṣṭavyā//
S01divyav_u:15867: katame ṣaṭ? nairṛto varuṇo vāyavo bhargodevo raudro vicārī ca/
S01divyav_u:15869: 356.008 athātra śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe 'ṣṭādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15870: 356.009 rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya cāntare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15871: sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15872: 356.010 dvādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamano nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15874: bhādrapade māse pūrṇe saptadaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye ca caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15877: trayodaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15878: 356.014 ardharātre mahābhayo vāyavo nāma muhūrto bhavati//
S01divyav_u:15880: āśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśamuhūrto divaso bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15882: samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya tvantare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15884: 356.018 caturdaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇe sūrye raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15885: abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya antareṇārdharātraṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15890: 356.022 samāne 'horātre sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15893: rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye bhargodevo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15896: 356.026 mārgaśīrṣe māse ca pūrṇe caturdaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāṃ muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15897: 356.027 viratasya saṃmukhasya ca muhūrtasyāntare madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15899: 356.028 ṣoḍaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ samyamo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15902: 357.001 [357]pauṣamāse pūrṇe trayodaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15905: saptadaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15908: 357.005 māghamāse pūrṇe dvādaśamuhūrte divase sūryodaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15909: sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasyāntareṇa madhyāhno bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15911: 357.007 aṣṭādaśamuhūrtāyāṃ rātrāvavatīrṇamātre sūrye nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15912: gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya cāntaramardharātraṃ bhavati/
S01divyav_u:15920: evameteṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ muhūrtānāṃ caritaṃ vicaritaṃ ca jñātavyam//
S01divyav_u:15922: 357.012 yathāmadhyaṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rātrivaśena divasavaśena cotkarṣāpakarṣau kartavyau/
S01divyav_u:15923: hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe 'rdhamāse vā/
S01divyav_u:15924: 357.013 dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atrāntare divase kalā vardhate,
S01divyav_u:15930: 357.019 trayastu te yatra bhavanti pakṣe ṣaḍekamāse tu bhavanti vegāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15931: 357.021 parasya cakrasya nidarśanaṃ syātprakampate yatra mahī tvabhīkṣṇam//235//
S01divyav_u:15937: 357.028 adhyardhaṃ phalgune māse caitre triṃśattu rātrayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:15939: 357.030 yadā sarveṣu māseṣu satataṃ kampate mahī/
S01divyav_u:15940: 357.031 vṛkṣāstathā calanti sma jalam yadi kampate/
S01divyav_u:15942: 358.001 [358]nagarāṇyatha vā grāmā ghoṣā ye cātra saṃśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15944: 358.003 aṭavyaḥ saṃpravartante daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca/
S01divyav_u:15950: 358.009 ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca taṃ grāmamāśritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15953: 358.012 proptaṃ śasyaṃ na roheta bhavet phalasya kṛcchratā//245//
S01divyav_u:15954: 358.013 gurviṇīnāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ garbho nipīḍyate bhṛśam/
S01divyav_u:15964: 358.023 kūpakhāḥ parikhākhāśca pāpakā ye ca taskarāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15976: 359.005 kīṭāḥ pipīlikāḥ śvānā ekakhurāśca ye mṛgāḥ//256//
S01divyav_u:15977: 359.006 vaidyā viṣakarāścāpi ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15980: 359.009 ye ca śrāddhā nivartante samājā utsavāstathā/
S01divyav_u:15982: 359.011 ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye cānye 'pyagrapaṇḍitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15983: 359.012 gandharvāśca vinaśyanti narā ye ca mahākulāḥ/
S01divyav_u:15988: 359.017 dharme ratā āsanikā ye ca śulkopajīvinaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16001: 359.028 kumāryaḥ sarvaratnaṃ ca sasyānāṃ bījakaiḥ saha//266//
S01divyav_u:16020: 360.017 grahāśrayāḥ piśācāśca ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16053: 361.020 dharme ratāśca ye siddhā ye ca śauktikakarmiṇaḥ//289//
S01divyav_u:16057: 361.024 grāmaghātāśca vartante grāmo grāmaṃ ca hiṃsati//291//
S01divyav_u:16062: 361.029 yā cātra garbhamādhatte ye ca jātāśca tāniha/
S01divyav_u:16087: 362.024 anulomaṃ ca samyānti carantaḥ paścimāṃ diśam//304//
S01divyav_u:16093: 362.030 sthāpyante tatra bījāni niṃne naśyanti vai tadā//307//
S01divyav_u:16098: 363.005 dṛśyate kapilā saṃdhyā candrasūryau tu lohitau/
S01divyav_u:16101: 363.008 na tatra pravasetprājña ātmānaṃ cātra gopayet//311//
S01divyav_u:16108: 363.015 saṃdhyā ca lohitā bhāti candrasūryau tu lohitau/
S01divyav_u:16111: 363.018 dṛśyante dhūmaśikharāḥ śastraṃ ca svidyate bhṛśam//316//
S01divyav_u:16112: 363.019 vīṇāśca divi dṛśyante nava māsānna varṣati/
S01divyav_u:16114: 363.021 jayati ahani pūrve kṣatriyān pārthivāṃśca hayagajarathamukhyān mantriṇo madhyamāhne/
S01divyav_u:16115: 363.023 vyathayati aparāhṇe gopaśūn vaiśyaśūdrān pradahati niśisaṃdhyā taskarānantavāsān//318//
S01divyav_u:16116: 363.025 rajanimiha pradoṣe hiṃsate mlecchasaṃghān striyamapi ca napuṃsaścārdharātreṣvanantān/
S01divyav_u:16117: 363.027 kṛṣivaṇigupajīvyān hanti yāme tṛtīye vyathayati surapakṣaṃ raudrakarmāntakṛṣṇe//319//
S01divyav_u:16118: 363.029 pradahati śaśipakṣe yājñikaṃ brahmakṣatra śrapayati śucivṛttāneva dharme pradhānān/
S01divyav_u:16119: 363.031 viduṣi ca mṛdubhāvaṃ vindate yo hyadhīte sa bhavati nṛpapūjyo brāhmaṇo vedadarśī//320//
S01divyav_u:16124: 364.005 atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn abhiṣāmaṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rogotpattiṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16127: 364.007 kṛttikāsūtthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16129: 364.009 agnirhi devatā tatra dadhnā hyasya baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16131: 364.011 rohiṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16137: 364.017 somo hi devatā tatra maṇḍena tu baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16139: 364.019 ārdrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16141: 364.021 rudro hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16143: 364.023 punarvasau bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16147: 364.027 puṣye samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16151: 365.001 [365]āśleṣāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16152: 365.002 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu sarpastatra tu daivataḥ//334//
S01divyav_u:16153: 365.003 maghāsamutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16157: 365.007 pūrvaphālgunijo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16161: 365.011 uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16162: 365.012 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu bhago 'pyatra tu devatā//339//
S01divyav_u:16163: 365.013 hastenāpyutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya va/
S01divyav_u:16167: 365.017 citrāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16169: 365.019 tvaṣṭā hi devatā tatra ghṛtamudgairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16171: 365.021 svātyāṃ samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya/
S01divyav_u:16175: 365.025 viśākhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16179: 365.029 anurādhotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16181: 366.001 [366]mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛtapātraṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16183: 366.003 jyeṣṭhāyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16185: 366.005 indro hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16187: 366.007 mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16191: 366.011 pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16193: 366.013 āpo hi devatāstatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16195: 366.015 uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16197: 366.017 viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16199: 366.019 abhijidutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16201: 366.021 viṣṇuśca devatā tatra dadhimaṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16203: 366.023 śravaṇenotthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16204: 366.024 guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśamāsikam//360//
S01divyav_u:16207: 366.027 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16209: 366.029 varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16213: 367.003 uttarābhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16217: 367.007 revatyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16219: 367.009 pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandhamālyairbaliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16221: 367.011 aśvinyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16223: 367.013 gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret/
S01divyav_u:16225: 367.015 bharaṇyāmutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
S01divyav_u:16226: 367.016 na taṃ vaidyāścikitsantu yamastatra tu daivataḥ/
S01divyav_u:16227: 367.017 śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati//370//
S01divyav_u:16229: 367.019 ayaṃ khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhananirmokṣaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16232: 367.021 kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti vaktavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16233: rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā trirātreṇa mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:16234: 367.022 mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā ekaviṃśatirātreṇa mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:16235: 367.023 ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā ardhamāsena mokṣyatīti/
S01divyav_u:16236: punarvassau ruddho vā baddho vā saptarātreṇa/
S01divyav_u:16248: śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhādrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ caturdaśarātreṇa/
S01divyav_u:16250: bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśamāvāpsyatīti vaktavyaḥ//
S01divyav_u:16255: 368.001 [368]mūrdhni tu yasyāstilako 'sti sūkṣmaḥ knigdho bhavet padmasamānavarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16256: 368.003 rājā tu tasyā bhavatīha bhartā stanopariṣṭātpratibimbamāhuḥ//372//
S01divyav_u:16257: 368.005 śīrṣe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhavedañjanacūrṇavarṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16258: 368.007 senāpatistasyā bhaveddhi bhartā stanāntare 'syāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//373//
S01divyav_u:16259: 368.009 bhruvontare 'syāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:16260: 368.011 pañcaiva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahvannapānaṃ labhate nārī//374//
S01divyav_u:16261: 368.013 gaṇḍasya nāsādikamadhyadeśe bhavecca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16262: 368.015 tāṃ śokabhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbamāhuḥ//375//
S01divyav_u:16263: 368.017 karṇe tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:16264: 368.019 bahuśrutāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//376//
S01divyav_u:16265: 368.021 yasyottaroṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syāttāṃ bhinnasatyāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:16266: 368.023 kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttimūrau tu tasyāstilabimbamāhuḥ//377//
S01divyav_u:16267: 368.025 yasyādharoṣṭhe tilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:16268: 368.027 miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ syāt//378//
S01divyav_u:16269: 368.029 cibuke tu yasyāstilakālakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
S01divyav_u:16270: 368.031 miṣṭānnapānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ syāt//379//
S01divyav_u:16272: 369.001 [369]atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrajanmaguṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16278: 369.006 vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ cāsya sadā sukham//381//
S01divyav_u:16279: 369.007 jāto mṛgaśire yastu mṛduḥ saumyastu mānavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16290: 369.018 dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//387//
S01divyav_u:16293: 369.021 uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
S01divyav_u:16299: 369.027 svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuślāghī vicakṣaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16304: 369.032 śuciścaiva kṛtajñaśca dharmātmā ca bhavecca saḥ//394//
S01divyav_u:16308: 370.004 dṛḍho vīro bhaveccāsau kilbiṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//396//
S01divyav_u:16312: 370.008 viśvadaive naro jāto bhavedapi ca niścitaḥ//398//
S01divyav_u:16313: 370.009 ācāryaḥ śāstrakartā ca viścvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16314: 370.010 śravaṇe jāta āyuṣmāñ śrīmāṃśca puruṣo bhavet//399//
S01divyav_u:16317: 370.013 vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16335: 371.004 māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivo yadi/
S01divyav_u:16342: 371.011 phālgune kṛttikāyāṃ tu āditye parikho yadi/
S01divyav_u:16343: 371.012 naśyanti karvaṭāstatra yadi devo na varṣati//411//
S01divyav_u:16344: 371.013 caitramāse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇaṃ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16356: 371.025 māse 'tha śrāvaṇe mūle candrasūryau na bhāsataḥ/
S01divyav_u:16363: 372.002 rājñāṃ vidyāddhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāsyati śoṇitam//421//
S01divyav_u:16364: 372.003 bharaṇyaṃ māghamāse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16366: 372.005 māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutam/
S01divyav_u:16378: 372.017 śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhastalam/
S01divyav_u:16389: 372.028 aśvinyāṃ viṣaye tatra prajā śvāsena vadhyate//434//
S01divyav_u:16390: 372.029 māse tu phālgune yatra agnivarṣaṃ nabhastalāt/
S01divyav_u:16392: 372.031 svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vātavarṣitam/
S01divyav_u:16396: 373.003 āṣāḍhe māsi puṇye 'tha dṛśyante vyoṃni vidyutaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16398: 373.005 śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
S01divyav_u:16400: 373.007 māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/
S01divyav_u:16402: 373.009 māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
S01divyav_u:16403: 373.010 kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu tadā prajā//441//
S01divyav_u:16406: 373.013 kārtike tu yadārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrūyeta bhairavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16410: 373.017 pauṣamāse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16412: 373.019 māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyedvasuṃdharām/
S01divyav_u:16418: 373.025 pūrvāyāṃ cedāṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
S01divyav_u:16421: 373.028 anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet//450//
S01divyav_u:16422: 373.029 jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kampedvasuṃdharā/
S01divyav_u:16424: 373.031 jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
S01divyav_u:16425: 373.032 pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//452//
S01divyav_u:16427: 374.002 śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//453//
S01divyav_u:16428: 374.003 prakampante yadā caityā ārdrāyāṃ vā maghāsu vā/
S01divyav_u:16430: 374.005 caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
S01divyav_u:16433: 374.008 sadā parājito rājā caurai rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//456//
S01divyav_u:16435: 374.010 dvāraṃ vā nagarasyātha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//457//
S01divyav_u:16436: 374.011 vāme vā dakṣiṇe cendoḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:16441: 374.016 jñeyaṃ rogabhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet//460//
S01divyav_u:16444: 374.019 yasya caivātha nakṣare śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
S01divyav_u:16446: 374.021 rājño vai cātha nakṣatre candraṃ keturyadā viśet/
S01divyav_u:16454: 374.029 maghāyāṃ lohitāṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:16459: 375.002 somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ paracakrabhayaṃ tadā//469//
S01divyav_u:16460: 375.003 kākāḥ śyenāśca gṛdhrāśca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
S01divyav_u:16461: 375.004 maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇastadā//470//
S01divyav_u:16463: 375.006 paracakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhaveccāpi punaḥ punaḥ//471//
S01divyav_u:16466: 375.009 garbhasthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
S01divyav_u:16471: 375.014 pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//475//
S01divyav_u:16473: 375.016 pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//476//
S01divyav_u:16475: 375.018 dvitriśīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//477//
S01divyav_u:16477: 375.020 jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//478//
S01divyav_u:16481: 375.024 rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//480//
S01divyav_u:16484: 375.027 saukareṇa tu vaktreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣam yadi/
S01divyav_u:16485: 375.028 sūtaṃ caturdiśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāttatra na saṃśayaḥ//482//
S01divyav_u:16486: 375.029 ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
S01divyav_u:16489: 376.002 dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyati//484//
S01divyav_u:16490: 376.003 kukṣiṃ bhittvā yadā bālo garbhānniṣkramate svayam/
S01divyav_u:16491: 376.004 atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//485//
S01divyav_u:16499: 376.012 sa jano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//489//
S01divyav_u:16501: 376.014 śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaśca vilayaṃ vrajet//490//
S01divyav_u:16503: 376.016 svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tadrāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//491//
S01divyav_u:16504: 376.017 phale phalam yadā paśyetpuṣpe vā puṣpamāśritam/
S01divyav_u:16506: 376.019 akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/
S01divyav_u:16507: 376.020 latā gulmo 'tha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//493//
S01divyav_u:16510: 376.023 vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
S01divyav_u:16514: 376.027 anāvartam yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ cāpi pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16515: 376.028 vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//497//
S01divyav_u:16520: 377.003 kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16522: 377.005 devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
S01divyav_u:16524: 377.007 devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
S01divyav_u:16527: 377.010 nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rājavadho bhavet//503//
S01divyav_u:16531: 377.014 amātyo hanti rājānaṃ kalahaṃ cātra nirdiśet//505//
S01divyav_u:16532: 377.015 vamanti rudhiraṃ kanyā namante vā diśo daśa/
S01divyav_u:16538: 377.021 indurvā dīpavṛkṣo vā dīpo yatra na dīpyate/
S01divyav_u:16541: 377.024 astraṃ vāpi gṛhaṃ dahyād rājño vyasanamādiśet//510//
S01divyav_u:16543: 377.026 puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//511//
S01divyav_u:16545: 377.028 vāyasaḥ kurute nīḍaṃ sāmātyo dhvaṃsate nṛpaḥ//512//
S01divyav_u:16554: 378.007 vidyucca patate ghorā karakāṇāṃ ca varṣaṇam/
S01divyav_u:16559: 378.012 gaganaṃ dahyate tatra lokapīḍā jvareṇa ca//519//
S01divyav_u:16564: 378.017 nāpsu majjati nāpyagnau pūrvavacca na dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16568: 378.021 jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayam/
S01divyav_u:16569: 378.022 anāvṛṣṭiṃ tadā brūyād durbhikṣaṃ ca mahadbhayam//524//
S01divyav_u:16571: 378.024 cakradvaye 'pi durbhikṣaṃ rāṣṭre rogaṃ ca nirdiśet//525//
S01divyav_u:16572: 378.025 triśīrṣaḥ pañcaśīrṣo vā yadā sarpo 'tha dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16582: 379.005 kākaḥ śyenaśca gṛdhro vā yasya nīyeta mūrdhani/
S01divyav_u:16597: 379.020 pādena karṣate śīghram yuddhe rājavadho dhruvam//538//
S01divyav_u:16598: 379.021 kākaśced gṛhamāruhya hā putra iti vāśati/
S01divyav_u:16600: 379.023 anagnau jāyate dhūmaḥ sthale padmāni vā yadā/
S01divyav_u:16612: 380.005 narāṇāṃ pramadānāṃ ca ratiharṣo na jāyate/
S01divyav_u:16613: 380.006 sarvatra śokacintā vā mahattatra bhayaṃ bhavet//546//
S01divyav_u:16615: 380.008 nadīṃ bhittvā nikuñjān vā sa deśo naśyate 'cirāt//547//
S01divyav_u:16618: 380.011 matsyāḥ kūrmāśca sarpāśca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16620: 380.013 apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi eva vā/
S01divyav_u:16627: kathayatu bhagavān--atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣapinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16632: 380.021 tatra sukugṛṣṭyā aṣṭāṅgalapramāṇayā dvādaśākṣagṛṣṭayaḥ svaśarīraṃ dairdhyeṇa jñātavyam//
S01divyav_u:16636: 380.023 nakṣatre yatra yo jātastatra tatra saṃdṛśyate//
S01divyav_u:16638: 380.025 kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16640: 380.027 bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ piṇḍato jvalati śriyā/
S01divyav_u:16642: 380.029 dṛśyate vraṇa evāyam yasya vai caturaṅgalaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16643: 380.030 rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so 'pi vidvān dharmarataḥ sadā//554//
S01divyav_u:16648: 381.003 ardhadvitīyagṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
S01divyav_u:16649: 381.004 ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaśca saḥ//557//
S01divyav_u:16650: 381.005 vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaścaiva punarvasau/
S01divyav_u:16653: 381.008 cakramadhye ca haste ca sūryaścandro virājate//559//
S01divyav_u:16658: 381.013 adha urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16659: 381.014 maghāyāṃ dhanavāñ jāto mahātmā dhārimiko naraḥ//562//
S01divyav_u:16666: 381.021 vyañjane yasya pinyastu dṛśyate niyamena hi/
S01divyav_u:16668: 381.023 vyañjane 'pi ca ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16670: 381.025 kugṛṣṭyā yasya ūrubhyāṃ pinyo lohita eva hi/
S01divyav_u:16676: 382.001 [382]adho yasyeha corubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
S01divyav_u:16684: 382.009 dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/
S01divyav_u:16686: 382.011 dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyām yasya pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16688: 382.013 dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16689: 382.014 mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hyudakena saḥ//577//
S01divyav_u:16690: 382.015 adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16694: 382.019 ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16695: 382.020 revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa bhavatyapi//580//
S01divyav_u:16703: 382.028 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16708: 382.032 strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarvakarmakam//584//
S01divyav_u:16710: 383.002 prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatām//585//
S01divyav_u:16716: 383.008 yadā savarṇapiṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ//588//
S01divyav_u:16717: 383.009 śīrṣe tu dhanadhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca/
S01divyav_u:16721: 383.013 aśrupāto dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16726: 383.018 cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ//593//
S01divyav_u:16729: 383.021 jāto 'yaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhanakṣayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16732: 383.024 pārśve tu sukhaśayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā//596//
S01divyav_u:16734: 383.026 bāhvoḥ śatruvināśāya yuktaṃ strīlābha eva ca//597//
S01divyav_u:16737: 383.029 saubhagaṃ dhanalābhaṃ ca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca/
S01divyav_u:16738: 383.030 puṣpito hyekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca//599//
S01divyav_u:16742: 384.004 putrotpattistu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā//601//
S01divyav_u:16750: 384.012 maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:16751: 384.013 paribādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ//605//
S01divyav_u:16752: 384.014 pārśve gulphe ca jānīyācchastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:16756: 384.018 dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni cāpnuyāt//607//
S01divyav_u:16757: 384.019 snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalam/
S01divyav_u:16758: 384.020 sthānasthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayam//608//
S01divyav_u:16760: 384.022 puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāśca deśe dakṣiṇataśca ye/
S01divyav_u:16761: 384.023 tathā cābhyantare caiva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//609//
S01divyav_u:16762: 384.024 strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrānteṣu ca parvataḥ/
S01divyav_u:16763: 384.025 tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānāṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//610//
S01divyav_u:16764: 384.026 sthānāsthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatimeva ca/
S01divyav_u:16766: 384.028 vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:16769: 384.031 yathoktānāṃ ca saṃdhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//613//
S01divyav_u:16774: 385.005 na nakhena na śastreṇa nāyasena kathaṃcana/
S01divyav_u:16777: 385.008 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16784: 385.013 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//617//
S01divyav_u:16785: 385.014 yastu paśyati svapnānte rājānaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam/
S01divyav_u:16786: 385.015 suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ caiva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//618//
S01divyav_u:16787: 385.016 sārasāṃśca śukān haṃsān krauñjāñ śvetāṃśca pakṣiṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16788: 385.017 yastu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//619//
S01divyav_u:16789: 385.018 samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/
S01divyav_u:16792: 385.021 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//621//
S01divyav_u:16793: 385.022 pāṇau pāde 'tha vā jānau śastreṇa dhanuṣāpi vā/
S01divyav_u:16796: 385.025 yastu paśyati svapnānte kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//623//
S01divyav_u:16801: 385.030 goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo 'bhirohati/
S01divyav_u:16811: 386.009 śuṣkodapānaṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam//630//
S01divyav_u:16813: 386.011 ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhikleśaṃ vinirdiśet//631//
S01divyav_u:16814: 386.012 kākaṃ śyenamulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vāpyatha vartakam/
S01divyav_u:16816: 386.014 nagnaṃ paśyati hyātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastameva vā/
S01divyav_u:16819: 386.017 kuśīlāṃścāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayam//634//
S01divyav_u:16822: 386.020 dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapnānte yasya dhāryate/
S01divyav_u:16826: 386.024 manuṣyaṃ bhūmibhāgaṃ vā svapnānte grasate yadi/
S01divyav_u:16830: 386.028 prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayam/
S01divyav_u:16837: 387.003 kṛṣṇavastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naram/
S01divyav_u:16839: 387.005 tamasi praviśet svapne śambhorvā cāmaraṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:16840: 387.006 vṛkṣādvā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//644//
S01divyav_u:16841: 387.007 vṛkṣaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vāpi virucam yastu paśyati/
S01divyav_u:16842: 387.008 svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//645//
S01divyav_u:16843: 387.009 devo vā varṣate yatra yatra caivāśaniḥ patet/
S01divyav_u:16845: 387.011 candradityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati/
S01divyav_u:16850: 387.016 labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhananāśaṃ samarcchati//649//
S01divyav_u:16851: 387.017 gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate/
S01divyav_u:16857: 387.023 āsane śayane yāne vastre sābharaṇe gṛhe/
S01divyav_u:16862: 387.028 utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandhanyāso na saṃśayaḥ//655//
S01divyav_u:16863: 387.029 abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśumathāpi vā/
S01divyav_u:16864: 387.030 aṅgāraṃ vāpi varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet//656//
S01divyav_u:16870: 388.004 gāyate hasate caiva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet//659//
S01divyav_u:16871: 388.005 yaṃ kṛṣṇavasanā nārī ārdrā vā malinātha vā/
S01divyav_u:16873: 388.007 kṛṣṇasārpo yadi svapne hyabhirohati yaṃ naram/
S01divyav_u:16876: 388.010 svapnānte puruṣo yastu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//662//
S01divyav_u:16881: 388.015 pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinātha vā/
S01divyav_u:16882: 388.016 evamrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//665//
S01divyav_u:16883: 388.017 susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śuklavāsasam/
S01divyav_u:16884: 388.018 puruṣaṃ vātha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahatsukham/
S01divyav_u:16885: 388.019 tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣamatho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍham yatra dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:16886: 388.020 gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravyakṣayo bhavet//667//
S01divyav_u:16888: 388.022 naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naram//668//
S01divyav_u:16890: 388.024 svapnānte yastu paśyeta strīlābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet//669//
S01divyav_u:16892: 388.026 narastu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patim//670//
S01divyav_u:16894: 388.028 labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patim//671//
S01divyav_u:16896: 388.030 abhivandeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate 'cirāt//672//
S01divyav_u:16902: 389.004 labdhvā nārī tu svapnānte śrīmatputraṃ prasūyate//675//
S01divyav_u:16904: 389.006 svapne yā labhate nārī sāpi putraṃ prasūyate/
S01divyav_u:16905: 389.007 yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ cāpi yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate///676//
S01divyav_u:16907: 389.009 śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣamaraṇaṃ bhavet//677//
S01divyav_u:16910: 389.012 badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuśca vyākulaṃ bhavet/
S01divyav_u:16912: 389.014 devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā/
S01divyav_u:16914: 389.016 apakṛṣṭo rudan yo vā nagno 'tha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16916: 389.018 carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vātha kilāṭakam/
S01divyav_u:16917: 389.019 svapne labdhvā ca prāpnu{jānī}yād dhruvaṃ vastrāgamo bhavet//682//
S01divyav_u:16918: 389.020 amānuṣo 'tha rājā vā devaḥ preto 'tha brāhmaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16919: 389.021 svapne yathā te jalpante sa tathārtho bhaviṣyati//683//
S01divyav_u:16923: 389.025 viṣamaṃ vā tathādhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate//685//
S01divyav_u:16924: 389.026 agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:16925: 389.027 gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate//686//
S01divyav_u:16926: 389.028 nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ samedhaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:16931: 390.002 madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//689//
S01divyav_u:16932: 390.003 pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:16934: 390.005 svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:16936: 390.007 mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:16937: 390.008 gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate//692//
S01divyav_u:16939: 390.010 vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:16941: 390.012 dhūmrā ghanā dundubhiśaṅkhaśabdo vāto 'bhravṛṣṭiśca tathā samantāt/
S01divyav_u:16942: 390.014 sarvasthirāṇāṃ ca calaśca yaḥ syādye cāntare doṣakṛtā vikārāḥ//694//
S01divyav_u:16943: 390.016 pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvadiṣṭā rājarṣayo devagaṇāśca sarve/
S01divyav_u:16944: 390.018 yad brāhmaṇa gātravikartanaṃ ca etāni sarvāṇyapi śobhanāni//695//
S01divyav_u:16946: 390.022 gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvijapūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnametena parājitaṃ syāt//696//
S01divyav_u:16947: 390.024 devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyastaṃ tu parāṃścārcayitum yatena/
S01divyav_u:16948: 390.026 svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsarānte 'sya vipākamāhuḥ//697//
S01divyav_u:16949: 390.028 ṣaṇmāsikam yacca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikam yattu bhavet tṛtīye/
S01divyav_u:16954: 391.006 atha khalu bho puṣkarasārinn aparamapi svapnādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:16960: 391.010 nimittam yādṛśam yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ//700//
S01divyav_u:16961: 391.011 jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati/
S01divyav_u:16962: 391.012 na tu bhayaṃ bhavettasya jānīyādeva buddhimān//701//
S01divyav_u:16964: 391.014 svapne tu kalahaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipraṃ prītirbhaviṣyati//702//
S01divyav_u:16967: 391.017 madhyame bhavate naiva kṣipraṃ bhavati paścime/
S01divyav_u:16973: 391.023 sarvāṇi khalu pānāni madhurāṇi sukhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:16974: 391.024 yastu pibati svapnānte sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate//707//
S01divyav_u:16977: 391.027 upari kākā gṛdhrāśca dhāvantyupari yānti ca/
S01divyav_u:16981: 391.031 ekaśca dharaṇau pādo dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:16985: 392.003 vṛkṣaṃ parvatamāruhya nāgaṃ ca turagaṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:16987: 392.005 yastu svapnāntare paśyet pitṛrn yāniha cānyathā/
S01divyav_u:16988: 392.006 tathā mātā pitā caiva tasya jīvanti te ciram//714//
S01divyav_u:16991: 392.009 anānaṃ codake dṛṣṭvā madhye 'gnau ca vidhāvitam/
S01divyav_u:17021: 393.007 suvarṇaṃ ca tathā rūpyaṃ muktāhāraṃ tathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:17023: 393.009 bandhanaṃ bahu dṛṣṭvā tu cchedanaṃ kuṭṭanaṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:17030: 393.015 yadi phālgune māse nirghoṣa upari bhavet,
S01divyav_u:17047: yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candragraho bhavati,
S01divyav_u:17058: 393.025 pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiṃcinnimittaṃ lakṣyate,
S01divyav_u:17065: 393.028 āṣāḍhe māse yadi sūryagraho rucirābhāso bhavati,
S01divyav_u:17083: tatra gṛhe yo gṛhasvāmī bhavati tasya vināśaṃ codayati/
S01divyav_u:17084: 394.002 atra ca māse 'bhinavaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ na prāvaritavyam/
S01divyav_u:17091: 394.005 yadi pūrve yāme candrasya nimittaṃ dṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:17096: tatra ca manuṣyā anyonyaṃ vadhayiṣyantīti codayati//
S01divyav_u:17117: 394.016 prathame yāme ca yadi candroparāgo bhavati lohitavarṇaśca dṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:17128: 394.020 yadyatraiva māse tārakā utsṛṣṭā na candro dṛśyate,
S01divyav_u:17136: 394.024 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin khañjarīṭakajñānaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17148: 395.004 kṛkare svalpacelatvaṃ purīṣe tu kṛśaṃ śravaḥ//736//
S01divyav_u:17157: 395.013 amṛtaṃ ca sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā odanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ//740//
S01divyav_u:17158: 395.014 gavāṃ pṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ siddhiraśvapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ jayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17160: 395.016 uṣṭrapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ kleśaḥ śvānapṛṣṭhe ca vidravaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17161: 395.017 pṛṣṭhe ca gardabhasyeha maraṇaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ//742//
S01divyav_u:17162: 395.018 kīle tu maraṇaṃ vidyād yūpāgre ca na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17163: 395.019 kumbhasthāne śmaśāne vā mṛto vā yatra dṛśyate//743//
S01divyav_u:17164: 395.020 antarīkṣe praḍīnaṃ tu aphalaṃ tu vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17168: 395.024 sameṣu samake kṣetre samān varṇān vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17172: 395.028 tāṃ diśaṃ gamanaṃ vidyādyathā tasya tathā punaḥ//746//
S01divyav_u:17173: 395.029 kīṭā vātha pataṅgā vā bhayam yadiha dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:17175: 396.001 [396]apāṃ samīpe gajamastake vā sūryodaye brāhmaṇasaṃnidhau vā/
S01divyav_u:17176: 396.003 mukhyaprakāśe 'pyahimastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakaṃ sa dhanyaḥ//748//
S01divyav_u:17177: 396.005 mātaṅgarājo matimāṃstriśaṅkaḥ provāca tattvaṃ khañjanaṃ ca śāstram/
S01divyav_u:17178: 396.007 snigdhe sarūkṣe viṣame same ca odeśayed doṣaguṇairyathoktaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:17181: atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriñ śivārutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17188: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tapasā vīryeṇa ca imaṃ śivārutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17191: 396.017 yādṛśaṃ ca yathā vāśetteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāśāñ śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:17193: śivā pūrvamukhaṃ sthitvā trīn vārān vāśet,
S01divyav_u:17211: dakṣiṇamukhaṃ sthitvā dakṣiṇāyā eva diśāyāḥ priyasamāgamaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:17223: 396.027 paścimāyāṃ paścimābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śivā trivārān vāśati,
S01divyav_u:17253: 397.006 diśi vidiśi caiva giriprāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśaṃ taṃ ca śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:17259: me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityam/
S01divyav_u:17274: kalahaṃ vivādaṃ vigrahaṃ maraṇaṃ ca nviedayati/
S01divyav_u:17283: 397.019 tribhirvārairarthaṃ caturbhiranarthaṃ pañcabhiḥ priyasamāgamaṃ ṣaḍbhirbhojanaṃ saptabhirbhayamaṣṭabhirvigrahaṃ vivādaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17287: mārge saṃsthitasyāpi sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇotha me/
S01divyav_u:17299: yadi dakṣiṇāmukhā eva diśaḥ karmasiddhiṃ ca nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:17311: atha paścimamukhaṃ sthitvā yā anyonyaṃ vyāharate,
S01divyav_u:17321: 398.003 mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmenāgatya purato vāśati,
S01divyav_u:17324: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ vāmaṃ gatvā vāmataḥ parivarteta "na tanmārgeṇa gantavyaṃ triśaṅkuvacanam yathā"/
S01divyav_u:17334: senāyāṃ vrajamānāyāṃ śivā āgacchedagrataḥ senājayaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:17336: sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchatyagrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati/
S01divyav_u:17346: 398.014 vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathaiva vidiśāsu ca/
S01divyav_u:17348: 398.016 adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅkuvacanam yathā//751//
S01divyav_u:17349: 398.017 madhusvarāṃ śivāṃ jñātvā kāle vele upasthite/
S01divyav_u:17380: 399.008 tṛtīya sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
S01divyav_u:17390: 399.018 dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
S01divyav_u:17394: 399.022 avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17396: 399.024 divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strīsaṃjñako bhavet/
S01divyav_u:17397: 399.025 rātriḥ saṃdhyā samākhyātā bhāgairanyair na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17403: 399.031 yasya syād yavakaścāpi cāpo vā svastikastathā/
S01divyav_u:17404: 399.032 taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyante dhanyāste puruṣā hyamī//766//
S01divyav_u:17410: 400.006 preṣkyante śākhayā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
S01divyav_u:17411: 400.007 kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiścāpi satkṛtaḥ//769//
S01divyav_u:17412: 400.008 vaiśyo 'tha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhanadhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17415: 400.011 viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahustathā//771//
S01divyav_u:17416: 400.012 śyāmavarṇātha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
S01divyav_u:17417: 400.013 trilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17420: 400.016 taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatim//773//
S01divyav_u:17422: 400.019 matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedistu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//774//
S01divyav_u:17423: 400.021 anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
S01divyav_u:17424: 400.023 same tvaśītirvarṣāṇi saptabhiryathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//775//
S01divyav_u:17425: 400.025 śarīravarṇaprabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇavihīnakāṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:17430: 401.003 dvirapi ca {sa} bhavāntare mahātmā vipuladhanaśriya āha vastralābhaḥ//778//
S01divyav_u:17431: 401.005 dadati satatamunnatastu pāṇirbhavati cirāya tu dīrghapīnapāṇiḥ/
S01divyav_u:17438: 401.019 iha hi bahudhano balena yuktaḥ sutanususaṃcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//782//
S01divyav_u:17439: 401.021 dhanamupanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛtajanitā jalavacca yā sudīrghā/
S01divyav_u:17444: 401.029 apagataghṛtavarṇapāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17449: 402.006 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasarutaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17457: 402.010 jayaṃ parājayaṃ caiva lābhālābhaṃ tathaiva ca//787//
S01divyav_u:17460: 402.013 devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namo namaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17467: 402.020 asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasam//782//
S01divyav_u:17469: 402.022 pāyasaṃ sarpiṣā miśraṃ tatra vidyānna saṃśayaḥ//783//
S01divyav_u:17473: 402.026 vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanam//785//
S01divyav_u:17476: 402.029 śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:17477: 402.030 kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//787//
S01divyav_u:17478: 402.031 kṣīrivṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:17479: 402.032 krameṇa yugamātreṇa na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyate//788//
S01divyav_u:17484: 403.005 pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
S01divyav_u:17486: 403.007 rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vāpi yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17488: 403.009 gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17489: 403.010 kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na cārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//803//
S01divyav_u:17490: 403.011 tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayecca sadā khagaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17492: 403.013 sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:17494: 403.015 yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17500: 403.021 vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
S01divyav_u:17501: 403.022 vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛhasvāminām//809//
S01divyav_u:17502: 403.023 śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17505: 403.026 niṣaṇṇo vāśati kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvam//811//
S01divyav_u:17506: 403.027 āsane śayane vāpi sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17519: 404.008 kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛhamāropayanti ca/
S01divyav_u:17521: 404.010 nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
S01divyav_u:17522: 404.011 nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//819//
S01divyav_u:17523: 404.012 grāmānte bhayamākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvam/
S01divyav_u:17527: 404.016 yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17534: 404.023 vakṣo vidhunvan vāyasaḥ sadyo vṛṣṭiṃ vinirdiśet//825//
S01divyav_u:17537: 404.026 prakāre toraṇāgre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17538: 404.027 abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//827//
S01divyav_u:17540: 404.029 vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra caiva vinirdiśet//828//
S01divyav_u:17541: 404.030 grāme vā nagare vāpi kurvate yatra maṇḍalam/
S01divyav_u:17546: 405.004 varṣati prathame māse paścāddevo na varṣati/
S01divyav_u:17556: 405.014 yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:17558: 405.016 skandhamūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:17560: 405.018 caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
S01divyav_u:17563: 405.021 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāralakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17568: 405.024 mohendramatha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtam/
S01divyav_u:17569: 405.025 dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryameva ca//839//
S01divyav_u:17573: 405.029 atha vai dhanamitraṃ ca paramaṃ mairameva ca//841//
S01divyav_u:17581: 406.006 vyāyamato jalaṃ caiva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//845//
S01divyav_u:17583: 406.008 anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktam yacca putrakṣayāvaham//846//
S01divyav_u:17599: 406.024 mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//854//
S01divyav_u:17602: 406.027 puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe 'pyaśubho bhavet/
S01divyav_u:17603: 406.028 śoke bhūtavikāraḥ syāt śoṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//856//
S01divyav_u:17614: 407.007 asure maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahudoṣatā//861//
S01divyav_u:17618: 407.011 mahendre muktapuṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//863//
S01divyav_u:17619: 407.012 āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ caiva priyaṅgavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17620: 407.013 antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//864//
S01divyav_u:17621: 407.014 nandā pratipadā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
S01divyav_u:17622: 407.015 tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryātprājño hyevaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//865//
S01divyav_u:17624: 407.017 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśarāśikaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17632: 407.023 dvādaśaiva tu cittāste ye loke pracaranti vai//867//
S01divyav_u:17633: 407.024 tānahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
S01divyav_u:17635: 407.026 prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17636: 407.027 tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ cāpi karkaṭaḥ//869//
S01divyav_u:17637: 407.028 pañcamaṃ cāpi siṃhastu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtam/
S01divyav_u:17638: 407.029 tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikastu tathāṣṭamam//870//
S01divyav_u:17639: 407.030 dhanvī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17643: 408.003 cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
S01divyav_u:17645: 408.005 navame cintyate dharmo daśame karmajaṃ phalam/
S01divyav_u:17647: 408.007 ete dvādaśa cittāstu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:17649: 408.009 āgatya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divyav_u:17652: 408.012 yadi brūyāttadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//877//
S01divyav_u:17653: 408.013 kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lohaṃ caiva bhṛśaṃ bhavet/
S01divyav_u:17658: 408.018 grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//880//
S01divyav_u:17659: 408.019 yadi śabdaśca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvastathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:17660: 408.020 īdṛśaṃ ca dṛṣṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17661: 408.021 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//881//
S01divyav_u:17664: 408.024 atha śabdo bhavettatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśāstu te/
S01divyav_u:17667: 408.027 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//884//
S01divyav_u:17669: 408.029 kacchapaṃ spṛśate yastu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17671: 408.031 ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaram/
S01divyav_u:17674: 409.002 hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yastu apatyaṃ tatra cintitam//887//
S01divyav_u:17676: 409.004 śastradravyaṃ ca yattasya brāhmaṇānāṃ kule sthitam//888//
S01divyav_u:17677: 409.005 atha śabdo bhavettatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:17680: 409.008 puruṣaḥ kaścidāgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
S01divyav_u:17681: 409.009 spṛśate cāpi pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//890//
S01divyav_u:17683: 409.011 atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyāste na saṃśayaḥ//891//
S01divyav_u:17686: 409.014 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//892//
S01divyav_u:17688: 409.016 hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayet//893//
S01divyav_u:17691: 409.019 sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartaṃ ca kṛtaṃ hastagataṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:17693: 409.021 yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//895//
S01divyav_u:17695: 409.023 udaraṃ caiva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//896//
S01divyav_u:17696: 409.024 nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ cāpi dṛśyate/
S01divyav_u:17698: 409.026 tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:17701: 409.029 ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyo dharmacintā ca cintitā//899//
S01divyav_u:17702: 409.030 tatra śabdāśca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17707: 410.003 spṛśate jānunī caiva karmacintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17708: 410.004 tatra śabdā bhavantīme śrotavyāśca na saṃśayaḥ//902//
S01divyav_u:17709: 410.005 bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathaiva ca/
S01divyav_u:17712: 410.008 jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hyarthalābhaṃ vinirdiśet//904//
S01divyav_u:17713: 410.009 tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17715: 410.011 etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrutvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17718: 410.014 pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchaṃś cittaṃ cāpyanarthikam//907//
S01divyav_u:17719: 410.015 yastu taccintito hyartha āśā āgantukā ca yā/
S01divyav_u:17722: 410.018 atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdastādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//909//
S01divyav_u:17724: 410.020 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyālakṣaṇaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17730: 410.024 ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇam//910//
S01divyav_u:17731: 410.025 pitaraṃ mātaraṃ caiva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:17734: 410.028 tadvijñaiḥ saha saṃgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstravit//912//
S01divyav_u:17736: 410.030 pāṇilekhāśca jaṅghe ca kaṭi nābhyūrumeva ca//913//
S01divyav_u:17737: 411.001 [411]oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃśca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
S01divyav_u:17738: 411.002 akṣibhruvau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃstathaiva ca//914//
S01divyav_u:17739: 411.003 romarājīṃ svaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gītameva ca/
S01divyav_u:17747: 411.011 dhanyān sā janayetputrāṃsteṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//918//
S01divyav_u:17748: 411.012 yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhvajaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17750: 411.014 ekaṃ sā janayetputraṃ taṃ ca rājānamādiśet//919//
S01divyav_u:17758: 411.022 subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahuprajā//923//
S01divyav_u:17761: 411.025 yasyāvartau samau snigdhau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
S01divyav_u:17765: 411.029 ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17766: 411.030 raktānte vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//927//
S01divyav_u:17773: 412.005 kāntajihvā tu yā nārī raktoṣṭhī priyabhāṣiṇī/
S01divyav_u:17776: 412.008 sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//932//
S01divyav_u:17781: 412.013 ūrdhvaprekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
S01divyav_u:17788: 412.020 trīṃśca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patim//938//
S01divyav_u:17789: 412.021 pārśvato romarājī tu vinatā ca kaṭirbhavet/
S01divyav_u:17791: 412.023 kākajaṅghā ca yā nārī raktākṣī ghargharasvarā/
S01divyav_u:17792: 412.024 niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭabāndhavā//940//
S01divyav_u:17795: 412.027 yā tu sarvasamācārā mṛdvaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
S01divyav_u:17798: 412.030 putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vāpi jāramicchati tādṛśī//943//
S01divyav_u:17800: 412.032 uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patim//944//
