S01divyav_u:17801: 413.001 [413]yasyā hastau ca pādau ca cchidrau dantāntarāṇi ca/
S01divyav_u:17802: 413.002 patinopārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//945//
S01divyav_u:17805: 413.005 yasyā kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate 'ṅguliḥ/
S01divyav_u:17806: 413.006 kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ tyaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyam//947//
S01divyav_u:17808: 413.008 na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//948//
S01divyav_u:17811: 413.011 āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā cānubandhati/
S01divyav_u:17812: 413.012 na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patim//950//
S01divyav_u:17816: 413.016 agnikārye 'pi sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//952//
S01divyav_u:17818: 413.018 pralamboṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciram//953//
S01divyav_u:17821: 413.021 na devikā na nadikā na ca daivatanāmikā/
S01divyav_u:17823: 413.023 nakṣatranāmā yā nārī yā ca gotrasanāmikā/
S01divyav_u:17837: 414.006 punarvasuśca dhanyā syātpuṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
S01divyav_u:17839: 414.008 phālgunīṣu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
S01divyav_u:17841: 414.010 svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priyadarśanam/
S01divyav_u:17848: 414.017 bharaṇī ca bhayākīrṇā cauragamyā ca sā bhavet//965//
S01divyav_u:17850: 414.019 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃl luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:17858: 414.024 vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalam yojayetkatham/
S01divyav_u:17860: 414.026 śāradaṃ vātha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
S01divyav_u:17861: 414.027 nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
S01divyav_u:17862: 414.028 kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//968//
S01divyav_u:17866: 415.002 kati saubhikṣiko luṅgāḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17872: 415.008 puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya vacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkurmātaṅgādhipatiridaṃ vacanamabravīt--
S01divyav_u:17875: 415.011 amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17877: 415.013 tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi lokasukhāvahāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17888: 415.024 trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
S01divyav_u:17895: 415.031 grāmakṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛhadevatā/
S01divyav_u:17898: 416.002 vāraṇendraṃ vṛṣaṃ caiva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtam//984//
S01divyav_u:17901: 416.005 cakrārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kākārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīm/
S01divyav_u:17905: 416.009 ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaśca praśasyate/
S01divyav_u:17906: 416.010 vikṛtaṃ kubjakuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//988//
S01divyav_u:17915: 416.018 śrutvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca mandavṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17917: 416.020 nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17918: 416.021 svayameva tu tacchasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//993//
S01divyav_u:17919: 416.022 nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/
S01divyav_u:17920: 416.023 bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānānna tacchakyaṃ tu vāpitum//994//
S01divyav_u:17931: 417.003 pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṃ kurvanti saṃcayam/
S01divyav_u:17932: 417.004 suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṃpadā//1000//
S01divyav_u:17933: 417.005 haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṃ tṛṇe śasyāpahā api/
S01divyav_u:17934: parasparaṃ ca hiṃsanti dhānyaṃ ca nidhanaṃ vrajet//1001//
S01divyav_u:17936: 417.007 dṛṣṭvā tu saṃcayaṃ niṃne 'nāvṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//1002//
S01divyav_u:17937: 417.008 yadā tu preṣitaṃ bījaṃ saptarātreṇa jāyate/
S01divyav_u:17938: 417.009 suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvaśasyeṣu saṃpadā//1003//
S01divyav_u:17940: 417.011 alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra jāyate//1004//
S01divyav_u:17943: 417.014 luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta nava tathā/
S01divyav_u:17944: 417.015 suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarvasasyeṣu saṃpadā//1006//
S01divyav_u:17946: 417.017 alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ cātra nirdiśet//1007//
S01divyav_u:17947: 417.018 luṅgasya yadi pādāstu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit/
S01divyav_u:17950: 417.021 yadā pūrvamukhī luṅgā kṣemaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
S01divyav_u:17951: 417.022 yadā paścānmukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//1009//
S01divyav_u:17956: 417.027 yadā nāgamukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kvacit/
S01divyav_u:17962: 418.002 dharmamarthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ//1014//
S01divyav_u:17965: 418.005 kathaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nāgāśca kena vā vinivāritāḥ/
S01divyav_u:17969: 418.009 ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṃ subhikṣaṃ caiva prāṇinām/
S01divyav_u:17970: 418.010 kastatra sa muniśreṣṭho nāma gotraṃ bravīhi me//1017//
S01divyav_u:17971: 418.011 daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17972: 418.012 yajñaṃ ca yajñabhāgaṃ ca hotavyaśca yathā baliḥ//1018//
S01divyav_u:17973: 418.013 pṛthivyāṃ daivataṃ brūhi āśrame daivataṃ brūhi/
S01divyav_u:17974: 418.014 deve tu daivataṃ brūhi kena devī sā kalpitā//1019//
S01divyav_u:17976: 418.016 karake daivataṃ brūhi tathā sthālyāṃ ca daivatam//1020//
S01divyav_u:17981: 418.021 tatra saṃvartate piṇḍaṃ tato meghaḥ pravartate//1022//
S01divyav_u:17982: 418.022 eṣa vyāpnoti cākāśaṃ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ/
S01divyav_u:17987: 418.027 virodhanaṃ tu vāyośca agneśca anilasya ca//1025//
S01divyav_u:17992: 418.032 yatra satyaṃ ca dharmaśca havirmeghaśca vartate//1027//
S01divyav_u:17996: 419.004 pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhāstathā/
S01divyav_u:18001: 419.009 dantāśanī tu sainyānāṃ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā/
S01divyav_u:18031: 420.006 tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭisahasraśaḥ//1041//
S01divyav_u:18035: 420.010 tadāprabhṛti bhūtānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vai trāsitaṃ manaḥ//1043//
S01divyav_u:18043: 420.018 digbhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṃ teṣāmarthaṃ dine dine//1047//
S01divyav_u:18046: 420.021 sadhūmaṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ tu pāvakam/
S01divyav_u:18051: 420.026 atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasāriṃs tithikarmanirdeśaṃ nāmādhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
S01divyav_u:18065: 421.006 gṛhe kṣetre vivāhe vā āvāhakarmasu mitreti//1055//
S01divyav_u:18066: 421.007 bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte 'dhvani/
S01divyav_u:18067: 421.008 nṛpāṇāṃ śāsane chatre śayyānāṃ karaṇeṣu ca//1056//
S01divyav_u:18077: 421.018 vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛhakarmasu pūjitā//1061//
S01divyav_u:18078: 421.019 jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitām/
S01divyav_u:18084: 421.025 nandādīnāṃ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhyādīnāṃ tu madhyame/
S01divyav_u:18087: 421.028 api ca mahābrāhmaṇa idaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ cittamabhinirṇayāmi nivartayāmi,
S01divyav_u:18089: 421.030 syātte brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:18091: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro 'bhūvam/
S01divyav_u:18096: 422.002 mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18100: 422.004 syāttava brāhmaṇa kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūt/
S01divyav_u:18102: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣirabhūvam/
S01divyav_u:18103: 422.006 mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇavikā duhitā āsāditā bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:18104: 422.007 so 'haṃ tatra saṃraktacitta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18105: so 'hamātmānaṃ jugupsamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe--oṃ bhūrbhuvaḥ svaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18108: 422.010 so 'haṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi--sāmānyasaṃjñāmātrakamidaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/
S01divyav_u:18110: putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaramanuprayaccha bhāryārthāya/
S01divyav_u:18112: 422.013 idaṃ ca vacanaṃ punaḥ śrutvā triśaṅkormātaṅgarājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī idamavocat--
S01divyav_u:18115: 422.016 putrāya te bhoḥ prakṛtiṃ dadāmi śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18116: 422.018 śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtistu bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mamedam//1067//
S01divyav_u:18117: 422.020 tatra tāni pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni uccaiḥśabdāni procurmahāśabdāni--mā tvaṃ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ rocaya/
S01divyav_u:18118: 422.021 nārhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ kartum//
S01divyav_u:18119: 422.023 atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokenaitānarthānabhāṣata--
S01divyav_u:18121: 422.026 tattvaṃ hyavitathaṃ bhūtaṃ satyaṃ nityaṃ tathā dhruvam//1068//
S01divyav_u:18122_0: 422.027 atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ māṇavakānāṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya
S01divyav_u:18122_1: triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅgarājamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhostriśaṅko brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cātrumahābhaitiko
S01divyav_u:18128: 423.003 aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṃ cāsya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ/
S01divyav_u:18129: 423.004 bhavāṃstu paramajño 'si tanme brūhi yathā tathā//1071//
S01divyav_u:18130: 423.005 iha bhostriśaṅko kimāha svalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva/
S01divyav_u:18131: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:18133: 423.007 gacchanti sattvā bahugarbhayoniṃ na caiva kaścinmanujo hyayoniḥ/
S01divyav_u:18134: 423.009 samastajātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutājjāyate kaścideva//1072//
S01divyav_u:18136: 423.013 sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaśca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hyapasmāriṇo 'pi//1073//
S01divyav_u:18137: 423.015 kṛṣṇāśca gaurāśca tathaiva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hyanyatame viśiṣṭāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18138: 423.017 sahāsthicarmāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsā duḥkhī sukhī mūtrapurīṣayuktāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18139: 423.019 na cendriyāṇāṃ praviviktirasti tasmānna varṇāścaturo bhavanti//1074//
S01divyav_u:18140: 423.021 mantrairhi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18144: 423.025 māṇavakaśateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahāyaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo 'bravīt--brāhmaṇo 'sau mātaṅgarājo hi triśaṅkur nāma/
S01divyav_u:18150: 423.029 jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ sarveṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18151: 424.001 [424]śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo 'si loke bhavān hi vidyācaraṇena yuktaḥ//1077//
S01divyav_u:18152: 424.003 dadāmi te 'haṃ prakṛtiṃ mamāmalāṃ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇairupetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18153: 424.005 śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiśca bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ mamedam//1078//
S01divyav_u:18157: 424.012 kṛtvā niveśaṃ sa tadātmajasya gatvāśrame 'sau nagaram yaśasvī/
S01divyav_u:18158: 424.014 dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sadotsavāḍhyam//1080// iti/
S01divyav_u:18159: 424.016 syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo 'bhūt?
S01divyav_u:18161: 424.017 ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅgarājo 'bhūvam/
S01divyav_u:18162: 424.018 syādevaṃ ca bhikṣavo yuṣmākam--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śādūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:18164: eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇo nāma mātaṅgarājakumāro 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:18165: 424.021 syādevam yuṣmākam--anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:18167: 424.022 eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo 'bhūt/
S01divyav_u:18168: 424.023 nānyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
S01divyav_u:18170: eṣā sā prakṛtirbhikṣuṇī tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitābhūt/
S01divyav_u:18171: 424.025 sā etarhi tenaiva snehena tenaiva premṇā ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ gacchantamanugacchati tiṣṭhantamanutiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:18174: 424.028 atha khalu bhagavānetasminnidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata--
S01divyav_u:18176: 424.030 etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//1081//
S01divyav_u:18181_0: 425.003 drutameṣāṃ caturṇāṃ duḥkhasyāryasatyasya duḥkhasamudayasya nirodhasya nirodhagāminyāḥ
S01divyav_u:18181_2: tīvracchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatiraprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyenāpramādato yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ //
S01divyav_u:18182: 425.007 asmiṃśca khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭimātrāṇāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāani vimuktāni/
S01divyav_u:18183: 425.008 saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigatamalaṃ dharmacakṣurudapādi viśuddham//
S01divyav_u:18190: 426.002 ekasmin samaye bhagavāñchrāvastyāṃ viahrati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham/
S01divyav_u:18191: 426.003 tatra {bhagavān} bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--saptagtriṃśatā bhikṣava ākāraiḥ paṇḍito dānaṃ dadāti/
S01divyav_u:18218: 426.022 tathāagatacaityeṣu tathāgatabimbeṣu ca sugandhodakasnānaṃ dānaṃ dadāti dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāśītyanuvyañjanavipākapratilābhasaṃvartanīyam/
S01divyav_u:18233: 427.002 buddho bhagavāñ śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme/
S01divyav_u:18236: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati tamate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:18239: 427.005 sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18242: sā kathayati--kasmāttvaṃ brāhmaṇa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitah?
S01divyav_u:18243: sa kathayati--mamāpatyaṃ jātaṃ jātaṃ kālaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:18247: sa kathayati--yadā tava patvyāḥ prasavakālaḥ syāt,
S01divyav_u:18249: 427.009 athāpareṇa samayena tasya patnyāḥ prasavakāle jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18253: 427.011 tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṃ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste 'nupradattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18263: 427.016 sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ayaṃ dāraka āryāṇāṃ pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:18267: 427.018 sthavirasthvirā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti/
S01divyav_u:18268: 427.019 sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ayaṃ dāraka āryāṇāṃ pādābhivandanaṃ karotīti/
S01divyav_u:18272: 427.021 bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśati sma/
S01divyav_u:18273: 427.022 sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--bhagavān,
S01divyav_u:18287: mahāpanthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18289_0: saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ brāhmaṇikāyāmīryāyāṃ śauce samudācāre bhasmagrahe autkare
S01divyav_u:18289_1: bhoskāre ṛgvede yajurvede sāmavede 'tharvavede yajane yājane 'dhyayane 'dhyāpane dāne pratigrahe /
S01divyav_u:18292: tasya bhūyaḥ krīḍato ramataḥ paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:18297: tayā sa dārakaḥ snāpayitvā śuklena vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā navanītenāsyaṃ pūrayitvā dārikāyā haste dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18298: 428.002 sā dārikoktā--imaṃ tvaṃ dārakaṃ caturmahāpathe dhāraya/
S01divyav_u:18300: sa vaktavyah--ayaṃ dāraka āryasya pādābhivandanaṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:18305: sā dārikā alasajātīyā taṃ dārakamādāya panthalikāyāṃ sthitā/
S01divyav_u:18307: sā dārikā sagauravā sapratīśā pādabhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati--ārya,
S01divyav_u:18321: panthako dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛttiḥ/
S01divyav_u:18328: asya tu panthakasya sītyukte dhamiti vismarati/
S01divyav_u:18338: 428.020 brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na sarve brāhmaṇā vedapāragā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:18342: 428.022 atha tena samayena sa brāhmaṇo glānībhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18346: 428.024 api tu tvayā panthakasya yogodvahanaṃ kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:18351: te taṃ nīlapītalohitāvadātairvastraiḥ śibikāmalaṃkṛtya mahatā satkāreṇa śmaśāne dhmāpayitvā śokavinodaṃ kṛtvā avasthitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:18352: 428.029 āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
S01divyav_u:18353: 428.030 śrāvastyāṃ janakāyena śrutam--āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu jānapadeṣu cārikāṃ carantau śrāvastīmanuprāptau/
S01divyav_u:18354: 428.031 śrutvā ca punaḥ sa janakāyo bahir nirgantumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18355: 428.032 mahāpanthako 'pi bahiḥ śrāvastyāmanyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle [429]pañcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayati/
S01divyav_u:18356: 429.001 tena sa janakāyaḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchan dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18360: bhadantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pañcaśataparivārau kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caritvā iha śrāvastīmanuprāptau,
S01divyav_u:18363: yatredānīṃ tadagraṃ varṇamapahāya dvitīyavarṇasya śramaṇasya gautamasyāntike pravrajitau/
S01divyav_u:18370: 429.007 ācaritaṃ teṣāṃ māṇavakānām yadā apāṭhā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:18374: apareṇa samayena te sarve apāṭhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18380: tena tasya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā vistareṇa saṃprakāśitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18387: tena tasya dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādo 'nulomapratilomo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18399: sa tena janapadaṃ nītvā pravrajitah upasampāditaḥ, uktaśca/
S01divyav_u:18403: 429.021 tena divā uddiśatā yoniśo bhāvayatā trīṇi piṭakāni,
S01divyav_u:18404: rātrau cintayatā tulayatā upaparīkṣamāṇena sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18407: 429.026 yadā panthakasya bhogāstanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatāḥ,
S01divyav_u:18411: 429.028 athāyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18413: śrāvastyāṃ janakāyena śrutam--āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ kosaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18418: te kathayanti--āryo mahāpanthakaḥ pañcaśataparivātaḥ kosaleṣu [430]janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carañ śrāvastīmanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18420: 430.002 panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--eṣāmasau na bhrātā na jñātiḥ/
S01divyav_u:18428: sa kathayati--ahaṃ cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18435: 430.008 pāpaṃ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke/
S01divyav_u:18436: 430.010 riktaḥ kāmaiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//1//
S01divyav_u:18437: 430.012 tasyaiṣā gāthā traimāsyenāpi na vṛttā jātā/
S01divyav_u:18438: anyeṣāṃ gopālakānāṃ paśupālakānāṃ śrutvā pravṛttā jātā/
S01divyav_u:18441: dharmatā khalu yathā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dvau śrāvakāṇāṃ saṃnipātau bhavataḥ,
S01divyav_u:18445: te tāṃstān manasikāraviśeṣānādāya tāsu tāsu grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu varṣā upagacchanti/
S01divyav_u:18449: 430.018 āyuṣmato mahāpanthakasya sārdhaṃvihāryantevāsikā bhikṣavo janapade varṣoṣitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:18454: 430.020 tatra ye cūḍā bhavanti paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ,
S01divyav_u:18456: 430.022 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ ṣaḍvargīyān sevate bhajate paryupāsate/
S01divyav_u:18461: na tvekā gāthā mama vṛttā jātā,
S01divyav_u:18468: 430.028 āyuṣmān mahāpanthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimasyedaṃ svaṃ pratibhānamāhosvit kenacitprayuktah?
S01divyav_u:18472: 430.031 sa tena grīvāayāṃ gṛhītvā bahirvihārasya niṣkāsitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18478: dṛṣṭvā ca punarāgacchantamidamavocat--kasmāttvaṃ pathaka vahirvihārasya rodiṣyasi,
S01divyav_u:18482: 431.004 bhagavānāha--nedaṃ vatsa maunīndraṃ vacanaṃ tavopādhyāyena tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairaneikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam,
S01divyav_u:18483: api tu mayedaṃ maunīndraṃ pravacanaṃ tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyairanaikairduṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya samudānītam/
S01divyav_u:18485: ahamasmi bhadanta cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18487: 431.009 yo bālo bālabhāvena paṇḍitastatra tena saḥ/
S01divyav_u:18488: 431.010 bālaḥ paṇḍitamānī tu sa vai bāla ihocyate//2//
S01divyav_u:18489: 431.011 asthānamanavakāśo yadbuddhā bhagavantaḥ padaśo dharmaṃ vācayiṣyanti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate/
S01divyav_u:18490: 431.012 tatra bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma--imaṃ pāṭhaya tvamānanda panthakam/
S01divyav_u:18498: bhagavatā tasya dve pade datte--rajo harāmi,
S01divyav_u:18515: 431.023 athāyuṣmataḥ panthakasya rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye etadabhavat--bhagavānevamāha--rajo harāmi,
S01divyav_u:18517: 431.024 kiṃ nu bhagavānādhyātmikaṃ rajaḥ saṃdhāyāha āhosvidbāhyam?
S01divyav_u:18518: tasyaivaṃ cintayatastasyāṃ velāyāmaṣrutapūrvāstisro gāthā āmukhīpravṛttā jātāh--
S01divyav_u:18519: 431.026 rajo 'tra rāgo na hi reṇureṣa rajo rāgasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:18520: 431.028 etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//3//
S01divyav_u:18521: 431.030 rajo 'tra dveṣo na hi reṇureṣa rajo dveṣasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:18522: 432.001 [432]etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāḥ sugatasya śāsane//4//
S01divyav_u:18523: 432.003 rajo 'tra moho na hi reṇureṣa rajo mohasyādhivacanaṃ na reṇoḥ/
S01divyav_u:18524: 432.005 etadrajaḥ prativinudanti paṇḍitā na ye pramattāaḥ sugatasya śāsane//5//
S01divyav_u:18530: sa tena bāhau gṛhītvoktah--āgaccha svādhyāyinikāṃ tāvatkuru,
S01divyav_u:18534: 432.013 āyuṣmatā mahāpanthakena pṛṣṭato mukhaṃ vyavalokayatā dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18536: evaṃ te tvayā guṇagaṇā adhigatāh? adhigatāḥ//
S01divyav_u:18539: 432.017 śramaṇo gautama evamāha--gambhīro me dharmo gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo durnubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ,
S01divyav_u:18542: yasyedānīṃ panthakaprabhṛtayaścūḍāḥ paramacūḍā dhanvāḥ paramadhanvāḥ pravrajanti/
S01divyav_u:18543: 432.020 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake mahājanakāyaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:18547: 432.022 evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāyuṣmān panthakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18548: 432.023 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakamidamavocat--śāstā tvāmāyuṣman panthaka evamāha--bhikṣuṇyaste avavaditavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:18549: 432.024 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ kathayati--kimarthaṃ sthavirasthavirān bhikṣūnapahāya māṃ bhagavān bhikṣuṇyavavādakamājñāpayati?
S01divyav_u:18576: 433.004 ṣaḍjanyaḥ śrāvastyāṃ praviśya rathya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocayantu--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:18579: 433.006 yena na kaścit putramoṭikāputro 'lpaśruta utsahate bhikṣuṇīravavaditum/
S01divyav_u:18580: 433.007 tāsāṃ ṣaḍbhir janībhir dvādaśahastikābhir latābhiḥ saṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptam,
S01divyav_u:18581: ṣaḍbhikṣuṇībhiḥ śrāvastīṃ praviśya rathyāvīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocitam--so 'smākaṃ tādṛśo 'vavādaka āgamiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:18584: 433.010 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:18585: 433.011 kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktāpiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ pratisamlayanāya/
S01divyav_u:18586: 433.012 athāyuṣmān panthakaḥ sāyāhne pratisamlayanāya vyutthāya saṃghāṭīmādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścāccramaṇena saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18589: 433.014 adrākṣīt sā pariṣat āyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:18590: 433.015 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ parasparaṃ pṛcchati--kataro 'tra bhikṣuṇyavavādakah?
S01divyav_u:18600: 433.019 apare kathayanti--tiṣṭhāmo yadi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, śroṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18603: 433.020 āyuṣmatā panthakena siṃhāsanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prajñaptakaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprāyābhih?
S01divyav_u:18605: dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ tāvat prasādajātābhiḥ prajñaptamāhosvit viheṭhanābhiprasāyābhih?
S01divyav_u:18607: 433.022 āyuṣmatā panthakena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya taṃ siṃhāsanam yathāsthāne sthāpitam/
S01divyav_u:18609: sa niṣīdan kaiścit dṛṣṭah. kaiścit na dṛṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18610: 433.024 athātrastha āyuṣmān panthakastadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte sve āsane 'ntarhitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18611: pūrvasyāṃ diśi uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya pūrvavat yāvat ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18612: 433.026 niṣadya āyuṣmān panthakastā bhikṣuṇīrāmantrayate--mayā bhaginyastribhirmāsairekā gāthā paṭhitā/
S01divyav_u:18615: 433.029 pāpaṃ na kuryānmanasā na vācā kāyena vā kiṃcana sarvaloke/
S01divyav_u:18616: 433.031 riktaḥ kāmeiḥ smṛtimān saṃprajānan duḥkhaṃ na sa vidyādanarthopasaṃhitam//6//iti/
S01divyav_u:18626: 434.005 yadbhūyasā sā pariṣad buddhaniṃnādharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā/
S01divyav_u:18627: 434.006 athāyuṣmān panthakastāṃ pariṣadaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18629: te saṃlakṣayanti--adyāyuṣmatā panthakena mahājanakāyaḥ prasādito bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:18630: 434.008 te na ṣaknuvantyāyuṣmantaṃ panthakaṃ saṃmukhamapriyaṃ praṣṭum/
S01divyav_u:18632: 434.009 āyuṣman, adya āyuṣmatā panthakena kiṃ mahājanakāyo na prasādito vā prasāditah?
S01divyav_u:18634: 434.010 bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ cakraṃ pravartitam,
S01divyav_u:18638: 434.013 tatra bhagavāan bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikcūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ cetovivartakuśalānām yaduta panthako bhikṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:18639: 434.014 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta dvādaśavargīyābhirāyuṣmataḥ panthakasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāmi ityatha eva kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18640: 434.015 bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvani ābhiranarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartha eva kṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18644: 434.018 sa tayā sardhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:18645: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato bhūyaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvar dvādaśa putrā jātāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18650: 434.021 yadā tāsāṃ svāmino bahir nirgatā bhavanti,
S01divyav_u:18655: 434.023 sa puruṣāṇāṃ padaśabdāñ śrutvā tāḥ snuṣā garjayati.
S01divyav_u:18658: 434.026 taistā uktāh--kiṃ kāraṇam yūyaṃ tātasya cakaṭyodanaṃ kāñjikacchiṭiṃ cānuprayacchata?
S01divyav_u:18667: 434.030 tābhiḥ kumbhakāara uktah--śakṣyasi tvaṃ bhadramukham ekamukhike dve sthālyau kartum?
S01divyav_u:18672: 434.032 tābhiḥ svāmināṃ purastādekasya [435]sthālyāṃ taṇḍulāḥ prakṣiptā ekasyāṃ dadhi/
S01divyav_u:18676: 435.003 tābhisteṣāṃ purastāttasyaukasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya cakaṭyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyāḥ kañjikam/
S01divyav_u:18677: 435.004 tata evaṃ tābhisteṣāmekasyāḥ sthālyā uddhṛtya śālyodanaṃ dattaṃ dvitīyāyā dadhi uddhṛtam/
S01divyav_u:18685: tena tāsāmapratyakṣaṃ mahānasaṃ praviśya paryeṣamāṇena hastasaṃspatśenaikamukhe dve sthālyau labdhe/
S01divyav_u:18689: 435.010 gatvā paśyadhvamasmākaṃ gṛha eva ekamukhī sthālī/
S01divyav_u:18690: putraka, anyeṣu geheṣu na shālīdvayaṃ tvakamukhamasmākaṃ mandabhāgyānām/
S01divyav_u:18696: sa kathayati--kīdṛśaṃ sarpaṃ mṛgayatha jīvantamāhosvit mṛtakamiti?
S01divyav_u:18700: 435.015 dharmatā khalu sarpasya ruṣitasya dvayoḥ sthānayorviṣaṃ saṃkrāmati--śirasi pucche ca/
S01divyav_u:18701: 435.016 tena roṣitvā śiraḥ pucchaṃ svayaṃ chittvā tāsāṃ madhye sarpā dattaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18704: sa brāhmaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kimetā me hilimāṃ jomāṃ dāsyanti?
S01divyav_u:18720: tasya tena bāṣpeṇa bhūyasyā mātrayā paṭale sphuṭite/
S01divyav_u:18722: 435.024 tāḥ pūrvam yathā tasyāndhasya tato viśvastā vihṛtavantyastathaiva vihartumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18724: kathayati ca--kim yūyaṃ jānītha idānīmapyahaṃ na paśyāmi?
S01divyav_u:18729: eṣa evāsau panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:18733: 435.029 etarhyapi ābhirasyānarthaṃ kariṣyāma ityartham eva kṛtaḥ//
S01divyav_u:18734_0: 435.030 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmān
S01divyav_u:18734_1: panthakaḥ parīttenāvavādenācodya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe anuttare yogakṣeme
S01divyav_u:18735: 435.032 bhagavānāha--na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣo mayā parīttenāvavādenācodya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18737: 436.001 [436]bhūtabhūtaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin kartavaṭake gṛhapariḥ prativasati āḍyo sahādhano mahābhogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18739: sa tayā sārdhaṃ trīṭati ramate paticārayati/
S01divyav_u:18745: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṃlakṣayati--yadahamasyai prabhūtānaṃ kārṣāpaṇān dāsyāmi,
S01divyav_u:18748: 436.006 tasmin karpaṭake śreṣṭhī prativasati tasya gṛhapatervayasyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18749: tasya haste prabhūtāḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāh--yadi mama patnyā bhaktācchādena yogodvahanaṃ kuryāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18752: tayā sa dārako jñātibakena svahastabalena vā āyāpitā(payitvā)
S01divyav_u:18756: sā saṃlakṣayati--yadyasya vakṣyāmi mahāsamudre potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsann iti,
S01divyav_u:18759: 436.011 śrutamāhitastava putā ca pitāmahāśca ihaiva vāṇijyamakārṣuḥ/
S01divyav_u:18763: tvaṃ mayā kathaṃcit jñātibalena svahastabakena āyāpitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18765: api tvayaṃ śroṣṭī tava pitṛvayasyo bhavati/
S01divyav_u:18766: 436.015 asya sakāśāt kārṣāpaṇān gṛhītvā karma kuru/
S01divyav_u:18770: tasya ca gṛhāt preṣyadārikāyāḥ saṃkāratalasyopari mṛtamūṣikāṃ dṛṣṭvā prayacchati cchorayitum/
S01divyav_u:18771: 436.018 sa śreṣṭhī tasya puruṣasya kathayati--yaḥ puruṣaḥ syāt,
S01divyav_u:18783: tena vāṇijakena dāraka ucyate--anuprayaccha asya biḍālasya mṛtamūṣikām/
S01divyav_u:18789: 436.026 sa tān bhrāṣṭre bharjayitvā śītalasya pānīyasya vardhanīyasya pūrṇaṃ kṛtvā tadgṛhya tasmātsthānakānniṣkramya yasmin pradeśe kāṣṭhahārakā viśrāmyanti,
S01divyav_u:18796: tena teṣāṃ kalāyānāṃ stoktaṃ dattaṃ śītalaṃ ca pānīyaṃ pātam/
S01divyav_u:18799: bhāgineya, vayaṃ tāvat kalyamevotthāya gatvā idānīmāgacchāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18804: sa tāṃ vikrīya [437]kalāyānāṃ gṛhītvā bharjayitvā udakasya kumbhaṃ pūrayitvā tasminneva praveśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18808: divase divase tvaṃ kalāyān pānīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā āgamya atraiva tiṣṭham/
S01divyav_u:18824: tasya tatprabhūto lābhaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati--etat pratikruṣṭataraṃ vāṇijyānām yaduta ukkarikāpaṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18828: sa saṃlakṣayati--etadapi pratikraṣṭataraṃ ca tadvāṇijyānāṃ pūrvavat/
S01divyav_u:18830: tasya mūṣikāhairaṇyako mūṣikāhairaṇyaka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:18834: yathā mahāsamudramavataret tatraivānayena vyasanamāpatsyate tathā kariṣyāma iti/
S01divyav_u:18835: 437.016 te tasya nātidūre sthitvā svaiḥ kathāsamlāpena tiṣṭhanti--yathāpi nāma bhavantaḥ puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
S01divyav_u:18838: evamevāsya mūṣkikāhairaṇyikasya pitā ca pitāmahāśca samudre potasaṃvyavahātiṇa āsan/
S01divyav_u:18839: 437.019 eṣa idānīṃ kuṛcchreṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayati hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ vāhayatīti/
S01divyav_u:18841: te kathayanti--tava pitā ca pitāmahāśca potasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan/
S01divyav_u:18845: satyamasmākaṃ pitā ca pitāmahāśca mahāsamudre petasaṃvyavahāriṇa āsan?
S01divyav_u:18856: tena ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kṛtam--yo yuṣmākamutsahate mūṣikāhairaṇyena sārdhamaśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavataritum,
S01divyav_u:18859: atha mūṣilāhairaṇyikaḥ kṛtamaṅgalakaitūhalasvastyayanaḥ śakaṭairbhārairmūṭaiḥ piṭakairuṣṭrairgobhirgardabhaiḥ paṇyamāropya mahāsamudraṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18863: sārthavāhaḥ karṇadhārasya kathayati--kathaya kathaya bhoḥ puruṣa yathābhūtaṃ mahāsamudrasya varṇam/
S01divyav_u:18865: 438.002 yo yuṣmākamutsahate evamrūpai ratnairātmānaṃ samyaksukhena pratiṇayitum,
S01divyav_u:18866: mātāpitarau putradārān dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ motrāmātyajñātisālohitaṃ kālena kālaṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyo dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayitum,
S01divyav_u:18872: sa karṇadhārasya kathayati--ghoṣaya bhoḥ puruṣa mahāsamudrasya yathābhūtaṃ varṇam/
S01divyav_u:18873: 438.008 tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣitumāravdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18875: tadyadhā timibhayaṃ timiṃgalabhayaṃ timitimiṃgalabhayamāvartabhayaṃ kumbhīrabhayaṃ śiśumārabhayamantarjalagatānāṃ parvatānāmāghātabhayam/
S01divyav_u:18878: 438.012 yena yuṣmākaṃ priyamātmānaṃ parityaktvā mātāpitarau putradāraṃ dāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaṃ mitrāmātyañjātisālohitaṃ mahāsamudramavataratu/
S01divyav_u:18882: 438.014 tataḥ karṇadhārastriruddḥpṣaṇāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ paścādekāṃ vastrāṃ muñcati,
S01divyav_u:18884: yatastadvahanaṃ mahākarṇadhārasaṃdhānabalavadvāyusampreritaṃ mahāmegha iva saṃprasthito 'nuguṇena vāyunā yāvad ratnadvīpamanuprāptam/
S01divyav_u:18885: 438.016 tataḥ karṇadhāra uddhoṣayitumārabdhah--śṛṇvantu bhavanto jambudvīpakā vaṇijaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18889: 438.019 asminneva ca ratnadvīpe kroñjakumārikā nāma rākṣasyaḥ prativasanti/
S01divyav_u:18890: 438.020 tāḥ puruṣaṃ tathā upalālayanti yathā tatraivānayena vyasanamāpadyante/
S01divyav_u:18897: 438.023 saptāahasyātyayāt tādṛśaṃ vāyumutsṛjanti yena vahanamapahriyate yathāpi tadkṛtakāryāṇām/
S01divyav_u:18898: 438.024 yaṃ śrutvā te vaṇijo 'vahitā apramattā avasthitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18906: 438.028 sa tathā uktah--putra na tava putā na putāmaho dhanikaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18911: 438.030 tena suvarṇasya phelāṃ pūrayitvā catasno mūṣikāścaturṣu pārśveṣu sthāpayitvā śroṣṭhigṛhaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:18912_0: 438.031 sa śreṣṭhī tadā tasyaiva tadvarṇaṃ bhāṣamāṇastiṣṭhati--paśyata bhavanto mūṣikāhairaṇyikaḥ
S01divyav_u:18912_1: kathaṃ puṇyamaheśākhyo yam yameva gṛhṇāti tṛṇaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā sarvaṃ tat suvarṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
S01divyav_u:18928: tava pitrā gacchatā mama hasto kārṣāpaṇāḥ sthāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18929: 439.006 tena śreṣṭhinā duhitā sarvlamlāravibhūṣitā tasya bhāryārthamanupradattā//
S01divyav_u:18933: eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:18935: 439.009 etarhyapyeṣa mayā parittenāvavādenāvavādya saṃsārakāntārāduttārya atyantaniṣṭhe 'nuttare yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ//
S01divyav_u:18936: 439.011 bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti--kiṃ bhadanta panthakena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaścūḍaḥ paramacūḍo jātah?
S01divyav_u:18938: 439.012 na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:18942: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:18944: 439.016 sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//7//
S01divyav_u:18945_0: 439.017 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śastā
S01divyav_u:18945_1: loka utpannastathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyāciraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S01divyav_u:18945_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S01divyav_u:18946: 439.019 sa viṃśatibhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ parivāro vārāṇasīmupaniśritya viharati sma/
S01divyav_u:18948: anena tatra mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikāpi gāthā uddiṣṭo/
S01divyav_u:18958: 439.025 sa prabhūtān sūkarāñ jānuṣu buddhvā nāvamāropya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18967: sa tena gajamujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya uddhṛtya vālukāyāḥ shalaṃ kṛtvā tatrāvamūrdhakaḥ sthāpitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:18971: sa tena pādānusāreṇa gato yāvatpaśyati pañcamātrāṇi pratyekabuddhaśatāni/
S01divyav_u:18972: 439.031 sa teṣāṃ patreṇa puṣpeṇa phalena dantakāṣṭhena copasthānaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18976: 440.001 tadā so 'pyekānte sthitvā paryaṅkaṃ buddhcā dhyāyati/
S01divyav_u:18979: yo 'sau kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya pravacane bhikṣastripiṭah āsīt,
S01divyav_u:18982: 440.004 yadanena mātsaryeṇa na kasyaciccatuṣpadikā gāthā uddiṣṭā,
S01divyav_u:18984: tasya karmaṇo vipākena cūḍaḥ paramacūḍo dhanvaḥ paramadhanvaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ//
S01divyav_u:18985: 440.007 yadā āyuṣmān panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:18986: jīvakena śrutam--panthakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajita iti/
S01divyav_u:18988: ahaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayiṣyāmi sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
S01divyav_u:18989: 440.009 bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastīṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhe tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18992: aśrauṣījjīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah--bhagavān magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:18994: 440.013 apasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānto niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:18995: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:18996: 440.015 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:18997_0: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtah utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S01divyav_u:18997_1: praṇamya bhagavantametadvocat--adhivāsayatu me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
S01divyav_u:18999: 440.018 sa na śaknoti bhagavantaṃ vaktuṃ sthāpayitvā bhadantaṃ panthakam/
S01divyav_u:19000: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yenāyuṣmānāndastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19001: 440.020 upasaṃkramyāyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vinditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19002_1: ānanda jānīyāh--mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargehe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ
S01divyav_u:19003: 440.023 yathā te jīvaka kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhirbhavati/
S01divyav_u:19004: atha jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmata ānandasya bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya āyuṣmata ānandasya pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19005: 440.025 athāyuṣmānānando 'ciraprakrāntaṃ jīvakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ viditvā yenāyuṣmān pathakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19008_0: sa jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtastāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ samudānīya
S01divyav_u:19008_1: kalyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati--samaye bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:19009: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate/
S01divyav_u:19010: 440.031 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena jīvakasya kumārabhūtasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19013: 441.002 jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sauvarṇabhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā vṛddhānte tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:19015: jīvikaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kathayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan vāridhārāṃ na pratigṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:19022: bhagavānāha--na tvayā jīvaka buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho nimantritah?
S01divyav_u:19026: 441.008 jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ cāpyahaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa śabdāpayāmi,
S01divyav_u:19031: tena dūtena gatvā panthaka iti śabdo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19033: sa dūta āgatya jīvakasya kathayati--tathaiva veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpo bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrṇastiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:19034: 441.012 bhagavānāha--gaccha tvaṃ kathaya yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:19035: 441.013 sa gatvā kathayati--yo bhūtapanthakaḥ sa āgacchatu/
S01divyav_u:19036: 441.014 āyuṣmān panthakastatra gatvā svasyāṃ gatyāṃ niṣaṇṇāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19039: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--sumeruprakhye mahāśrāvake jīvakaḥ kumārabhūtaḥ kṣāntiṃ gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:19042: 441.017 dharmatā khalu na tāvat sthabirashtavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi pratigṛhyante,
S01divyav_u:19044: 441.018 āyuṣmān panthakaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavataḥ sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pātrāṇi na gṛhyante?
S01divyav_u:19046: 441.020 āyuṣmatā panthakenādharmāsanaṃ kṛtvā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya bhagavataḥ pātraṃ gṛhītam/
S01divyav_u:19052: sa jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇa āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayati,
S01divyav_u:19054: 441.025 nityaṃ caityaguṇo hi candanaraso nityaṃ sugandhayutpalaṃ nityaṃ bhāsati kāñcanasya vimalaṃ vaiḍūryaśuddham/
S01divyav_u:19055: 441.027 nityaṃ pāpajane hi krodhamatulaṃ pāṣāṇarekhopamaṃ nityaṃ cāryajaneṣu prātirvasate kṣāntirdhruvā hyarhatām//8//
S01divyav_u:19058: yadā jīvakaḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmataḥ panthakasya guṇānāmanabhijñastadā asatkāraḥ prayuktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:19064: 442.003 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava uttarāpathāt sārthavāḥ pañcaśatamaśvapaṇyamādāya madhyadeśamāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:19066: sa yameva divasamavakrāntastameva divasamupādāya te 'śvā na bhūyo heṣante/
S01divyav_u:19067: 442.005 sārthavahaḥ saṃlakṣayati--kiṃ ca mamāśvānāṃ kaścid rogaḥ prādurbhūto bhaviṣyati yena te na heṣante?
S01divyav_u:19070: 442.007 sa yameva divasamupādāya te 'śvāḥ saṃcartumapi nārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19071: sārthavāhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--nūnamayaṃ daurbhāgyasattvo jātah asya doṣaṇa mamāśvānāṃ rogaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19080: sa tasyaiva varṣāmuṣitasya tadvāsino yo śilpinaste svena śilpenopasthānaṃ kurvānti/
S01divyav_u:19104: sa patnyā uktah--asti kiṃcittvayā tasya sakāśāllabdham? labdham/
S01divyav_u:19110: 442.023 sa pakkamānānāṃ bhāṇḍānāṃ madhye parisarpanna kiṃcidbhāṇḍaṃ bhinatti/
S01divyav_u:19121: 442.028 na bhūyo mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:19125: 442.030 tena kālena tena samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:19133: brahmadattena rājñā śrutam--uttarāpathāt sārthavāho 'śvapaṇyamādāya vārāṇasīmanuprāpta iti/
S01divyav_u:19140: sārthavāhaṃ dṛṣṭvā te kathayanti--bhavanto 'śvāvaḍavāyā aśvājāneyo jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19142: sārthavāhamupasaṃkramya pṛcchanti--asti kaścidaśvastvayā vikrītaḥ kasyacidvā datta iti?
S01divyav_u:19144: 443.008 api tvasti mayā pūjitake 'dhiṣṭhāne 'maṅgalakaḥ kiśorakaḥ kumbhakārasya datta iti/
S01divyav_u:19157: te kathayanti--evaṃ cet saṃpradhāraya vayaṃ śvo bhūya āgamiṣyāmaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19160: kiṃ tvaṃ jānāsi mayā mṛttikā voḍhavyā tuṣāśca kuṭisakaṇṭaṃ bhakṣitavyam/
S01divyav_u:19166: 443.020 vaktavyāh--suvarṇalakṣaṃ vānuprayacchatha yāvadvā dakṣiṇena sakthnā kariṣyati tāvadanuprayacchati/
S01divyav_u:19181: tairbrahmadattasya rājñaḥ saṃdiṣṭaṃ suvarṇalakṣeṇa aśvājāneyo labhyate/
S01divyav_u:19182: 443.027 rājñāpi saṃdiṣṭam--yūyam yāvatā mūlyena tāvatā gṛhṇīta/
S01divyav_u:19191: 443.032 smarasi turaga ghaṭikarasya śālāṃ kimiha vidhairya viprayukraḥ/
S01divyav_u:19193: 444.003 na carasi bahumatastadarthe māsidiha hi cara yānasahasrapūrṇayāyī/
S01divyav_u:19194: 444.005 hyavasanamidaṃ tṛṣāpanītaṃ na carasi kiṃ vada me 'dya sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ//10//
S01divyav_u:19197: 444.011 tvamiha vidhihitapradābhimānī na ca vihito bhavato yathāvadasmi/
S01divyav_u:19198: 444.013 nidhanamahamiha prayāyamāśu na ca biduṣāya taraya pūrvyām//12//
S01divyav_u:19199: 444.015 suciramapi hi na sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi saumya nāvamānaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19200: 444.017 kṣaṇamāpi khalu sajjanāvamāno yadi guṇavānasi nāvamānaḥ//13//
S01divyav_u:19201: 444.019 sūto rājñaḥ kathayati--devasyānupūrvī na kṛtā yanaiṣa yavasayogyāśanaṃ na gṛhṇāti/
S01divyav_u:19209: sa tasya śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ mūrdhni dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:19210: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇena maṇivyajanena makṣikān vārayati/
S01divyav_u:19211: 444.023 rājño 'gramahiṣī sauvargasthāle madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati/
S01divyav_u:19218: rājā kathayati--yattāvadatītaṃ na śakyaṃ tatpunaḥ kartum,
S01divyav_u:19221: tasya rājño jyeṣṭhaḥ putraḥ śataśalākāṃ dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:19222: rājño jyeṣṭhā duhitā sauvarṇamaṇimayavālavyajanena makṣikān vārayati,
S01divyav_u:19223: rājño 'gramāhiṣī sauvarṇena sthālena madhumrakṣitakān mūlān bhakṣayato dhārayati,
S01divyav_u:19226: sasṛtaparamasugandhivilepanānudhārī madhuramadhurakṛtāntarānurāgā nṛpamahiṣī turagottamāya dattā rājñā/
S01divyav_u:19228: rājā sūtaṃ pṛcchati--rājā asya pṛṣṭhaṃ duḥkhayati/
S01divyav_u:19235: api tu mā rājānaṃ pucchodakena sekṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:19239: sāmantarājaiḥ śrutam--yathā rājā brahmadatta udyānaṃ gata iti/
S01divyav_u:19241: rājñā brahmadattena śrutaṃ sāmantarājair nagaradvārāṇi nigṛhītānīti/
S01divyav_u:19243: antarā ca vārāṇasyantarā codyānamatrāntarā brahmavatī nāma puṣkiriṇyutpalakuṃdapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā/
S01divyav_u:19260: 445.013 tataḥ kumbhakārasya sakāśāt suvarṇalakṣeṇāśvājāneyaṃ gṛhītvā ihānītam/
S01divyav_u:19275: eṣa eva jīvakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:19277: eṣa eva panthakastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:19289: 446.002 buddho bhagavān kuruṣu janapadacārikāṃ carat kalmāṣadamyamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19290: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kalmāṣadamye mākandiko nāma parivrājakaḥ prativasati/
S01divyav_u:19292: 446.004 tasya duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:19295: 446.005 tasyāstrīṇi saptāhānyekaviṃśatiṃ divasān vistareṇa jātimahī saṃvṛttā yāvajjātamahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti?
S01divyav_u:19296: jñātaya ūcuh--iyaṃ dārikā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā/
S01divyav_u:19302: mākandikaḥ saṃlakṣayati--iyaṃ dārikā na mayā kasyacit kulena dātavyā na dhanena nāpi śrutena,
S01divyav_u:19303: kiṃ tu yo 'syā rūpeṇa samo vāpyadhiko vā,
S01divyav_u:19305: 446.012 atrāntare bhagavān kuruṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran kalmāṣadamyamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19307: 446.013 atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya kalmāṣadamyaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:19308: 446.014 kalmāṣadamyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19309: 446.015 pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmya pādau prakṣāmya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā/
S01divyav_u:19310: 446.016 tena khalu samayena mākandikaḥ parivrajakaḥ puṣpasamidhasyārthe nirgato 'bhut/
S01divyav_u:19311_1: suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅka baddhvā niṣaṇṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ dūrādevānyataravṛkṣamūlaṃ
S01divyav_u:19311_2: niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīlṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇaṃ prāsādikaṃ pradarśanīyaṃ
S01divyav_u:19311_3: śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittavyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpamiva śriyā jvalantam /
S01divyav_u:19313: sa saṃlakṣayati--yādṛśo 'yaṃ śramaṇaḥ prāsādikaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ sakalajanamanohārī,
S01divyav_u:19314: durlabhastu sarvastrījanasya patiḥ pratirūpaḥ prāgeva anupamāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19317: upasaṃkramya patnīmāmantrayate--yatkhalu bhadre jānīyāh--labdho me duhiturjāmātā/
S01divyav_u:19327: 446.027 dṛṣṭo mayā vipra sa piṇḍahetoḥ kalmāṣadamye vicaranmaharṣiḥ/
S01divyav_u:19328: 446.029 bhūratnabhā santi tasya pragacchato 'tyunnamate na caiva(?)//1//
S01divyav_u:19333: 447.003 saceddruta samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyasau kāmaguṇyeṣu raṃsyate//2// iti/
S01divyav_u:19337: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--yatkhalu bhavati jānīyāh--eṣa te duhitustṛṇasaṃstaraka iti/
S01divyav_u:19339: 447.009 raktasya śayyā bhavatativikopitā dviṣṭasya śayyā sahasā nipīḍitā/
S01divyav_u:19340: 447.011 sūḍhasya śayyā khalu pādato gatā suvītarāgeṇa nisevitā nviyam/
S01divyav_u:19343: 447.015 amaṅgale sākalike tvaṃ maṅgalyakāle vadase hyamaṅgalam/
S01divyav_u:19344: 447.017 sāceddrutaṃ samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyasau kāmaguṇeṣu raṃsyate//4//
S01divyav_u:19346: bhagavataḥ padāni dṛṣṭvā punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--imāni te bhavanti bhadre duhiturjāmātuḥ padāni/
S01divyav_u:19348: 447.021 raktasya puṃsaḥ padamutpaṭaṃ syānnipīḍitaṃ dveṣavataḥ padaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:19349: 447.023 padaṃ hi mūḍhasya visṛṣṭadehaṃ suvītarāgasya padaṃ tvihedṛśam/
S01divyav_u:19355: 447.029 śrutvā ca punaḥ punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--eṣa te bhavati huhiturjāmāturutkāśanaśabda iti/
S01divyav_u:19357: 447.031 rakto naro bhavati hi gadadasvaro dviṣṭo naro bhavati hi khakkhaṭāsvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:19358: 448.001 [448]mūḍho naro hi bhavati samākulasvaro buddho hyayaṃ brāhmaṇadundubhisvaraḥ/
S01divyav_u:19359: 448.003 nāsau bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//3//
S01divyav_u:19363: 448.007 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate sma--eṣa te bhavati duhiturjāmātā nirīkṣata iti/
S01divyav_u:19365: 448.009 rakto naro bhavati hi cañcalekṣaṇo dviṣṭo bhujagaghoraviṣo yathekṣate/
S01divyav_u:19366: 448.011 mūḍo naraḥ saṃtamasīva paśyati dvijavītarāgo yugamātradarśī/
S01divyav_u:19367: 448.013 na eṣa bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//7//
S01divyav_u:19371: 448.017 dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ patnīmāmantrayate--eṣa duhiturjāmātā caṃkramyata iti/
S01divyav_u:19373: 448.018 yathāsya tetre ca yathāvalekitam yathāsya kāle sthita eva gacchataḥ/
S01divyav_u:19374: 448.020 yathaiva padmaṃ stimite jale 'sya netraṃ viśiṣṭe vadane virājate/
S01divyav_u:19375: 448.022 na eṣa bhartā bhajate kumārikāṃ nivarta yāsyāmaḥ svakaṃ niveśanam//8//
S01divyav_u:19376: 448.024 amaṅgale sākalike tvaṃ maṅgalakāle vadase hyamaṅgalam/
S01divyav_u:19377: 448.026 saceddrutaṃ samadhikṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati punarapyayaṃ kāmaguṇeṣu raṃsyate//9//
S01divyav_u:19380: 448.030 dharmo munīnāṃ hi sanātano hyayamapatyamutpāditavān sanātanaḥ//10//
S01divyav_u:19383: 449.003 imāṃ bhagavān paśyatu me sūtāṃ satīṃ rūpopapannāṃ pramadāmalaṃkṛtām/
S01divyav_u:19384: 449.005 kāmārthinīm yadbhavate pradīyate sahānayā sādhurivācaratāṃ bhavān/
S01divyav_u:19387: sthānametadvidyate yadanupamā rāgeṇa svinnā kālaṃ kurvāṇā bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:19388: 449.009 tattasyāḥ pratighavacanaṃ brūyāmiti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:19389: 449.011 dṛṣṭā mayā mārasutā hi vipra tṛṣṇā na me nāpi tathā ratiśca/
S01divyav_u:19391: 449.014 tasmādimāṃ mūtrapurīṣapūrṇāṃ praṣṭuṃ hi yattāmapi notsaheyam//12//
S01divyav_u:19393: 449.017 sutāmimāṃ paśyasi kiṃ madīyāṃ hīnāṅginīṃ rūpaguṇairviyuktām/
S01divyav_u:19394: 449.019 chandaṃ na yenātra karoṣi cārau viviktabhāveṣviva kāmabhogī//13// iti/
S01divyav_u:19396: 449.022 yasmādihārthī viṣayeṣu mūṭaḥ sa prārthayedvipra sutāṃ tavemām/
S01divyav_u:19398: 449.026 ahaṃ tu buddho munisattamaḥ kṛtī prāptā mayā bodhiranuttarā śivā/
S01divyav_u:19399: 449.028 padmam yathā vārikaṇairaliptaṃ carāmi loke 'nupalipta eva//15//
S01divyav_u:19400: 449.030 nīlāmbujaṃ kardamavārimadhye yathā ca paṅkena va nopaliptam/
S01divyav_u:19401: 449.032 tathā hyahaṃ brāhmaṇa lokamadhye carāmi kāmeṣu viviktah {eva}//16// iti/
S01divyav_u:19402: 450.001 athānupamā bhagavatā mūtrapurīṣavādena samudācaritā vītaharṣā durmanāḥ saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:19410: 450.007 ratā vayaṃ hi pramadāmalaṃkṛtāṃ bhokṣyāmahe ghīra yathānulomam//17// iti/
S01divyav_u:19414: 450.011 idaṃ ca te pātramidaṃ ca cīvaram yaṣṭiśca kuṇḍī ca vrajantu niṣṭhām/
S01divyav_u:19415: 450.013 imāṃ ca śikṣāṃ svayameva dhāraya dhātrī yathā hyaṅkagataṃ kumārakam//18// iti/
S01divyav_u:19416: 450.015 evamukte sa mahallaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya mahānanāryo 'yamiti matvā yena mākandikaḥ parivrājakastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19421: 450.018 evamuktasya mākandikasya parivrājakasyāntike tādṛśaṃ paryavasthānamupannam yenoṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālagato narakeṣūpapannaḥ//
S01divyav_u:19422: 450.020 tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:19425: yathā atīte 'pyadhvanyeṣā mayā labhyamānā na pratigṛhītā/
S01divyav_u:19431: 450.025 ayaskāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--mayaiṣā duhitā na kasyacit kulena dātavyā,
S01divyav_u:19433: api tu yo mama śilpena samo 'bhyadhiko vā,
S01divyav_u:19435: 450.027 yāavadanyatamo māṇavo bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19439: sā kathayati--yadā jātāhaṃ tadaiva matpitaivāṅgīkṛtya vadati--duṣkaramasau māṃ kasyaciddāsyati/
S01divyav_u:19448: 451.001 [451]tenāyaskārabhāṇḍikām yācitvā anyatra gṛhe susūkṣmāḥ sūcyo ghaṭitāḥ,
S01divyav_u:19450: 451.002 ekā ca mahatī ghaṭitā yasyāṃ sapta sūcyaḥ pratikṣiptāḥ saha tayā plavante/
S01divyav_u:19460: 451.010 sacetpitā te jānīyācchilpaṃ mama hi yādṛśam/
S01divyav_u:19461: 451.011 tvāṃ caivānuprayaccheta anyacca vipratam (vipulam?) dhanam//21// iti/
S01divyav_u:19482: evaṃ dvitīyāṃ tṛtīyām yāvat saptasūcīṃ prakṣipya prakṣiptāstathāpi plotumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19485_0: iti viditvā tāṃ dārikāṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāṃ kṛtvā vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena
S01divyav_u:19485_1: pāṇinā bhṛṅgārakamādāya māṇavasya purataḥ sthitvā kathayati--imāṃ te 'haṃ māṇavaka
S01divyav_u:19487: kiṃ tu tavaiva madāpanayaḥ kartavya iti mayā śilpamupadarśitamiti//
S01divyav_u:19489: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:19491: eṣa eva mākandikastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:19493: eṣaivāsau mākandikabhāryā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:19498: 451.029 punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--paśya bhadanta ayaṃ mahallako 'nupamāmāgamyānayena vyasanamāpanna iti/
S01divyav_u:19499: 451.030 bhagavānāha--bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'pyadhvanyeṣa anupamāmāgamya sāntaḥpuro 'nayena vyasanamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19501_0: 452.001 [452]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ siṃhakalpāyāṃ siṃhakesarī nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
S01divyav_u:19501_1: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanaṃ pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati /
S01divyav_u:19502: 452.002 tena khalu samayena siṃhakalpāyāṃ siṃhako nāma sārthavāhaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigrahaḥ pūrvavadyāvattena kalatramānītam/
S01divyav_u:19505: 452.005 sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā/
S01divyav_u:19506: dārako jātah abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇah chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhurvidtīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṇa saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19507: 452.007 tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṃśatiṃ divasān vistareṇa tasya jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate--kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti?
S01divyav_u:19508: jñātaya ūcuh--ayaṃ dārakaḥ siṃhasya sārthavahasya putraḥ/
S01divyav_u:19511: 452.010 siṃhalo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ pūrvavadyāvadaṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu ghaṭako vācakaḥ piṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19512: 452.011 tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikam/
S01divyav_u:19518: tāvatprabhūtaṃ me dhanajātamasti yadi tvaṃ tilataṇḍulakulatthādiparibhogena ratnāni me paribhokṣyase,
S01divyav_u:19519: tathāpi me bhogā na tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gamiṣyanti/
S01divyav_u:19526: 452.017 sa tenāvaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā uktah--putra, evaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:19528: tena siṃhakalpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ siṃhakalpanivāsino vaṇijo nānādeśābhyāgatāśca/
S01divyav_u:19530: yo yuṣmākamutsahate siṃhalena sārthavāhena sārdhamaśulkenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudramavatartum,
S01divyav_u:19533_2: prabhūtaṃ mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyamādāya pañcabhirvaṇikśataiḥ saparivāraḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S01divyav_u:19544: 452.030 sā saṃtrastā kathayati--yadi yuṣmākameṣa nirbandho māṃ dhariṣyatha ānayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:19547: sā paramabhīṣaṇarūpamabhinirmāya laghuladhveva gatvā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya purato gatvā sthitā/
S01divyav_u:19553: 453.003 tasya mahāsamudramadhyagatasya makareṇa matsyajātena yānapātraṃ bhagnam/
S01divyav_u:19569: sāpi rākṣasī svayamatīvarūpayauvanasampannamahāsundarīmānuṣīrūpamāsthāya siṃhalasadṛśanirviśeṣasundaraṃ putraṃ nirmāya taṃ putramādāya siṃhakalpāṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptā/
S01divyav_u:19573: jñāyantāmayaṃ dārakaḥ siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya putra iti/
S01divyav_u:19581: ahaṃ tāmradvīparājasya duhitā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya bhāryārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:19617: ahaṃ tāmradvīpakasya rājño duhitā siṃhalasya sārthavāhasya bhārvārthaṃ dattā/
S01divyav_u:19618: 453.026 tasya mahāsamudramadhyagatasya makareṇa matsyajātena yānapātraṃ bhagnam/
S01divyav_u:19622: tadarhasi deva tameva siṃhalaṃ sārthavāhaṃ kṣamāpayitumarhasi/
S01divyav_u:19643: 454.002 yāvadapareṇa samayena rājñaḥ sāntaḥpurasyāsvāpanaṃ datvā tāsāṃ rākṣasīnāṃ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--bhaginyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:19653: eṣa śabdaḥ siṃhakalpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ samantato visṛtah--rājadvāraṃ na mucyate/
S01divyav_u:19685: sa kathayati--samayena pratīcchāmi yadi mama vacanānusāriṇo bhavatha/
S01divyav_u:19688: taurasau nagaraśobhāṃ kṛtvā mahatā satkāreṇa rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19689: 454.022 tena nānādeśanivāsino vidyāvādikā āhūya bhūyasyā mātrayā vidyā śikṣitā,
S01divyav_u:19692: 454.025 siṃhalo rājā caturaṅgādbalakāyādvaravarāṅgān hastino 'śvān rathān manuṣyāśca vahaneṣvaropya tāmradvīpaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19703: 454.031 avaśiṣṭāḥ siṃhalasya rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti--deva,
S01divyav_u:19712: 455.002 siṃhalenāpi rājñā āvāsitamiti siṃhaladvīpaḥ siṃhaladvīpa iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā//
S01divyav_u:19714: ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:19716: eṣa eva sa mahallastena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:19724: strī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā udyāne tiṣṭhati/
S01divyav_u:19725: 455.010 devasyaiṣā yogyeti śrutvā rājā tadudyānaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:19739: pañca ca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dine dine gandhamālyanimittam/
S01divyav_u:19741: 455.016 tena khalu punaḥ samayenodayanasya rājñastrayo 'grāmātyā yogandharāyaṇo ghoṣilo mākandika iti/
S01divyav_u:19742: 455.017 yāvadapareṇa samayena udayanasya rājñaḥ puruṣa upasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19758: yāvadapareṇa samayena rājā udayanaḥ śyāmāvatī anupamā caikasmin sthāne tiṣṭhanti/
S01divyav_u:19771: yadā devaḥ śyāmāvatī ahaṃ ca rahasi tiṣṭhema,
S01divyav_u:19774: tayā teṣāṃ rahasyavasthitānāṃ sopānake kāṃsikā pātitā/
S01divyav_u:19776: 455.030 anupamā namo devasyetyuktvā kathayati--devasya santakaṃ bhavatī bhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:19782: 455.032 rājā udayana ekasmin divase śyāmāvatyā sakāśam [456]bhuṅkte,
S01divyav_u:19784: 456.001 rājñā śākunikasyājñā dattā--yasmin divase śyāmāvatyā bhojanavāraḥ,
S01divyav_u:19785: tasmin divase jīvantaḥ kapiṃjalā ānetavyā iti/
S01divyav_u:19803: yadyasāvucyate śramaṇasya gautamasyārthāya sādhayeti sāmprataṃ saparivārā sādhayet/
S01divyav_u:19811: śākunikena gatvā rājñe niveditam--sā deva saparivārā udyukteti/
S01divyav_u:19816: devasya na kalpate iti kuta etat?
S01divyav_u:19819: aparayā śyāmāvatyā niveditam--devo 'tyarthaṃ paryavasthito dhanuḥ pūrayitvā āgacchati, kṣamayeti/
S01divyav_u:19823: 456.018 rājñā ā karṇāddhanuḥ pūrayitvā śaraḥ kṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19831: 456.020 rājā vinītaḥ kathayati--tvaṃ devī nāgī yakṣiṇī gandharvī kinnarī mahoragīti?
S01divyav_u:19847: anupamā saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ rājā maya sārthaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ pratyanubhavati/
S01divyav_u:19848: 456.028 śyāmāvatyā navaiḥ phalair navaiḥ sasyakair navartukaiḥ kārāṃ karoti/
S01divyav_u:19850: 456.029 sā ca tasyāḥ praghātanāya randhrānveṣaṇatatparā avasthitā/
S01divyav_u:19859: 457.001 tena kauśāmbyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--yo mama vijite kaścicchastropajīvī prativasati,
S01divyav_u:19865: 457.004 rājñā mākandikaḥ sthāpita uktaśca--śyāmāvatyā yogodvahanaṃ kartavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:19872: 457.007 śakyamanena sahāyena vairaniryātanaṃ kartumiti viditvā kathayati--nānujānīṣe śyāmāvatī kā mama bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:19880: yāvat trirapyahaṃ rājñā siṃdiṣṭah--śyāmāvatyā yogodvāhanaṃ kariṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:19885: yaḥ sapatnyāḥ sakāśe atīva snehaṃ karoti?
S01divyav_u:19897: 457.017 api tvetā dārikā rātrau pradīpena buddhavacanaṃ paṭhanti,
S01divyav_u:19898: atra bhūrjena prayojanaṃ tailena masinā kalamayā tulena/
S01divyav_u:19912: kauśāmbyām yantrakarācāryaḥ kathayati--ahamenaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantam yantreṇānyasthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:19919: 457.029 naivāntarikṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
S01divyav_u:19920: 457.031 na vidyate pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//22// iti/
S01divyav_u:19923: 458.003 ājñātāni ca satyāni kṛtaṃ buddhasya śāsanam//23// iti/
S01divyav_u:19925: iti tatra śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatāni dagdhāni/
S01divyav_u:19927: mākandikena teṣāṃ pañcānāṃ strīśatānāṃ kalevarāṇi śmaśāne choritāni/
S01divyav_u:19930: 458.008 atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya kauśāmbīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan/
S01divyav_u:19931: 458.009 aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ kauśāmbīnagare udayanasya vatsarājasya janapadān gatasya antaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni/
S01divyav_u:19932_0: 458.010 śrutvā ca punaḥ kauśāmbīṃ piṇḍāya praviśyā caritvā pratikramya punaryena
S01divyav_u:19932_1: bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntā etadūcuh--aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo kauśāmbīṃ
S01divyav_u:19932_2: piṇḍāya caranta udayanasya vatsarājasyāntaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni
S01divyav_u:19933: 458.014 bhagavānāha--bahu bhikṣavastena mohapuruṣeṇāpuṇyaṃ prasūtam yenodayanasya vatsarājasya janapadagatasyāntaḥpuramagninā dagdhaṃ pañcamātrāṇi strīśatāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni/
S01divyav_u:19934: 458.015 kiṃ cāpi bhikṣavastena mohapuruṣeṇa bahvapuṇyaṃ prasūtam,
S01divyav_u:19935: api tu na tā durgatiṃ gatāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19938: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāḥ pañcānāmavarabhāgīyānāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇādupapādukāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19941: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāstrayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇādrāgadveṣamohānāṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā sakṛdāgāminyaḥ,
S01divyav_u:19944_0: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāstrayāṇāṃ samyojanānāṃ prahāṇācchrotāpannā avinipātadharmiṇyo
S01divyav_u:19944_1: niyatasamādhiparāyaṇāḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparamāḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃśca manuṣyāṃśca saṃdhāvya
S01divyav_u:19946: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yāḥ svajīvitahetorapi śikṣāṃ na vyatikrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19948: santi tasminnantaḥpure striyo yā mamāntike prasannacittālaṃkāraṃ kṛtvā kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapannāḥ/
S01divyav_u:19950: āgamyata bhikṣavo yena śyāmāvatīpramukhānāṃ pañcastrīśatānāṃ kalevarāṇi/
S01divyav_u:19952: atha khalu bhagavān saṃbahulairbhikṣubhiḥ sārdham yena tāsāṃ pañcānāṃ strīśatāṇāṃ kalevarāṇi tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19953: 458.030 upasaṃkramya bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--etāni bhikṣavastāni pañcaśatakalevarāṇi yatra udayano vatsarājo raktaḥ sakto gṛddho grathito mūrcchito 'dhyavasāyamāpannaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19958: 459.003 asatsaditi paśyanti paśyatāṃ nāsti kiṃcana//24// iti/
S01divyav_u:19960: yaddagdhasthūṇāyāmapi cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ prāgeva savijñānake kāye/
S01divyav_u:19977: pañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇalakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānam/
S01divyav_u:19978: 459.013 paṭe lekhayata puṣpadantaprāsādam yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime ca bhūrjabhāge 'gniḥ prakṣiptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19982: 459.016 yathā yantrakalācārya āgatya kathayati--dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti/
S01divyav_u:19986_1: pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ kauśāmbyadhiṣṭhānaṃ paṭe
S01divyav_u:19987: 459.020 yathā mākandikena bhūrjaṃ kalamā tailaṃ tūlamasirapaścime bhūrjabhārake 'gniḥ prakṣipto yathā dvārako 'ṣṭhake prajvālitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:19990: 459.023 yathā yantrakalācārya āgatah--ahamenaṃ dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ jvalantamanyat sthānaṃ saṃkramayāmīti,
S01divyav_u:19994: 459.025 tato 'priyākhyāyino 'mātyānāṃ lekho 'nupreṣito rājña īdṛśo 'nartha utpanno 'hamasyānenopāyena nivedayiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:19996: 459.027 sa teṣāṃ lekhāṃ lekhayitvā caturaṅgabalakāyayukto 'nyatamasmin pradeśe gatvāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20001: yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena niyoktumityevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:20002: no cetpañcahastinīśatāni pañcāśvaśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:20003: 459.032 rājña udayanasya sa kārvaṭiko balavān saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:20007: 460.002 etattasyaivaṃ likhitam--mamaivaṃnāmā kārvaṭikaḥ saṃnāmaṃ na gacchati/
S01divyav_u:20013: sa saṃlakṣayati--ekena tāvadahaṃ rājñā daśa diśo viśrāntaḥ,
S01divyav_u:20016: 460.006 sa kaṇṭhe 'siṃ baddhvā nirgatya rājña udayanasya pādayor nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20018: 460.007 athasāvapriyākhyāyī rājalīlayā rājña udayanasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--deva,
S01divyav_u:20022: yadi tāvattvaṃ śaknoṣi yuddhena nirjetumiyevaṃ kuśalam,
S01divyav_u:20023: no cetpañcahastiśatāni pañcahastinīśatāni pañcavaḍavāśatāni pañcakumāraśatāni pañcakumārikāśatāni suvarṇasya lakṣaṃ datvā tamāneṣyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:20030: rājā paṭaṃ nirīkṣya marmavedhaviddha iva ruṣyamāṇaḥ kathayati--bhoḥ kim?
S01divyav_u:20032: kiṃ kathayasi śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dagdhānīti?
S01divyav_u:20033: sa paṭṭaṃ mauliṃ cāpanīya gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:20034: 460.016 nāhaṃ narendro na narendraputraḥ pādopajīvī tava deva mṛtyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20039: ayaṃ mākandikaḥ puṣpadantaṃ prāsādaṃ bhūrjādinā prayogeṇa dahati,
S01divyav_u:20040: imāni śyāmāvatīpramukhāni pañca strīśatānyagninā dahyamānānyutplutya nipatitānīti/
S01divyav_u:20043: deva, nāhaṃ kathayāmi api tu deva eva kathayati/
S01divyav_u:20046: anyathā te mayāsinā nikṛntitamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitamanvabhavisyadityutkvā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20055: tato yogandharāyaṇasyājñā dattā--gaccha mākandikamanupamayā saha yantragṛhe prakṣipya dahyatām/
S01divyav_u:20056: 460.029 tato yogandharāyaṇena suguptaṃ bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20064: tvayāpyanupamayā saparivārayā sārdhaṃ mayā pravrajitavyaṃ jātamiti/
S01divyav_u:20066: ityarthameva mayā asau bhūmigṛhe prakṣipya sthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:20071: 461.002 nūnamanayā parapuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ paricāritamiti viditvā kathayati--anupame,
S01divyav_u:20080: api tu kiṃ navaśavāyā arthe bhagavantaṃ pravakṣyāmi,
S01divyav_u:20081: śyāmāvatyā arthe pravakṣyāmīti viditvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20082: 461.006 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20083: udayano vatsarājo bhagavantamidamavocat--kiṃ bhadanta śyāmāvatīpramukhaiḥ pañcabhiḥ strīśataiḥ karma kṛtam yenāgninā dagdhāni?
S01divyav_u:20085: 461.008 bhagavānāha--ābhireva mahārāṭ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
S01divyav_u:20086: 461.010 bhūtapūrvaṃ mahārāja vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryā brahmadatto rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:20087: 461.011 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:20110: sa tāsāmanukampārthaṃ tata evākāśamutplutya tapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20112: 461.023 tā mūlanikṛntita iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamayitumārabdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:20116: 461.025 tāni tasmin kārāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kārtumārabdhāh--yadasmābhirevaṃ sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:20122: 461.028 kiṃ manyase mahārāja tadā sāsau rājño brahmadattasyāgramahiṣī,
S01divyav_u:20123: eṣaiva sā śyāmāvatī tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:20125: etānyeva tāni pañca strīśatāni tāni tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:20127: eṣaivāsau kubjottarā tena kālena tena samayena/
S01divyav_u:20129: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣāṇi narakeṣu patkā yāvadetarhyapi dṛṣṭasatyā agninā dagdhāḥ/
S01divyav_u:20132: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ pūrvavadyāvadevamābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20134: 462.003 atrodayano vatsarājo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinindyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikātprakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20135: 462.005 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena kubjā saṃvṛttā?
S01divyav_u:20136: bhagavānāha--kubjottarayaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvad phalanti khalu dehinām/
S01divyav_u:20137: 462.008 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati pūrvavadyāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati/
S01divyav_u:20139: rājñā vārāṇasyāmevaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--yasya dvādaśavārṣikaṃ bhaktamasti,
S01divyav_u:20141: 462.010 yasya nāsti tenānyatra gantavyamiti yataḥ kolenāgantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:20142: 462.011 tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ saṃdhāno nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ pūrvavadyāvad vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī/
S01divyav_u:20144: bhaviṣyati mama saparivārasya dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti?
S01divyav_u:20147: 462.014 asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante pūrvavadyāvadbhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:20148: vinyasya pravrajitasahasrasya mama dvādaśa varṣāṇi bhaktamiti/
S01divyav_u:20159: sā pṛṣṭhaṃ vināmayitvā kathayati--tāta, īdṛśa iti/
S01divyav_u:20162: 462.021 punarapi bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta,
S01divyav_u:20163: kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena śrutadharāa jāteti?
S01divyav_u:20164: bhagavānāha--tena kālena tena samayena pratyekabuddhānām yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ sa vāyvādhikaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20166: tasya saṃdhānaduhitrā hastāt kaṭānavatārya sa pratyekabuddha uktah--ārya,
S01divyav_u:20172: evameva mamāpi saṃtāne ye dharmāḥ praviśeyuḥ,
S01divyav_u:20174: 462.026 yattayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena śrutadharā saṃvṛtā//
S01divyav_u:20175: 462.028 punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta kubjottarayā karma kṛtam yena dāsīsaṃvṛtteti?
S01divyav_u:20178: 462.031 punarapi bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta anupamayā karma yadeṣā nirāhārā bhūmigṛhe sthāpitā amlānagātrī cotthitā/
S01divyav_u:20179: 462.032 bhagavānāha--anupamayaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām//
S01divyav_u:20180: 463.001 [463]bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin karvaṭake dve dārike anyonyasaṃstutike kṣatriyadārikā brāhmaṇadārikā ca/
S01divyav_u:20181: 463.002 asti buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:20183: 463.004 aparasmin divase pūrvāhṇe nivāsya piṇḍārthī pracalitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20187: ekā ghoṣilasya gṛhapaterduhitā jātā mahāsundarī śrīmatī nāma/
S01divyav_u:20188: 463.006 ekasmin samaye rājñā dṛṣṭā pṛṣṭā ca--kasyeyaṃ kanyā?
S01divyav_u:20198: udayanena vatsarājenāntaḥpuraṃ praveśya mahatā śrīsamudayena pariṇītā/
S01divyav_u:20201: 463.011 sa kathayati--ākāṅkṣase kiṃ tu bhikṣavo rājakulaṃ praviśānti/
S01divyav_u:20204: adyāgreṇa na bhokṣye na pāsya iti/
S01divyav_u:20216: 463.017 tato bhūri karma kārayitvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20217: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20218: 463.018 ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ ghoṣilaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:20219: 463.019 anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tuṣṇīm/
S01divyav_u:20220_0: 463.020 atha ghoṣilo gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādyena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat--adhivāsayatu
S01divyav_u:20220_1: me bhagavāñchvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena mama nimantritaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
S01divyav_u:20222: sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālāṃ manyata iti/
S01divyav_u:20225: 463.024 pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairbuddhā bhagavanta aupadhike tiṣṭhanti--abhinirhṛtaṃ manrtayate sma/
S01divyav_u:20230: 463.027 sa praviśya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20231: atha śrīmatī devī sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ śāriputrapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā pūrvavadyāvannīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā purastānniṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya/
S01divyav_u:20232: 463.029 athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ devīṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati/
S01divyav_u:20243: 464.003 tena tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ ca prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:20244: yāṃ śrutvā śrīmatyā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ pūrvavadyāvatsarvaṃ vādyaṃ triśaraṇagamabhiprasannam/
S01divyav_u:20245: 464.005 athāyuṣmāñchāriputraḥ śrīmatīṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya prakrānto yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20246: 464.006 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20247: ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñchāriputra etatprakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavate vistaraṇārocayati/
S01divyav_u:20256: 464.010 atha bhagavāñchikṣākāmatayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā pūrvavadyāvat pūrvikā prajñaptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20258_0: yaḥ punarbhikṣuranirgatāyāṃ rajanyāmanudgate 'ruṇe anirhṛteṣu ratneṣu ratnasaṃmateṣu
S01divyav_u:20258_1: vā rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya indrakīlaṃ vā idrakīlasāmantaṃ vā samatikrāmedanyatra
S01divyav_u:20267: 464.017 ratneṣu veti ratnānyucyante maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaṃ pūrvavadyāvaddakṣiṇāvartaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20268: 464.018 ratnasaṃmateṣu veti ratnasaṃmatamucyate sarvaṃ saṃgrāmāvacaraśastraṃ sarvaṃ ca gandharvāvacaraṃ bhāṇḍam/
S01divyav_u:20269: 464.019 rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasyeti vā rājye stryapi rājyābhiṣikeṇābhiṣiktā bhavati,
S01divyav_u:20271: 464.020 kṣatriyo 'pi brāhmaṇo 'pi vaiśyo 'pi śūdro 'pi rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣikto bhavati rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhnābhiṣiktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20287: 464.027 bhikṣuraprabhāte aprabhātasaṃjñī antaḥpurendrakīlam asmatikrāmati āpadyate pāpāntikam/
S01divyav_u:20291: anāpattih--rājā śabdayati--devyaḥ kumārā āmātyā aṣṭānāmantarāyāṇāmantyatamānyatamamupathitaṃ bhavati rājā cauramanuṣyāmanuṣyavyālāgnyudakānām/
S01divyav_u:20296: 465.002 buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe/
S01divyav_u:20300: roruke mahānagare rudrāyaṇo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:20307: 465.007 rājagṛhe rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:20316: asti kasyacidanyasyāpi rājña evamavidhā janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāṣca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāśca?
S01divyav_u:20320: te vaṇijaḥ kathayanti--asti deva pūrvadeśe rājagṛhaṃ nagaram/
S01divyav_u:20321: 465.014 tatra rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:20330: 465.019 tena tasya ratnānāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:20332: 465.020 yadā tava kiṃcid roruke nagare karaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
S01divyav_u:20335: te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:20337: taiḥ sā ratnapeṭā rājño bimbisārasyopanāmitā lekhaśca/
S01divyav_u:20338: rājā bimbisāro lekhaṃ vācayitvā amātyānāmantrayate--kiṃ bhavantastadrājño durlabham?
S01divyav_u:20342: tena tasya mahārhāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ vastrāṇāṃ peṭāṃ pūrayitvā prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ lekhaśca dattah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:20347: 465.027 te taṃ prābhṛtamādāya yena rorukaṃ tena prakrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:20349: 465.028 taiḥ sā vastrapeṭā rājño rudtāyaṇasyopanāmitā lekhaṣca/
S01divyav_u:20355: api tu sa rājā svayaṃ prahartā/
S01divyav_u:20357: rudrāyaṇasya rājño maṇivarma pañcāṅgepetośītam uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śootasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:20359: idaṃ mayā ca tava maṇivarma prābhṛtamanupreṣitaṃ pañcāṅgopetaṃ śīte uṣṇasaṃsparśamuṣṇe śītasaṃsparśaṃ duśchedaṃ durbhedaṃ viṣaghnamavabhāsātmakam/
S01divyav_u:20369: 466.006 dharmatā khalu yasya na śakyate mūlyaṃ kartum,
S01divyav_u:20371: 466.007 rājā bimbisāro vyathitaḥ kathayati--kiṃ mayā tasya prābhṛtamanupreṣitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:20376: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20377: 466.010 rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--roruke bhadanta nagare rājā rudrāyaṇo nāma prativasati mamādṛṣṭasakhā/
S01divyav_u:20411: 466.029 asya tvayā ardhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyam/
S01divyav_u:20413: 466.031 vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvodghāṭayitavyam/
S01divyav_u:20415: 466.032 rājñā bimbisāreṇa yathāsaṃdiṣṭaṃ lekho likhitvā saṃpreṣitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20420: kīdṛśaṃ mama tena prabhṛtamanupreṣitam yasya satkāraḥ kartavyo bhaviṣyati?
S01divyav_u:20425: 467.004 na śakyaṃ tena yadvā tadvā pratiprābhṛtamanupreṣayitum/
S01divyav_u:20432: 467.007 vistīrṇāvakāśe pradeśe sthāpayitvā mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvoddhāṭitā/
S01divyav_u:20434: 467.008 tairbuddhapratimāṃ dṛṣṭvā ekaraveṇa nādo muktah--namo buddhāyeti/
S01divyav_u:20435: 467.009 tasya buddha ityaśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇyāhṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:20436: sa kathayati--ka eṣa bhavanto buddho nāma?
S01divyav_u:20438: śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'sti himavatpārśve nadyā bhāgīrathyāstīre kapilasya ṛṣerāśramapadasya nātidūre/
S01divyav_u:20441: rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgairvijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:20443: tadyathā--cakraratnaṃ hastiratnamaśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam/
S01divyav_u:20444: 467.014 pūrṇaṃ cāsya bhaviṣyati sahasraṃ putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām/
S01divyav_u:20445: 467.015 sa imāmeva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthvīṃkhilāmalaṇṭakāmanutpīḍāmadaṇḍenāśastreṇa dharmeṇa śamenābhinirjitya adhyāvasiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:20446: 467.016 sacet keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:20455: 467.021 atha rudrāyaṇo rājā sāmātyaḥ pratyūṣasamaye sarvārthān sarvakarmāntān pratiprasrabhya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya ṛjukāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya/
S01divyav_u:20458: asyotpādādidamutpadyate yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavati/
S01divyav_u:20459: 467.024 tenemaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādamanulomapratilomaṃ vyavalokayatā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:20468: anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:20471: atha sa rājā bimbisāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20472: 468.001 [468]upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20473: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhadanta rājñā satyāni dṛṣṭāni/
S01divyav_u:20475: 468.003 bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katamasya bhikṣo rudrāyaṇo rājā saparivāro vineyo rairukanivāsī ca janakāyah?
S01divyav_u:20477: 468.004 tatra bhgavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamāmantrayate--samanvāhara kātyāyana rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇaṃ rājānaṃ saparivāraṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam/
S01divyav_u:20480: 468.007 athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastasyā eva rātryā atyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:20481_1: paribhuktaṃ śayanaṃ pratiśāmya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivāro yena raurukaṃ
S01divyav_u:20485: 468.012 asya tvayārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
S01divyav_u:20494: yena ekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa rorukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20499: 468.019 ayuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20503: tata āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanena tasyāḥ pariṣada āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:20511: 468.026 yadbhūyasā sā pariṣadbuddhaniṃnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthāpitā//
S01divyav_u:20512: 468.027 rauruke nagare tiṣyaḥ puṣyaśca gṛhapatī vasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:20514: 468.028 upasaṃkramya āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau/
S01divyav_u:20515: 468.029 tiṣyapuṣyau gṛhapatī āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanamidamavocatām--labhevahi āryamahākātyāyana svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:20519_0: tābhyām yujyamānābhyāṃ vyāyacchamānābhyāṃ ghaṭamānābhyāmidameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ
S01divyav_u:20521: 469.004 sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyau mānyavabhivādyau ca saṃvṛttau/
S01divyav_u:20522: tau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtau/
S01divyav_u:20523: 469.006 tayorjñātṛbhiḥ śarīrapūjāṃ kṛrtvā dvau stūpau kāritau--ekastiṣyasya,
S01divyav_u:20525_0: 469.007 rudrāyaṇo rājā dine dine āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyāntikād dharmaṃ śrutvā antaḥpurasyārocayati--āryo
S01divyav_u:20525_1: mahākātyāyano madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudramiva madhuraṃ praprīṇayatīti /
S01divyav_u:20530: kathaṃ vayaṃ tatra gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇumah?
S01divyav_u:20533: 469.011 rudrāyaṇena rājñā āyuṣmān mahākātyāyana uktah--mama ārya sāntaḥpuramicchati śrotum/
S01divyav_u:20542: 469.016 bimbisāro rājā taṃ lekhaṃ vācayitvā yena bhagvāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20543: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20544: 469.017 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā bimbisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--rudrāyaṇena bhagavan rājñā lekho 'nupreṣitah--antaḥpuramicchati dharmaṃ śrotum/
S01divyav_u:20547: bhagavān saṃlakṣayati--katarasyā bhikṣuṇyā rudrāyaṇasya rājño antaḥpuraparijano vineyo raurukanivāsī ca strījana iti?
S01divyav_u:20549: 469.021 tatra bhagavāñchailāṃ bhikṣuṇīmāmantrayate--samanvāhara śaile rauruke nagare rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpurajanaṃ raurukanivāsinaṃ strījanamiti/
S01divyav_u:20550: 469.022 evaṃ bhadanteti śailā bhikṣuṇī bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā/
S01divyav_u:20551_0: 469.024 atha śailā bhikṣuṇī tasyā eva rātrertyayātpūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya
S01divyav_u:20551_1: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhakrakṛtyā pañcādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntā yathāparibhuktaṃ
S01divyav_u:20551_2: śayanāsanaṃ pratisamayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ pañcaśataparivārā yena raurukaṃ nagaraṃ
S01divyav_u:20552: 469.027 bimbisāreṇa ca rājñā rudrāyaṇasya rājño lekho 'nupreṣitah--priyavayasya,
S01divyav_u:20553: eṣā te mayā mahāśrāvikā śāstrānugatā pañcaśataparivārā preṣitā/
S01divyav_u:20554: 469.028 asyāṃ tvayārdharṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kartavyā nagaraśobhā ca/
S01divyav_u:20556: abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kārayitavyāni,
S01divyav_u:20561: 469.032 rudrāyaṇena rājñā lekhaṃ vācayitvā prāmodyajātenārdhatṛtīyāni yojanāni mārgaśobhā kāritā/
S01divyav_u:20562: 470.001 anekajanasahasraparivāreṇa ca svayameva pratyudgamya mahatā satkāreṇa raurukaṃ nagaraṃ praveśitā/
S01divyav_u:20563: 470.002 abhyantare ca nagarasya pañca vihāraśatāni kāritāni,
S01divyav_u:20566: 470.003 śailā bhikṣuṇī rudrāyaṇasya rājño 'ntaḥpuraṃ praviśya dine dinai dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:20569: 470.005 yāvadapareṇa samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā vīṇāṃ vādayati,
S01divyav_u:20578: 470.008 api tu mayā tava nṛtyantyā vināśalakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭam--saptame divase tava kālatriyā bhavatīti/
S01divyav_u:20579: 470.009 candraprabhā devī pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva yadyevam,
S01divyav_u:20591: sā rudrāyaṇena rājñā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ samarpitā--āryacandraptabhā devī ākāṅkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikcuṇībhāvam/
S01divyav_u:20598: sā saptame divase kālagatā cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannā/
S01divyav_u:20599: 470.018 dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya,
S01divyav_u:20609: tasyā etadabhavat--tadapratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitum/
S01divyav_u:20612: 470.026 bhagavatā tasyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:20613: yāṃ śrutvā candraprabhayā devakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃsatkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā śrotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:20615: na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭair nasvajanabandhuvargair na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:20625: 471.007 prāptaṃ ca śāntaṃ padamāryakāntaṃ tīrṇaśca duḥkhārṇavapāramasmi//5//
S01divyav_u:20628: 471.013 avanamya tataḥ pralambahārā caraṇau dvāvabhivandya jāraharṣā/
S01divyav_u:20629: 471.015 parigamya pradakṣiṇaṃ jitāriṃ suralokābhimukhī divaṃ jagāma//7//
