S01divyav_u:20634: yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśāmāgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svarbhavanaṃ saṃprasthitā/
S01divyav_u:20636: 471.020 atha candraprabhā devakanyā yena rājā rudrāyaṇastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:20637: tena khalu samayena rudrāyaṇo rājā ekākī gṛhasyoparitalake śayitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20638: 471.021 sa tayā udārāvabhāsaṃ kṛtvā acchaṭāśabdena pratibodhitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20651: tatra te mayā sārdhaṃ samāgamo bhaviṣyati/
S01divyav_u:20653: rudrāyaṇo rājā kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ pravrajyāmanuvicintayan kālyamevotthāya amātyānāmantrayate--paśyata bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:20657: 471.029 rudrāyaṇaḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ devatācodito 'ham agāramadhyāvaseyam/
S01divyav_u:20659: 471.031 yannvahaṃ śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajeyamiti/
S01divyav_u:20661: yādṛśa eva mama śikhaṇḍī kumāraḥ putraḥ,
S01divyav_u:20663: 472.001 sa eṣa yuvābhyāmahitānnivārayitavyo hite ca saṃniyojayitavyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20667: yathaiva tvaṃ mama vacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyase,
S01divyav_u:20668: tathā anayorapi hirubhirukayoragrāmātyayorvacanaṃ śrotavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyathāḥ/
S01divyav_u:20671: tato rudrāyaṇena rājñā rauruke nagare ghaṇṭāvadhoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--śṛṇvantu bhavanto raurukanivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgataśca janakāyaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20672: 472.007 ahaṃ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyāmi/
S01divyav_u:20674: tvayā rājyaṃ kārayatā kasyacidaparādhyaṃ na kṣantavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:20676: śrutvā sarva eva raurukanivāsī janakāyo 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgātaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho vyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20677_0: 472.010 tato rudrāyaṇo rājā śikhaṇḍinaṃ kumāraṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamāpayitvā
S01divyav_u:20677_1: śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā paṇyāni kṛtvā ekena puruṣeṇopasthāyakena
S01divyav_u:20678: 472.012 tataḥ śikhaṇḍī rājā sāntaḥpurāmātyapaurajanapado 'nyaśca nānādeśābhyāgato janakāyaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20687: 472.019 rājā śikhaṇḍī sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajanapado 'śruparuyākulekṣaṇo muhūrmuhūr nivartya nirīkṣamāṇo raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pratinivṛttaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20688: 472.020 tato rudrāyaṇo rājā anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20689: 472.021 tenodyāne sthitvā sa puruṣa uktah--gaccha bhoḥ puruṣa,
S01divyav_u:20690: rājño bimbisārasya gatvā nivedaya--rudrāyaṇo nāma udyāne tiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:20691: 472.022 tena puruṣeṇa gatvā rājño bimbisārasya niveditam--deva,
S01divyav_u:20699: 472.025 rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃlakṣayati--na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ rāhānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhnāmiṣiktamevameva praveśayeyam/
S01divyav_u:20700: 472.027 mahatā satkāreṇa praveśayāmīti viditvā mārgaśobhāṃ bagaraśobhāṃ ca kārayitvā caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:20701: 472.028 kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya hastiskandhe āropya rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ praveśitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20705: sphītaṃ rājyamapāsya antaḥpuraṃ kumārānāmātyān paurajanapadān kimihāgamanaprayojanam?
S01divyav_u:20710: 473.001 iti śrutvā rājā bimbisāra āttamanāḥ pūrvakāyamabhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhumābhiprasāryodānamudānayati--aho buddhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:20713_0: yatredānīmevaṃvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ sphītaṃ rājyamapahāya sphītamantaḥpuraṃ vistīrṇasvajanabandhuvargaṃ
S01divyav_u:20713_1: sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇyapahāya ākāṅkṣante svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam /
S01divyav_u:20714: 473.005 ityuktvā rājānaṃ rudrāyaṇaṃ samādāya yena bhagavāṃsetnopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20715: 473.006 tena khalu samayena bhagavānanekaśatāyā bhikṣuparṣadaḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ deśayati/
S01divyav_u:20716: 473.007 adrākṣīdbhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ dūrādeva/
S01divyav_u:20717: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhikṣūnāmantrayate sma--eṣa bhikṣavo rājā bimbisāraḥ saprābhṛta āgacchati/
S01divyav_u:20720: rājā bimbisāro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20721: 473.010 ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā biṃvisāro bhagavantamidamavocat--ayaṃ bhadanta rājā rudrāyaṇa ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam/
S01divyav_u:20726: 473.013 sa bhagavato vācāvasāne eva muṇḍaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ saṃghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto varṣaśatopasampannasya bhikṣorīryāpathenāvasthitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:20727: 473.015 ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaśca saṃghāṭiparivṛtadehaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20728: 473.017 sadyaḥ praśāntendraya eva tasthau evaṃ sthito buddho manorathena//8//
S01divyav_u:20729: 473.019 āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇṭāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:20731: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtah--rudrāyaṇo rājā bhagavatā pravrajitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:20736: rudrāyaṇo rājā rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭo 'nekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtastiṣṭhatīti/
S01divyav_u:20737: 473.024 śrutvā ca punā rājā bimbisāro yena rudrāyaṇo bhikṣustenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20741: 473.028 bhuktvā śatapale pātre sauvarṇe rājate 'tha vā/
S01divyav_u:20755: 474.011 koṣṭhāgārāṇi kośaṃ ca bahuvittaṃ prahāya vai/
S01divyav_u:20761: 474.017 kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rājan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
S01divyav_u:20763: 474.019 kiṃ nu tvaṃ durmanā rāhan kiṃ dīna iva bhāṣase/
S01divyav_u:20764: 474.020 dadāmi pravarān bhogān yān kāṃścinmanasecchasi//20// iti/
S01divyav_u:20766: 474.022 na rājan kṛpaṇo loke dharmakāyena saṃspṛśet/
S01divyav_u:20771: 474.026 śṛṇu me tvaṃ mahārāja dharmatā deśayāmyaham/
S01divyav_u:20772: 474.027 śrutvā dharmaṃ tato jñeyo yadi tvaṃ prītimeṣyasi//23//
S01divyav_u:20776: 474.031 trīṭā tatra ratiḥ kā vā putraparadhaneṣu vā//25//
S01divyav_u:20778: 475.002 śaurā dhanaṃ prārthayante rājan mukto 'smi bandhanāt//26//
S01divyav_u:20779: 475.003 na bhaiṣajyāni trāyante na dhanaṃ jñātayo na ca/
S01divyav_u:20780: 475.004 na sarvavidyā na balaṃ na śauryaṃ trāyate 'ntakāt//27/
S01divyav_u:20782: 475.007 āyuḥkṣayānte 'pi tataścyavante mucyeta ko neha śarīrabhedāt//28//
S01divyav_u:20783: 475.009 rājyāni kṛtvāpi mahānubhāvā vṛṣṇyandhakāḥ kuravaśca pāṇḍavāśca/
S01divyav_u:20784: 475.011 saṃpannacittā yaśasā jvalantas te na śaktā maraṇaṃ nopagantum//29//
S01divyav_u:20785: 475.013 na samyamena tapasā na rājan na karmaṇā na rājan na karmaṇā vīryaparākrameṇa vā/
S01divyav_u:20786: 475.015 na vittapūgair na dhanairudāraiḥ śakyaṃ kadācinmaraṇādvimoktam//30//
S01divyav_u:20787: 475.017 naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praviśya/
S01divyav_u:20788: 475.019 na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta mṛtyuḥ//31//
S01divyav_u:20789: 475.021 naivāntarīkṣe na samudramadhye na parvatānāṃ vivaraṃ praciśya/
S01divyav_u:20790: 475.023 na vidyate sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra sthitaṃ na prasaheta karma//32//
S01divyav_u:20794: 475.028 śaṅkhavarṇāni śīrṣāṇi tāni dṛṣṭveha kā ratiḥ//34//
S01divyav_u:20801: 476.005 purā hi tvāṃ vyāghra iva mṛgaṃ nihatya vyādhirjarā karṣati antakaśca/
S01divyav_u:20802: 476.007 na te mitrāṇyapaneṣyanti rogaṃ saṃgamya sodaryagaṇāśca sarve//38//
S01divyav_u:20803: 476.009 yadeva labdhādhikamasya bhavati dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpam/
S01divyav_u:20805: 476.013 sacedṛṇaṃ bhvati piturmṛtasya priyāḥ sutā nāsya vahṇiṃ viśanti mṛtyau na vāpyaśrumukhā rudanti rāhuḥ pitā mama kāryateti(?)//40//
S01divyav_u:20806: 476.017 āyāntu sattvāḥ pitā mameti prakīrṇakeśāśrumukhā rudanti/
S01divyav_u:20807: 476.019 jyotiścāsya purato haranti hyaho batāyamamaro bhavediti//41//
S01divyav_u:20808: 476.021 dūṣyairenaṃ prāvṛtaṃ nirharanti jyotiḥ samādāya {ca tam} dahanti/
S01divyav_u:20809: 476.023 sa dahyate jñātibhī rudyamāna ekena vastreṇa vihāya bhogam//42//
S01divyav_u:20810: 476.025 eko hyayaṃ jāyate jāyamānastathā mriyate mriyamāṇo 'yamekaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20811: 476.027 eko duḥkhānanubhavatīha jantur na vidyate saṃsarataḥ sahāyaḥ//43//
S01divyav_u:20812: 476.029 etacca dṛṣṭveha parivrajanti kulāyakāste na bhavanti santaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20813: 476.031 te sarvasaṃgānabhisamprahāya na garbhaśayyāṃ punarāvasānti//33// iti/
S01divyav_u:20814: 477.001 [477]atha bimbisāro rājā rudrāyaṇena bhikṣuṇā uttarottareṇa pratibhānena nirākṛtastūṣṇīṃ niṣpratibhaḥ prakrāntaḥ//
S01divyav_u:20815: 477.003 atha śikhaṇḍī rājā yāvatkaṃciddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā adharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20821: 477.005 tadyathā deva puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāśca kālena kālaṃ samyakparipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ puṣpāṇi phalāni cānuprayacchanti,
S01divyav_u:20822: evameva janapadāḥ pritipālyamānā anuparataprayogeṇa yathākālaṃ karapratyāyānanuprayacchantīti/
S01divyav_u:20823: 477.007 sa tābhyāṃ nivārito yāvattāvaddharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapyadharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20827: ruṣito 'mātyānāmantrayate--yo bhavanto rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya yāvat trirapyājñāṃ prativahati,
S01divyav_u:20833: 477.013 amātyasya ca duṣṭasya dantasya calitasya ca/
S01divyav_u:20836: 477.016 kośasthaṃ ca balasthaṃ ca yo na hanyātsa ghātyate//43// iti/
S01divyav_u:20840: 477.018 kiṃ tvābhyāṃ mama darśanapathe na sthātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:20852: 477.025 dharmeṇa vā kārayati svarājyaṃ na cāsya kaścitparatopasargaḥ//47// iti/
S01divyav_u:20854: 477.028 tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo balavānarogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20855: 477.030 na cāsya kaścitparatopasargo adharmeṇa tu rājyaṃ karoti nityam//48//
S01divyav_u:20866: 478.006 sa vaṇik paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya saṃprasthito 'nupūrveṇa raurukamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20872: hite ca saṃniyojayiṣyāmi yathā janapadānna pīḍayatīti/
S01divyav_u:20875: 478.010 evaṃ karṇaparamparayā sa śabdastayorduṣṭāmātyayoḥ karṇaṃ gataḥ/
S01divyav_u:20879: 478.012 tadupāyasaṃvidhānaṃ ca kartavyam yenāsavantarmārga eva praghātyata iti/
S01divyav_u:20886: sa vinā rājyenābhiraṃsyata iti kṛta etat?
S01divyav_u:20893: 478.017 kathaṃ nāma kumārāmātyapaurajanapadairañjalisahasrair namasyamānena rājyaṃ kārayitvā punarapi kumāravāsena vastavyam?
S01divyav_u:20894: varaṃ deśaparityāgo na tu kumāravāsena vāsam/
S01divyav_u:20895: 478.019 tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo hastigrīvāyāṃ gatvā aśvapṛṣṭhena gacchet,
S01divyav_u:20898: evameva rājyaṃ kārayitvā punaḥ kumāravāsena vāsa iti/
S01divyav_u:20905: 478.023 sa evamukte hīnadīnavadano mūhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā bāṣpoparudhyamānahṛdayaḥ karuṇadīnavilambitairakṣaraiḥ sa kathayati--bhavantau,
S01divyav_u:20908: 478.026 pitā vā yadi vā bhrātā putro vā svāṅganiḥsṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20912: 478.030 ekaśca tatra śatruḥ syāttadarthe tānnimajjayet//50// iti/
S01divyav_u:20915: 478.033 grāmaṃ janapadasyārthe ātmārthe pṛthivīṃ tyajet//51// iti/
S01divyav_u:20920: 479.002 kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcitpāpaṃ karmākaraṇīyamiti tenādhivāsitam--evaṃ kriyatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:20927: 479.006 tābhyāṃ te hiraṇyasuvarṇagrāmapradānādinā protsāhitā na pratipadyante/
S01divyav_u:20929: bhavantah etān puruṣān saputradārān sasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavāṃścārake baddhvā sthāpayateti/
S01divyav_u:20935: 479.010 āyuṣmānapi rudrāyaṇastrayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayātkṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20936: 479.011 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantamidamavocat--icchāmyahaṃ bhadanta raurukaṃ nagaraṃ janapadacārikāṃ caritumiti/
S01divyav_u:20939: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20940: 479.014 āyuṣmān rudrāyaṇastasyā eva rātreratyayāt pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/
S01divyav_u:20941: 479.015 rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātraḥ pratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratisāmayya samādāya pātracīvaraṃ karmabalapreritam--
S01divyav_u:20942: 479.018 dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrātkarma prakarṣate/
S01divyav_u:20943: 479.019 tatra prakarṣate jantum yatra karma vipacyate//52//
S01divyav_u:20944: 479.020 iti yena raurukaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20945: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carannantarmārge 'nyatamaṃ karvaṭakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20950: sa taiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhamekasminnevodyāne rātriṃdevā samupagataḥ/
S01divyav_u:20953: 479.026 dharmeṇa vā kārayati svakaṃ rājyaṃ na cāsya kaccitparatopasargaḥ//53// iti/
S01divyav_u:20955: 479.029 deva, tathyaṃ śikhaṇḍī khalu raurukeṣu sabhṛtyavargo bakavānarogaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20956: 479.031 na cāsya kaścitparatopasargah adharmarājyaṃ tu karoti nityam//54//
S01divyav_u:20958: 480.002 tasyāpi tu yatsadṛśaṃ tadadya upalapsyase saubhyeti//55//
S01divyav_u:20967: 480.006 kva yāsyasi tvaṃ naravīra bhūyo na te suto nandati jīvitena/
S01divyav_u:20968: 480.008 vayaṃ hyadhanyā nṛpasamprayuktā ihābhyupetāstava ghātanāya //56// iti//
S01divyav_u:20972: 480.011 sa saṃlakṣayati--yattaduktaṃ bhagavatā karmasvakatā te rudrāyaṇa manasikartavyeti, idaṃ tat/
S01divyav_u:20973: 480.012 sarvathā dhik saṃsārabhaṅguramiti viditvā teṣāṃ kathayati--bhadramukhāḥ,
S01divyav_u:20977: 480.014 te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā kathayanti--deva, evaṃ kuru/
S01divyav_u:20978: athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'nyatamaṃ vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍataṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathenāvasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:20979: 480.015 uktaṃ bhagavatā--pañcānuśaṃsā bāhuśrutye--skandhakuśalo bhavati dhātukuśala āyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ,
S01divyav_u:20981_0: 480.017 tena vīryamārabhya idameva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
S01divyav_u:20984: 480.022 athāyuṣmān rudrāyaṇo 'rhattvaprāpto vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī tasyā velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate--
S01divyav_u:20986: 480.025 adyāpyudrāyaṇo bhikṣū rājadharmair na mucyate//57// iti/
S01divyav_u:20991: yadi śikhaṇḍī rājā asmān pṛcchati--kiṃ vṛddharājena maraṇasamaye vyākṛtamiti,
S01divyav_u:20996: 480.031 ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyasi//58// iti/
S01divyav_u:20997: 481.001 [481]idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21005: tasya dharmavinaṣṭatvād ṛkaro 'pi na pratibhāti prāgeva ṛddhiḥ/
S01divyav_u:21006: 481.005 tatasteṣāmekena puruṣeṇa nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena kakṣādasiṃ niṣkṛṣya utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātitaḥ//
S01divyav_u:21008: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
S01divyav_u:21009: tasmin samaye nīlapītakohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhānniścārya kāścidadhastādgacchanti,
S01divyav_u:21012_0: tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanamavīcimarbudaṃ
S01divyav_u:21012_1: nirarbudamaṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvamutpalaṃ padman mahāpadmaṃ narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakāsteṣu
S01divyav_u:21015: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati--kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
S01divyav_u:21018: 481.015 teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati--na hyeva vayaṃ bhavanta itaścyutāḥ,
S01divyav_u:21022: te nirmite cittamabhiprasādya taṃ narakanivedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisaṃdhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti/
S01divyav_u:21024_3: sudṛśān sudarśanānakaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmetyuddhoṣayanti /
S01divyav_u:21030: 481.027 atha tā arciṣastrisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokaghātumanvāhiṇḍya bhagavantameva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti/
S01divyav_u:21044: 482.001 atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ pādatale 'ntarhitāḥ/
S01divyav_u:21051: 482.013 tatkālaṃ svayamadhigamya dhīra buddyā śrotṛrṇāṃ śramaṇa jinendra kāṅkṣitānām/
S01divyav_u:21054: 482.018 yasyārthe smitamupadarśayanti dhīrāstaṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ//64// iti/
S01divyav_u:21056: nāhetvapratyayamānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksambuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti/
S01divyav_u:21060: 482.024 rudrāyaṇa ānanda arhattvaṃ prāpto jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21062: 482.025 atha te vadhakapuruṣā āyuṣmato rudrāyaṇasya pātracīvaraṃ khikkhitaṃ cādāya raurukamanuprāptāḥ/
S01divyav_u:21064: tau śrutvā prītiprāmodyajātau yena śikhaṇḍī rājā tenopasaṃkrāntau/
S01divyav_u:21081: śikhaṇḍī [483]rājā mūrcchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatito jalapariṣekapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21085: 483.004 ahaṃ ca parinirvāsye tvaṃ cāvīciṃ gamiṣyase//66// iti/
S01divyav_u:21086: 483.005 idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyah--dve tvayā ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21099: tābhyāmapi duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ pracchannaṃ tiṣyapuṣyastūpayordve bale kṛtvā dvau biḍālapotakau sthāpitau/
S01divyav_u:21101: yena satyena satyavacanena yuvābhyāṃ māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau,
S01divyav_u:21102: tena satyena satyavacanena māṃsapeśīṃ kṛtvā svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ balaṃ praviśatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:21104: tadā tābhyāṃ duṣṭāmātyābhyāṃ rudrāyaṇasya rājño devī uktā--devi,
S01divyav_u:21118: tvamapyevaṃ kathayasi--kasmāttvamutpāḍūtpāṇḍuḥ kṛśāluko durbako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
S01divyav_u:21119: kathamahaṃ notpāṇḍūtpāṇḍuko bhavāmi kṛśāluko dubalako mlāno 'prāptakāya iti,
S01divyav_u:21120: yena mayā duṣṭāmātyavigrāhitena dve ānantarye karmaṇī kṛte--yacca pitā jīvitādvyaparopito yaccārhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāśravah?
S01divyav_u:21128: kiṃ tu mayā ṛtusnātayā anyena puruṣeṇa sārthaṃ paricaritam,
S01divyav_u:21138: 483.031 tayā tau duṣṭāmātyau āhūyoktau--mayā asya pitṛvadho vinoditaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21152: sa kathayati--yuvāmapyevaṃ kathayatha--kimarthaṃ śokaḥ kriyate iti,
S01divyav_u:21156: sa kathayati--mayā pratyakṣadṛṣṭau tiṣyapuṣyau arhantau jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau nirvātau/
S01divyav_u:21159: tau kathayatah--vayaṃ devasya pratyakṣīkurmo yathā māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau adyatve 'pi stūpe tiṣṭhata iti/
S01divyav_u:21163: 484.011 eṣa ca śabdo rauruke nagare samantato visṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21165_0: tatastau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--yathā tiṣyapuṣyau yena satyena satyavacanena yuvāṃ
S01divyav_u:21165_1: māyayā lokaṃ vañcayitvā śraddhādeyaṃ vinipātya pratyavarāyāṃ biḍālayonāvupapannau
S01divyav_u:21166: 484.014 anena satyena satyavacanena imāṃ māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakaṃ stūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakaṃ bilaṃ praviśatāmiti/
S01divyav_u:21169: tau māṃsapeśīmādāya svakasvakastūpaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakabilaṃ praviṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:21180: śikhaṇḍī rājā saṃlakṣayati--yadi na santyeva loke 'rhantaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21181: kimarhtamāryakāśyapasya kātyāyanasya pañcaśataparivārasya śaulāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ plañcaśataparivārāyāḥ piṇḍakamanuprayacchāmīti?
S01divyav_u:21182: tena bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ ca piṇḍapātaḥ samucchinnaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21184: athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śaulā ca bhikṣuṇī vinayāpekṣayā tatraivāvasthatau/
S01divyav_u:21186: 484.025 āyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya praviśati/
S01divyav_u:21190: kimarthamayamāryo mahākātyāyano māṃ dṛṣṭvā ekānte 'pakramyāvasthita iti/
S01divyav_u:21199: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyano raurukaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya caritvā nirgacchati,
S01divyav_u:21208: eṣa kathayati--mā ahamasya pitṛmārakasya rajasā pravrajyāmīti/
S01divyav_u:21216: ekaikayā pāṃśumuṣṭyā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasyopari mahān pāṃśurāśirvyavasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21224: te kathayanti--tena kalirājena pitṛmārakeṇa āryo mahākātyāyano 'duṣyanayakārī pāṃśunā avaṣṭabdha iti/
S01divyav_u:21225: 485.011 tau sāśrukaṇṭhau rudanmukhau gopālakapaśupālakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pāṃśūnapanetumārabdhau/
S01divyav_u:21231: yadidaṃ śikhaṇḍinā mahākātyāyane janakāyasahāyena karma kṛtam/
S01divyav_u:21233: 485.015 itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pāṃśunā avaṣṭapsyate/
S01divyav_u:21236: prathame divase mahāvāyurāgatya raurukaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati/
S01divyav_u:21243: 485.019 teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratvavarṣaṃ patiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:21250: sa kathayati--yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṃ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata/
S01divyav_u:21253: tau tasya pādayor nipatya raurukaṃ praviṣṭau/
S01divyav_u:21254: 485.024 rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ praviṣṭau kathayatah--kiṃ devenāryo mahākātyāyanaḥ kiṃciduktaḥ pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhah?
S01divyav_u:21259: evaṃ kathayati--itaḥ saptame divase raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pāṃśunā avaṣṭapsyata iti/
S01divyav_u:21262: prathame tāvaddivase mahavāyurāgatya raurukaṃ nagaramapagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakapālaṃ vyavasthāpayiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:21267: paścādyai raurukasāmantakanivāsibhiḥ sāmavāyikaṃ karma kṛtaṃ te raurukaṃ nagaraṃ pravekṣyanti,
S01divyav_u:21268: teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patiṣyati,
S01divyav_u:21275: sa kathayati--[486]yuvām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe nāvaṃ sthāpayitvā tiṣṭhata/
S01divyav_u:21278: tau duṣṭāmātyau kathayatah--samucchinnapiṇḍapātaḥ pāṃśuvarṣeṇāvaṣṭabadhaḥ sa kimanyadvadatu?
S01divyav_u:21282: hirubhirukāvagrāmātyau mukhaṃ vibhaṇḍya hastān saṃparivartya prakrāntau/
S01divyav_u:21285: hitukena śyāmāko dāraka āyuṣmate mahākātyāyanāya dattah--ārya,
S01divyav_u:21289: 486.008 bhirukenāpi śyāmāvatī dārikā śailāyā bhikṣuṇyā dattā--ārye,
S01divyav_u:21292: 486.009 no cet kauśāmbyāṃ ghoṣilo nāma gṛhapatirmama vayasyastasya samarpayiṣyasīti/
S01divyav_u:21294: atha śailā bhikṣuṇī śyāmāvatīmādāya ṛddhyā raurukānnagarāt prakrāntā/
S01divyav_u:21298: hirubhirukābhyāmagrāmātyābhyām yāvacca gṛham yāvacca nadī atrāntare suruṅgāṃ khānayitvā gṛhasamīpe ca nauḥ sthāpitā/
S01divyav_u:21303: śrūyate rājño māndhātuḥ saptāhaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ patitamiti/
S01divyav_u:21317: 486.022 teṣu praviṣṭeṣu ṣaṣṭhe divase ratnavarṣaṃ patitam/
S01divyav_u:21319: 486.023 tatra hirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe hirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
S01divyav_u:21321: bhirukeṇānyatamasmin pradeśe bhirukaṃ nāma nagaraṃ māpitam/
S01divyav_u:21336: atha yā raurukanivāsinī devatā sā yenāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastenopasaṃkrāntā/
S01divyav_u:21345: sa ṛddhyā uparivihāyasā śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21350: 487.005 āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ khalabhidhāne sthāpayitvā pinṇḍapātraṃ praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21353: sa taṃ dārakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasya sakāśamupasaṃkramya kathayati--bho dāraka,
S01divyav_u:21355: 487.008 sa kathayati--na mama prabhāvāt khalabhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti,
S01divyav_u:21356: api tu raurukanivāsinī devatā ihāgatā amuṣmin pradeśe tiṣṭhati,
S01divyav_u:21357: tasyāḥ prabhāvāt khalābhidhāne dhānyaṃ vardhata iti/
S01divyav_u:21358: 487.010 sa tasyāḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kathayati--devate,
S01divyav_u:21361: 487.011 na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:21362: 487.012 tenāpi karvaṭakaṃ gatvā karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyaḥ saṃnipātitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21366: tasyā haste mayā tāḍakaṃ kuñcikā ca dattā/
S01divyav_u:21368: tāḍakaṃ kuñcikāṃ ca tāvaddhāraya yāvad grāmaṃ gatvā āgacchāmi/
S01divyav_u:21369: 487.016 na ca tvayā māṃ muktvā anyasya kasyaciddātavyamiti/
S01divyav_u:21376: tataḥ sarvaṃ tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ gandhapuṣpośobhitaṃ chatradhvajapatākāśobhitaṃ ca balimādāya yena devatā tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ/
S01divyav_u:21383: samanvāhara asya yasya sakāśāt tāḍakaḥ kuñcikā ca gṛhīteti/
S01divyav_u:21388: 487.025 tauryādṛśameva tasyā devatāyāḥ sthaṇḍilaṃ kāritaṃ tādṛśamevāyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya/
S01divyav_u:21390: tamasau gṛhītvā āyuṣmato mahākātyāyanasya sthaṇḍile sthāpayati/
S01divyav_u:21391: 487.028 sā anyatamena puruṣeṇa prākārakaṇṭake sthitena pradīpaṃ gṛhītvā gacchantī dṛṣṭā/
S01divyav_u:21392: 487.029 sa saṃlakṣayati--eṣā devatā āryasya mahākātyāyanasyābhisātikā gacchatīti/
S01divyav_u:21410: āyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastatra varṣoṣitaḥ śyāmākaṃ dārakamādāya devatāmupāmantrya saṃprasthitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21415: 488.009 tayātra prakṣipya stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito mahaśca prasthāpitah--kāśīmaha kāśīmaha iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:21418: 488.011 tairlambate lambata iti uccair nādo muktaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21419: tasmiñ janapade manuṣyāṇāṃ lambakapāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:21421: 488.013 tatra śyāmākaṃ dārakaṃ vṛkṣamūle sthāpayitvā piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21433: tasya vṛkṣasya cchāyā asya śyāmākasya dāraksya kāyaṃ na vijahātīti/
S01divyav_u:21443: kimasya dārakasya rājñaḥ saṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi na veti/
S01divyav_u:21454: 488.027 sā āyuṣmantaṃ mahākātyāyanaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati--dṛṣṭvā cirasya bara putrakaṃ paśyāmi,
S01divyav_u:21459: tasyā āyuṣmatā mahākātyāyanenāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
S01divyav_u:21460: yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam/
S01divyav_u:21461_0: 488.032 sā dṛṣṭasatyā trirudānamudānayati sma--idamasmākaṃ bhadanata na mātrā [489]kṛtaṃ
S01divyav_u:21461_1: na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam /
S01divyav_u:21470: 489.006 durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge ca te aham/
S01divyav_u:21471: 489.007 sthāpitā putra yatnena sādhu te duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam//68//
S01divyav_u:21472: 489.008 athāyuṣmān mahākātyāyanastāṃ bhadrakanyāṃ satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya kathayati--amba,
S01divyav_u:21479: tayā stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sā tasmin pratimāropitā/
S01divyav_u:21487: 489.014 sa saṃlakṣayati--uktaṃ bhagavatā madhyadeśe pule na dhārayitavye iti/
S01divyav_u:21490: tayā sthaṇḍile kārayitvā te pratiṣṭhāpite itaścarasantisaṃjñā saṃvṛttā/
S01divyav_u:21499: 489.019 yad rājā śikhaṇḍī raurukanivāsī ca janakāya ahaṃ ca pāṃśunāvacṭabdhaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21507: 489.024 bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā rudrāyaṇena karma kṛtam yenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule pratyājātah?
S01divyav_u:21513: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:21517: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:21519: 490.002 sāmagarīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//69// iti/
S01divyav_u:21520_0: 490.003 bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīti^dhvani asti buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā
S01divyav_u:21520_1: lola utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ khaṅgaviṣāṇakalpā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
S01divyav_u:21522: tasya karvaṭakasya ca nātidūre udapānaṃ prabhūtānāṃ mṛgāṇāmāvāsaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21523: 490.006 tatrāsau lubdhakaḥ pratidinaṃ prabhūtān kūṭān pāśālepāṃśca pratikṣipati prabhūtānāṃ mṛgānāmutsādāya vināśāya anayena vyasanāya/
S01divyav_u:21525: 490.008 yāvadanyataraḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāaṃ caraṃstaṃ karvaṭakamanuprāpto devatāyatane rātiṃdivā samupāgataḥ/
S01divyav_u:21526: 490.009 sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya taṃ karvaṭakamanuprāptaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21528: 490.010 tataḥ piṇḍapātamaṭitvā saṃlakṣayati--idaṃ devāyatanaṃ divā ākīrṇam/
S01divyav_u:21529: 490.011 bahiḥ karvaṭakasya śānte sthāne piṇḍapātaṃ velāṃ karomīti/
S01divyav_u:21530: sa karvaṭakānniṣkramyedaṃ śāntamidaṃ śāntamiti yena tadudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21531_0: 490.012 upasaṃkramya pātrasnāvaṇamekānta upanikṣipya pādau prakṣālya hastau nirmādya
S01divyav_u:21531_1: pānīyaṃ parisrāvya śīrṇaparṇakāni samudānīya niṣadya bhaktaketyaṃ kṛtvā hastau nirmādya
S01divyav_u:21531_2: mukhaṃ pātraṃ ca pātraparisrāvaṇam yathāsthāne sthāpya pādau prakṣālya anyatamavṛkṣamūlaṃ
S01divyav_u:21531_3: niśritya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā śānteneryāpathena niṣaṇṇaḥ /
S01divyav_u:21533: atha sa lubdhakaḥ kālyamevotthāya yena tadudapānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21537: kimatra kāraṇam yenādya ekamṛgo 'pi na baddha iti?/
S01divyav_u:21542: 490.021 sa saṃlakṣayati--ete pravrajitāḥ śāntātmāna īdṛśeṣu sthāneṣvabhiramante/
S01divyav_u:21546: 490.023 tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena karākārasadṛśaṃ dhanurākarṇaṃ pūrayitvā saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21547: 490.024 sa mahātmā pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃlakṣayati--mā ayaṃ tapasvī lubdho 'tyantakṣataśca bhaviṣyati,
S01divyav_u:21550: sa vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21552: 490.027 sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--avatarāvatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya,
S01divyav_u:21561: 490.030 sa saṃlakṣayati--yanmayā anena pūtikāyena prāptavyaṃ tadidānīṃ śāntaṃ nirupadhiśeṣaṃ nirvāṇadhātuṃ praviśāmīti/
S01divyav_u:21562: 490.031 sa tasyaiva purastātpunargaganatalamabhyudgamya vicitrāṇi pratihāryāṇi vidarśya nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21566: tānyasthīni nave kumbhe prakṣipya śārīrastūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21568: gandhairmālyairdhūpaśca kumbhe kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam--yanmayaivaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye 'pakāro kṛtaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21571: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam,
S01divyav_u:21574: 491.007 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena lubdhakaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21576: 491.008 yadanena pratyekabuddhaḥ saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21577: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi narakeṣu paktaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21578: tasminnapi codapāne saviṣeṇa śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21580_0: 491.011 punarapi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S01divyav_u:21580_1: papracchuh--kiṃ bhadanta śikhaṇḍinā raurukanivāsinā janakāyenāyucmatā mahākātyāyanena
S01divyav_u:21585: na bḥkṣavaḥ karmaṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
S01divyav_u:21589: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāayataneṣu karmaṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca/
S01divyav_u:21591: 491.019 samagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām//70//
S01divyav_u:21594: 491.021 sa tayā saha krīḍate ramate paricārayati/
S01divyav_u:21595: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21596: 491.022 punarasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato dārikā jātā/
S01divyav_u:21601: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanasanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya/
S01divyav_u:21603: 491.026 yāvattayā dārikayā gṛhaṃ saṃmṛjya vāṭasyopariṣṭāt saṃkāraśchoritaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21609: sā bhrātrā pṛṣṭā--kiṃ tvayādya kṛtam yena te yācanakā nāgatā iti/
S01divyav_u:21621: 492.003 tasmin karvaṭake dvau gṛhapatī samakau prativasataḥ/
S01divyav_u:21626: 492.005 kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau dārikā yayā pratyekabuddhasyopari saṃkāraśchoritaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21637: 492.010 yadanena bipuṣpitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena pāṃśunāvaṣṭabdhaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21642: 492.013 iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
S01divyav_u:21645: 492.014 tasmāttarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
S01divyav_u:21652: 493.002 mātaryapakāriṇaḥ prāṇina ihaiva vyasanaprapātapātālāvalambino bhavantīti satatasamupajāyamānapremaprasādabahumānamānasaiḥ satpuruṣairmātaraḥ śuśrūṣaṇīyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:21658: 493.015 dṛṣṭvā lokamimaṃ dhanakṣayabhayāt saṃtyaktadānotsavaṃ lokakleśapiśācikāvaśatayā saṃdūṣitādhyāśayam/
S01divyav_u:21659: 493.017 kāruṇyāt sa dadāvanāthakṛpaṇaklībāturebhyo dhanaṃ matvā ca prahatārṇavormicapalaṃ svaṃ jīvitaṃ bhūyasā//3//
S01divyav_u:21660: 493.019 yeṣu vyāsajjacetā bhujagavaravadhūbhogabhīmeṣu labdhā gāhante pāpagartaṃ sphuṭadahanaśikhābhīmaparyantarandhram/
S01divyav_u:21663: yadāsau lokapravādamātrayāpi panthānaṃ samavatīrya dhanadavaruṇakuberaśaṃkarajanārdanapitāmahādīn devatāviśeṣān putrārtham yācitumārebhe/
S01divyav_u:21666: 493.029 tattattasya prabalavirasam yāti tīkṣṇāṃśumālaiḥ śoṣaṃ manye raviriva jalaṃ bhāgadheyārkabimbam//5//
S01divyav_u:21667: 494.001 [494]rudraṃ naikakapālaśekharadharaṃ cakrāyudhaṃ vajriṇaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ makaradhvajaṃ girisutāputraṃ mayūrāsanam/
S01divyav_u:21668: 494.003 gaṅgāśaṅkhadalāvadātasalilāṃstāṃstāṃśca devānasau putrārthī śaraṇam yayau bahu punardānaṃ dvijebhyo dadau//6//
S01divyav_u:21671: 494.009 evamanekaprakārakāyacetasorāyāsakāribhirapi vratopavāsamaṅgalairyadā naiva kadācit kāle 'sya putrā jīvino babhūvuḥ,
S01divyav_u:21676: 494.015 na ca te 'dyāpi jīvanti tatra kiṃ parikhidyase//9//
S01divyav_u:21678: 494.018 ye yairvinā nātmabhavaṃ labhante te tairvinā janma kathaṃ bhajeran//10//
S01divyav_u:21680: 494.022 tvaṃ kenāpi viḍambase jaḍamatiḥ putrāśayonmattako yastvaṃ dyāmadhigantumicchasi bṛhatsopānamālāśrayāt//12//
S01divyav_u:21681: 494.024 vidhimaparamahaṃ te bodhayāmi prasiddhyai tvamapi ca kuru tāvat saṃprasiddhyai kadācit/
S01divyav_u:21682: 494.026 yadi bhavati sutaste kanyakānāma tasya sakalajanapade 'smin khyāpayasva prasiddhyā//13//
S01divyav_u:21683: 494.028 atha tasya kālāntare gaganatalamaṃśumālīva svakiraṇanikarairvirājamānaṃ svavaṃśalakṣmīḥ putraṃ janayāmbabhūva/
S01divyav_u:21688: 495.005 mūrtistasya rarāja cāruśikharāddhemam yathā bhūcyutaṃ prodgīrṇasvamayūkhajālajaṭilai ratnāṅkurairveṣṭitam//15//
S01divyav_u:21695: 495.017 atha tasya pitā mitraḥ sārthavāho vaṇigjanaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:21698: 495.021 pitaryatīte jananīṃ jagāda cakāra kiṃ karma pitā mameti//20//
S01divyav_u:21704: 495.028 yāvaccāyaṃ janapadamimaṃ tasya vṛttiṃ na bhūtāṃ pṛcchatyasmai kathayati na vā sarva evaiṣa lokaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21705: 495.030 tāvadyuktaṃ mama sutamimaṃ mṛtyuvaktrāntarālaṃ nānāduḥkhavyasanagahanaṃ vyādhiṣaktaṃ niṣeddhum//23//
S01divyav_u:21706: 496.001 [496]paro 'pi yaḥ sādhujanānujuṣṭaṃ vihāya mārgaṃ śrayate vimārgam/
S01divyav_u:21707: 496.003 nivāraṇīyaḥ sa svamatājjanena prayatnataḥ kiṃ punareva putraḥ//24//
S01divyav_u:21711: 496.008 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo māturvacanaṃ kusumamālāmiva śirasā samabhivandya anyasminnahani aukarikāpaṇaṃ prasasāra/
S01divyav_u:21714: 496.012 svagarbhasaṃdhāraṇaduḥkhitāyai dadau sa tasyai mudito jananyai/
S01divyav_u:21716: 496.016 atha ye tasmin puravare ciraṃtanā aukarikāḥ,
S01divyav_u:21719: 496.020 sa tvaṃ tāṃ vṛttimujjhatvā śrayase 'nyāṃ kayā dhiyā//28//
S01divyav_u:21724: atha gāndhikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣāḥ sametyāgatya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ vicchandayāmāsuh--
S01divyav_u:21725: 496.026 gāndhāpaṇaṃ klībajanābhipannaṃ pitā na vai mādya pure(?) cakāra/
S01divyav_u:21726: 496.028 tatraiva hairaṇyikatāṃ sa kṛtvā dhanāni bhūyāṃsi samāpa sādho//30//
S01divyav_u:21727: 496.030 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāmapi jīvikāmapahāya hairaṇyikāpaṇaṃ cakrāra/
S01divyav_u:21729: 497.001 [497]lebhe dine sa prathame mahārhaḥ kārṣāpaṇān ṣoḍaśa tān dadau ca//31//
S01divyav_u:21732: 497.005 atha hairaṇyikāpaṇikāḥ puruṣā sametyāgatya ca taṃ tasmātkarmaṇo vinivartanārthamāhuh--
S01divyav_u:21736: 497.010 vivartitaṃ ślāghyamatīva puṃsāṃ na tu svavṛtteścyavanaṃ pravṛttam//34//
S01divyav_u:21739: 497.016 yadāśritaṃ karma janānuvarjinā tvayā vidagdhena dhanepsunādhunā/
S01divyav_u:21740: 497.018 kathaṃ na saṃprāpsyasi bhāgyasampadaṃ piturvyatīte 'pi viśālinīṃ śriyam//36//
S01divyav_u:21742: 497.022 tasyā mahendrāmalatulyakīrteḥ sūnuḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ na bibharṣi lajjām//37//
S01divyav_u:21743: 497.024 ye mṛtyuṃ gaṇayanti naiva vipadi grāsaṃ bhajante 'nagha gehe bandhuṣu sūnuṣu vyapagatasnehātmanodyoginaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21744: 497.026 ye nītvā jaladhīnagādhasalilānāvartabhīmān budhāḥ prāpyārthān gajadantabhaṅgasitayāsinvanta kīrtyā jagat//38//
S01divyav_u:21745: 497.028 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastebhyo 'pi tathānuguṇinīṃ kathāmavadhārya samudrāvataraṇakṛtavyavasāyo mātaramupasṛtyovāca--amba,
S01divyav_u:21749: 497.030 sā pūrvameva bhartṛmaraṇaduḥkhena vigatajīvitāśā svasya tanayasya tenāsamlakṣitadāruṇena viyogaśokaśastreṇa bhṛśataraṃ pravidāryamāṇahṛdayeva svatanayamāha--
S01divyav_u:21751: 497.033 jīvitaṃ kasya te 'niṣṭaṃ tvayā krīḍāṃ karoti kaḥ//39//
S01divyav_u:21754: 498.003 na yāvadevaṃ mama duḥkhaśalyaṃ prayāti nāśaṃ pravidārya śokam/
S01divyav_u:21755: 498.005 kathaṃ nu tasyopari me dvitīyaṃ nipātyate pāpamayairamitraiḥ//41//
S01divyav_u:21756: 498.007 yeṣāṃ ceto vividhavirasāyāsaduḥkhāprakampyam yaiḥ saṃtyaktaṃ kṛpaṇahṛdayairjīvitaṃ bhogalubdhaiḥ/
S01divyav_u:21757: 498.009 te saṃtyaktvā nayanagalitāśrupravāhārdravaktrān bandhūnajñā makaranilaye mṛtyave yānti nāśam//42//
S01divyav_u:21759: 498.013 saṃtyajya yātuṃ kathamudyamaste mā sā kathā mā nu vaco madīyam(?)//43//
S01divyav_u:21761: 498.017 saṃpattayo yena vaṇigjanasya tato 'hamevaṃ suta vārayāmi//44//
S01divyav_u:21762: 498.019 sa tasyā hitārthaṃ madhurāṇyapi vacanakusumāni tṛṇamivāvadhūya sapragalbhatayā samavalambitavikatthāśobhaṃ kiṃcidīdṛśaṃ pratyāha--
S01divyav_u:21763: 498.021 varaṃ naiva tu jāyeran ye jātā nirdhanā janāḥ/
S01divyav_u:21764: 498.022 jātasya yadi duḥkhāni varaṃ mṛtyur na jīvitam//45//
S01divyav_u:21766: 498.024 arthino mama pāpasya yānti niḥśvasya durmanāḥ//46//
S01divyav_u:21767: 498.025 ye śaktihīnā vibhavārjanādau te dehino duḥkhaśataṃ sahante/
S01divyav_u:21768: 498.027 lokaṃ punarduḥkhaśatopataptaṃ draṣṭaṃ na śaknomi cirāyamāṇaḥ//47//
S01divyav_u:21769: 498.029 tasmādvilaṅghāmi vacastvadīyam yāsyāmi taṃ tvaṃ prajahīhi śokam/
S01divyav_u:21770: 498.031 tatraiva yāyāṃ nidhanaṃ samudre chinnaṃ mayā vā vyasanaṃ janasya//48//
S01divyav_u:21771: 499.001 [499]atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvo mātaramapramāṇīkṛtya nirgatya gṛhādvārāṇasyāṃ puryāmātmānaṃ sārthavāhamityuddhoṣayāmāsa/
S01divyav_u:21772: 499.003 asyāmeva purā puraṃdarapurīpratispardhipuryāṃ vaṇik mitro nāma babhūva yatsuranaraprakhyātakīrtidhvajaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21773: 499.005 putrastasya mahāsamudramacirādyāsyatyamuṣmindine yātum ye vaṇijaḥ kṛtopakaraṇāste santu sajjā iti//49//
S01divyav_u:21778: 499.014 anartharāgagrahamūḍhabuddhayo narā hi paśyanti na kevalaṃ hitam/
S01divyav_u:21779: 499.016 satāṃ hitādhānavidhānacetasāṃ giro 'pi śṛṇvanti na bhūtavādinām//50//
S01divyav_u:21780: 499.018 maitrakanyako 'pi dharaṇi{tala}niṃnāṃ mātaraṃ śokavaśyāṃ śirasi kupitacittaḥ pādavajreṇa hatvā/
S01divyav_u:21781: 499.021 muhurupacitaśokaḥ karmaṇā preryamāṇas tvaritamatirabhūt saṃprayātuṃ vaṇigbhiḥ//51//
S01divyav_u:21784: 499.026 vyasanaphalamanantaṃ mā tu bhūt karmaṇo 'sya punarapi guruvākyaṃ mātigāḥ svapnato 'pi//52//
S01divyav_u:21805: 501.009 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastena mahatā vyasanopanipātenāpyanāpatitabhayaviṣādadainyāyāsamanāḥ samavalambya mahaddhairyaparākramaṃ sasambhramaṃ phalakamādāya prasasāra/
S01divyav_u:21808: 501.016 saṃsmṛtya māturvacanaṃ sa pāṇā vyāsajya mūrdhānamidaṃ jagāda//62//
S01divyav_u:21809: 501.018 śṛṇvanti ye nātmahitaṃ gurūṇāṃ vākyaṃ hitārthodayakāryabhadram/
S01divyav_u:21812: 501.024 prāptaṃ phalaṃ janmataroḥ sudhībhirye mānayantīha giro gurūṇām//64//
S01divyav_u:21813: 501.026 māturhitāyaiva sadodyatāyāḥ prollaṅghya vākyaṃ mama duṣkṛtasya/
S01divyav_u:21814: 501.028 puṣpam yadīdṛgbharapāpadāruṇaṃ prāntaṃ gamiṣyāmi kadā phalasya//65//
S01divyav_u:21816: 501.032 guruśirasi dadhānaḥ pādavajraṃ khalo 'haṃ kathamavanividāryaśvabhrarandhre na lagnaḥ//66//
S01divyav_u:21817: 502.001 [502]ye santo hitavādināṃ sphuṭadhiyāṃ saṃpādayante giriḥ śreyaste samavāpnuvanti niyataṃ kravyādapuryām yathā/
S01divyav_u:21818: 502.003 ye tūtsṛjya mahārthasāradayitāṃ vācaṃ śrayante 'nyathā dustāre vyasanodadhau nipatintāḥ śocanti te 'ham yathā//67//
S01divyav_u:21820: 502.009 ete dāḍimapuṣpalohitamukhāḥ pronmuktakolāhalā hāsādarśitadantapaṅktivirasāḥ śākhāmṛgā nirbhayāḥ/
S01divyav_u:21821: 502.011 sarpān bhīmaviṣānalasphuradurujvālākarālasphuṭān hatvā pāṇitalaiḥ prayānti vivaśāḥ phūtkārabhītā nunaḥ//68//
S01divyav_u:21823: 502.015 vaṃśaistālaravaiḥ sagītamadhuraiḥ pracchedasampādibhiḥ saṃgītāhitacatasaḥ pramuditā gāyantyamī kinnarāḥ//69//
S01divyav_u:21837: 503.005 likhantaṃ karālair nabhaḥ śṛṅgajālaiḥ kṣipantaṃ mayūkhaistamaḥ sāgarāṇām/
S01divyav_u:21847: 503.024 prekṣante madavārilolamadhuliṭprollīḍhagaṇḍasthalaṃ darpāt kesariṇo balena mahatā pronmathyamānā gajam//78//
S01divyav_u:21848_1: jagat saṃsārapaṅke tribhuvanasvāmīvodayad ramaṇakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa /
S01divyav_u:21864: 504.025 adyaiva duḥkhāni śamaṃ gatāni adyaiva no jīvitamāttasāram/
S01divyav_u:21869: 505.003 teṣāṃ phalaṃ vīkṣaṇameva te 'laṃ saṅgastvayā kiṃ punareva dīghyam (rgha?) //87//
S01divyav_u:21870: 505.005 adyaiva mā bandhusuhṛdviyogaśokaṃkathāḥ kasya na santyapāyāḥ/
S01divyav_u:21871: 505.007 dāsyo vayaṃ te 'psarasaścatasrah chāyā na te laṅghayituṃ samarthāḥ//88//
S01divyav_u:21872: 505.009 ratnāni vāsāṃsi samujjvalāni śayyāśrayāścārutarā vayaṃ ca/
S01divyav_u:21878: 505.018 nitye viyoge maraṇāt puraḥsthite śocanti te deśakṛte viyoge/
S01divyav_u:21881: 505.024 haimādriśṛṅgamiva tatpuramāviśantaṃ nemuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭā bahavo 'pi tatra//92//
S01divyav_u:21884: 505.029 hā kiṃ vinikṣipya kharāgravajro nāthaḥ surāṇāmiti tarkito 'bhūt//93//
S01divyav_u:21891: 506.009 krīḍan sa kālaṃ na viveda yātaṃ sarvātmanā rāgaparītacetāḥ//96//
S01divyav_u:21892: 506.011 pratyahaṃ ca dakṣiṇena gamanaṃ vārayanti sma/
S01divyav_u:21894: tathā tathā tayā diśā gamanāyautsukyamanā babhūva/
S01divyav_u:21897: 506.015 yadi kuryādayaṃ loke suhṛdāṃ vacanaṃ hitam/
S01divyav_u:21898: 506.016 paraiti svargaṃ pātāle śvabhre vā svapnato 'pi na//98//
S01divyav_u:21899: 506.017 atha maitrakanyako bodhisattvastāsāmapsarasāmaparijñātagamanaprayojano dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi padavīmāruhya vrajan sadāmattakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
S01divyav_u:21900: 506.018 tasmādapi nagarādaṣṭāpsarasaḥ sasambhramaṃ niḥsṛtya taṃ mahāsattvaṃ praveśayāmāsuḥ/
S01divyav_u:21901: 506.019 tatrāpyaticiraṃ ratimanubhūya pratiṣiddhamānagamanakriyastenaiva dakṣiṇena pathā gacchannandanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ dadarśa/
S01divyav_u:21903: 506.021 tatrāpi ciraṃ krīḍāṃ sevitvā tasmādapi brahmottaraṃ nāma nagaraṃ prayayau/
S01divyav_u:21904: tatrāpi dvātriṃśatāpsarobhiḥ prabhūtasatkāraṃ viṣayasukhaṃ bhuktvā tāḥ prāha--
S01divyav_u:21905: 506.023 icchāmi gantuṃ tadahaṃ bhavantyo mā matkṛte śokahrade śayīdhvam/
S01divyav_u:21906: 506.025 saṃpātabhadrāṇi hi kasya nāma viśleṣaduḥkhāni na santi loke//99//
S01divyav_u:21907: 506.027 sthitvāpi yenaiva ciraṃ viyogaḥ śatroḥ kṛtāntādbhavitāntakāle/
S01divyav_u:21910: 507.001 [507]viśleṣaduḥkhāya ratiṃ prayānti teṣāṃ paro nāsti vimūḍhacetāḥ//101//
S01divyav_u:21911: 507.003 athāpsarasastāḥ samastāstadgamanaviyogaśokaropitahṛdayāḥ sasambhramāḥ kamalakuvalayakunmalavilāsā nalinya iva śirasi viracitobhayakamalāñjalayaḥ prāhuh--
S01divyav_u:21912: 507.005 asmāsu te kartumaniṣṭamiṣṭaṃ kathaṃ hi bhaktipraṇayārpitāsu/
S01divyav_u:21914: 507.009 gatvā tannagaratrayam yadapi he svāminnihāpyāgataḥ saṃprāptā viṣayopabhogamadhurāḥ saṃpattayaste ciram/
S01divyav_u:21915: 507.011 gantavyaṃ na punastvayā subahunā proktena kim yāsi cet saṃsmartāsi vipatsamudrapatito vākyaṃ hi no duḥkhitaḥ//103//

S01divyav_u:21919: 507.016 niyojanīyāḥ suhṛdo 'suhṛdbhir yasmin hite karmaṇi nityakālam/

S01divyav_u:21921: 507.020 divyaṃ prāpya sukhaṃ pure ramaṇake saṃcoditaḥ karmaṇā āyāto 'smi niṣevaṇāya paraṃ saukhyaṃ sadāmattakam/
S01divyav_u:21922: 507.022 saṃprāpto 'smi tataḥ svakarmakuśaleneṣṭaṃ puraṃ nandanaṃ tasmādāgatakasya yūyamadhunā pronmūlitā bhūmayaḥ//106//

S01divyav_u:21927: 508.001 [508]samprāptamātrasya tu tatkṣaṇena dvāraṃ ca pusphoṭa kapāṭabhāram/
S01divyav_u:21938: 508.019 kṣaṇādabhūttannagaraṃ ca sarvaṃ bhrāntaṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ sa dadarśa bhītaḥ//111//
S01divyav_u:21939_0: 508.021 tato maitrakanyako bodhisattvaḥ paśyati sma tamatidāruṇākārapramāṇaṃ krūrājvalanamālāliṅgitamudāreṇa
S01divyav_u:21941: 508.025 kiṃ nāgo 'si suro 'si kinnaravaro yakṣo 'si kiṃ mānuṣaḥ kiṃ vidyādharasainikaḥ kimasi vā daityaḥ piśāco 'si vā/
S01divyav_u:21942: 508.027 kiṃ vākāri bhavāntareṣu bhavatā karmātiraudraṃ svayam yāsyāmi vyasanaṃ duruttaramidaṃ bhujyaṃ phalaṃ krandayat//112//
S01divyav_u:21944: 508.030 nāhaṃ nāgo naiva yakṣo na devo daityo nāhaṃ nāpi gandharvarājaḥ/
S01divyav_u:21945: 509.001 [509]rakṣo nāhaṃ nāpi vidyādharo 'pi jātistulyā saṃpratīhi tvayā naḥ//113//
S01divyav_u:21947: 509.004 kiṃ karma bhramatā tvayā kumatinā saṃsāradurge kṛtam yenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam/
S01divyav_u:21949: 509.007 nānāduṣkarakārikā bhagavatī saṃsārasaṃdarśikā tatra śreyaḥsukhopapādanaparā matsnehabaddhāśayā//114//
S01divyav_u:21950: 509.009 yāṃ loke pravadanti sādhumatayaḥ kṣetraṃ paraṃ prāṇināṃ daivāveśavaśādakāryagurukastasyā jananyā mahat/
S01divyav_u:21951: 509.011 sādho prāskhalayaṃ śiraḥpraharaṇaṃ pādena pāpāśayas tenedaṃ jvalitānalaṃ śirasi me cakraṃ bhramatyāyasam//115//
S01divyav_u:21952: 509.013 atha bodhisattvastasya puruṣasya pravacanapratodena saṃcoditahṛdayastāṃ parajugupsāmātmanyanupaśyannāha--
S01divyav_u:21954: 509.017 yeṣu svayaṃ doṣaguṇeṣu magnas taireva lokaṃ kathamaṅkayāmi//116//
S01divyav_u:21959: 509.025 kiṃ na paśyati karmāṇi balavanti śarīriṇām/
S01divyav_u:21961: 509.027 ye baddhā viṣayeṇa duḥkhanigaḍenāyāsakarmotkaṭe ye tyaktvā guruvākyamandhamatayaḥ pāpāśrayaṃ kurvate/
S01divyav_u:21962: 509.029 muktāḥ karmabhireva duḥkhanigaḍapracchedaśūraiḥ śubhair mānuṣyam yadavāpya mūḍhamatayo dūre sthitā jarmiṇah (janminah?) //119//
S01divyav_u:21963_0: 509.031 atha tasya vacanānantarameva karmānilāvegotkṣiptamiva taccakraṃ ciṭiciṭāyamānadahanakaṇacayodgāraraudraṃ
S01divyav_u:21963_1: tasya mūrdhnaḥ samabhyudgamya maitrakanyakasya bodhisattvasya śiraḥ pravidārayad bhramitumārabdham /

S01divyav_u:21975: 510.020 yuddhe mriyante bahavo narendrā yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//124//
S01divyav_u:21977: 510.024 mahodadhau yānti narāḥ praṇāśam yayā tayecchālatayā gato 'ham//125//

S01divyav_u:21997: 511.020 atha bodhisattvastena mūrdhnā pravidāhajena tīvreṇa duḥkhena samākulahṛdayo 'pi sattveṣvananteṣu samutpāditatīvrakāruṇyāśayastaṃ puruṣamābabhāṣe--

S01divyav_u:22000: 511.026 kṛtvā duścaritaṃ svamātari jagatkṛtsnam yadi prodvahedetatprajvalitāgnirāgakapilaṃ cakraṃ bṛhanmūrdhani/
S01divyav_u:22001: 511.028 kalpaṃ kalpasamairahobhirayutān voḍhuṃ cirāyotsahe sattvārthaṃ pratipadyamānamasya hi me cittaṃ na saṃkhidyate//134//

S01divyav_u:22016: 512.023 bhagavati guṇarāśau saṃprasādya svacittaṃ svagṛhamiva sa sādhurdyāmayāttatkṣaṇena//141//
